item.text: rgyagar skad du/ leka pradz+nyA ba ti/ bod skad du/
'jig rten bzhag pa/ ban po dang po/// thams cad
mkhyenang la phyag 'tshal// da ngor// sdem la/ rnams
blablabya// dang ni rgya mtsho dang// ngan song rnams dang gling dang shing// klurgyul
dngani mkha' lding dang// rgyal chen 'gro dang 'dunas rnams// 'di skad bdag gos
thes pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
bamagon med zos sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/dge
slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'jig rten gyi khams ni gsum po 'di dag yin te/ gsum gang zhen/ stong spyi phud kyi
'jig rten gyi khams dang/ stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po' 'ojig rten gyi khams so//
stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhen/ ji tsam du stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na nyi ma rnam par snang ba rnams kun tu 'khor zhing
phyogs snang bar byed pa'i bar yin te/ zla ba stong dang/ nye ma stong dang/ re rgyal po ra rib stong dang/ shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang/
'dzam bu gling stong dang/ nub kyi ba lang spyod stong dang/ byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang/ rgyal chen bazhi pa'i lha rnams stong dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum
thu@#// ba stong dang/ 'thababral ba stong dang/ dga' ldan stong dang/ 'phrul dga' stong dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed stong dang/ tshangs
pa'i 'jig rten stong ste/ dge slong dag 'di na stong spaphud kyi 'jig rtenagyi khams zhes bya'o// stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhen/
stong spyi phud kyi 'jag rten gyi khams gang yin pa de lta bu stong la ni/ stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o// stong gsum gyi stong chen
po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhen/ stong gnyeg pa bgama'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang yin pa de lta bu stong la ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
gyi khams zhes bya'o// dge slong dag de lta bu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams shar phyogs su mtha' med cing mumed la/ 'jig
ba 'am zhig bar gnas shing/ 'chags pa 'am chags par gnas te// gzhan 'jig cing gzhan zhig par ga nas la/ gzhan 'chags shing
gzhan chags par gnas so// dge slong dag de lta bu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po la 'juge rten gyi khams rnams lha dang/ nub dang/ byang gi phyogs su nyathab med tsang mu med la// 'jig
'am zhig par gnas shing bachags pa 'am chags nga ' gnas te/ gzhan 'jig cing gzhan zhig par gas te/ gzhan la chags shing gzhan chags par gnas so// dge slong dag dper na/
bar snang las char nga 'a 'bru shang rta'i srogang tsam 'bab ste/ chu'i rgyun rnams rab tu 'bab pa na mtshams sam bar chad med pa de bzhin du/ dge slong dag ngas lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mal las
las pas/ shar phyogasasu de lta bu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamasamathob med cing mumed la/ 'jig pa 'am zhog par gnasaShashade/ bachags pa'i m chags par gnas/
te/ gzhan 'jig cing gzhan zhig pa gnas / gzhan 'achags shing gzhan chags par gnas pa dang/ de bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang byang gi phyogs su de snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'
'jig rten gyi khams rnams mtha' mad cing mu med la/ 'jig pa 'am zhig par gnas nigashang/ 'chags pa 'am/ chags par gnas te/ gzhan 'jig cing gzhan zhig par gnas la/
gzhan 'chags shing gzhis chags par gnas pa de dag kyang mthong ngo zhes bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyi'i gnas khang gi nang du gshegs so// dab tshan tshe
dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'khor de nyid kyi nang du ba dus par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ dge slong rnams la smras pa// dang
ldan pa dag jitsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par bstan pa dang/ ji ltar shing rta'i srog shing gi dpes bstan pa 'di'i gas te ngo mtshar to/ de la stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/

ri chen po nyis stong yod de/ ri rgyal bo ra reb skong dang/ khor yug gar stong rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na rgya mtsho chen po nyis stong yod de/ nang gi rgyu mtshochen po stong dang/
phyi rol gyi rgya mtsho chen po stong rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ ngan song gsum stong yod de/ sems can dmyal ba stong dang/ dud 'gro dang/ la dgas stong rnams so//

stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gling chen po bzhi stong yod de/ shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang/ 'dzam bu gling stong dang/ nub kyi ba glang spyod stong dang/ byang gi sgra ma snyan stong rnams
so stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ shing chen po bzhi stong yod de/ 'dzam bu gling pa'i shing 'dzam bu stong dang/ rgya mtsho'i 'graman shal mara'i mthon po stong dang/ lha ma yin
gyi ris kyi tshid tA pa ta la stong dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i sa brtol stong rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ klu'i rigs bzhastong yod de/ klub rigs sgo nga las skyo bstong
dang/ mngal nas skye bstong dang/ drod gsher las skye ba stong dang/ rdzus te skye ba stong rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ nam mkha' lding gi rigs bzhi stong
yod de/ nam mkha' lding gi rigs sgo nga 'das skye ba stong dang/ mngal nas skyi ba stong dang/ drod gsher las skye ba stong dang/ rdzus te skye ba stong rnams so// stong pa phud kyi 'jig
rten gyi khamasan/ rgyal po chen po bzhi stong yod de/ yul 'khor srung stong dang/ 'phags skyes po steng dang/ mig ma bzang stong dang/ rnam thos sras kya bu stong rnams so//
stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'gro ba lnga po lnga stong yo da de/ sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba stong dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dgas dang/ ltadang/ mi'i 'gro ba song/
rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'dun sa chen po nyis stong yod de/ lha'i 'dunas chos bzang stong dang/ lha ma yan gyi 'dunas nor bzang zhes bya ba stong
rnams so// 'jig rten bzhag nga 'as tshigs dang po'o// sdom la/ skye gnas ra dang rol mtshodang// de bzhin sems can dmyal brgyad gzhan// sanas can
gnas dgu rab bshad de// las lam bcu po de bzhin no// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'dod pa'i skye gnas gsum yod de/ gsum gang zhen/ sems can
'dod pa nye bar gnas pa dag yod de/ gang dag 'dod pa nye bar gnas pa rnams la/ dbang phyug gi dbang byed pa dag ste/ 'di lta ste/ ma kha cig dang lha rnams so/
du 1 'di ni 'dod pa'i skye gnas dang po'o// sems can 'dod pa sprul pa dag yod de/ gang dag 'dod pa sprul pa rnams la dbang phyug ga dbang byed pa dag ste/ 'ad lta// 'phrul dga'
lha rnams so// 'di dag ni 'dod pa'i skye gnas gnyis pa'o// sems can 'dod pa gzhan gyi sbal pa dag yod de/ gang dag 'dod pa sprul pa rnams la dbang phyug gi dbang byed pa
ngag ste/ 'di lta ste/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams so// 'di ni 'dod pa'i spyi gnas gsum pa 'o// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasan/ bdaba'i skyi gnas gsum yod de/
kya sems can gang dag lus 'di nying la dban pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang/ bde bas sman par byed cing/ yongs su rlan par byed de/ yongs su tshim par byed cing/ yongs su khyab par
byed pa dag yod do// de dag lus 'di nyid la dbenang las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang/ bde bas brlan par byas shing/ yongs su brlan par byas te/ yongs su tshim par byas shing/
yongs su khyab par byas nas/ bde bar reg nga ra gnas so// de dag bde ba de dang/ bde ba la gnas pa des rang zhing yun ring por gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ tshangs ris kyi lha
0 rnams so// 'ad ni bde ba'i skye gnas dang po'o// sems can gang dag lus 'di nyid la ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang/ bde bas rlan par byed cing/ yongs su rman/
par byed da/ yongs su tshes par byed cing yongs su khyab par byed pa dag yod do// de dag lus 'di nyidi la ting nge 'dzin las skyes nga 'i dag kha ba dang/ bde bas badran par byed cing/
yongs su brlan par byed do/ yongs su tshim par byas shang/ yongs su khyab par byas nas/ bde bar reg pa la gnas so// de dag bde ba de dang/ bde ba la gnas pa des tshe ring zhing
yun ring por gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ 'od gsal gyi lha rnams so// 'di ni bad ba'i skye gnas gnyis pa'o// sems can gang dag lus 'di nyid la dga' ba med nga 'i bde bas rlan par byed
nga/ yongs su man par byed de/ yongs su tshim par byed cing/ yongs su khyab par byed pa dag yod do// de dag lus 'di nyid la dga' ba med pa'i bdadA brlan par byas dang/
yongs su brlan par byas te/ yongs su tshim par byas ngashang/ yongs su khyab par byas nas/ bde bar reg pa la gnasaso// de dag bde ba de dang/ bde ba la gnas pa des tshe/
ring zhing yun ring du gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ dag rgyas kyi lha rnams so// 'di ni bdeba'i skyi gnas gsum pa'o// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasan/ gser gyi'i chen po bdun/
stong yod de/ ri'i rgyal boganya' shing 'dzin stong dang/ gshol mda' 'dzin stong dang/ sang ldeng na stong dang/ bltan sdug stong dang/ rta na 'dzin stong
dang/ mu khyud 'dzin stong dang/ ri'i rgyal po rnam par 'dud stong rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rol mtsho chen po bdun stong yod do/ gnya' shing 'dzin gyi rol mtsho/
stong dang/ gshol mda' 'dzin gyi stong dang/ sang ldengacan gyi stong dang/ bstan sdugag stong dang/ rta rna rib stong dang/ mu khyud 'dzin gyi stong dang/ rnam par 'dud kyi rol mtsho stong
sa rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad stong yod de/ sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos stong dang/ thig nag stong dang/ bsdus
gzhom stong dang/ ngu 'bod stong dang/ ngu 'bod chen po stong dang/ tsha ba stong dang/ rab tu tsha ba stong dang/ sems can dmyal bachen po mnar med pa stong rnams so// stong spyi phud kyi
'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can gyi gnas dgu stong yod de/ sems can gzugs yodapa lus tha dad cing 'du shes tha dad pa dag yodad/ 'di lta ste/ ma rnams dang lha khacig
go/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas dang ngo 'o// sems can gzugs yo dang lus tha dad la 'du shes gcig pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ tshangs ris kyi lha dang pobyung ba gang yan pa de
nga ga ge// 'di ni sems can gyi gnas gnyis pa'o// sems can gzugs yod pa lus gcig la 'du shes tha dad pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 'od gsal gyi lha rnams so// 'di ni sen
can gyi gnas gsum ba'o// sems can gzugs yod pa lus gcig cing 'du shes gcig pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams s// 'danasems can gyi gnas bzhu
pa'o// sems can gzugs yod pa 'du shes med cing 'du shes dang bral ba dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ 'du shes med pa'i lha rnams so// 'di nasems can gyi gnas lnga pa'o// 'dan
sems can gyi gzugs med pa rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams
yid lami byed ngas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du
skyes pa'i lha rnams so// 'dan sims can gyi gnas drug pa'o// sems can gzugs med pa rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las ya nga dag par 'das te/ rnam shes
mtha' yas sa nA ma nas/ rnam shes ma spyan yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du skyes nga 'a lha rnams so// 'di ni sems
na gyi gnas bdun pa'o// sems can gzugs med pa gang dag rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched 'a sa yang dag par bdas te/ ci yang med do
snyam nas/ ci yang med ba'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ ci yang med pa'i skyonached du nye bar 'gro ba ba lha rnams te/ 'di ni sems can gyi gnas brgyad
pa'o// sems can gzugs mod po rnams thams cad ci ya nga med pa 'i skye mched las yang dag pa 'a 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med man skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dag yod
da 'di lta ste/ 'du shes med 'du shes med man sku mched du skyes pa'i lha rnams so// 'dan sems can gyi gnas dgu pa 'o// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ mi dge ba bcu'i
na la a yo rje gal la [- ]pa/ 'dod log par g.yem pa dang/ rdzun ngu ba dang/ dram dang/ tshig rtsub po dang/ tshig 'khya' pa dang/
brnab sems dang gnod sems dang/ lag ngar lta pa rna saM ga tsad nga shas cher kun tu bsnyen cing bsgoms te lanamang du byas pas na sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye bar
'gyur ro/ de bas shAs chung pa dang/ de bas ches yang bas ya ra ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang/ de bas ches yang bas ni tshapar ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang/ bas ches
yang bas nangu 'bod chen po'i ste// de bas chesangashas chung ba dang dengs ches yang bas ningu 'bod du'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang/ de bas ches yang bas nabasdus gzhomadu'o// de
bsams81na chung ba dang/ de bas ches ya nga bas na thag nag tu'o// de bas ches sa chung ba dang/ de bas rkyen yang sa nasems can dmyal ba chen po ya nga sos su skye bar 'gyur ro/
la byin pa la re na nga shas cher kun bstan cing bsgoms te la namang du bya ba dang/ 'dod pas log par g.yen pa dang/ brdzun du smra ba dang/ bram dang/ tshig rtsub po dang/ ga 'khyal
pa dang/ brnab sems dang gnod sams dang/ log par lta ba shas cher kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te lan nga du byas pa ni sems can dmyal ba chen po ma'amed pa la skye bar 'gyur ro//
de las ches na chung ba dang de bas ches dang bas ni rab tu tsha bar 'o// de bas che sa chung ba dang/ de bas rgyus yang bas 'tsho bar ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang/ de bas ches
yang bas na ngu'abod chen ngo ra de bas chos9sa nyung ba dang de bas ches yang bas na ngu 'bod du'o// de bas ches ngashas nyung ba dang/ de bas ches yang bas nibasdus pa/zhom du'o//
de bas ches nas rung ba dang nga las tshes 15 sa ni thig nag tu'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang/ de bas ches yang bas na sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos su skyo bar 'gyur ro//
[S]/// 'jig rten gzhag pa las tshigs gnyis pa'o/// sdom la/ mkha' lding las lam bcu po dang// myong ba dang na bkres dang zas// bdud rtsi'i
[j]31 phyis char pa dang/ mug bde dang bcu tshan no// stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na klu'arigs bzhi stong rgya mtsho chen po na gnas so// nam mkha' lding gi rigs bzhi stong shing shal
ma la' mthon po la gnas ta sgong las skyes pa stong dang/ mngal nas skyes pa stong dang/ drod gsher las spus pa stong dang/ rdzus te gas nga stong rnams so// nam mkha' lhang

'khaM/ sgo nga las skyes pa na badra' ba'i phyir/ klasgo nga la skye ba 'byin par byed de/ mngal nas skye ba sa yan/ drod gsher las skye ba ma yin/ rdzus te skye ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci ste/
da len na de nyid thal ba bzhin du byed nga ba 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ nan mkha' lding mngal sa skya ba ni bza' ba'i phyir/ klu sgo nga las skye ba dang/ mngal nas skye ba 'byin par byed du/ drod gshen

las skye ba ma yin/ rdzus te skye ba ma ya na no// de ci'i phyis zhen/ ci ste de lan na de nyid thal ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// nam mkha' ldang drod gtamar las skye ba nibaza' ba'i phyir

klu sgo nga las skya ba dang/ mngal nas skye ba dag 'byin par byed de/ drod gsher las skye ba dang/ rdzus te skya ba ma yanano// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ci ste de len na de nyid thal ba bzhin du byed par
'gyur ba'i phyir ro// nam mkha' lding rdzus te skye ba ni bza' ba'i phyir/ klu sgo nga las skye ba dang mngal nas skye ba dang/ drod gsher las skye ba dang/ rdzus te skye ba 'byin par byed do// ka
la klu chen po bskal par gnas shing sa 'dzin ng dag yod do// de dag kyang gang zha na/ 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nya dga' gnyis dang/ klu'i rgyal po rtag rgal dang/ klub rgyal/
po btang bzung dang/ klu'i rgyal po gzican dang/ klu'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang/ klu'i rgyal po nag po chen po tshan po che dang/ klu'i rgyal po a la'i 'dab rnams te/ 'di dag dang gzhan yang klu
chen po bskal par gnas shing sa 'dzin ba nam mkha' lding dag gas 'byung bar ma nus pa gang zhan pa de dag ni/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul myong bar byed cing sa sor myong bar byed de/ bzhes shing
rab tu shes la kun tu rab tu shes so// ji skad du shin tu mthu che ba'i klu dag yod de/ mtha' bsrung zhing chun gnas te/ de dag lha ma yAn dag dang g.yul 'gyed ngas/ 'di dag brgya byin gyi ni
dbungaya nga yan// stobs kyang che zhing mthu che klayani te// shin tu drag po dgra thabs sna tshogs can// lhaman rnams dang lhan cag g.yul 'gyed pas// dad brgya byin gyin g.yul yang 'dun
zhes kyang bya'o// bar gyi sdom la/ dga' bo nye dga' rtag rgyal dang/ btang bzung dang nagazi byin dang// yul 'khor srung dang nag po che// e lab 'dab ma phyim yin// stong
spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ dge ba bcu la kya 'am dag yod de/ srog gcod pa spong ba dang/ ma byin par len pa dang/ 'dod nga sa log par g.yem pa dang/
[r///]brdzun du smra ba dang/ dra ma dang/ tshig rtsub po dang/ tshig 'khyal pa spong ba dang/ brnab sems med pa dang/ ba rtsod sems med pa dang/ yang dag pa'i lta ba rnams so// srog gcod pa spong
bshas cher kun tu bstan drung bsoms te 'a na mang du byas pas ni bdazhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par sku ngar 'gyur ro// de bas sa ras chung ba dang/ de bas ches ya nga
bas na 'phrul dga' rnams su'o// de bas ches rags chung ba dang/ de bas ches yang bas na dga' ldan pa rnams su 'o/ nga bas sa shas chung ba dang/ de bas ches ya nga bar pa na 'thab bral ba
rnams su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang/ de bas che yang bas ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams su 'o// de bas ches sa chung ba dang/ de bas ches yang bas na rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams
su'o// de bas ches shas chung ba dang/ dbas ches yang bas na ma rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// ma byin par len pa dang/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang/
brdzun du smra ba dang/ phra ma dang/ tshig rtsub po dang/ ga 'khyal pa spong ba dang chags nas che da pa dang/ gnod sems med pa dang/ yang dag par lta ba a cher kun tu bsten cing
bsdoms te lan mang du byas pas ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// de bas ches shas chung ba dang/ de bas ches yang ngag ni 'phrul dga' rnamis/
su'o// de bsachesangs chung pa dang/ de bas ches yang bsan dga' ldan rnams su'o// de bas chos ngs chu ba dang/ de bas ches yang bas na 'thab bral ba rnams su'o// ngo bas sa
shas chung ba dang/ de bas ches yang bsanasum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams su'o// dbas ches sa chung ba dang/ dengs ches yang bsan rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams su'o// de bas ches shas nyung ba
dang/ de bas ches yang bas na ma rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyo bar 'gyur ro// ci ste ma rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ba na yang/ srog gcod pa spong bas na[@] ring bar 'gyur ro// ma bunapar

le napa spong bas na los spyod chen por bgyur ro// 'dod pa log par g.yem pa spong bas na chung ma dang 'gran zla med par 'gyur ro// brdzun du smra ba sbyong bas na skur pa mang bar mi 'gyur ro// phra ma
sbyong bas mdza' bo dang dbye bar mi 'gyur ro// tshig rtsub bo song bas na yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra thos par ma 'gyur ro// tshig 'bya la pa spong bas ni tshig mnyan bar 'gyur ro// chags sems med/
bas na 'dod chags che bar ma 'gyur ro// gnodasams med pas na zhe sdang che bar mi 'gyur ro// yang dag par lta bas na gti mug che bar ma 'gyur ro// bar sdom na/ skur pa med
dang mdza' ma dpe// de bzhin yid du 'ong ba thos// nyan pa'i tshig tu 'gyur bas// yi gabazhi ni brjod pa yin// sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang
na nalas gang gi rnam par sminapas/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por tsha'i tshad bskal par len pa 'di mchog yin no// dud 'gro myong bar 'gyur ba 'a 'os rnams kyi nang na ni las kyi rnam/
par smin pas/ sa srungs kyi bus sa srungs kyi bu nyid dang/ rab tu brtan pas rab tu brtan pa nyid thob pa 'di mchog yin no// ya dgas kyi skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyin ng na ni
ts+tso lasu gang gi rnam par smin pas/ rgyal po gshin rjegashan rje'i 'jig rten gyisems can rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa 'di mchog yin no// ma'i skye gnas myong bar 'gyur
ba'i las rnams kyi nang nan las gang gi rnam par smin pa sa/ nga las nu nga las nu nyid thob pa 'di mchog yan no// rgyal chen zha' ris myong bar 'gyur ba ba 'as rnams kyi nang na ni las

mtsho gang gi rnam par sman pas/ rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed pa bad mchog yin no// sum cu rtsa gsum pa myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na na las gang gi
rnam par smin pas/ brgya byin gyis brgya byon nying thob pa 'di mchog yin no// 'thab bral myong bar 'gyur babs rnams kyi nang na na las gang gi rnam par sman pas/ rapa 'thab bral gyis rab
'thab bral nyid thob pa 'di mchog yin no/ dga' ldan myong bar 'gyur ba las rnams kyi nang nan las gang gi rnam par smin pas dga' ldan gyis yongs su dga' ldan nyid thob pa 'di mchog
yin no/ 'phrul dga' thob pa'i las rnams kyi nang nan las gang ga rnam par smane pas/ ba sprul gyis rab sprul nyid thob par 'gyur ba ba na mchog yin no// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
myong bar 'gyur ba'i las rnams kyi nang na na las gang gi rnam par smin pas/ dbang byed kyis dbang byed myong bar 'gyur ba 'dini mchog yin no// jaltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la bkris pa/
dang sgom pa yod pa da bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang/ nub kyi ba lang spyod rnams dang/ byang gi sgra ma snyan pa rnams dang/ rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams dang/ sum cu rtsa
gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba rnams dang dga' ldan pa rnams dang/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do// de yan chad la
bkres pa dang ston pa med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gam rnamag 'a kha zas 'di lta sta/ 'bras chan dang/ zan dang/ phye dang/ ngag dang/ 'khur ba rnams yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus
'phags ngo dang chub kyi ba lang spyod pa la yang yod do// byung ga sgra mi snyan gyi ma rnams ni ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sA lu 'bru za'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams ni dri'i zag dang/
bdud rtsi'azas za'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba rnams dang/ dga' ldan pa rnams dang 'phrul

dga' ba rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang de bau0f10na no// deyan chad la ni khan gyi sa med do// rgyal chen ba'i bdud rtse na rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang
dkar po rnams so// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba rnams dang/ dga' ldan pa rnams dang/ baphrul dga' ba rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang/
byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ras pa rnams la ni med do// de yan chung 5nga med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi ma rnams la yang bshang ba dang gcib yod pa de bzhin du/ shar gyi lus
'phags bo rnams dang nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang/ byang gi sgra pa sAn rnams la yang ngodod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnamar la ni med do// de yan chad la yang med de// dza ltar 'dzam bu'i
gling gi ma rnams la ni/ char 'bab mkhas pa dang/ char 'bab mi na khas pa rod pa de ba na du/ 'ashar gyi lus 'phags de rnams dang/ nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do/ 'byung
gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang 2 rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams la ni med do// de yan la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi ma rnams ga 'degs pa dang mu ge yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi
lus 'phags po rnams dang/ nub kyi ba lang sprod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra man pa rnams dang/ rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams la na med do// de yan chad 'a yang med do// ji ltar
'dzam bu'i gling gi ma rnams la ni 'jigs pa dang bde ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang/ nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byung gi sgraa snyan gyi ma rnams 'ad/
mad do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba rnams dang/ ngag ldan pa rnams dong/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa
rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris pa rnams la na med do// de yan chad la yang med do// 'jig rtan bzhag pa las tshigs gsum pa'o// sngon la/ nyo tshong mdog dang khang
pa dang// gdang ba dang ni bzhi g gos dang// yang ba rdul rab bskye ba dang// tha dad bag ma len dang bcu// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling ga mi rnams la/ nor ram/ 'bru 'am/ gsar ram/ dngul
gyi nyo tshong bya ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang/ nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra ma snyan gyi ma dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la na med
do de yan chad la yang med do// 'daskad du 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams lan/ nor dang 'bru rnams kyis nyo tshong byed do// shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams la ni ras dang bcas rnams kyis bod
nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams kyis ni ba lang dang nor bu rnams kyis so zhes zer ba yang yod do// ji tsAr 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyi mdog nag po dang/ dkar po dang/ sngo bsangs

du dang/mdog skya snar rnam pabazhi yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang/ nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams kyang de bzhan no/ dbyang g sgra ma sAn gyi sa rnams ni mdog gcig pa ste dkar ro//

rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi mdog gi rnam pa bzhi ste// sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po rnams so// rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhani du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab

bral ba rnams dang/ dga' ldan pa rnams dang/ 'phrul dag lab rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris lha rnams kyin dog gcig pa ste dkar po'o// tshangs ris pa rnams

( ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rna rang nga/ tshangs pa chen po ba rnams dang/ 'od chung ba rnams dang tshad med 'od pa rnams dang/ bod gsal ba rnams dang/ dge chung ba rnams dang/ tshad
med dge ba rnams dang/ dge rgyas pa rnams dang/ sngonamed pa rnams dang/ bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang/ 'bras bu che ba rnams dang/ ma tshab rnams dong/ mi gdung ba rnams dang/ gya nom snang ba
rnams dang [7]8shan tu mtho ba pa rnams dang/ log man gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin ni// nam mkha' mtha' yas skyemachod pa dang/ rnamar shes mtha' yas skye mched pa dang/ ciyang med pa'i skye mched/

ba dang/ 'du shes med 'du shes med tshan sku mched pa rnams la na 'dog mad do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi ma rnams kyi khang pa nyid du byas pa dang/ ched du byas pa ma yin pa dang/ khang bzang dang/ sa khang

rnams yod pa de bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi ma rnams kyi khang pa na ched du byas ba ma yin nga 'a sa khang ngo// rgyal chen

bzhi pa rnams kyi gzhal med khang na ched du byas pa dang/ ched du byas pa ma yin pa'o// rgyal chen bzhi nga' lha rnamaMsakyi ji lta ba pa du 1 sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba rnams dang ga' ldan

ba rnams dang// 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no// tshangs a pa rnams kyi gzhal med khang rnams ni ched du byas pa ma'an pa'o// tshangs ris pa rnams kyi lta
ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang/ tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang/ bod chung ba rnams dang/ tshad med 'od pa rnams dang/ 'od gsol ba rnams dang/ dge chung ba rnams dang/ tshad
mad dge ba rnams dang/ dge rgyas pa rnams dang/ sprin med pa rnams dang/ bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang/ 'bras bu che ba rnams dang/ mche ba rnams dang/ mgadung ba rnams dang/ rgya
nom snang ba rnams dang/ gshin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang/ 'og min pa rnams kyi gzhal med khang pa yang ched du ma byas pa yin no// gzugs med pa rnams la na khang pa yang med do// ji ltar
'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la gdange ba dang/ bgob 'di lta ste/ bal gos dang/ gna' sa dang/ gso sa dang/ thar ma ras dang/ stabs da yapa dang
ko tam pa'i ras dang/ rtswa du ku la'i gos dang/ a bar n ti'i ka'i gos dang/ ras dang/ be'u sa yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang/ nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la pung

yod do// byang gi spru ma sA na kye ma rnan tan dpag bsams shade las byung ba' gos gyon no// ji ltar byang gi sgra ma snyan gyi ma rnams dang ga bdams kyi rigange ba byung nga' gos gyon pa b.ru ngu la
chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba rnam pa dang/ dga' ldan pa rnams dang/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams
( bzhin no// tshangs ra'i kya lha rnams gos gyon bzhin du skye'o// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang/ tshangs pa chen po pa rnams nga/ 'od
chung ba rnams dang/ tshad med 'od pa rnams dang/ 'od gsal ba rnams dang/ dge chung ba rnams dang/ tshad med dag ba rnams dang/ dge rgyas pa rnams dang/ sprin med pa rnams dang/
bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang/ 'bras bu che ba rnams dang/ ma chob rnams dang/ ma gdung ba rnams dang/ gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang/ shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang/ log man gyi lha rnam pa kyang
gos gyon bzhin du skya'o// byang gi skam snyan gyi ma rnams kyi dbag bsams kyi gang las byung ba'i gos kyi shing rnams na rnam pa pal ste/ sngon po dang/ sur po dung 'amar po dang/ dkar po rnams so/
bzhag gos kyang rnam pa bzhi sta/ sngon po dang/ ser po dang dmar po dang/ dkar po rnams so// dpag bsams shalas byung ba'i gos kyang rnam pa bzhi ste sngon po dang/ der po'i
dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po rnams te/ dang ga bsams kyashang las byung ba'i gos ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu skyes pa 'am/ bang med dag gis sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de la yul ga 'dud
bar byed ngo// rgyal chen ng zha'i lha rnams kyi ngapag bsams kyi shang las byung ba'agos kyashang rnams kyang rnam pa bzhi ste/ sngon po dang/ saMr po dang/ dmar ngo bo dang/ dkar po rnams so// bzha
gos kya rnam pa bzhi ste// sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang/ dkar po rnams so// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos rnams kyang rnam pa bzhiste/ sngon po dang ser po dang/
dmar po dang/ dkar po rnams te/ dpag bsams kyi shang las byung ba'i gos ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu lha 'am/ lha'abu mo dag gas sems bskyedas thag tu sa la ga 'dud par byed do// de'i lag tu 'ong
bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba rnams dang/ dga' ldan pa rnams dang/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang/ gzhan
kya// 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no// tshas ris kyi lha rnams la ni/ dpag bsams kyi dpe las byung ba'i gosamad do// de yan chad la yang mad do// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling/

gi mi rnams la yang gding ba dang/ bgo ba lci ba dang/ mang ba yodapa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags bo rnams dang/ nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod de/ byang gi sgrami snyan gyi mi rnams kyi dpag

bsams kyi zhing las byung ba'i gos la srang gcig yod do// rgyalachen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyini srang phyed do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyin srang gi bzhin gcig go/ 'thab bral ba rnams kyi ni byung

[%, ]brgyud chu gcig go/ dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni srang gi bcu drugacha gcig go/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi ni srung gisumacu rtsaganyisakyi cha gcig go/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi dpag bsamasakyi

shing las byung ba'iges ni srong gi drugacu rtsa bzhi'i cha gcig yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal du med pa'i gos yin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa mdun na 'don rnams

dang tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang/ 'od chung ba rnams dang/ tshad med 'od pa rnams dang/ 'od gsal ba rnams dang/ dgachung ba rnams dang/ tshad mad dge ba rnams dang/ dag rgyas pa rnams dang/ sbyin mad
ba rnams dang/ bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang/ 'bras bu che ba rnams dang/ mib rnams dang/ mi gdung ba rnams dang/ gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang/ shan tu mthong ba ba rnams dang/ 'og min

gyi lha rnams kyi yang gzhal du med pa'i gos yin// nyi zer gyi rdul gyi bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i chagacigani rdul phrarab yin no// rdul phra rab bdun la ni rdul phra mo gcig go/ rdul phra mo bdun la ni nyi zer gyi rdul
gcig go/ nyi zer gyi rdul bdun la niri bong gi rdul gcig go/ ri bong gi rdul bdun la ni lug rdul gcig go/ lug rdul bdun la ni glang rdul gcig go/ glang rdul bdun la ni sro ma gcig go/ sromabadun

la nas bag nagacig go/ a ba ba/nabadunal nib ti ga gcig go/ ba te gabadun la ni nas 'bru gcig go/ nas 'bru bdun la ni sor gcig go/ sor sti shu rtsa bzhi la khru gang ngo// 'dzamabu gling pa'i mi rnamA

ni kha cig ni khru tshad nga ltar brtsis pa'i khu phyed dang bzhipa'o// kha cig ni khru ba'i pa'o// shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams ni khru brgyad pa'o// nub kyi ba lang spyodopa rnams ni khru bcu drug go/ byang gi sgra mi snyan ng

rnams ni khrusumacu rtsa gas pa'o// rgyal chen bazhi pa'i lha rnams kyi lus thob pa ni rgyang grags kyi chab 'i chagacig go/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi nirgyang grags phyed do// 'thab bral ba rnams kyi ni rgya grag

kyis zhi gsum pa'o// dga' ldan ba rnams kyi ni rgyang grags gcig gi/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi ni rgyang grags gcig dang rgyang grags ba'i cha'o// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni rgyang grags phyed dang

gas so// tshangs ris ba rnams kyi ni dbag tshad phyed do// tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad phyed dang gcig go/ tshangs pa chen ngo u0f7c ba rnams kyi ni dengag tshad phyed dang gnyis so//'od chung ba rnams kyi
ni dpag tshad gnyis so// nga mad 'od pa rnams kyi dpag tshad bzhi pa'o// 'ong ga la ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad brgyad do// dge chung ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad bcu drug go/ tshad med dug

ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad sumacu rtsa gnyis so// dge rgyas pa rnams kyi ni dpagad phug cu rtsa bzhi'o// sren mad pa rnams kyini dpag tshad brgyanyi shu rtsa lnga'o// bsod nams skyes pa nas keni dpag tshang

brgya lnga bcu'o// 'bras buchub 'i lha rnams kyi na dpag tshad lnga brgya'o// 'du shes med pa 'i sems can rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra'o// micha ba'i lha'i lus thob pa ni dpag tshad stong ngo// migadung ba/ mang ka ri/

dpag tshad nyis stong ngo// gya nom snang ba rnams kyi nadapag tshad bzhi stong ngo// shan du mthong ba po rnams kyi ni dpag tshad brgyad stong ngo// 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lus thob pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad khri drug stong ngo//

gzugasamang pa'i lha rnam sa la nibasags pa'i lus mad do// 'thoragyi rdul gyi bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'amagacigane rdul phra rab yin no// rdul phra rab badun lanartul phramo gcig go/ rdul phra mo bdun la ni ther gyi rdul
gcig go/ nyi zer gyi rdul bdun la ri bong gi rdul gcig go/ bongagi rdul bdun lazhilug rdulagacig go/ lug rdul bdun 'anib dang rdul gcig go/ glang rdul bdun la ni srom gcig go/ sor bdun 'a ni a ba
gan gcig go daa ba gan bdunalan bti ka gcig ga/ ba ti ka bdun la nas 'bru gcig go/ nas 'bru bdun la ni sor gcig go/ sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi la khru gang ngo// 'dzam bu gling gi misnyoms kha gnigo

0 lu tshad 'di lta bu brtsis pa'i khru brgyad pa gon no// kha cig ni khru bcu pa'o// shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams ni khru shu pa'i// nub kyi nga 'khang so= kyi ni khru bzhi bcu'o/ byang gi sgra mi sAn gyi mi rnams ni dpag

bsams shing lasubyung ba'i gos khru brgyad cu pa gyonano// rgyal chen bazhi'ilha rnams kyang lus la ci dran pa'i gos gyon no// rgyal chen bzhi'i ji lta ba nga/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba

rnams dang/ dga' ldan pa rnams dang/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang/ tshangs ris pa rnams dang/ tshangs pa'ir ngun na 'don pa rnayus dang/ tshangs pa chen po pa rnamA
dang 'ong chung ba rnams dang/ tshad mad 'od pa rnams dang/ 'od gsal ba rnams dang/ dge chung ba rnams dang/ tshadamang ngang ba rnams dang/ dge rgyas pa rnams dang/ srin med pa rnams dang/ bse
nams skyes pa rnams dang/ 'bras bu che ba rnams dang/ mi chab rnams dang/ mi gdung ba rnams dang/ gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang/ shin tu mthengab pa rnams dang/ 'og ma na pa rnams kyi yang de

bzhinano// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gima rnams la dbang po tha dad de/ khacig la ni pho'i dbang po yodapa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang/ nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnam sa dang/ byang gi sgra
misan pa rnams dang/ rgyal chen bzhisa'i lha rnams dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba rnams dang dga' ldan pa rnams dang/ 'phrulaM dga' ba rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang
byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni mo'i dbang po yang med/ pho'i dbang po yang med do// tshangs sa pa rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du changs pa'i mang ra
'don pa rnams dang/ tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang/ 'od chung ba rnams dang/ tshad med 'od ba rnams dang/ 'od gasal ba rnams dang/ dge chung ba rnams dang/ tshad med dge ba rnams dang ge rgyas/
b rnams dang/ sprin med pa rnams dang/ bsedanams skyas pa rnams dang 'bras bu che ba rnams dang/ mi che rnams dang/ mig dung ba rnams dang/ gya nom snangang rnams dang/ gnyan sa pa
[%/ ] rnams dang/ 'og min pa rnams kyang de baTitano// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams 'bag ma gtong ba dang/ bag ma len pa yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang/ bkub la lcer
ba rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgramisan pa rnams la ni da do// rgyalan bzhi pa'i lha rnams dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba rnamus dang/ ga' ldan nga ras nga 'phrul
dga' ba rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod de// tshangs ris kyi rnams lan bgamagatong ba yang med/ bgam len pa yang med do//tshangs se lha rnam sa la ltung nga zhin
du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang/ tshongs pachen po pa rnams dang/ 'od chung ba rnams dang/ tshad med 'od pa rnams dang/ 'od gsal ba rnams dang/ dge chung ba rnams dang/ tshad med pa s+sa
dang dge rgyas pa rnams dang/ sprinamadapa rnams dang/ bsod nams skyas pa rnams dang/ 'bras bu ba rnams dang/ mi che ba rnams dang/ mi gdung ba rnams dang/ gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang/ shin
tu mthong ba pa rnams dang/ gomin gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshigs bzhi pa'o// sdom la/ grang dang dus tshigs mtshan mo dang// pha ma dang ni rje
khol dang// nor dang 'bru dnga mngon bar zhen// bcu tshan yongs subarjod pa yin// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gima rnams la shin tu grang ba dang/ shin tu tshab yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'jigs de
rnams dang/ nub kyi ba langaskyod pa rnams la yod do// byang gi sgra'agan ba rnams la namad do// rgyalachen bzhi'i lha rnams la yang med do// de yan chad la yang med do// ji ltar 'dzam bu glingagi mi
rnams la dus tshigs 'di lta ste/ dgun dang/ dpyid dang/ dbyar dang/ ston yodapa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang/ nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang/ byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnamA
dang/ rgyal chen bazhi pa'i lha rnams dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba rnams dang/ dga' ldan pa rnams dang/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnamA
la yang yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni dus tshigs med do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'imadun na 'don pa rnams dang/ tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang/ 'od rung
b rnams dang/ tshad med 'od ba rnams dang/ 'od gsal ba rnams dang/ dge chung ba rnams dang/ tshad med dge ba rnams dang/ dge rgyas pa rnams dang/ sI nasong pa rnams dang//
da 1 bsong nyams skyes pa rnams dang/ 'bras bu che ba rnams dang/ ma tshib rnams dang/ migadung ba rnams dang/ gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang/ shan tu mthong ba pa rnams dang/ 'o rer spyi lha rnams
yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la mtshan mo dang nyin mo yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus raphags po rnams dang/ nub kyi ba 'ang sed pa rnams nga/ byang gi sgra ma pa/bas pa
rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba rnams dang/ dga' ldan pa rnams dang/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ltarna[']ya nga se da
do[]tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni mtshan mo med/nyin mo yang mang ngo// tshangs rnas pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdunan 'don rnams dang/ tshangs pa chen po nga rnyam sa dang
ba'i dang / tshad med 'od pa rnams dang/ 'od gasal ba rnams dang/ dgachung ba rnams dang/ tshad med dgaba rnams dang/ dgergyas pa rnams dang/ sprinamad pa rnams 8nga/ bsod nams skyes
'bras bu che ba rnams dang/ mi chab rnams dang/ mi gdung ba rnams dang/ gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang/ ani tu mthong ba pa rnams dang/ 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji t+ta 'angs bu
glange gi mi rnams la pha dang ma yod pa bzhinadu/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang/ nubakyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang/ byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang rgya pa chen bka'i lha rnams dang/ su
rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thababrelab rnams dang/ dga' ldan pa rnams dang/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la ya ste nga de/ chungos ringe kyi lha rnams la
ma yang med/ pha yang med do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdunan 'don ba rnams dang/ tshangs pa chen pong rnams dang/ 'od chung ngu rnams dang/ tshad med 'od pa
rnams dang/ 'od gsal ba rnams dang/ dgechung ba rnams dang/ tshad med dge ba rnams dang/ dge rgyas pa rnams dang/ sprin med pa rnams dang/ bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang/ 'bras bu
che ba rnams dang/ mi che ba rnams dang/ mi gdung ba rnams dang/ gya nom snang ba rnams dang/ shan du mthong ba pa rnams dang/ 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhinano// dzi 'khrug gi
rnams la rje bo dang bran yodapa bzhin du/ sha gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang/ nub kyi ba lang sprod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan ng 'a mi rnams la ni po ya nga// nga
rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ni rje bo dang bun yang yod do// rgyal chen bzhi kelha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba rnams dang/ dag pa da na 'phrul
dga' ba rnams dang/ ba ]zhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams lani rje bo yang mad/ bran yang med do// tshangasangs sa nga ba pa/
du tshasapa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang/ tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang/ 'od chung ba rnams dang/ tshad med 'od pa rnams dang/ 'od gsal ba rnams dang/ dge chung nga rnams dang/ tshad med dge
rnams dang/ dge rgyas pa rnams dang/ srin mad pa rnams dang/ bsod nams skyas pa rnams dang/ 'bras bu che ba rnams dang/ mi che ba rnams dang/ mi gdung ba rnams dang/ gya nom snang ba par d+ha sa

u0fc4 dang/ shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang/ 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la/ nor dang 'bru yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags bo rnams dang nus pa

langasod pa rnams la yang yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams la ni 'bru ni yod lanor med do// rgyalachen bzhi'i lha rnams la ninor ni yod la 'bu ni mad do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha sas ji lta ba bzhane
sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba rnams dang/ dga' ldan ba rnams dang/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni pa

yang med/ 'bru yang mdade// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang/ tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang/ 'od chung ba rnams dang/ tshad med 'od pa rnams dang/ 'od gsalang
rnams dang/ dge chung ba rnams dang/ tshad med dge ba rnams dag/ dge rgyas pa rnams dang/ sprinam dpa rnams da[E ]/ bsang nyamasaskas pa rna sa dang/ 'bras bu che ba rnams dang/ mi che ba rnams dang
gdung ba rnams dang/ gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang/ 'gan mthong ba pa rnams dang// 'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la/ ba'am ma las/bu bo'am/ bu mo
'am/ rje bo 'am/ bran nam/ nor ram/ 'bu la mngon par zhenang yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'gasapo rnams dang nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams la yang yod de// byang sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams

la nici yang zhen pamad do// rgyalachen bzhi'i lha rnams la ni/ 'brum gtogs pa gzhan rnams lta ma u0f7cna par zhen pa yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnam
dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang/ dga' ldan pa rnams dang/ wu'u dga' ba rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams n ci la yang mngon pad+masnyen ma
do tshangs nges pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang/ tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang/ 'od chung ba rnams dang/ tshad med 'od nga rnams dang/ 'od gsal ba rnams dang 3
dge chung ba rnams dang/ tshad med dge ba rnams dang/ dge rgyas pa rnams dang/ swe named pa rnams dang/ bsod nams rgyas pa rnams dang/ 'bras bu che ba rnams dang// mche ba rnams dang/ mi gdung pa
rnams dang/ gya nom snang bapa rnams dang/ shin tu mthong ba pa rnams dang/ 'ogaman gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// 'aNig na nga'ag pa rigs lngapa'e
'jig rten bzhag pa bam po gnyis pa// sdom la/ zla mtshan 'akhrig dang khu chu dang/ bsgyur dang ni chu klung brag/ sal gang po dang/ rgyu las 'kher pe sgra ltar
'a dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la/ bud med zla mtshan can dang/ sbrum ma dang/ bubatsa' ba yod pa bzhin du/ zher gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang/ rub kyi nga 'a nga srong rnams dang/ bya smra ba nga
la yang yod de// rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyis/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyi khye'u dang/ bu mo la lnga lon pa ji tsam nga de bzhin du/ lha 'am/ 'dus drug nan pang pa semanyan pas
s+ya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de na lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo dag 'di snyam du/ 'di ni bdag gi bu 'am/ bu mo'o sAm du sar sa so// khye'u dang bumo dag kyang ar 'di bdaka drug gis 'am pha'o
snyam du sems so// sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyini lo drug len pa ji tsam pa bzhin no// 'thab bral ba rnams ni lo bdun len pa ji tsam pa ba na no/ sa/ ro na kaM ba pa dalen pa jicam
ba bzhin no// 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyin lo dgu len pa ji tsam pa bzhin no// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyi khye'u dung/ bu mo lobatu []nad pa dang du
lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo phrag ba 'am/ phang par se mas can rdzus te skya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ den lha kham/ lha'i bu mo 'di snyam du 'di na bdag gi bu 'am/ bu mo'o snyam dusams/ 'u dang/ bum
de dag kyang 'disAm du 'di ni bdag cag gi ma 'am pha'osAm dusamasaso// tshangasaris kyi lha rnams ni theg ma nas lus kyiyan lag dang nying lag thams cad rdzogs par skyanying/ 'chi ba na de kho na

bzhinano//tshangs sa kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang/ tshangs pachen po pa rnams dang/ 'od chung ba rnams dang/ tshad med 'od pa rnams dang/ 'od gs ba rnams dang
dge chung ba rnams dang/ tshadamed dag ba rnams dang/ dge rgyas pa rnams dang/ sprinamad pa rnams dang/ bsod nams byas pa rnams dang/ 'bras bu che ba rnams dang/ mche ba rnams dang/ mi gdung ba rnam
nga/ gya nomasnang ba rnams dang/ shin tu mthong ab pa rnams dang/ 'ogamin gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// gzugs med pa rnams lan/ lus kyi gzugasamad de/ de bas na de bzhin ska ba ngan
mngon/ 'chi 'a 'o ba yang mi mngon no// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams mi tshangs par srid pa 'khrig pa'i sa stanapa naganyis kyis gnyis sbyor ba yod pa bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phagasapo rnamA

dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang/ byang gi sgramisnyan pa rnams dang/ rgyalachen bzhi'i lho rnams dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyang de bzhinano// 'thab bral ba rnams 'khyud pa tsam gyis gdung
bzhi bar 'gyur ro// dga' ldan rnams kyi ni lag pa nas bzung ba tsam gyis so//'phrula dga' ba rnams kyisan bgad pa tsam gyis so// gzhan 'phrul dang sa kyi nas
pa tsam gyis gdung ba zhi bar 'gyur ro// tshangs ris pa rnams la 'dod chags med do// tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams/ tshanges pen po rna[]sang 'o
chung ba rnams dang/ tshad med 'od pa rnams dang/ 'od gsal ba rnams dang/ dge chung ba rnams dang/ tshad med dag ba rnams dang/ dge rgyas pa rnams kyang/ sprin med pa rnams dang so nam sgyu
rnams dang 'bras bu tshab rnams dang/ mi chab rnams dang/ mi gdung ba rnams dang/ gyanom snang ba pa rnams dang/ 'an tu mthong ba pa rnams dang/ 'og min gyi lha rnams kya pa sa ye'o//
ltar 'dzam bu gling gimi rnams la/ khumu mi gtsang ba 'byung ba yod pa de bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang/ nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang/ bang ge sgra'i sAn pa ma rnam lnga dang
da bzhin no// rgyal chen bazhi'i lha rnams kyin rlung 'byung ngo// rgyalachen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba rnams dang/ dga' ldan rnams dang/
'phrul dga' ba rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi yang de bzhinano// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ni 'dod chags med do// tshangs sa pa rnams ji ltar/ zhir tsha4sa'amana'
pa rnams dang/tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang/ 'od chung ba rnams dang/ tshad med 'od pa rnams dang/ 'od gsal ba rnams dang/ dgechung ba rnams dang/ tshad med dge ba rnams dang/ dge rgyas ba rnams
dang/ sngon med ba rnams dang/ bsod nams skyas pa rnams dang/ 'bras bu che ba rnams dang/ mi che ba rnams dang/ mi gdung ba rnams dang/ gya nom snang ba pa rnams dang/ shAn tu mthong ba pa rnamA
dang/ 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no// sems can dmyalab pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' nibaskal pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba na yod do// dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tsho'itshad kyimatha' nibaskal pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chib ni yod do// mi rnams kyi ni zhagasum sdugang yin pa de ni/ yi dgas rnams kyi ne zhagagacig ste/ tin

zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla babcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ yi dgasa rnams kyitsho'atshad kyi mtha' ni/lod lta bur brtsis pa'i lo lnga brgya sta/ bar m dor 'baniyod do//demi'i lta brtsis nani la lnga

stong yod do// shar gyi lus 'phags kyi mi rnams kyitsho'id kyi mtha'an les brgya lnga bcu ste// bar ma dor 'chi ban yod do// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha'ani lo lnga brgyaste/ bar ma do

'ban yod do// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi tsho'atshad kyimatha' ni lo stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chib med do// ci'i phyi'i byang ga sbami snyan gyi mi rnams labar ma dor 'chi ba med chen/ de dag la bdag gi ba med
cing yongs su 'dzin pa med de/ tshengs shing khyad par du 'gro ba yin pas/ de'i phyir byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la/ bar mdo ramib med do// 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams la ni sar skye ba dang

mar 'grib pa yod de/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams res 'ga' ni tshodapag tu med par 'gyur/ nges 'ga' ni tshu la bcu par 'gyur ro// mi rnams kyi tsholo lnga banu gang yin pa de ni/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams gtan zhag

gcig yin no// nyin zhag de sum nu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la logacig ste/ rgyal chen bazhi'i lha rnams kyi tsho'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis nga 'i lha'i lo lnga brgya so/ bar ma dor 'chib na yod
do de mi'i ltar brtsesan lo sa ya phrag dgu yod de/ de nas Mms can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zab ba shugs la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba

chen po yang sos kyi sems can rnams kyi tsho'i tshad kyi mtha' na/ lod lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo lnga brgya sku/ bar ma dor 'chi ba na se dado// de mi'i ltar ngs na lo bye ba phrag 'bum drug khri nyis

stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo brgyagang yin pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ nyan zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyas la 'gacig ste/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha

rnams kyi 'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i lo stongoste/ bar ma dor 'ching na yod do// dema'i ltar brtsis na la bya ba srog gsum dang sa ya phrag drug yod do// de na sems can dmyal ba chen
po tsagi nag gi ni zhag gcig go/ nyin zhagade sumacu lazlab gcig/ zla ba bcugs la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po thoge nag gi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo de lta bur brjes pa'i sems can la

ba'i lo stang sku/ bar ma dor 'chib ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtses na la bye ba phrag 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang/ bye ba phrag dgu khri drug stong yod do// mi rnams kyi lo nyis brgya gang yin pa de ni/ 'thab bral gyi
lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag de sumacu la zla ba gcig go/ zlab bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' na la de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha'i sa

stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chib na yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag bcu pazhi dang/ sa ya phrag bzhi yod de/ de nas ms can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom gyi nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag de sum cu
la zub gcig/ sgrub bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen bo bsdus gzhom gyi sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha'an/ lo delta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i las stong

bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag gcig dang/ bye ba phrag sum 'bum drug khri brgyad stong yod do// ma rnams kyi lo bzhi brgya gang yin pa de ni/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nyin

zhag gcig go/ nyin zhagade sumacu la zla ba gcig/ sgrub bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnamu tshe'i tshad kyi mtha'ani/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i lo bzhi stong ste/ bar mdor 'chi ba ni yod de/
demi'i ltar ba n lo bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang/ bye ba phrag gsum dang/ sa ya phrag drug yod do// de nasems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod kyi nyin zhag gcig go/
nyin zhag desum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig sta/ sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod kyi sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' na/lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal

ba'i lo bzhi stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chib na yod do// de ma'i ltar brtsisan lo bye ba phrag brgya dang/ bye ba phrag sa ya gnyis dang/ bye ba phrag dgu 'bum bzhi khri bzhi stong yod do// ma rnams kyi lo brgyad
zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi tshor tshad kyi mthar na// ga' ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' na/ lo

de lta bur brtsis pa 'a lo brgyad stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chib na yod do// de ma'i ltar brtsasan la bye ba phrag nyis brgya sum cu dang/ las ya phrag bzhi yodado// de ni sems can dmyal chen po ngu 'bod chen
po 'i nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal bachen po du 'bod chen po'i tsho'i tshad kyi mtha' ni/ lo'o lta bur brtsis pa'i

sems can dmyal ba'i lo brgyad stong yod de/ bar ma dor 'chib na yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa drug dang/ bye ba phrag sa ya gsum dang 2 bye ba phrag lnga 'bum lnga khri nyis stong
sayod do// ma rnams kyi le stong drug brgya gang yin pa de ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yanano// nyani zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/

ga zhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi chu'i tshod kyi mtha' na/le de lta bur brtsis pa'i lha' la khri drug stong ste/ bar ma dor 'gab na yod do// de ma'i ltar brtsasin la bye ba phrag dgu brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig dang/
las ya phrag drug yod de/ dran sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po
tshapa'i sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi tshong tshad kyi mtha'ani/ lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i lo khri drug stong ste/ bar m dor 'chibani yod do// de mi'i ltar brtsisan
labya ba phrag lnga brgya dang/ lo bye ba khrag sum cu dang/ 'bya ba phrag sa ya brgyad dad/ bzhi 'bum dang/ la bye ba phrag khri drugastod yod de// bar gyi sdom la/ dgu dang gsum

dang bcu bzhi dang ni lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang// nyis brgya dgu brgya rnams nam yi grangs kyis lha tsher bshad// de bzhin gcig dang bcu gnyis gcig dang brgya dang drug cu dad/ lnga brgya dag na sems can

dmyal ba pa la tshor bshad de// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi tshod kyi mtha' na bskal pa'i byed de/ bar ma dor 'du ba na yod do// sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba'i tsho'i tshod kyi mtha' na bsal
pa'i phyid de/ bar ma dor 'chi pan yodado// tshangs pa'i mdunan 'don pa'i lha rnams kyi tshad kyi mtha' na bskal pa gcig ste/ bar ma der 'drib na yod do// sems can

dmyal ba chen po mnar mad pa'i tsho'i tshad kyi mtha' na bskal pa gcig ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba na yod do// tshangs pa chen po pa'i lha rnams kyi tsho'i tshod kyi mtha' na bskal pa byed dad gnyis te/ bar ma do

'chib na yod do// 'od chung ba rnams kyi 'i tshad kyi mtha' na bskal pa gnyis te/ bar ma dor 'chi ban yod do// tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' na bskal pa bzhi ste/ bar ma dor 'chi bani

bod do// 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyi tsho'atshad kyi mtha' na bskal pa brgyad de/ bar ma dor 'chi ban yod do// dge rlung gi lha rnams kyi tsho' tshod kyi mtha' na bskal pa bcu drug ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ban

yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams spyi'i tshod kyi mtha'an bskal pa sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ bar mdor 'chi ba na med do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi tshi'i tshad kyi mtha'an bskal pa drug cu rtsa bzhi ste/

bar ma dor 'chi ban yod do// sngan med kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' nibaskal pa brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba na yod de// bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams kyi rtsa'i tshad kyi mtha' na bskal

pa nyis brgya lnga bcu ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba na yod do// 'bras bu chab 'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' na bskal pa lnga brgya sto/ bar ma dor 'chiban med do// 'du shes med pa' sems can rnams

kyang de dang 'dra'o// mchi ba'i lha rnams kyi tshor tshad kyi mtha' nabe la pa stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chib na yid do// ma gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' nabaskal pa nyis stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi

ba na yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi tsho'i tshad kyi mtha' na bskal pa bzhi stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba na yod do// shan tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' nabaskal pa brgyad stong ste/

bar m dor 'chi ba na yod do// 'og man gyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' na bskal pa khri drug stong ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba na yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mchod pa'i tsho'i tshad kyi mtha' na bskal pa

nyi khro ste/ bar ma dor 'chib na yodado// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched pa'i lnga rnams kyi tsho'i tshad kyi mtha' nabasal pa bzhi khro ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ban yod do// ci yang med pa'i skye mched pa'i

lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha'an bsal pa drug khri ste/ bar ma dor 'chi ba na yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched pa'i lha rnams kyi tsho'i tshad kyi mtha' nabaskal pa brgyad khri ste/ bar ma
dor 'chi ban yid ngo// 'di nas byang phyogs na ri nag po gsum yod de// ra nag po gsum po dag ga byang phyogs na ri nag ngo gzhan gtum yong ngo// nag po gsum po de dag ga byang phyogasan yang
ra nag po gzhan gsum yod do// ri nag po gzhan gsum po dod pa de dag gi byang phyogs na ra'i rgyal po gangs zhes bya ba yod do ri'i rgyal po ba ngas kyi byang phyogs ra'i rgyal bo skyes kyi ngad ldang
zhes bya ba yod do// ji'i rgyal po gros kyi ngad ldang nas dang ga tshad bcu'i tshu rol mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ ma dros pa zhes kyang bya'o// mtshochen po chu zhes bya ba de la

chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do// mtha' skor du ni dpag tshad nyis brgyayod de/ dbyibs legs shang blta na sdug la mdzes pa chu bsal zhing rgyu spang rtsa lta bas gang la me
tog ut+pal dad/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu ta dang/ pad+ma dkar bos kun tu khebs par 'dug go/ de'i nang nas klung chen po bzhi 'di lta ste/ gang+gA dang/ saMn du dang/ si ta dang/ pad shu dang/ 'di

rnams 'bab ste/ gang+gA na shar phyogs nas glang po cha' kha nas 'bab ste/ de ni mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu shar phyogs kyi lcamatsho chen po

'gro'o// sin du na lho phyogs nas khyu mchog gi banas 'bab ste/ de na mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba g.yas phyogs su bskor nas/ klung lnga brgyadang lhan cig tu lho phyogs kyi rgyu mtsho chen por 'gro'o//

bkashu nanub phyogasanas rta' khanas 'khab ste/ den mtsho chen po chu zhes bya ba g.yas phyogs su bskoranas/ klung lnga brgya dang lhan cag tu nub phyogs su mtsho chen por 'gro'o// si tan byang phyogs

nas seng ge 'i kha nas 'bab sta/ de na mtshonapo chu zhes bya ba g.yas phyogs su bskor te klung lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'gro'o// 'di skad du/ byang phyogs kha dgur 'gyur
ba ya4 chumatsho la nga de gzhan dag kyang// des na mtshonanu zhes bya// tha dad rgyun rnams 'byung gnas yod/ chu klung gang+gA sin du pag shu dang// sa rta dba' rlabs dbu ba'i 'dre nga btsan// 'bab

! thams cad bsal ba'i chu pani de/ chus gang khyang par bazhi 'bab ste/ phyogs bcu kho ra khor yug dag nas 'byung// gang+ge shar phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro ba ste// sin du lho phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro ba 'o//
pagasha yang na nub phyogs rgya mtshor 'gro dang byang phyogs mtshu da 'gro/ chu klungarang cha chen po 'di ga rmi mchog tu bzang zhing so sor 'bab pa ste// re re zhing yang lnga brgyakhyer nas ni//
chu ya rgyun rnams rgya mtshortan por 'gro/ zhes par bya'o/raM nga ljangade'i bya dang katsa ba sa su / gyi ga spyobs lha ma yan gyi ngos zhes bya ba yod de chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ nying
du dpa gatshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya/ 'phang du ropagar phyang da bcu pa bya[-- ]shang blta sdug2 mdzes pa zhig yod de/ de'anang gas gzha yang dbyibs leg

shing blta na sdug pa mdzas pa gsar gyi phyi ma bdal cang/ tsan dan gyi chu'i chag chag btabapa sta/ derayang du ma 'ong par M shang ngam gseg ma lam/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na de ma ma yin pa rnams
kyis rlung gi mthus phyi ril du 'dor ro// de'i lor ra khor yug tu gser gyi brag bya skyibs brgyad stong yod de/ de thams cad kyang dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ dngag gi nang gi sa
gzhi rnams kyang dbyibs legs shing bltan sdug pa la/ mdzas pagasar gyi bye ma bdal cing/ tsan dan gyichus chag chag btab ste/ deng yang yang du ma 'ong dra bang ngan/ gsag

[Dr ]ma 'am/ gang ca yang rung ba dag lhangan/ dem ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyishu/ zheng du dpagatshad phyed dang gnyis med nga/ dbyibs lags

shang blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal zhing/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ der yang yadi du ma 'ong ba'i rishang dang/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na/

de ma ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gyi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// brag bya skyabs lha ma yan gyi ngos de'i byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shun shang sA la'i rgyal po chen po rab tu brtan pa zhes bya ba sA la'i 'phreng/
ba ram pa bdun gyis bskor ba zhig yod de/ sA la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa de'i rtsa ban/ 'dom bcu bzhi thur du zug go/ sa la'i 'phreng ba dang po'i rtsa ba na 'dom bcu gsum thur du zug go/ gnyis
pa'i na bcu gnyis so// gsum pa'i n bcu gcig go/ bzhi pa'i ni bcu'o// lnga pa'i ni dgu'o// drug pa'i na nga rgyad do// sA la'i 'phreng ba bdun pa'i rtsa ba ni 'dom bdun thur du zug go/ sA la'i
rgyal po rab tu brtan pa de'i yal ga dang/ lo ma dang/ yan lag rnams kang yin pa de na/ sA la'i 'phreng ba dang po la thug go/ 'phreng ba dang po'i yal ga dang/ lo ma dang/ yan lag gang yan pa de ni/
gnyis pa la// gnyis pa'i gang yin pa de na gsum pa la'o// gsum pa'i gang yin pa de na bzhapa la'o// bzhi pa'i gang yin pa de na lnga pa la'o// lnga pa'i gang yin pa de na drug pa la ro// drug/
pa'i gang yan pa de na bdun pa la'o// sA la'a'aphreng ba bdun pa'i yal ga dang/ lo ma dang/ yan lag gang yin pa des nanam mkha' khyab par 'dug go/ de'i nang gi sa gzhi yang dbyibs
legasashang blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal cang/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa ste/ der yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gsog ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhangan/
der ma ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad cha shu/ zheng du dpag tshad phyir dang gnyis yod de/ dbyibs legs shang blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/
der yang yid du ma 'ong ba'i shing ngam/ gseg ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhungan/ de ma ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// sA la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i nge'ar/
phyogs dpag tshad nyishu na/ rdzung bu dal gyis 'bab ces bya ba chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu ste/ mog+ga' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya yod pa/ dbyibs legs shangekalta na/
sdug la mdzes pa chu bsal zhing/ chu sbrang rtsi lta bu s gang ba/ ma tog ut+pal dang/ pad+madang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar pos khebs pa zhig yod de/ rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab kyi nang ga pats+tsha'i
lo ma rnams che zhing mchog tu che sta/ 'di lta ste/ ba lang yeg pa tsam mo// pad+ma'i sdong bu rnams che zhing mchog tu mesta/'di lta ste/ gshol mda' tsam mo// pad+ma'i me tog

[D1 ] rnams che zhing mchog tu che sta 'di lta ste/ shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam mo/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta sta/skyes bu chen po'i brlatsam mo// ro mngar zhing mchog dumangar te
'di lta sta/ sbrang bu'i sbyad tshe ma skol ba bzhinano// bcad na yang 'o ma 'dzag ge/ rdzing bu dal gyi 'bab kyi khor khor yugan/ rdzing bu brgyad stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang dbyibs legs

shang blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ chu bsal zhang sbrang rtsi lta bu s gang ngo// de dag gnang gi pad+mo'i lam rnams kyang che zhing mchog tum ste/ 'di lta ste/ ba lang g.yog patsam mo// pad+ma'i sdong bu

rnams che zhing mchog tu cha ste/ 'di lta ste/ gsolamada' tsam mo// pad+ma'i me tog rnams che zhing mchog tu che ste/ 'di lta ste/ shing rta'i 'phang lo lnga tsam mo// pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams che zhing mchog tu
choste/ 'di lta sta/ skyes bu chen po'i brla tsam mo// ro mngar zhing mchog tu mngar te/ 'di lta sta/ sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi ma skol ba bzhin no/ bcad na yang 'o ma 'dzag go/ de lam srid du dpag
tshad nyashu/ zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gsar gyi bye ma bdal zhing/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ der yad yad du mi

'ong ba 'dishang ngam/ gsog ma 'am/ gang ci yang rung ba dag lhung na de ma ma yin pa rnams kyis/ rlung gi mthus phyi rol du 'dor ro// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul
na spyod pa rab tu brtan pa zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod do// me tog ku mu da'i mdog ltar thal kar 'dug pa/ yan lag bdun shin tu legs par gnas te/
de'i mgo yang dabyabs legs shang blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste sngo zhing srog chags 'dam bu chu/ shel gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar la ma ba drug yod de/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i

srid du dpag tshad phyed dang gsum/ zheng du dpag tshad gcig/ 'phang du dang ga tshad phyed dang gnyas/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad bdun yod do// de'i 'khor glang po che brgyad stong yod de/ de dag thams
cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa// ma tog ku mu da'i mdog ltar thal kar du 'dug cing/ yan lag bdun shin tu legs par gnas te/ de dag gi mgo yang dbyibs legs shang bawA

na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sngo zhing srog chags 'dam bu chu shel gyi mdog ltar dbus mang ba mche badrug yod pa sha stag ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa de 'khor dang bcas pa/ dgun zla ba bzhi

ni brig bya skyabs lha ma yin gyi ngos kyi nang na gnas shing 'khod do//dpyadi zla bzhi napishang sA la'i rgyal po rab du brtan pa'i nang na gnas shing 'khod do// gang gi tsha glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa brag
bya skyabs lha ma yaji gyig kyi nang na gnas shing 'dug pa'i tshe na/ glang po che brgyad stong po rnams 'di lta ste// glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa bsrung ba dang/ sba ba dang/ mdzes pa

bya ba'i phyir/ brag bya skyibs brgyad stong dag gi nang na nye bar gnas shing 'khod do// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa brag bya skyabs lha ma yan gyi ngos kyi nang nas shing sA la'i rgyal bo rab tu

brtan pa'i nang na 'gron/ re 'ga' ni tha mal pa'i tshul gyis 'gro/ res 'ga' na 'di lta ste/ lha 'am lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing/ mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas

! glang po che de dag thams cad kyi nang na dbang che bar grags pa gang yan pa de nyid kyi mgo 'am rgyab du zhon te/ sal san dang phag rdzob pa dag rgya cher byeng cange 'gro'o// gang gi tshe glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu

brtan pa shang sA la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa'i nang na gnas shang 'dug pa de'i tshon/ glang bo che brgyad stong po de dag kyang 'dalta ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa bsrung ba dang/ snga ba dang/

mdzes par bya ba'i phyir/ shang A la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bdun bo dag gi nang na khanang du bltas shing 'khod de// shang sA la'i phreng ba dang po'i nang na 'bod pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du bltas

shing 'khod do// gnyis pa'i nang na 'dug pa'i gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du lta'o// gsum pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du lta'o bzhi pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang u0f38na pa

de dag kyang kha nang du lta'o// lnga pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang khanang du lta'o// drug pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang yin pa de dag kyang kha nang du lta ro/kungun pa'i nang na 'dug pa gang yan

pa de dag kyang kha nang du bltas te 'khod do// gang gi tsho glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa shudi sA la'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa nas/ rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab par 'gro ban res 'ga'anathi ma la

pa'i tshul gyis 'gro'o// res 'ga' na 'di lta ste/ lha 'am lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu chab gang yang rung ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ glang po che de dag thams cad kyi nangan dbang

che bar grags pa gang yin pa de nyid kyi mgo bo 'am/ rgyab tu zhon te/ sil snyan dang/ phog rdeb pa dag kya da rgya cher byed cing 'gre'o// gang ga tsha glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa sdong bu dal gyis

'bab kyi nang du zhugs nas/ rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa// de'i tshe glang po che brgyad stong po dag 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa de bsrung ba dang/ sba ba dang/ mdzes par

bya ba'i phyir/ rdzing bu dal gyi 'bab kyi mtha' kho ra khor yug kun nas bskor te/ kha nang du bltasangashang ra byed do// mdang gi tsha glang po che'i rgyal bo rab du brtan pa ljang bu dal gyis 'bab kyi nanganartse zhing

dgar la dga' dgur spyad nas/ phyir 'byung ba de 'tshada'i nang na glang bo ma bang che bar grags pa gang yin ba de rdzong du dal gyis 'bab kyi nang na zhugs nas pad+ma'i rtsa ba rnams blangs te shun tu bkrus shing rab tu
bshal nus/ glang bo che'i rgyal bo rab tu brtan pa la 'bul/ gang gi tshaglang po che'i rgyal po rab tu brtan pa zos shang 'thungs te/ 'grongs par gyur pa de'/ glang bo che gzhan

brgyad stong po de dag kyang rdzing bu re rer zhugs nas/ rtsa zhang dga' la dga' dagur spyod de/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba dag blangs shing shin tu bkrus shing rab tu bshal te za'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang

po che'i rgyal po g.yul don spyod pa rab tu brtan pa' mthun di tsam mo// soms na thams cad nasrungs ma dang bcasangashang srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ sbad pa dang ma 'bral te 3sems can gang dbang chung bar

grags shing bsod nams chung la/ gakhri ba rdzing chung ba de dag ni/ brgya phrag mang po dang/ stong phrag mang po la gcig bsrung ste// dper na ba lang mang po dang/ lug brgya phrag mang po dang/ stong phrag mang po

la gtsagi gsi bsrung ba de bzhani du/ sems can gang dbang chung bar grags shang/ bsod nams chung la/ gzi brjing chung ba de dug na brgya phrag mang po dang/ stong phrag mang po la gcig bsrung ngo// sems
can bang che bar grags shang bsod nams che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag na'icu phrag mang po dang/ stong phrag mang po dag gas gcag bu bsrung ba ste/ dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'am// de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la brgya phrag mang po dang/ stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig pu bsrung ba de bzhin du/ sems can gang dbang che bar grags shing/ bsod
0 nams che la gzi brjid chab de dag la brgya phrag mang bo dang/ stong phrag mang po dag gis gcig pu bsrung ngo// 'dir smras pa/ ci ste sems can thams cad srungs ma dang bcas/ srung ba dang/ skyob
pa dang/ sbyad pa dang ma 'bral na ci'i phyir 'tshab yod par 'gyur/ smras pa/ sungs ma mthu chung ba zhig yanin ni/ de la zal gyis gnon pa las 'tshe ba yod do// srungs mabag med cing bag med/
pa la gnasapa zhig yanin/ de'i bag mad pa'i rgyu las kyang 'tsho ba rnams yod do// srungs ma gnyis lhan tsag 'thun par gyur pas kyang zil gyis mnananas 'tshe bar byed do// mi rnams chos ma

yan pa la spyod tsang ma rigs pa spyod pa yanin/ de dag na de dag gi chos ma yin pa skyed pa dang/ ma rigs pa spyod pa las kyang 'tsho ba yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma 'di lta
ste lam po che dang/ srang dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo dang/ sbos 'tshongapa'i gnas rnams dang/ me tog gi 'phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang/ zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams ngang b.rung ba
'tshor ba'i gnas rnams dang/ rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang/ gsod byed kyi gnas rnams su bkod pa dag yod de/ zla ba phyed kyi tshes brgyad la rgyal po chen po bzhang po de dag ga ga neshas/
'tsho ba rnams kyis lam po ra dang sang nga gzhi dngo dang sumado chang rgyalatshong lA gnas rnams dang ma tog gi 'phreng ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang/ zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams
dang btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang/ rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang/ bsod byed kyi gnas rnams na su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad byul te//
cas de dag gas skyen par tshor na nad dag gnas mthon po la 'god do// caste de dag gas skyon par ma tshor na nadi dag gnas dma' ba la 'god do// zla ba phyed kyi tshes bcu bzhi lan rgyal po chen po
bzhi po de dag gi bu rnams kyis lam po che dang/ srang dang/ bzhi mdo dang/ sum mdo dang/ sbyos 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang/ ma tog gi 'phrang ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang/ zong dgram/
pa'i gnas rnams dang/ btung ba 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang/ rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang/ gsod byed kyi gnas rnams nasu zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad byul te/ mu ste

rgyu de dag gis skyon par tshor nanadi dag gnas rnams mthon po la 'god do// ci ste de dag gis sbyin par ma tshor na na de dag gnas ma' bo la 'god do// zla ba khyod kyi tshes bco lnga lan rgyal po chen po ba
po de dag nyid kyis lam po che dang/ srang dang/ bzhi mdodang/ sum mdo dang/ dra 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang/ ma tog gi 'phrang ba 'tshod ba'i gnas rnams dang/ zong dgram pa'i gnas rnams dang
btung pa 'tshong ba'i gnas rnams dang/ rtag tu myos pa'i gnas rnams dang/ gsod byed kyi gnas rnams na su zhig 'dug ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad byul te/ ci ste de dag gso skyon pa nga tshor na dz+ha/
de dag gnas mthon po la 'god do// caste de dag gis sbyin par ma tshor nan de dag gnas dma' ba la 'god do// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'daskad du/ dge slong dag zla ba phyed kyi tshes brgyad la/
na rgyal po chen po dag gi g.yog zho shas 'tsho ba rnams ci ma dang ma ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar 'dzin pa dang/ phar 'dzin pa dang/ dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dad/ bram zer 'dzin pa dang/ rigs

kyi nang na rgan rabs la ra mir byed pa dang/ don byeng pa dang/ bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang/ bsod nams byed pa dang/ tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang/ sbyin pa
dag sbyin 'di bsod nams dag byed pa dang/ gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa mad dam zhes 'jig rten 'di thams cad nyul lo// zla ba phyed kyi tshes

bcu bzhi la ni/ rgyal bo chen po bzhi po dag gi bu rnams tsa ma deng mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang/ phar 'dzin pa ngad/ dge sbyong du 'dzan pa dang/ bram zer 'dzin pa dang/ rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs

la ra mi byed pa dang/ don byed pa dang/ bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang/ bsod nams byed pa dang/ tshe 'dingang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho bo rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang/ sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams

ngag byed pa dang/ gso sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te 'dug pa dag mang ngam zhes 'jig rtan 'di thams cad du nyul lo// zla ba phyed kyi chos bco lnga la ni rgyal po chen ngo
bzhape de dag 'du ca mo dang ma ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang/ phar 'dzin pa dang/ dge sbyong du 'a dzin pa dang/ bram zer 'dzin pa dang/ rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la8

mo byed pa dang/ don byed pa dang/ bya ba byed pa dang/ bsod nams byed pa dang/ tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang/ sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams byed pa dang/ gso
sbyong la nye bar gnas pa dang/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ngam zhes 'jig rtena'adi thams cad du nyul lo// ci ste ma dngam ma yin pa'i 'jig rtenan/ mar ma 'dzin pa dang/

phar ma 'dzin pa dang/ dge sbyong du ma 'dzin pa dang/ bram zer ma 'dzin pa dang/ rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ra min ma byed pa dang/ donami byed pa dang/ bya ba'i rogs pa ma byed pa dang/ bsod nams

ma byed pa dang/ tshe 'di dang tshophya ma la khanam tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par ma lta ba dang/ sbyin pa dgam sbyin zhing bsod nams dag ma byed pa dang/ gso sbyong la 'bar ma gnas pa dang/ tshul khras yang

dag par blangs te ma 'dug pa dag mang nan/ rgyal po bzhi po rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs su 'dus shade 'khong pa'i nang du song nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'du shes/

par gyis shog/ ma dang mi ma yin par 'jig rten na mar ma 'dzin pa dang/ phar ma 'dzin pa dang/ dge sbyong ru ma 'dzin pa dang/ bram zer ma 'dzan pa dang/ rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mor ma byed pa

dang don ma byed pa dang/ bya ba'i rigs pa ma byed pa dang/ bsod nams ma byed pa dang/ tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par ma lta ba dang/ sbyin pa dag ma sbyin zhing/ bso nyams
dag ma byed pa dang/ gso sbyong la nye bar ma gnas pa dang/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs te ma 'dug pa dag mang ngo zhes bsad do// de dag las thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yi ma rangs/
shang ma mgu bar gyur nas/ ya ma rangs pa 'di kyang phyi'i ldog par byed de/ kye ma grogs po dag 'di ltar ma dang ma ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na/ mar ma 'dzin pa dang/ phar ma 'dzin pa dang/ dge sbyos

ma 'dzin pa dang/ bram zer ma 'dzin pa dang/ rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ro mi ma byed pa dang/ don mi byed pa dang/ bya ba'i rogs pa mi byed pa dang/ bsod nams mi byed pa dang/ tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la/

'anam tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par mi byed pa dang/ sbyin pa dag ma sbyin zhing bsod nams dag ma byed pa dang/ gso sbyong la nye bar mi gnas pa dang/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs de ma 'dug pa mang
na ma rnams kyi chos mdzes pa yin no// rkyen du bob pa ma yin no// logs pa ma yin no// dge ba ma yin ne// de ltar na lha rnams kyi tshigs na yongs su 'grib par 'gyur la/ lha ma yin rnams
kyi tshigs na mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes slos so// ci ste ma dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jig rtenan mar 'dzin pa dang/ phar 'dzin pa dang/ dge sbyong du 'dzan pa dang/ phram zer 'dzin pa dang/ rigs
kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mo byed pa dang/ don byed pa dang/ bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang/ bsod nams byed pa dang/ tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jagi sa par/
lta ba dang/ sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang/ gso sbyong la 'bar gnas pa dang/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug pa dag mang ban na/ rgyal po chen po bzhis sum cu rtsa
gsum pa'i lha rnams lha'i 'dun sa chos bzangs su 'dus shing 'khod pa'i nang du song nas/ 'di skad du grogs po dag 'dapishes par gyis shig/ ma dang ma ma yin pa'i 'jig rten na mar 'dzin pa dang

phar 'dzin pa dang/ dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang/ bram zer 'dzin pa dang/ rigs kyi nang na tshadan rabs la ra mi byed pa dang/ don byed pa dang/ bya ba'i rigs pa byed pa dang/ bsod nams byed pa dang/ tshe 'di

dang 4 tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang/ sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa dang/ gso sbyong la 'bar gnas pa dang/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas 'dug
pa dag mang ngo zhes bsad na ni/ de dag las thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ya rengs shong mgu bar gyur nas/ ya rangs pa nyid kyang zlos par byed do/ kye ma grogs bo dag 'di ltar ma deng mi
ma yin ba'i 'jo'i rtenan/ mar 'dzin pa dang/ phar 'dzin pa dang/ dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang/ bram zer 'dzin pa dang/ rigs kyaningan rgan rabs la ri mo byed pa dang/ don byed pa dang/ bya sha' gis

pa byed pa dang/ bsod nams byed pa dang/ rma'adi dang tshe phyi ma la kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jigs par lta ba dang/ sbyin pa dag sbyani zhang bsod nams dag byed pa dang/ gso sbyong la nges par gnas/
nga dang/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas/ 'dug pa dag mang ba na mi rnams kyi chos mdzes so// rkyen du bab bo// legs so// dge'o// de ltar na lha rnams kyi tshigs na mngon par 'phal
bar 'gyur la/ lha ma yin rnams kyi tshogs na yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro zhes slos so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgyabyan byas/ lha'i 'khor rab tu dga' la bde zhang yade bde ba skyes par

rig nas/de'atsho tshigasasu bcad de smras pa/ 'diri na zla ba phyed dang tshes brgyad dang// de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang// cho'aphrul rgyan zla phyud la'ang// gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu

mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir// nga ci 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// dag slong dag lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis gang 'ad skad du/ 'dir ni zla phyad tshes brgyad dang// de bzhan bcu bzhi bco lngarang
che 'phrul gyi na zla phyed la'ang// gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dor// nga cha 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// zhes tshigasub cad pa sa pa de nas par sa pa yani
gyi legs par smras pa ma yin no// zhes par ston pa yan gyi/ legs par ston pa ma yin ne/ zhes par brjod pa yin gyi/ legs par brjod pa ma yin ne// dge slong dag/ de ci'i phyir zhen
lha'i bang po brgya byan den 'dod chags dang bcas pa// zhe sdang dang bcas pa// gti mug dang bcas pa ste/ skya ba dang/ rgyab dang/ nu ba dang/ 'chib dang/ mya ngan dang/ skya
[ ]sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yadi ma bdeb dang/ 'khrug pa rnams las yongs su ma grel/ sdug bsngal las yongs su ma grol la zhes nga smra'o// de bas na des gang 'di skor/
du 'dun zla phyed tshes brgyad dang// de bzhin bcu bzhi bco lnga dang// cho 'phrul gyin zla phyud la'ang// gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam gzhag gnas khyod 'dir// nga tsa
'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// zhes tshigs su bcad pa smras pa 'das par smras pa yan gyi/ legs par smras pa ma yan no// nyes par ston pa yan gyi/ legs par ston pa ma yan no// zhes pa
