brjod pa yin NaM/ leb/sa par brjod pa ma yin no// dag slong dag dge slong gang dgra bcom pa yin zhang/ gang zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa// khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su

thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems ngashin tu rnam par grol ba des n gang 'ad skad du/ 'dir ni zla phyed tshos brgyad dang/ de bzhinugartsub zhabaco lnga dang/
cho 'phrul gyi na zla phyad la'ang// gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shin tu mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dir// ngaca'adra ba de bzhin 'gyur// tshigs su bcad pa 'dasbasan legs par smras pa yin te/
0/ nyes par smras pa ma yin na// legs par ston pa yan tu/ zhes par ston pa ma yin no// legs par brjod pa yin te/ nyes par brjod pa ma yin no// dge slong dag de ci'i phyir zhe na dge slong de na/

'dod chags dang bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba ste/ skya ba dang/ rgyab dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ rtsa sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yade mi bde

ba rnams las yongs su grol zhing sdug bsngal las yongs su grol ba'o zhes nga sma ste/ de bsan des na gang 'daskad du/ 'dir ni zla phyed tshes brgyad dang// de bzhin bcu bzhi btse lnga dang/ cho 'phrul
gyin zla phyad la'ang// gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la// shan tu mnyam gzhag gnas byed 'dore/ nga ca 'dra ba de bzhin 'gyur// zhes tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag sna na legs par smras pa yin te/
nyes par smras pa ma yin no// legs par ston pa yin te/ nyes par ston pa ma yanin// legs par brjod pa yin te/ zhes par brjod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs so// 'dzam bu gling gi kho ra khor yug na

'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po lam dpag tshad gcig tu/ gser gyi bye ma bdal te/ rgya mtsho chen po'i rtsis pus mo nub pa tsam du yongs su khyabab/ gang gi tshe 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byung ba

de'i tshe/ rgya mtsho chen por dpag tshad gnyis kyi bar duchusam zhing med par 'gyur te/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po gang nas glang du 'gro bde na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i lam yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis

[p]@#// kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po glang po rin po che brtag par 'dod pas nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe/ glang po ran po che la zhenanas sa chen po rgyam tsho

[ ]la thug pa 'di nyid bskor te/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de nyid du song nas/ khyi'u sus kyi bya ba byed do// dge slong dag gzhan yang 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal bo rta ran po che brtag par 'dod pas nyi ma shar/
ba'i dus kyi tshe/ rta rin po chal zhonanas sa chen po rgya mtsho chen po la thug pa 'ad nyid bskor te/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de nyid du song nas/ khye'u sus kyi bya ba byed do zhes gsungs so/
N+NaM spyi sdom la/ ri dang skye ba'i gnas dag dang// nam mkha' ltare dang 'o tshong dang// grangab dag na lnga par byas// dusatshags kyang n tha ma yani// 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshigs drug pa'o///
'jig rten po zhig pa bam bo gsum pa/ sdom la/ srungs ma lha ya grong khyer bsrung dang rnam par rgyal// chos bzang rgyaba'i lam dang 'obs dang skyong mos tshal// sa gzhi

dang na yongs 'du sa brtol glang chen rnams// lha ma yin rnams kyi yang de dang 'dra ba yin// lha'i grong khyer dang/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gyi bar du/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi sras ma rnam pa lnga
bkodapa la 'di lta ste/ rgyun gnas pa'i klu rnams dang/ lag na yol go thogs pa'i lha rnams dang/ lag na gzhong pa thogs pa'i lha rnams dang/ 'phreng ba thogs pa'i lha rnams dang/ rtag tu myos
pa'i lha rnams dang/ rgyal bo chen po bzhi rnams so// gang ga tshe lha ma yin rnams sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod par gyur pa de'i/ dpung gi tshogs yan/
lag bzhi pa 'di lta ste/ glang po cha' tshogs dang/ rta pa'i tshogs dang/ shing rta'i tshogs dang/ dpung bu chung ga tshigs rnams go cha gyon no// go cha rnam pa bzhi gyon pa 'di lta sta/ gsar las
byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ brtud+ma las byas pa rnams dang/ shel las byas pa rnams so// gong rnam pa bzhi gsar las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ bzurma las byas
pa dang/ shel las byas pa rnams bgos nas/ mtshonacha rnam pa bzhal 'di lta ste/ ral gri dang/ mdung dad/ 'phang mdung dang/ gzhu rnams so// mtshon cha rnam pa bzhwa ril gri dang//
mdung dang/ 'phang mdung dang gzhu rnams blangs nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir lha ma yan gyi grong khyer nas byung ngo// lha ma yin de dag gi dpung gi tshogs
yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang/ rtapa'i tshogs dang/ sharta'i tshogs dang/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams kyis go cha bgos te/ gom rnam pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang/ dngul
las byas ba dang/ bzurma las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa rnams bgos pa nas/ mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi ral gri dang/ mdung dang/ 'phang mdung dang/ gzhu rnams blangs te/ sum
[r/ ]@#// cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir lha ma yin gyi grong khyer nas byung ba de dag/ chun gnas pa'i klu rnams kyis mthong ngo// mthong nas chu na gnas pa'i
[Or9 ]klu rnams kyang/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'di lta sta/ glang po che'i tshogs dang/ rtapa'i tshogs dang/ shang 'a tshogs dang/ dpud bu chung gi tshogs rnams kyis go cha bgos te/
go cha rnam pa bzhi gsar las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ bzlad+ma las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa mgos nas/ mtshon rnam pa bzhi ral gri dang/ mdung dang/ 'phang
mdung dang/ gzhu rnams blangs te/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// der tsaste klu rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham par gyur na ni/ klu rnams kyis lha ma lami rnams lhupa
cing rmugs par byas te/ pham par byas shang rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yan gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ci ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal to/ klu rnams phamamanalha ma yin rnams

kyis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi sungs ma dang po klu rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas ra'i rgyal po ra rib kyi bang rim
dang po gang na lag na gzhong thogs kyi lha rnams dang/ lag na yol go thegs kyi lha rnams 'khod par rtsa 'ang 'gro'o// de nas lag na yol go thogs kyi lha rnams dang/ lag na gzhong thogs kyi lha
0 rnams dang/ chun gnas pa'i klu rnams dang/ srungs ma gnyis gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas lha ma yin dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// der ma ste srungs ma gnyis rgyal te/ lha ma yan rnams pham/
na na srungs ma gnyis kyis lha ma yin rnams thub car rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// tsaste lha ma yin rnams
rgyal te/ srungs ma gnyis phaman na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srus ma gtas lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cang rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/

ra'i rgyal po re reb kyi bang rim dang po nas/ bang rim gnyis pa gang na 'phrang tho gas kyi lha rnams 'khod par rtse zhing 'gro'o// de nas 'phrang thogs kyi lha rnams dad/ lag na yol ge thogs kyi lha
rnams dang/ chun gnas pa'i klu rnams dang/ srungasam gsum po rnams lhan cig tu 'dus par gyur nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyod do// der ci ste srungs ma gsum
po rnams rgyal to/ lha ma yin rnams pham na na srungs ma gsum po dag gis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rmugs par byas te/ pham par byas shang rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas lho ma yan gyi grong
khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ci ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ srungs ma gsum po pham nan sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma gsum po rnams lha ma yin gyas thub cing rmugs par byas te/
0[ ]/pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi bang rim gnyis pa nas/ bang rim gsum pa gang na rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams 'khod par rtsi zhang
[/ ]'gro'o// de nas rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams dang/ 'phrang thogs kyi lha rnams dang/ lag na yul go thogs kyi lha rnams dang/ chu na gnas pa 'a klu rnams dang/ srungs ma bzha po rnams
gcig tu 'dus par gyur nas/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// der ci ste sungasam bzhi po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yan rnams phamanan srungs ma bzha po rnams kyis
lha ma yin rnams grub cade rdugs par byas te shupham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas lha ma yan gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ci ste lha ma yin rnams rgyal ste/ srungs ma
bzhi po rnams phaman na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi srungs ma bzha po dag lha ma yin rnams kyis grub cing rdugs par byas te pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/
ri'i rgyal po ra rib kyi bang rim gsum pa nas bang rim bzhi pa gangan rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams 'khod par rtse zhing 'gro'o// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang/ rtag tu myos pa'i
lha rnams dang/ 'phreng thogs kyi lha rnams dang/ lagan yol go thogs pa'i lha rnams dang/ rgyun gnas pa'i klu rnams dang/ srungs ma lnga po rnams gcig tu 'dus par gyur na/ lha sa
yani rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// der ci ste srungs ma lnga po rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams pham nan srungs ma lnga po rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te
pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yan gyi grong khyer du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ci ste lcam yin rnams rgyal te/ sungs ma lnga pa rnams pham nan sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha

rnams kyi srungasam lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis thub cing rdugs bar byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ra rib kyi bang rim bzhi pa nas/ stong gi gzhi gang

na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khod par rtse zhing 'gro'o// de nas rgyal bo chen po bzhis/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgyabyin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad

ces smras so// ko'u shi ka gang bdag cag srungs ma lnga po rnams lha ma yin rnams kyis grub cing rmugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng gi

gzhir rtsis te/ mchis pa mkhyen par mdzod cig/ ko'u shi ka da ltar gang gi dus la bab par dgongs shig/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyi ltar mnyan nas/ sum cu rtsa
gsum pa'i lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag gang srungs ma lnga po rnams lha ma yane rnams kyis thub cing rmugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ ri'i rgyal po
[c]glu// ra reb kyi steng gi gzhir rtsis te 'ongs pa shes par gyis shig/ grogs po dag da ltar gang gi dus la bab par soms shig/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis glang po che'i
[?]rgyal po rab brtan la bsams so// de nas glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan gyis lha'i dbang po brgyabyan gyi mtshan ma rtogs nas/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang
ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa bzhin du/ glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan 'dzam bu gling nas ma snang bar gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song ngo// song nas mgo sum cu

rtsa gnyis mngon par sbyal te/ mgo re re la mche ba drug drug/ mche ba re re la rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu re re la pad+ma bdun bdun/ pad+ma re re la sdong bu bdun bdun/ sdong bu re re la lha'i bu mo bdun
bdun lha'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog mo re ra la sal san bdun bdun mngon par sprul te/ mgo bo do dag thams cad kyi nang na khyad par du 'phags pa gang yAn pa de la lha'i dbang
po brgya byin zhon no// de las gzhan pa'i mgo bo lhag ma rnams la na 'a ba'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis po rnams chen no// de las gzhan pa'i glang po che rnams lan las gzhan pa'i sum cu rtsa gsum pa/

rnams zhon no// dashin tu mgyog te/dpar na 'jig pa'i rlung ngam chag pa'i rlung bzhin te/den lha 'am/lha'i bu'osu yang 'di snyam du 'di'i bdag ga mdun du 'gro'o zhi 'am/ phyi nas 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa mad do//

[z/ ]de nas glang po che'i rgyal po rab brtan sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi grong khyer gyi lho phyogs sgo nas byung sta/ skyed mos tshal lcab 'gyur tshal du phyin nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa de btang sku

lha 'am/ lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig du lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la 'byor cing
ldan par gyur te/ rtsi zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo// ji tsam du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal du rtsi nang dgar
la dga' dgur spyod pa de tsam du lus kyang rtsub par 'gyur la/ sems kyang rtsub par 'gyur te/ de dag lus rtsub pa dang/ sems rtsub pa dang/ g.yul 'gyed pa la mngon par mos par gyur
nas 4 dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'dalta ste/ glang po che'i tshogs dang/ rtapa'i tshogs dang/ shing rta'i tshogs dang dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams go cha gyon te/ dpung gi tshogs yin
lag bzha pa glang po che'i tshogs dang/ rta pa'i tshogs dang/ shing rta'i tshogs dang/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs rnams kyis go cha rnam pa bzhi 'di lta ste/ gsar las byas pa dang/ dngul las
byas pa dang baiDUrma las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa rnams bgos so// go cha rnam pa bzhi gser las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ bi'arla las byas pa dang/ shel las
[F ]@#// byas pa tsa 44nas/ []chana rnam pa bzhi 'di lta sta/ ral gri dang/ mdung dang/ 'phang mdung dang/ ga zhu rnams bungs so// mtshon rnam papa naM ral gra b+hanaM/
mdung dang/ 'phang mdud dang/ gzhu rnams blangs nas/ lham yin rnams dang lhan cagi du g.yul 'gyed de/ casta lha ma yan rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams pham nan lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub

cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go/ 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du
snyag par byed na ni/ der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin snyeg pa lasan/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/
lha rnams phyir log sta/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyid do// ci ste lan gnyis su yang lha ma yin rgyal te/ lha rnams nga ma na ni/ lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cade

jugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas shang rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyer gang na par phyir ldog go/ 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin snyeg par byed
na ni de ltar lha rnams 'ad snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag gaphyi bzhan du sog pa las na yang lan gsum du 'gyed par 'dod de sum du shes nas/ lha rnams phyir ldog
go lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// ci ste lha ma yin rnams 'ba' zhig rgyal te/ lha rnams phaman na lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cang rdugs par byas te/ pham
par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas na ni/ lha'i grong khyer du 'jug go/ lha'i grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad de/ lha rnams la lha ma yan rnams kyis ma tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag

pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyis der ma brdza bzhin du lham yin rnams kyang 'di ltar lha rnams na lha'i grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang
ldan pa'i sems kyis shas char gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gsanadir mi brdza'o snyam du shes pa' mthong ba 'jug go/ tsa ste lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams phamanan/ lha rnams kyis lha ma
yan rnams thub cad rdugasapar byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog ge/ 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin
rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyeg par byed na ni/ der lham yin rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'daltar lha 'du dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyeg pa lasan/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par
'dod do snyam du shesanas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir log ste/ lha rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyed do// ci ste lan gnyis su yang la rnams rgya de snyi rnams
dkyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rmugs par byas te/ pham par byas shang rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shang rta lho phyogs su lha ma yan gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go/
[On ]'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yan gyi phyi bzhin du snyeg par byed na na/ dar lham yan rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'ad ngag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du stag pa las na/ yang lan gsum du
g.yul 'gyed nga ra 'dod ngo sum du shes nas lha ma yin rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// ji ltar lan gsum du lha rnams 'ba' zhig rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams
phamanan lha rnams kyis lham yin rnams btsang rdugs par byas te pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lham yan gyi grong khyer du 'jug go/ lha ma yan gyi grong khyer du zhugs nas
sgo rnams bcad de/ lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyis ma tshugs kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan nga'i sems kyis shasacher gnas so// 'on kyang lha rnams kyis der ma brdzi bzhin du/ lha rnams
kyang 'di ltar lha ma yin rnams lha ma yin gyi grong khyer na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyis/ bdag cag gis ni dor ma brdzi'o snyam du shes pa'i
mthong ba 'jug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba lha dang lha ma yin g.yul du zhugs pa na lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams phamanan/ lha ma yan rnams

kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rtabyang phyogasasu lha'i grong khyer gangan bar phyi'i leg go 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du/
seg par byed nan/ der lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'ang dog bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du stegs pa las na/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas//
lha rnams phyir log ste/ lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do/ cis lan gnyis su yang lha ma yin rnams rgyal te/ lha rnams phamanan lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rdugs

par byas to/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shang rta byang phyogs su lha'i grong khyor gangan bar phyir ldog go/ 'on kyang lha ma yan rnams lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin du snyeg par byed na ni/
dur lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha ma yin 'di dag bdag cag ga phyi bzhin du snyeg pa lasan/ yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyed par 'dod ngo snyam du shes nas/ lha rnams phyir ldog
sta lha ma yin rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed do// dag slong dag ci ste lha ma yin rnams 'ba' zhag rgyal te/ lha rnams pham nan lha ma yin rnams kyis lha rnams thub cing rmugs par byas te/
pham par byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha'i grong khyer du 'jug go/ lha'i grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad de/ lha rnams la lha ma yani rnams kyis ma tshugs kyang 'jigs shing
sag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnasaso// 'on kyang lha ma yin rnams kyis der ma ba bzhin du/ lha sa yin rnams kyang 'di ltar lha rnams na/ lha'i grong khyer
na 'dug kyang 'jigs shing skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyisan sacher gnasamod kyi/ bdag cag gis ni dor ma brdzi'o snyam du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go/ dge slong dag 'di ltar snga ma 'das
pa'i dusanas/ lha dang lha ma yan g.yul du zhugs pa na/ lha rnams rgyal te/ lha ma yin rnams phaman na lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rdugs par byas te/ pham par byas shing rgyab kyis

sku phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yan gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyi'i ka ko/ 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin rnams kyi spyang zhin du sug par byed nan/ de ltar lha ma yin rnams 'di snyam du
soms te/ 'di ltar lha 'di dag bdag cag ga phyi bzhin du stegs pa lasan/ yang lan gnyis su g.yul 'gyed par 'dod do snyam du shes nas/ lha ma yin rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha rnams dang lhan
cig du g.yul 'gyed do// ci ste lan gnyis su yang lha rnams rgyal te lha ma yin rnams phaman na/ lha rnams kyis lha ma yon rnams thub cadi rdugs par byas nas/ pham par byas shing

rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ shing rta lho phyogs su lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gang na bar phyir ldog go/ 'on kyang lha rnams lha ma yin gyi phyi bzhin du snyag par byang nan/ der lha ma yan rnams 'ad
snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar lha 'ad dag bdag cag gi phyi bzhin du snyag pa las na/ yang lan gsum du g.yul 'gyod par 'dod do snyam du shes nas lha ma yin rnams phyir ldog ste/ lha
rnams dang lhan cig g.yul 'gyodado// tsa ste lan gsum du lha rnams 'ba' zhig rgyal te/ lham yan rnams phaman na lha rnams kyis lha ma yin rnams thub cing rmugs par byas te/ pham par
byas shing rgyab kyis phyogs par byas nas/ lha ma yan gyi grong khyer du 'jug go/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer du zhugs nas sgo rnams bcad de lha ma yin rnams la lha rnams kyis mi tshugs kyang 'jigs
shaji skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas so// 'on kyang lha rnams kyis der ma brdzu bzhin du/ lha rnams kyang 'ad ltar lha ma yan rnams n lha ma yan gyi grong khyer na 'dug kyang
'jigs shaji skrag pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis shas cher gnas mod kyi/ bdag cag gas na dor ma brdzi'i sum du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go/ dge slong dag sngon 'dus pa'i dus na de lta bur
gyur te// 'di skad du (gang tshe lha dang lha min lhan cig tu// gas ka'adus 'di g.yul na 'gyed pa na// shang rdapa na'i zla mtshungs med de// lha yi shing rta pa ya mchog yin no// zhes kyang

bya'o ri'i rgyal po ra rib kyi steng ga gzhan sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi grong khyer bltan sdug ces bya ba myur dang ga tshad nyis stong lnga brgya/ zheng du dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya/ mtha' skor
du dang tshad bru yid pa dbyangs legasang/nga blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/gsar gyi ra bas bskor re ra ba' 'phang du na dpag tshad phyed dad gsum yod de[]ra ba
/ de las rtsag skyabs rnam pa 48zhi las byas pa yod do/ gsar las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ bo zlumu las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa rnams so// gyen du 'a dba' mda'
yab dang/ thur du 'phyang ba'i mda' yab dang zam pa rgyud ma rnam pa ba zhwa yod de/ gser las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang 2 ba rnguru las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa rnams so//
de'i nang gi sa gzhi dbyibs legs shang blta na sdug la mdzes te// bras shing legs par bris pa/ tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gas bras pa ste/ 'jam zhing shan tu 'jam pa na/ dparan shing bal gyi
'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na na nims zhes byed/ rkang pa bteg na na par nges byed la/ me tog man+da ra ba mang pos pus mo nub pa tsam du khebs te//
rlung ga ma thus me tog rnying pa rnams na 'dor/ ma tog gsar pa rnams n legs par 'grems te/'daskad du/ lha rnams bsod nams dbang gi mthu stobs kyis// lha ya grong khyer dag na
rlung chen ldang// me tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor bar byed// ma tog gsar pa rnams na legs par 'grems/ zhes kyang 'byung ngo// lha'i grong khyer de na sgo steng du gcag gas ma tshud pa yod de/
0/sgo gcig kyang 'phang du na dpag tshad phyed dang gsum zheng du na dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod de// sgo re re la yang skar ma'i gzugs su byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod de/ gsar las byas pa dang/
dngul las byas pa dang/ bi zlan las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa rnams so// zla ba phyed pa lta bur yongs su grub pa dang/ ba lang gi mgo lta bu dang/ ma long rnams kyang gsar
lasabyas pa dang dngul las byas pa dang/ li cha rlu las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod do// dbyibs 'degasashar blta na sdug la mdzes pa yin no// sgo ra re
la yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bsrung ba'i phyir dang/ bskyab pa 'a phyi'i dang/ mdzes par bya ba'i re srungs ma go cha bgosashang madrar cha thogos pa lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do//
sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lam srang sradi du dupagatshad nyis stong lnga bcu yod la/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shang blta na sdug lamadzes pa gser gyi bye ma bdal/

zhing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ srang de'i glo g.yas g.yonan rdzong bu byas pa'i rdzing bu de dag gsar las byas pa dang 2 dngul las byas pa dang/ brtu rma las byas pa dang/ shel
las byas pa dang/ pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzange bu de dag gi phyogs bzhi na them skas byas pa yong nge/ them skas do dag kyang 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dong dngul las byas pa dang/
baiDUr+ya las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de dag gi lan kan gsar las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ ba zlarlu las
[ ]byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa dang bzhes kun nas bskor te/ gsar gyi lan kan gyi rgan ma dad/ gdang bu dang/ gzung gzer tsa dengul las byas so// dngul gyi nagasar las byas so// lo klu rgyal
na shel las byas so// shel gyi lan kan gyi rten ma dad/ gdang bu dang gzungagazer na bai DUr+ya las byas te/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug pa mdzas so/ rdzing bu de dag kyang chu bsil zhing chu

sbrang rtsi lta bu s gang ste/ me tog du la dang/ pad+madang ku mu da rung/ pad+ma dkar pos yongs su 'igs te de dag na mun s skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang/ skud padi du 'ong ba dang/
skad snyan pa dang/ 'dod dgur bsgyur ba' gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin te// rdzing bu de dag gi nyen kor na me tog gi shang dang/ 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shang

dbyibs legs la yengs su grub pa ste/ ma tog 'phrang bar bkod pa bzhan du gyur pa na/ dparan me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog 'phrang batha gu la brgyus pa 'am//
ma rtog gi rna rgyan legs par brgyus pa bzhin du sa ba lasaskos par ba sa tshogs stang/ natsang 'dzems pa dang/ sang yang du 'ong ba dod 2 skad mnyen pa dang/ 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can/
ka7 rnams skad snyanu pa 'byin te// de dag gi nyin deranadupag bsams kyi gang ston pa dang/ nganar nge dang 3sar ngo dang/ da ra de rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag shes sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dam/
po dang/ dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod de// dpag bsams kyayigang las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang/ sar po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos rnam pa bzhi yang de dag
bzhi'i/ gang las byas pa'i gis rnam pa bzhi yang de dag bzhi'i// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang/ dang rgyun dang/ rgyan snang ba dang/ mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shing yod do// lha 'am/ lha'i bu

mo dag gsi ja lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pa wang dang/ gling bu dang/ pa wang rgyud gsum pa dang/ 'khar rnga dang/
dang shang rnams 'byung ba'i shang dag yod de lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnam sa kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang/

sbrang rtsi dang sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do// yang thog rnams dang// khang pa brtsigs pa rnams dang/ khyim rnams dang/ khang bzangs rnams dang/ bsil khang rnams dang/ ltad mo lta ba'i sa
mas dang/ zam pa rnams dang/ bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shadi/ lha'i bu mo mang pos bstan pa dang/ sil snyan dang/ phag rdob pa dag gas sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang 2 dra sna tshogs
sa rA 4 24 ngo sa dang/ btung ba dang ldan pa dag kyang yad de// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dab/'a la dga' dgur spyod de

rang galas kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo// lha'i grong khyer gyi nang na/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzangs rnam par rgyal bzhes bya bachur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zhing du dpag tshad se
brgya rje /mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad stong yod nga/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/ lha'i grong khyer las dpag tshad phyed dang lngas gyen du 'phags so// 9nga bzangs
rnam par rgyal ba por rmang rten rnam pa bzhi las byas pa la 'di lta ste gser las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ bo zurlu las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam
la thim pa rnam pa bzhi bkod pa la 'di lta ste/ gsar las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ bezlum las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam par
rgyal ba rna ma pa bzhi btsugs pa la 'di lta ste (gsar las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ bi zurlu las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa rnams te/ gsar gyi ka ba na ka rten
dang ka zhu dang/ bri phul dad/ gdung ma rnams dngul las bas pa'o/ 3dngul gyi ni se las byas pa'o// bai DUrma' ni shel las byas pa'o// shel gyi na ka rten dang/ ka zhu dung/ bri phul dang/
gdum bai DA las byas so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba de'i phyam rten rnam pa bzha las byas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ gsar las byas pa dad/ dngul las byas pa dang/ bai rtachu las
byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa rnams so// khad bzangs rnam par rgyal ba la phyam stobs dang ldan pa rnam pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang dngul las byas
pa dang/ bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang/shelalas byas pa rnams so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba la them skasa rnam pa bzhi las byas pa dag yod de/ them skas de dag na 'di lta ste gser las
byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang 2 bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhi btsugs so// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba la lan kan gsar las byas pa da/
dungul su byas pa dang/ bo zlurgya las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa'i rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gsar gyi lan kun gyi nam dang/ gdang bu dang/ gzung gzer na dngul las byas se/
dngul rgyan gser las byas so// ba zurlan shel las byas so// shel gyi rten ma dad/ gdang bu dang/ gzung gzer na bai DUrma las byas so///bar gyi sdom la/ rmang

rjen them pa ka ba dang// phyam rtan dang ni stobs ldan phyam// 'khor sa dngan sbyang leb khang/ ya phubs dag ni tha ma yin// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba la ba gam brgya yod de/ ba gam re re la yang
khang pa brtsigs pa bdun bdun yod do// khang pa brtsigs pa re re la gnas khang bdun bdun/ gnas khang re re la lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun/

bdun/ g.yog mo re re la yang sal snyan bdun bdun yod do// khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba'anang na rdzing bu byas pa yod de/ rdzing bu de la chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha'
skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya yod do// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhin them skas byas pa dag yod de them skas de dag kyang 'ad lta ste/ gser las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ basman las/
byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis btsugs so// rdzing bu da' phyogs bzhir yang lan kan dag gis kun nas bskor te/ lan kan rnam pa bzhi dag gas snga ma bzhin du/ dbyibs

legs shing blta na sdug pa la mdzes pa/ chub sil zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bu s gang ste/ me tog ut+pa la dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs la/ chunas skyes pa'i bya sna tshog
skad snyan tsang 'jebs pa dang/ skad yade du 'ong ba dang/ skadamanyan pa dang/ 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams sgra skad snyan pa 'byin to// rdzing bu de'i nye 'khor na me tog gshang dang/
'bras bu'ashang rnam pa sna tshogs yodapa rnams legs par skyes shang/ dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ ma tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa ni/ dpar na ma rtog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me

tig 'phrad rgyud slob ma mkhas pas me tog gi 'phrang ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang/ ma rtog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang lasaskyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cang 'jebs pa dang 2 skad/
yadi du 'ong ba dang/ skad mnyen pa dang/ 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams sgra skad snyan pa 'byin to// dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang ser bo dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po rnam
ba ba na yod do// bzhag gos sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shang las byung ba'i gos sngon pa dang/ sar po dang/ dmar po dang/

dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang/ rkang rgyan dang/ rgyan snang ba dang/ ma snang ba dag 'byung pa'i pishang dag yod do// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste 1 pi wang dang/
klu'i bu dang/ pa wang rgyud gsum pa dang/ 'khar rnga dang/ skad snyan pa dag 'byung ba'ashang dag yod de/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de bzhin du de
dag ga lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod do// yang thog rnams dang/ khang pa brtsigs pa rnams dang/ khyim rnams dang/
khang bzangs rnams dang/bsal khang rnams dang/ ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang/ zam pa rnams bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing/ lha'i bu mang pos bstan pa dang/ sil snyan dang/ phag
[7 ]@#// rdob pa dag gis sgra sgrogs pa dang/ dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang/ kha zas dang/ btung ba dang ldan pa dag yod de/ den lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'khor dang bcas

ka1 pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur sbyong do/ rang gi lasakyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo// lha'i grong khyer gyi shar lho'i mtshams na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i 'dun sa ches bzang zhes bya ba
yod de chur dpag tshad sum brgya/ zheng du dpag tshad sum brgya/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad dgu brgya yod de/ lha'i grong khyer las dpag tshad phyed dang bzhas 'phags se/ lha' 'dunas chos bzang
ga sa gzhi dang/ yang thog dang dgab pa dang/ spyi bsdus kyi gdung sa dang/ yang thog gi rtsa bzhi dang phyam gzungs dang/ phyam dgu bo thams cad shel las byas pa la dbyibs legs shang/
rta blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ lan kanagasar las bas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ bi zlad+ma las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi kun nas bskor te/ de la sgo dang/ ya phubs
dang gnad dang/ yang thog gi rtsa bzhi dang/ lun dang/ phyam dgu po re re la yang ka po bcu drug bcu drug gis kun nas brtan te// rgyuba' laman rim pa bdun yod de/ da' dbusan ba zurlu las byas

pa'i ka ba zur brgyad pa gsal zhang 'phan med la/ rigs dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ skra'i rtsa mo tsam gyis khang pa brtsigs pa'i spyi bsdus kyi rten la mi ga go/ de'i 'og na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi
gsar gyi khri bzang po dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha lhag ma rnams kyi khri bshams pa yod do/ der sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'dus shang 'khod nas lha rnams dang/ mi rnams kyi don dad/ chos
sems shang dpyod do// yongs su rtog par byed do// lha'i grong khyer na rgyuba' lam srid du dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa
gsar gyi bye ma bdal zhing tsanangan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod do// de'i glo g.yas g.yon nas me tog gshing ngang/ 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes pa'i dbyibs legs

la yongs su 'grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhan du gyur pa ni/ dperan me tog 'phrang rgyud dam/ ma tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas ngas me tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang/ me tog
gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang/ skad yid du 'ong ba dang/ skadamanyen pa dang/ 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad
snyan pa 'byin to// lha'i grong khyer bas bdun rami gyis kun nas bskor te 'obs de dag zabs dang/ rgyar dpag tshad gcig yod de/ pha gu gsar las byas pa dpaM/ dngul las byas pa dang/
bi zlachu las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis brtsags la/ chu bsal zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bu s gang ste/ me tog ut+pal dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dang/ pad+ma dkar pos yongs su
[f ]@#// khabs la chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cang 'jebs pa dang/ skad yad du 'ong ba dang/ skad mnyen pa dang/ 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan ng
ka7'byin to// 'obs de dag nachu ska dang/ rgyum kun dang/ gru sna tshogs rnams byas pa dag yod de/ de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams chu'i rtsed mo la rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// 'obs
de dag gi nyen kor na/ me tog gireshang dang/ 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyabs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pan/

dpar na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas me tog ga 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang/ me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhan to/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs
skad snyan tsang 'jibs pa dang/ skad yadi du 'ong ba dad skad mnyen pa dang/ 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to/ de nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'khor dang
bcas pa rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod du/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo// lha'i grong khyer gyi shar phyogs dpag tshad nyi shun/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal
shang rta sna tshogs can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa// dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug
la mdzes pa/ gser gyi ra bas kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'i phang du dpag tshad gcig yod la/ ra ba de la jig skyabs gsar las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ ba zlum las byas pa dang/
shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod do// gyen du 'phang ba dang/ thur du 'phyang ba'i mda' yab dang/ zam pa brgyud ma rnam pa bzhi yod do// gsar las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/
ba rdzun las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa rnamA so// de'i nang ga sa gzhi dbyibs legasangashang blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ bris pa tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bris pa ste/ 'jam zhing shin
chu 'jim pa ni/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag pa na ni noms shes byed/ rkang pa brtag nan par shes byed la/ me tog mnar ba mang pos pus mo
nub tsam du yongs su khebs te/ rlung gi mthus ma tog rnying pa rnams ni'athor/ me tog gsar pa rnams na legs par 'grems te/ 'daskad du/ lha rnams bsod nams dbang gi rkyen gyisan//
shing rta sna tshogs pa na rlung chen ldang// ma tog rAdi pa rnams n 'dor bar byed// ma rtog gsar pa rnams na legs par 'gremA// zhes kyang bya'o// skyed mos tshal shang rta sna tshogs can gyi nang na
rdzing bu zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zhing du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya yod de/ rdzing bu de yang gsar las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ ba zur
las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhas brtsigasaso// rdzing bu de'i phyogs bzhin them skas byas pa bzhi yod de/ them skas de dag kyang gsar las byas pa dang/

[Di ]dngul las byas pa dang/ ba zurlu las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhasabartsigs so// rdza debu de'i phyogs bzhi'i them skas gser las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ bo na/
las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa bzhas kun nas bskor te chu bsal ba dang/ chu sbyang rtsa lta bu s gang zhing/ me tog ut+pal dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu da dad pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs la/ tshe

pa nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs kyang skad snyan cang 'jebs pa dang/ skad yad du 'ong ba dang/ skad mnyen pa dang/ 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byon to// rdzing bu de'i nyen kor na me tog gi
sku shing dang/ 'bras bu'i shing yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyibs legs pa yongs su grub pa ste 3me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhan du gyur pa/ dper na ma tog 'phreng rgyud dam 3me tog

'phrang rgyudakya slob ma mkhas pas me tog ga 'phreng batha gu la brgyus pa dang/ me tog ga rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skangasAn cang 'jebs pa dang/ skad yad du 'ong ba dang/
skad mnyan pa dang/ 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// dpag bsams kyi shang sngon po dang ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos sngon pa dang/

sar pa dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyang shang las byung ba'i gis sngon po dang/ sar bo dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyan dang/

rkang rgyan dang/ rgyan snang ba dang/ ma snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shang dag yod do// rol mo'i cha byed snatshogs 'du lta sta/ pa wang dang/ glang bu dang/ pa wang rgyud gsum pa dang 'khar rnga dang/ sgra snyan pa rnams 'byung

ba'angashing dag yod de/ lha dang/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sams bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu de dgagi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ sbrang chang gi btung ba dag kyang yod

do/ yang thog rnams dang/ khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang/ khyim rnams dang/ khang bzangs rnams dang/ bsal khang rnams dang/ ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang/ zam pa rnams bud med kyis mdzes par byas shade/ lha'i

bu mo mang bos bstan pa dang/ sal snyan dang/ phag rdzob pa dag gis sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang/ dra sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang/ kha zas dang/ btung ba dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha/
rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtsa zhing dga' la dga' dgur sbyod de/ rang galas kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo/ de'i glo lam chur dpag tshad nyashu/ zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod pa/ dbyibs
legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bya ma bdal zhing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod do// pa'i glo g.yas g.yon na me tog gi shing dang/ 'bras bu' shang rnam pa sna tshogs yod/
pa rnams legs par skyes shang dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pan/ dparan me tog 'phrang rgyud dam/ ma tog 'phreng rgyud kyi

[r/ ]slob ma mkhas pas ma tog gi 'phrang ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang/ me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cang 'jobs pa dang/ skad yid du 'ong
ba dang/ skang mnyen pa dang/ 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin te// dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po rnam ba bzhayid
do bzhag gos sngon pa dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dad dkar
po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rel mo'i cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs pa wang dang/ glang bu dang/ pa wang rgyud gsum pa dang/ 'khar rnga dang/ hab shang dag 'byung ba'apishang dag yod do// rgyunasna

tshogs lag rgyan dang/ rkang rgyan dang rgyan snang ba dang/ ma snang ba rnams 'byung ba'ipishang dag yod do// lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta de dag gi
lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// lam de na bzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'dalta ste/ glang po che'i bzhon pa dang/ rtar bzhon pa dang/ shang rta'i bzhon pa dang/ khyogasakyi bzhon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am/

0 lha'i bu mo rnams kyis bzhon pa ji lta bur 'dod pa sems bskyed ma thag du/ de lta bu'i bzhon pa la zhon par 'gyur te/ skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can du dong nas rtsa zhang dgar la dga' dgur/

spyod da/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo// ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi mngashing rta sna tshogs can zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can na/ rdzing bu sna tshogs zhes
bya ba dang/ shang rtasnatshogs dang/ lo ma dang me tog dang/ 'bras bu sna tshogs dang/ gos dang/ rgyan sna tshogs dang/ lha'i bu mo sna tshogs yod la/ gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha

rnams skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de'i tsha/ yang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shani tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras du nyams su

myongabasan/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal bya mang shang rta sna tshogs can zhes bya'o/ skyed mos tshal shing rta sna tshogs can gyi dpagatshad nyi shun/ sa gzhi bzang po sna tshogs zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag
tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod pa/ dbyibs legs shang bltan stag la mdzes pa/ lan kan gsar las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa
dang bo zurla las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gser gyi lan kan gyi rten ma dang/ gdang bu dang/ gzung gzer na dngul las byas so// dngul gyin gsar
las byas so// bai DUrlu'i no shel las byas so// shel gyi narten ma dang/ gdang bu dang/ gzung gzer na bo zlurla las byas so// de'i nang ga sa gzhi dbyibs legs shing blta na/
stabad la mdzes pa// bras shing legs par bris pa/ tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis legs par bris pa ste/ 'jam zhangashin tu 'jam pa ni/ dper na shad bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba/
bzhin/ rkang pa bzhag pan nanams shes byed/ rkang pa btaganan par shes byed la/ ma tog man+da ra ba mang pos pus mo nub pa tsam du yongs su khebs te/ de na ma ma yin pa rnams kyis rlung ga mthus

ma me tog rAde pa rnams na 'dor/ me tog gsar pa rnams na legs par 'grems te/ 'di skad du/ lha rnams las kyi dbang gi rkyen gyis na// sa gzhi sna tshogs can na rlung chen ldang// me tog rnying pa rnams na
'dor bar byed// me tog gsar pa rnams ni legs par 'grems// zhes kyang bya'o// de'i lam srid du dpag tshad nyi shu/ zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod pa// dbyibs legs shang blta na sdug la
mdzas pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal zhing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa zhig yod de/ de'i glo g.yas g.yon na ma tog gseshang dang/ 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing/

dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ma tog gi 'phrang bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa na/ dper na me tog 'phrad rgyud dam/ me tog 'phrang rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas ma tog gi 'phrang ba tha gu la brgyus
pa dang/ me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang/ skad yadi du 'ong ba dang skad mnyen pa dang/ 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs
can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin te// dpag bsams kyi shang sngon po dang/ sar po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po rnam pa bzha yod de// bzhag gos sngon po dang/ sar po dad/ dmar po dang/ dkar
po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shing las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang/ sorapo dang/ mar po dang/ dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pa wang dad/ gling bu dang/

pa wang rgyud gsum pa dang 'khar rnga dang/ hab shang rnams 'byung ba'i shang dag kyang yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag rgyun dang/ rkang rgyan dang/ rgyun snang ba dang/ mi snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i shade dag
yod de/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sams bskyed ma thag tu de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// lam de na bzhon pa sna tshogs bkod pa 'di lta sta glang po/
cha'i bzhon pa dang/ rta'i bzhon pa dang/ shing rta' bzhon pa dang/ khyogs kyi bzhon pa dag yod de/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis bzhen pa ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta

bu'i bzhon pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de la zhon nas sa gzhasna tshogs can du 'dong zhing cabader gnas pas mngon par dga' bar byed do// den lha'i drang srong rnams rang dgar tshangs par spyad pa spyod do// de
bya@#// bzhan du lha'i grong khyer gyi lho phyogs dpag tshad Nishu na/ skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal zhes bya nga nag yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du yad dpag tshad nyes
brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpagatshad stong yod la/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gsar gyi ra bas kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de/ shang rta sAtshogs

can n ji lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// khyad par ni 'di yod de/ ci'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi mang rtsu ba 'gyur zhe bya zhen/ smras pa/ sbyad mos tshal rtsub 'gyur la rdzing bu rtsub 'gyur
zhes bya ba dang/ shing rnams dang lo ma rnams dang/ ma tog rnams dang/ 'bras bu rnams dang/ gos rnams dang/ rgya rnams rtsu ba par 'gyur ba dang/ lha'i bu mo rtsub par 'gyur ba rnams yod la/

gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal du rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa de'i tshe yang/ lus kyang rtsub par 'gyur zhing sems kyang rtsub par 'gyur te/ g.yul

la mos par 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi ming rtsub 'gyuratshal zhes bya'o// skyed mos tshal rtsub 'gyur tshal gyi lho phyogs dpag tshad nyi shun/ sa gzhi bzang po rtsub 'gyur zhes bya ba yod de/

chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dang ga tshad stong yod de/ sa gzhi bzang po sna tshogs can dza lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// lha'i grong

khyer gyi nub phyogs dpag tshad nya shu na/ skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshil zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ snga ma rnams ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad

nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la/ gsar gyi ra bas kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phang du dpag tshad gcig yod de/ snga ma rnams ji skad bshad pa de ngazhan du rgyas par brjod par
bya'o khyad par na 'ad yod de ci'i phyi'i skyed mos tshal gyi ming 'dres pa'i tshal zhes bya zhen/ smyos pa/ skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshalan/ rdzing bu 'dres pa zhes bya ba dang/ shang rnams rang/
le ma rnams dang/ me tog rnams dang/ 'bras bu rnams dang/ gos rnams dang/ rgyun 'dres pa rnams dang/ lha'i bu mo 'dres pa rnams yod la/ gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyod/

mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshalan rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa'i tsho yang tshol par 'dres te shun tu rtsa zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang ga las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bas na/ de'i phyi'i

skyed mos tshal gyi mang 'dres pa'i tshul zhes bya'o// skyed mos tshal 'dres pa'i tshul gyi nub phyogs dpag tshad nyi shun/ sa gzhi bzang po 'dres pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya

lnga bcu zheng du yad dpag tshad nyas brgya lnga bcu mtha' skor du ang dpag tshad stong yod de/ sa gzhi bzang po snga ma rnams ja lta ba de bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// lha'i grong khyer gyi byang
0 @#// phyogs dpag tshad nyatishun/ skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad sa brgya lnga bcu zheng du yang dpag tshad nyas brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du
dpag tshad stong yod la/ gsar gyur bas kun nas bskor te/ ra ba'i 'phad du dpag tshad gcig yod de/ snga ma rnams ji skad bshad pa bzhin du brjod par bya'o// khyad par ni 'di yod de/ ci'i phyir skyed
mos tshal gyi mang dga' ba'i tshol zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal na ljang bu dga' ba zhes bya ba dang/ shang rnams dang/ lo ma rnams dang/ ma tog rnams dang/ 'bras bu
rnams dang/ gos rnams dang/ rgyan rnams dga' ba dang/ lha'i bu mo dga' ba rnams yod la/ gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gas pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal du rtsa zhing dga' la dga' dgur

spyod pa de'i tshe yang kun tu dga' zhing/ rab tu dga' la dga' zhing ya bde bar gyur nas/ rtsa zhing dga' la dga' dgur sbyong// rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bsan/ de'i phyir skyed mos tshal

gyi ming dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya'o// skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal gyi byang phyogs dpag tshad nyi shun/ sa gzhi bzang bo dga' ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag
tshad sa brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ sa gzhi ri thang po snga ma rnams ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o/
bam po bzhi pa// lha'i grong khyer gyi byang shar gyi mtshamasan/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ yongs 'du sa bal

gyi rtsa ba na dpag tshad lnga bcu thur du zug go/ 'phang du na depag tshad brgyayod do// yal ga phyar gyes pa na dpag tshad lnga bcu yod do// yongs 'du sa brtol gyi yal ga lnga yod de/ yal ga gcig na shar
phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do// yal ga gnyes pan lho phyogs su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do// yal ga gsum pa na nub phyogs su dang ga tshad lnga bcur 'dud do// yal ga bzhi pa na byang phyog
su dpag tshad lnga bcur 'dud do// yal ga stong man dpag tshad lnga bcur stang gnam mkha' khyab par 'dug go yongs 'du sa brtol gyi chur dpag tshad lnga bcur yod do// sboms su yang dpag tshad lnga

bcu yod do// mtha' skor du yang dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu yod do// yongs 'du sa brtol gyi dra rje phyogs su dpag tshad brgyar dad ldang ngo// rdza phyogs ma yin par dpag tshad lnga bcur ngad ltung ngo//

dpag tshad brgyad cur na 'od dang/ kha dog gis lham me lhanAne lhang nger 'dug go/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyangeshang yongs 'dus brtol gyi lo ma ser ba na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
kyi ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di lo ma ser ba lasan/ nga ni ring po ma thogs par 'dab ma lhags par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/
bya// de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyangeshang yongs 'du sa brdal gyi 'dab ma lhags pa na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ma yongs 'du sa brtol/
ka 'di 'dab ma lhags pa lasan/ da na ring por ma thogs par sbal mag 'then par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dgas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do//

sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyangeshing yongs 'dus brtol gyi sbal mag 'thon pa na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ky-i ma yongs 'dus brtol 'ad sprul mag 'thon pa lasan/ da na ring po ma
thogs par sbal mag bye bar 'gyur ro zhes/kun du dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yan pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyashang yongs 'du
zla sa brtol rgya sbal mag bye ba na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di sbal mag bye ba las/ naring po ma thogs par me tog kha 'bu bar 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu

dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sumacu rtsa gsum pa'i lha / las kyi ngo shari yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog kha 'bus pa na/ de'i tshe sum
cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di mi tog kha 'bus pa lasan/ dan ring bo ma thigs par ma tog kha 'ang/ ra 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhidi rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang

za yin pa de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ngeshang yongs 'du sa brdol rgya mi dog 'bya ban/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ma yongs 'du sa
brtol 'di ma tog kha bye ba lasan/ dan ring po ma thogs par ma tog gi 'dab ma thams cad yengs su rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' ba'a gnas pa gang yan pa de'i dus
kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtel gyi me tog 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa na/ yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma/

thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i dri rdzo phyogs su dpag tshad brgyar ngad ldang ngo// rje phyogs ma yin par na dpag tshad lnga bcur ngad ldang ngo// dang ga tshad brgyad cur na 'od dang kha dog gas lham me lhan ne
lhang nge 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'ad skad du/ dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yongs 'dus brtol rgyu rtsa ban dpag tshad lnga bcur thur du zug go/ 'dzad du na dpag tshad
brgya yod do// yal ga dang/ lo ma dang/ yal ga rnams na dpag tshad lnga bcu 'gyes so// dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shang yongs 'dus brtol rgya lo ma ser ba na/ de'i[@]
sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ma yongs 'du sa brdol 'di lo ma ser ba lasan/ da ring po ma thogs pa'i 'dab ma lhags par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' 'di rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang
yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyangeshade yongs 'du sa brtol gyi 'dab ma lhags pa na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa' delha rnams kyi ma
langs 'dus brtol 'di 'dab ma lhags pa las na/ da ring po ma thogs par sbal mag 'then par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yan pa de'i dus kyang yod do//
dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyishade yongs 'du sa brtol 'dasbal mag 'thon pa na de' tshasum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kye ma yengs 'du sa brtol 'ad sbal mag 'thonapalas
na da ring po ma thigs par sbal mag 'khye bar 'gyur ro zhus nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas kun s pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi
shange yongs 'du sa brtol gyi sbal mag bye ba na/ de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum nga 'i lha rnams kyi ma yongs 'du/ bal 'dasbal mag bya ba las na/ da rang po ma thogs par me tog kha 'bu bar 'gyur ro
zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhing rab tu dga' bas gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang shang yongs 'du sa brtol rgya me tog kha 'bus pa na/
de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'di me tog kha 'bus pa lasan/ da ripi lo ma thogs par me tog kha 'bye bar 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu dga' zhade rab tu dga'
las gnas pa gang yin pa de'i dus kyang yod do zhus nas/ dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog kha bye ba na/ de'i rgyu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
kyi ma yongs 'du sa brtol 'dim tog kha 'bye ba las na/ da ring po ma thogs par me tog gi 'dab ma thams cad yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes nas/ kun tu ngagar tsa nga ba tu dga' bas ba gnas pa gang
yan pa de'i dus kyang yod do// dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang shadi yongs 'du sa brtol gyi me tog 'dab ma thams cad yodas su rgyas pa na/e ngos 'du sa brtol gyi mi rtog 'dab

ma thams cad yongs su rgyas pa'i dri rdzo phyogs su dpag tshad brgyar ngad ldang ngo// rdza phyogs ma yin par na dpag tshad lnga bcur ngad ldang ngo// dpag tshad brgyad cur ni 'od dang kha dog gis lham me lhan
na lhang nge 'dug go/ shang yongs 'du sa brdol thams cad yangs su rgyas pa'i 'og na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba bzhi lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur te
rtsi zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo// dge slong dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shang yongs 'dus brdol gyi mthun de tsam mo zhes gsungs so//
dbar gyi sdom la/ dang po lem ser ba dang// de nas 'dab lhags sbal mag 'thon// sbalamig bye dang me tog 'bus// ma tog kha bye thams cad rgyas// shadi yongs 'du sa brdol gyi drung na//
bya// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ar mo na ga lta bu'i rdo leb yod de/ chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad nyis brgya/ rab ng du dpag
tshad phyed dang drug dang/ dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad pa gcib tu yod de/ dbyibs 5shang blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ brasishang legs par bris pon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bras te/ 'jam zhing nyan
tu 'jam pa ni/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ sa la gyi sku 'on te/ rkang pa bzhag na nanims zhes byed/ rkang pa brtag nan par rdos byed la/ ma tog man+da ra ba mang pos pus mo nub
pa tsam du yongs su khebs to/ de'i dbus na lha' pa sa se [%, ]gtsang ga' khri bzang po dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha lhag ma rnams kyi khri bshams pa yod do// de na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha

rnams dbyar zla ba bzhir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag la 'byor cing ldan pa// 'gyur te rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo// ar mo na ga lta bu'i rdo leb kyi khe ra
kyi khor yugan/ me tog gi shang dang/ 'bras bu'adebang sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes shing dbyangs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa na/ dbar

na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ ma tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas ma tog gi 'phreng ba tho gu la brgyus pa 'am/ me tog ga rna rgyan legs par bya pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad/
snyan tsang 'jebs pa dang/ skad yadi du 'ong ba dang/ skad mnyen pa dang/ 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin te// de'i 'on ker na dpag bsams kyishadi sngon po dang/ sar po dang/
dmar po dang/ dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag gos sngon po dang/ sor po dang dmar po dad/ dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyangegang las byung ba'i gos sngon po dang/ sar ngo

dung dmar po dang/ dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ pi wang dang/ gling bu dang/ pi wang rgyud gsum pa dang/ 'khar rnga dang hab shang rnams 'byung ba'i shang dag

yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lagargyan dang/ rkang rgyan dang/ rgyan snang ba dang/ ma snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i rishang dag yod de/ lha 'ame/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu

de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang/ sbrang rtsa dang/ sbrang chang gi btung ba dag yod do// yang thog rnams dang/ khang pa brtsigs pa rnams dang/ khyim rnams dang/
khang bzangs rnams dang/ bsal khang rnams dang/ ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams da/ steng khang rnams dang/ khyer du 'dug pa rnams dad/ so so na 'dug pa rnams dang/ rgyud ma rnams bud med kyi
tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shang/ lha'i bu mo mang pos bstan pa dang/ sal snyan dang/ phag rdob pa dag ga sgra snyan par sgrogs pa dang/ dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang/ kha zas dang
@#// btung ba dang ldan te/ da na sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams 'khor dang bcas pa rtse zhing dpa' la dus 'dagur spyod de/ rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo// sum cu rtsa gsum

pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos tshal du spyad pa sa srungs kyi bu zhes bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig yod de/ me tog ku mu ta'i mdog ltar thal kar du 'dug la yan
lag bdun legs par gnas pa ste/ da' mgo bos dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa sta/ sngo zhing srog chags lham bu chu gsher gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar la mche ba drug yod de/ glang po

che'i rgyal pos srungs kyi bu'i srid du dpag tshad phyed dang gsum/ zheng du dpag tshad gcig/ 'phad du dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad bdun yod do// glang po che'i rgyal po sa srungs
kyi bu 'khor slang po tsho'i brgyad stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ me tog ku mu ta'i mdog ltar thal kar du 'dug cing/ yan lag bdun 'an du langs par
gnas pa lta de dag ga mgo bo dang dbyibs legs pa blta na sdug la mdzes pa sta/ sngo zhing srog chags lham bu chu gsher gyi mdog ltar dbus dmar la mche ba drug yod pa shastag ste/ gang gi tshe sum cu

rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal rgyas r 'gro bar 'dod pa de'i tshe/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srungs kyi bus mgo bo sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par sprul te/ mgo bo re re la mche ba dus/ tshu cha nga bar re la

rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu re ra la pad+ma bdun bdun/ pad+mar re la sdong bu bdun bdun/ sdong bu re re la lha'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo re re la g.yog mo bdun bdun g.yog mo re re la sil snyan/

bdun bdun ma ngon par sprul te/ mgo bo de dag thams cad kyi nang na/ khyad par du 'phags pa gang yan pa de la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgyabyin zhon no// mgo bo lhag ma rnams la ni zhi ba'i dbadabo sus/
cu rtsa gnyis po rnams zhonani// glang po cha lhag ma rnams la nasumacu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams nyon no// de shin tu 'gyogs te// dper na 'jigs pa'i rlung ngam/ chags pa'i rlung bzhin te/ de na wA

'am lha'i bu mo su yang 'di snyam du 'di dag gi mdun du 'gro'o zhi 'am/ phyi nas 'ong ngo snyam du sems pa mad do// de nas glang po cha'argyal po sa srungs kyi dus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams so ser grong

khyer gyi sgo nas 'thon no// bdonanas so sor skyed mos tshal du phyin par byas te/ rdzu 'phrula mngon par 'du byed pa de btang na/ 'di lta ste/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba gang yang rung/

ba dang 'dra bar bdag nyid mngon par sbyal nas/ lhan 'a dod pa lnga dag la 'byor cing ldan par 'gyur te rtsi zhang dga' la dga' dgur spyod do// ji ltar brgya byin lha'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha

rnams kyi rgyal sride kya ngebang phyug la dbang byed pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rgya dbang po thags bzangs ras lha ma yan gyi rgyal sridi kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed do// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rgyal
dpo'i pho brang 'o kher grong khyer blta na sdug ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lham yin rnams kyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi ya nga grong khyer gsar ldan zhes bya'o// lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi

po' pho brang 'bar yang+ga bya ba rta khang bzangs rnam par rgyal ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzangs ris kyi khang bzas kyang gdams pa can zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lta'i 'dun sa

chos bzangs zhes bya ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi lha ma yan gyi 'dunas yang nor bzangs zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi skyed mos tshal bzhi 'di lta ste/ shing rta sna
tshogs can dang/ rtsa ba 'gyur tshal dang/ 'dres pa'i tshul dang/ dga' ba'i tshul ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lham yan rnams kyi skyed mos tshal bzhi yang/ 'di lta ste/ kun tu dga' ba dang/ rab tu dga'
ba dang/ dga' ba dang/ dga' ba'i kun dga' ra ba rnams yanino// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi sa gzhi bzang po 'di lta ste/ sna tshogs dang/ rtsub 'gyur dang/ 'dris pa dad dga' ba
ji lta ba de bzhin du lha ma yin rnams kyi sa gzhi bzang po bzhi yang kun tu dga' ba ma dang/ rab tu dga' ba dang/ dga' ma dang/ dga' ma'i kun dga' ra bam rnams so// sum cu rtsa gsum

pa'i shing yongs 'dus brtol ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi shing yang tsi tri pa rta la zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi ar mo ni ga lta bu'i rdo leb ji lta ba de bzhin du/

lha ma yin rnams kyi yang lha ma yin gyi rdo leb ces bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos tshal du sbyad pa sa srungs kyi bu ja lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams//

kyi glang po che'i rgyal po skyed mos tshal du spyad pa yang ti se'i gangs brtsegs zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ngor spyad pa rab tu brtan pa dza lta ba de bzhin du/

lha ma yin rnams kyi glang po che'i rgyal po g.yul ngor spyod pa yang bzod par dka' ba zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rta'i rgyal po sngon gyi shugs zhes bya ba ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lha ma

yin rnams kyi rta'i rgyal po yang brag rdzong zhes bya'o// sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i grong khyer ji ltar 'khor dang ldan pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin rnams kyi yang grong khyer yang 'khor dad ldan
pa yan ne// lha ma yin rnams kyi lha ma yan gyi rgyal srid kyang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du/ rgyas par brjod par bya'o// 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshigs bdun pa'o/

sdom la/ phyed dang drug dang thung cag mtha'// thung dang grang dang 'dri ba dang// rtog pa dang na bsdu ba dang// phyogs dang shar phyogs 'du shes pa// zla ba drug tu nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ste/lho

phyogs su 'gro ba na/ dpagatshad phyed dang drug dang dpag tshad bco brgyad chagacig tu 'dzam bu gling las yol te/ rgya mtsho chen po dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang/ dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad ma gcig
nyubla// khyab par byed do// zla ba drug tu nyi ma byang phyogasasu 'gro ste/ byang phyogs su 'gro ban/ dpogatshad phyed dang drug dang/ dbag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig tu rgya mtsho chen mo las/

mal te/ 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad phyad dung drug dang/ dpag tshad kyi bcobargyad chagacig khyab par byed do// zla ba drug tu ma lho phyogs su 'gro ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba na/ nyin mo las thang cag re

re 'grab cang/ mtshan mo las thad cig re re skya'o// zla ba drug tu nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ste/ byang phyogs su 'gro ba na/ mtshan mo las thad cig re re 'grib cadi/ nyin mo las thang cig re re skya'o//

zla ba drug tu ma lho phyogs su 'gro ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba na/ 'dzam bu gling gi mtha' myur du sbyong ngo// zla ba drug tu nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ba ste/ byang phyogs su 'gro ba na/ 'dzam bu gling ga dbus

yun ring mo zhig gis stong ngo// ci'i phyir dgun mtshan mo ring la tan mo thung zhe na/ smras pa/ zla badrug tu 'am lho phyogs su 'gro ste/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba na/'dzam bu gling gi mtha' myur du sbyong bas

na de'i phyir na dgun mtshan mo rang la nyin mo thung ngo// ci'i phyir dpyad dang dbyar nyin mo rang la mtshan ma thung zhe na/ smras pa/ zla ba drug tu nyi ma byang phyogs su 'gro ba na/ 'dzam bu gling gi dbus yun ring po//

zhig gas slong bas/ de'i phyir na dpyad dang dbyar na nyin mo rang la mtshan mo thung ngo// ci'i phyir dgun grang bar gyur ce na/ smras pa// zla ba drug tu nyi ma lho phyogs su 'gro ba sta/ lho phyogs su 'gro ba na/

dpag tshad bzhi khri nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ba rnams rgya mtsho rman por bab pas glang rnams su grung bar gyur te/ de'i phyir dgun grang ngo// ci'i phyir dpyod dang dbyar dro bar gyur ce na/ smras pa/ zla ba drug tu rim

byad phyogs su 'gro ba ste/ byang phyogs su 'gro ba na/ dpag tshad bzhi khri nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ba rnams krung rnams su 'bab pas/ glang rnams dro bar gyur te/ de'i phyir na dpyid dang dbyar dro'o/ ci'i phyir

zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mar gyi ngo tshes bcu drug phan chod 'od 'grib cing kha dog dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ chu zheng du 'grib ce na/ stsas pa/ nyim dang nye bar 'gro zhing phrad par gyur te 'gro ba de rang gi dkyil

'khor las de'i grib ma byung ste/ das de'i da kyil 'khor khebs shing de'i dkyil 'khor yog par gyur te// ma snang bsan de'i phyir na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mar gyi de tshes bcu drug phan chad 'a grib cade

kha dog dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ chu zheng du 'grab bo// ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mar gyi ngo'i gnam stong la rnam pa thams cad du ma snang zhen/ smras pa/ nyi ma dang rnam pa thams cad du 'phrad
cing 'grogs te/ de rang gi dkyil 'khor las grab ma byung nas/ de'i dkyil 'khor khebs shing de la de'i dkyil 'khor yig nga ra gyur te/ ma snang bas de'i phyir na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mar gyi

ngo gnam stong la rnam pa thams cad du ma snang ngo/ ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi ngo tshes gcig phan chad 'od skye zhing kha dog dang/ dbyibs dang/ dkyil 'kher dang/ chu zheng du skye zhe na/
sgrub ba nyam dang srol 'di 'gro ste/ nyam dang bral zhing 'gro ba de rang gi dkyil 'khor las grub mchung ngur 'gyur te/ grib ma chung ngur gyur pas/ de'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs
snang bar gyur te/ 'i phyi'in zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi ngo tshes gcig yan chod 'od skye zhing kha dog dang/ dbyibs dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ chu zheng du skye'o// tsa'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga la rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ smras pa/ nyi ma dang rnam pa thams cad du bral te 'gro bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de las nyi ma'i 'od zer las gyur pa'i

gribam gang de 'a de kyil 'khor la bsgrib ma de mad par gyur te/ des de'i dkyil 'khor snang bar 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga la rnam pa thams cad du yongs su
rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbusarnyog la/ mtha' rnam par dang zhing rtog pa med ce na/ smras pa/ glang gi rkyen gyis de'i dbus rnyog la/ chu'i rgyan gyis mtha' rnam
par dang zhing rtog pa med de/ gling rnams kyi gzugs bar n gang yin pa des na dbus rnyog la/ chu'i gzugs gang yin pa des n mtha' rnam par dang zhing rnyog pa med do// gzhan yang zla ba'i dkyil
'khor gyi stang na/ kun dga' ra ba dang/ skyed mos tshal rnams dang/ khyim rnams dad/ khang pa brtsigs pa rnams yod pas/ de'i phyir yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus rnyog la/ mtha' rnam

par dang zhing rnyog pa med do// gang gi tsho 'dzam bu'i gling du nyam 'tshar ba de'i tshe/ shar gyi lus 'phags su ma phyed do// byang gi sgra ma snyan nan nub bo// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi glinganan nas phud do//

gang gatsho 'dzam bu'i gling na ma khyad par gyur pa de'i tsho/ shar gyi lus 'phags na ni nyi ma nub bo// byung gi sgra mi snyan n ni nam phyad do// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gang nan/ma 'char ro// gang ga tsho

'dzam bu'i gling du nyi mnub pa de'i tsho/ shar gyi lus 'phagasanan nam phyed do// byang ga sgram snyan n na nyim 'char ro// nub kyi ba langaskyod kyi glinganan nyi ma phyed do// gang gi tshe 'dzam bu gling na nam

phyad par gyur pa de'i/ shar gyi lus 'phags kyi glang nan ha ma 'char ro// byang ga sgyu ma snyan gyi klong nan nyi ma phyad do// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling na ni nyi ma nub bo// ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling
thog mar byas te bshad pa de bzhin du/ shar gyi lus 'phags dad/ byang gi sgra ma snyan dang nub kyi ba lang spyod kyang thog mar byas te thams cad brjod par bya'o// 'dzam bu gling ga shar phyogs
gang yin pa de/ shar gyi lus 'phags kyi na lho phyogs so/ byang gi sgra mi snyan gyin nub phyogs so// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi ni byang phyogs so// 'dzam bu glang gi lho phyogs gang yAn pa de/
shar gyi lus 'phags kyi nanub phyogs so// byang gi sgra ma snyan gyani byang phyogs so// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyin shar phyogs so// 'dzam bu glingag nub phyogs gang yin pa de/ shar gyi lus 'phag
00/ kyani byang phyogs so// byang gi sgra mi snyan gyin shar phyogs so// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi ni lho phyogs so// 'dzam bu'i gling gi byang phyogs gang yin pa de/ shar gyi lus 'phags

kyi shar phyogasaso// byang gasgra ma snyan gyi lho phyogs so// nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi nub phyogs te/ jo ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thog mar smyos te bshad pa de bzhin du/ byang gi sgra ma snyan dang/ nub
kyi ba lang spyod dang/ shar gyi lus 'phags kyang thog mar smos te thams cad brjod par bya'o// phyogs ni bzhi yod de/ shar phyogs dang/ lho phyogs dung/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs
so shar phyogs la sems can shar phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyad yodado// sems can lho phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ sems can nub phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang med/
sems can byang phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod do// lho phyogs la sems can lho phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ sems can shar phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ sems
can nub phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang med/ sems can byang phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod do// nub phyogs la sems can shar phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ sems can
lho phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ sems can nub phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ sems can byang phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod do// byang phyogs la sems can shar phyogs ]
su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ lams can lho phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ sems can nub phyogs su 'du shes pa dag kyang yod/ sems can byang phyogs su 'du shes pa de dag kyang
yod do// phyogs de dang de dag la de ltar tha snyad 'dogs so// 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshigs brgyad pa'o////sdomal/ zla ba nyi ma gnyis kyi tshod/ ]skaram rnams
kyang de bzhin te// zla drug nyim 'gro ba dang// gnod par byed pa tha ma yin// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ji tsam zhen/ smras pa// zla ba'i dkyi 5'khor na chur dpagatshad lnga bcu zhing du yang
dpag tshad lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad brgya lnga bcu rdums su dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang/ dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad kyi chagacag yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa shel
las grub pa ste/ gsar gyi ra bas kun nas bskor te/ ra bu de'i 'phang du yang dang ga tshad phyid yod la/ra ba de la rtsa ga skyabs 'dalta sta/ gser las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ phyi
rla las byas ba dang/ shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi dang/ gyen du 'phang ba'i mda' yab dang/ thur du 'phyang ba'i mda' yab dang/ zab pa rgyud pa rnam pa bzhi dag med do// de'i nang ga sa gzhi dbyibs
lags shang bltan sdug la mdzes pa ste/ bris shing legs par bris pa/ tshon sna brgya rtsa gcig gis bris pa ste/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa na/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am ]ras bal gyi
[7 ]@#// 'da' ba bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na nanams zhes byed/ rkang pa bteg na ni par zhes byed l/ ma tog man+da ra ba dag gis bus mo nub tsam du khebs te/ den ma ma yane pa rnams rgyase
rlung gi mthusam tog rnying pa rnams na'ador/ ma tog gsar pa rnams na legs par 'grems te/ 'di skad du/ zla ba'i bsod nams dbang ga rgyan gyis na// zla ba'i grong khyer dag na rlung chen ldang//

ma tog rnying pa rnams ni 'dor bar byed// me tog gsar pa rnams na legs par 'grems// zhes kyang bya'o// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na lam srung chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad phyed dad

gnyis yod de/ dbyabs legs shing bstan sdug la mdzes pa gsar gyi bye ma bdal zhang/ tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa de'i klog las g.yon na rdzing bu byas pa dag yod de/ rdzing bu de dag kyang gsar las
byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ brturma las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de dag gi phyogs bzhi na yang/ them skas byas pa dag yod de//
them skas de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ bo zurla las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa'i lo gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de dag kyang gsar las byas pa dang/
dngul las byas pa dang/ bu zurla las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa'i lan kan rnam pa bzhis kun nas bskor te/ gsar gyi lan kan gyi rten ma dang/ gdang bu dang/ gzung gzer na dngul las
byas so// dngul gyi ni gsar las byas so// bi ma'i nangashel las byas so// shel gyin rtan ma dang/ gdang bu dang/ gzung gzer na bi zurlu las byas pa ste/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la

mdzes pa/ chu bsal ba dang/ chu sbrang rtsi lta bu s gang ba ste/ ma tog ut+pal dang/ pad+ma dang ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebasaMshang/ chu nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cid
'jebs pa dang/ skad yad du 'ong ba dang/ skad mnyen pa dang/ 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// de dag gi 'khor na me tog ga shing dang/ 'bras bu'i shing sna
tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes ngashang/ dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog 'phreng bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa na/ dper na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob

ma mkhas pas/ ma tog gi 'phreng ba tha gu la brgyus pa dang/ me tog gi rna rgyan legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang/ skad yid du 'ong ba dang/
skad mnyen pa dang/ 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// dpag bsams kyi rishari sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dmar po dang dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// bzhag shes
son po dang/ mar po dang/ ar po dang/ dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// dpag bsams kyi shang las byung ba'i gis sngon po dang// sar po dang/ dmar po dang/ dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod de//
[d/ ]@#// rol mo' cha byad sna tshogs pa wang dang/ gling bu dang/ pa wang rgyud gsum pa dang 'apar ja dang/ hab shang rnams 'byung ba'i shang dag yod do// rgyan sna tshogs lag
rgyan dad/ rkang rgyan dang/ rgyan snang ba dang/ ma snang ba dag 'byung ba'arigang dag yod de/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji ltar 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de lta bu de dag ga lag
tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ sbrang chang ga btung ba dag kyang yod/ yang thog rnams dang/ khang pa brtsigs pa rnams dang/ khyim rnams dang khang bzangs
rnams dang/ bsal khang rnams dang/ ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang/ zam pa rnams budamed kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shing/ lha'i bu mo mang pos bstan pa dang/ sil snyan dang/ phag rdob

! pa' sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang/ dri sna tshogs kyis legs par bskos pa dang/ kha zas dang/ btung ba dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de na lha'i bu zla ba 'khor dang bcas pa rtsa zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod de/

rang gi las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ngo// nyima'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshod ji tsam zhe na/ smras pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor na chur dpag tshad lnga bcu rtsa gcig/ zheng du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu rtsa gcig/
mtha' skor du dpag tshadabargya lnga bcu rtsa gsum/ rngams su dpag tshad phyed dang drug dang/ dpag tshad kyi bco brgyad cha gcig yod de/ dbyibs legs shing bltan sdug la mdzes pa shel las grub
pa sta/ gsar gyi ra bas kun nas bskor ro// ra ba de' 'phang du yad dpag tshad phyad yod la/ ra ba de'i rtsoge skyabs 'di lta ste/ gsar las byas pa dad/ dngul las byas pa dang/ ba cha d+ma las/
byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi dang/ gyen du 'phang ba'i mda' yab dad thur du 'phyang ba'i mda' yab dang/ zam pa rgyud ma rnam pa bzhi dag yod do// de'i nang ga sa gzhi dbyibs
legs shang blta na sdug lamadzes pa ste/ brisingashang legs par bris pa na/ tshon sna brgyartsa gcig gis bris te/ 'jam zhadi han tu 'jam pan dpar na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi
'da' ba bzhin te/ rkang pa bzhag na na nims zhes byed/ rkang pa brtag nan par zhes byed la/ ma tog man+dar ba dag gis pus mo nub pa tsam du phebs te/ don mi ma yin pa rnams rlung ga mthus ma
tog rAng pa rnams na 'dor/ me tog gsar pa rnams na legs par 'grems te/ 'daskad du/ ma'i bsod nams dbang ga rkyen gyis na// nyi ma'i grong khyer d gnas rlung chen ldang// ma rtog rong pa
rnams na 'dor bar byed// ma tog gsar pa rnams legs par 'grems// zhes kyang bya'o// nyi ma' dkyil 'khor gyi nang na lam srang chur dpag tshad lnga bcu rtsa gcig/ zheng du yang dang ga tshad phyed dang
gnyis yod de/ dbyibs legasangashang blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ gser gyi bye ma bdal zhing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab pa de'i glo g.yas g.yonan/ rdzing bu byas pa dag yod de/ rdzing bu de dag
kyang gsar las byas pa dang/ dadul las byas pa dang/ bi cha rgya las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de dag gi phyogs bzhi na/
yang them skas byas pa dag yod de/ them skas de dag kyang gsar las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ bo cha rlu las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa'i tha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsags so// rdzong
bu de dag kyang gser las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ bo zlarlu las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa'i lan kan rnam pa bzhes kun nas bskor te/ gsar gyi lan kan gyi rten ma dad/
rgyu gdang bu dang/ gzung gzer dngul las byas so// dngul gyi ni gsar las byas pa'o// bai DUrla'i nad+d+hishel las byas so// shel gyi rten ma dad/ gangang bu dang/ gzung gzer na dngul las
byas so// dbyibs legs shange blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ chu bsal ba dang/ chu sbrang rtsi lta bu s gang ba ste/ ma tog ut+pal dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu da dang/ pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs de
chu nas skyes pa'i byas tshogs skad snyan cing 'jebs pa dang/ skad yid du 'ong ba dang/ skadamanyen pa dang/ 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can rnams skad snyan pa 'byin to// de dag gi nyen kor na me tog
gishang dang/ 'bras bu'ashing sna tshogs yod pa rnams legs par skyes ngashang dbyibs legs la yongs su grub pa ste/ me tog gi 'phreng ba bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa na/ dpar na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/
