rgyal rigs zhes bya bar mang du chags so// chos dang tshul khrims kyi tshul kun tu spyod pa dang/ shes rab kyi tshul kun tu spyod pas 'khor mgu bar byed pa 'a phyi'i rgyal po zhes bya bar mang du gas/
so bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gnas 'jog dang/ bar dwa dza lung bstan pa las 'di skad du/ gnas 'jog ci'i rgyudang pa'i rkyen gyis rgyalarags kyi tshorags 'jig rten du 'byung zhen/ 'gi
rten 'di 'jig cing 'jig pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten na sems can phal cher 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su skye ba de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod de/ de dag der gzugs bzang zhing yadi la
ka @#// skyes pa dang/ ma nams zhing dbang po tshang ba dang/ yan lag dung tang lag thams cad dang ldan pa dang/ bzang zhang mdog sdug pa dang/ rang las 'od 'byung ba dang/ rnam
mkha' la 'gro ba dang/ dga' ba'i bza' ba dang/ dga' ba'i zas za ba dang/ tsherang zhing yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod do// 'jig rten/
'du gsung shadi chags pa na/ 'jig rten du sa chen po 'ad chu gtsag tsang rgya mtsho chen po gcag tu gyur pa'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod de/ chu gcig cing rgya mtsho gcig tu gyur pa'i

rgyu sa chen po steng du rlung gis spyisama kun tu bsdus shing kun tu 'thas par byas pa nas/ snga ma bzhin du rgyas par skye bo mang bos bkur bar zhes mang du chags pa dang/ zhang rnams kyi bdag por gyur pa
dang 'khongs pa las skyob pa'i phyir rgyal rigs rgyal rigs zhes bya ba' mang du chags pa dang/ chos dang tshul khrims kyi tshul kun tu spyod pa dang/ shes rab kyi tshul kun tu sbyod pas 'khor
mgu bar byed pa'i phyir rgyal bo rgyal po zhes bya bar mang du chags pa'i bar du thams cad barjod par bya sta/ gnas 'jog 'di ni rgyal rigs kyi tshorags 'jig rten du byung ba'i gtan tshags kyi mchog
yan te/ de yang chos bzhin du byed pa yin te/ chos ma yan pas ma lanano// de la 'di'i rgyal ba'i dbang po mchog rnams kyi chos so// gang ga tsho mang pos bkur ba rgyal po chen por gyur pa de'i ri//
den ma rnams kyi mi'i sems can sems can zhes bya bar gyur to// mang bos bkur ba'i bun 'od mdzes zhes bya bar gyur to// gang gi tsho 'od mdzes rgyal bor gyur pa de'atshon/ ma rnams kyi mang du/

chu stod chu smad ces bya bar gyur to// 'od mdzes kyi bu dge ba zhes bya bar gyur te/ gang gatsho dgab zhes bya ba rgyal por gyur ba de'atshi/ ma rnams kyi mang til las skyes til las skyes zhes bya bar
gyur to// dge ba'i bun dge mchog ces bya bar gyur te/ gang gatsho dge mtshog rgyal por gyur pa de'atshan ma rnams kyi mang na sprin mgrani snganamagrin ces bya bar gyur te/ dag mchog ga ba nagaso

sbyong 'phags zhes bya bar gyur te/ gang gatshe gas sbyong 'phags rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe/ ma rnams kyi mang ta la'i rdzidar ta la'i rdzong zhes bya bar gyur to/ de'i tshe rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags
kyi spyi bor khol mag gcig byung ste/ 'jom zhingashin tu 'jam pa ni/ dab na shing bal gyi la ba 'am/ ras bal gyi la ba bzhin te// de la rlung zad kyang gnod pa med de/ de smin te brdol ba

las khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ mang spyi bo skyes spyi bo skyes zhes bya ba dang/ nga las nu nga las nu zhes bya bar gyur

do gzhon nud rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu chen por gyur te/ des gling bzhi char du yang rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas te/ gang gi tshe rgyal po nga las nu byung ba de'i tshe gzhung lugs chen po rgya che'o cog dpyad
spya// cing bsams te/ med cang nye bar brtags nas byas ba na/ de phyin chad nas da ltar gyi bar du/ mi rnams kyi mnge dbyod pa can dang/ sems pa can dang/ nye bar rtog pa can dang/

[DI]shed lasaskyes ng shad las skyes pa zhes khyabaragyur to// rgyal po nga las nu'i bar g.yas pa nas phol mig byung ste/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa ni/ dper na shing bal gyi la ba 'am/ ras bal gyi la
ba pa nan to/ de la cung zad kyang gnod pa med do// de smin cing rdol ba las khye'agazugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/

rkang pa g.yas pa nas byung ba'i phyir de'i ming mdzes pa mdzes pa zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ste/ des kyang gling gsum du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so//
rgyal bo mdzes pa'i ba g.yon pa nas thol mag gtsag byung ste/ 'jam zhing shan tu 'jam pan/ dpar na shing bal gyi la za ram ras bal gyi la ba bzhin te/ de la cung zad kyang gnod pa med

tsha da de smin cung rdol ba las khye'u gzugs bzung zhing blta na sdug lamadzes pa ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ rkang pa g.yon pa nas skyes so// rkang pa

g.yon pa nas skyes so zhes nas/ mang nya mdzes te mdzes zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhang mthu che ste/ des kyang glang gnyis su rgyal sridi kya dbang phyug la dbang byas so// rgyal
ba ha mdzes kyi rkang pa'i bol las phol mag gtsag byung ste/ 'jam zhu shani du 'jam ban/ dpar na shang bal gyal ba 'om/ ras bal gyi la ba bzhin te/ de la cung zad kyang gnod pa med
de de snyan te rdol ba las khye'u gzugs bzang zhing bltan sdug la mdzes pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ de rkang pa'i bol gyi steng nas byung ba'i phyi'i/

mang mdzes can mdzes can zhes bya bar gyur te// gzhon nu de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ste/ sa kyang gling gtsag du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// rgyal bo mdzes ldan gyi rkang pa'i
mthal gyi 'og nas thol mig gcig byung ste/ 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam pa na/ dpar na shang bal rgya la ba 'am/ ras bal gyi la ba bzhin te/ cung zad kyang gnod pa med do// de smin te rdol ba las

khye'u gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ rkang pa'i mthal gyi 'og nas skyes so zhes nas/mang mdzes ldan madzes ldan zhes bya bar

gyur to// ga zhon nu rdzu 'phrulartsazhing mthu chaste/ des kyang gling gcig tu rgyal srid kyi bang phyug la dbang byas s// de phyin chad 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams na gling gcig la dbang ba sha stag

yanibar rig par bya'o// mdzes ldan gyi bu ni btang pa'o// btang pa'i bu nabatang bzung ngo// btang bzung gi bu na risha ku na'i// sha kuni'i 'onapisha ku na chen po'o// sha kun chen po 'i bu na ku sha'i//
kru// ku sha'i bu nar ba'i ku sha'i// lte ba'i ku sha'i bun ku sha chen po'o// ku sha chen po'i bun legs mthong ngo// legs mthong gi bu nalegs mthong chen bo 'o// legs mthong/
chen po'i bu naganod sel lo// gnod sel gyi bunapishil ldan no// shel ldan gyi bun skal ldan no// skal ldan gyi bu na ngen spong ngo// na rdzong gi bun lhun po'o// lhun po'i bu nanges 'gro'o//
des 'gro la bun rab tu grags pa'o// rab tu grags pa'i bun rab tu sgra grags chen po'o// rab tu sgra grags chen po'i bun bde byed do// bde byed kyi ban phyogs bdag go/ phyogs bdag ga bu'i

jul bzang ngo// rdul bzang gi bu na rgyas byed do// rgyas byed kyi ba na lha chen po'o// lha chen po'i bu tsha rgyud dang/ tshabo dang/ yang tsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong gis 'dres pa'i grong khyen
du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dbag 'og tu rgyal bo mu khyud ces bya ba byung ste/ mu khyud kyi bun rgyal po'o// rgyal po'i bun lhun po'o// lhun po'i bu na 'a jigs byed kyishing

rta'o 'jagis byed kyi shing rta'i bunashang rta brgya pa'o// shing rtab pa'i bu na/ shang rtabcupa'o// sha rta bcu pa'i 'ig tu lnga len gyi rgyal bo lnga stong gas rgyal srid kyi debang phyug la dbang

byas so// lnga lenagyi rgyal bo lnga stong gi 'og tu ka lang ka'i rgyal po lnga stong gis rgyal sridi kya dbang phyug la dbang byas so/ dka lang ka'i rgyal po lnga stong ga 'og tu a sna ka'i rgyal po bdun/

stong byung ngo// a sba ka'i rgyal bo bdun stong gi 'og tu sgram snyan gyi rgyal po brgyad stong byung ngo// sgra ma snyan gyi rgyal po brgyad stong gi 'og tu thod ba can gyi rgyal bo dgu stod byung ngo// thod ba na gyi/

rgyal po dgu stong ga 'og tu man lag can gyi rgyal po khri byung ngo// yan lag can gyi rgyal po khra'i 'og tu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po khri chig stong byung ngo// ma ga d+ha'i rgyal bo khri chig stong ga 'og tu ta ma la ba

ta'i rgyal bo khri lnga stong byung ngo// ta ma la ba ta'i rgyal bo khri lnga stong ga 'og tu rgyal po bu ram shing pa zhes bya ba byung ngo// bu ram shang nga' 'og tu bum rgyud dang/ tshabo dang/ mang tshu'i rgyud bu

ram shade ba'i rgyal bo stong tshig brgyas rgyalasrid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag gi 'og tu rgyal po 'phags skyes bo zhes bya ba byung sta/ 'phags skyes po'i bu bzhi byung ba la 'di lta ste/
bzhin 'bar ba dang/ lag na dang/ glang chen 'dul dang/ rkang gdub can no// de nas rgyal po rkang gdub can gyi bu rgyal bo rkang gdub can gyi zhabs zhes bya ba byung ngo// rkang gdub can
gyi zhabs kyi bu na gnas 'jog go/ gnas 'jog ga bu ban lang gnas so// ban lang gnas kyi bun song gi 'gram mo// seng ge 'grimagyo bun bzhi yod pa la 'di lta sta/ zas
gtsang dang zas dkar dung/ bre bo zas dang/ bdud rtsi zas so// zas gtsang gasrasan bcom ldan 'das so// bcom ldan 'das kyi sras na sgra gcan zin no// den ge sa
mngon pa las byung ba'i rgyal bo'i'i mib yin te/ bdag 'de chen bo de dag gis lag rgyas pa dag las mdor bsdusaso// 'dul ba las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du bri dag/
[Di]byas te/ mang bos bkur ba dang/ 'od mdzes dang/ dge ba dang dge mchog dang/ gso sbyong 'phags dang/ de las nu ba dang/ mdzes pa dang/ rta mdzes dang/ mdzes can dang/
mdzes ldan dang/ rgyas byed dang/ srid pa dang/ zhe sradu dang/ btang ba dang/ btang bzung dad lus thul dang// shes ldan dang/ n gnas long dang/ shing rta sdug gu can dang/ dug
tsan dang/ dug can chen bo dang/ sha kun deng/ shA kun chen bo dang/ kungashi dang/ shwa ba'i kushadang/ kushachen po dang/ rgyas byed dang/ rgyas byed chen bo dang/ legs mthong dang/
legs mthong chen po dang/ gnod sel dang/ nya ba'i gnod sel dang/ rmubya dung/ nges 'gro dang/ bde byed dang/ rab 'dul dang/ rab tu sgra grags dang/ rab gdung dang/ 'od byed dang//

lhun po dang/ rarib dang/ lhun po ldan dang/ me lce dang/ me lce 'phrang dang/ mo lce ldan dang/ martse ldan gyi bu tsha rgyud dang/ tsho bo dang/ yang tsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal po 'bum gyis grong khyer gru 'dzan du

rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag gi 'og tu rgyal bo dgra 'dul zhes bya ba byung ste/ dgra 'dul ba'i phyir na dgra 'dul zhes bya'o// rgyal po dgra 'dulatsa ba tshargyud dang/ tshabo dang/

mang tsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal po lnga khri bzhi stong gas grong khyer 'thab med du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag gi 'og tu rgyal bo ma phabs 'babs zhes bya ba byung ngo// rgyal bo ma thos

'bebs kyi bu tsha rgyud dang/ tshabodad/ lang tsho'i rgyud kyi rgyal bo drug khri sum stong gis wAraNasa'i grong khyer du rgyal srid kyi dbadabyug la dbang byas so// de dag ga 'og tu rgyal po bzod par

dka' ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ rgyal bo bzod par dka' ba'i bu tshargyud dang/ tsha ba dang/ yang tsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal bo brgyad khrab zhi stong gis grong khyer 'dar 'dzin du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang/

byas so// de dag gi 'og tu rgyal bo tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba byung ste/ rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi butshargyud dang/ tshabo dang/ yang tsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal bo sum khri nyis stong gsi grong khyer glang chen gnas

su rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag gi 'og tu rgyal po glang pos byin zhes bya ba byung ste/ rgyal bo glang pos byin gyi bu tshargyud dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal bo lnga stod gas grong

khyer rdo'ajog tu rgyal sridikyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag ga 'og tu rgyal bo bal bu zhes bya ba byung ste/ rgyal po bal bu'i bu tsha rgyud dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal po sum khri nyis stong

gsi grong khyer u rangashar rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag gi 'og tu rgyal bo tshana chen thub sa bya ba byung ste/ rgyal bo tshonachen thub kyi bu tsha rgyud dang/ tshabo dang/ lang tsha'i rgyud kyi
rgyal bo sum khri nyis stong gsi grong khyer ma thobs 'bebs su rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag ga 'og tu rgyal bo rgyal ba bo zhes bya ba byung ste/ rgyal bo rgyal ba

[w]1 po'i bu tsha rgyud dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha'i rgyudakyirgyal po khri nyis stong gsi kan kub dza' grong khyer du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag ga'og tu rgyalapo rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba byung

ste rgyal po rgyal ba'i sde'i bu tsha rgyud dang/ tsha be dang/ yang tsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal po khri brgyad stong gas grong khyer tsam par rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag gi 'og tu rgyal po sku lha

zhes bya ba byung ste/ rgyal po klu lha'i bu tsha rgyudadang/ tsha ba dang/ mngatsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal bo khri lnga stongags ta ma 'be ta'i grong khyer du rgyal sridi kya dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag gi 'og

tu rgyal po ma'i lha zhes bya ba byung// rgyal po mi'i lha'i butsha rgyud dang/ tshabo dang/ yang tsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal po nyi khri lnga stong gis yang ta ma labi ta'i grong khyer du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang

byas so// de dag gi 'og tu rgyal bo dug can pa 'i lha zhes bya ba byung ste/ rgyal bo dug can pa'i lha'i bu tsha rgyud dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal po khri brgyad stong gas grong khyarasong

ldan du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag gi 'og tu rgyal bo blo bzang zhes bya babyung ste/ rgyal bo blo bzang gi bu tsha rgyud dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal po nyi khri chog

stong gas grong khyer rgyal bo 'a khab tu rgyalam+bade kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag gi 'og tu rgyal po mun sal ces bya ba byung ste/rgyal po mun sel gyi bu tsha rgyud dang/ tshe bo dang/ lang tsho'i

rgyud kyi rgya la po brgyas grong khyer wA raNA sar rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag gi 'og tu rgyal bo dbang chen sde zhes bya ba byung ste/ rgyal po dbang chen sde'i bu tsha rgyud dang/ tsha bo dang/

lang tsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal bo brgyad khri bzhi stong gis grong khyer ku sha ldan du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag gi 'og tu rgyal po rgya mtsho lha zhes bya ba byung sta/ rgyal bo rgya mtsho'i lha'i

bu tshargyud dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsho'i rgyud kyi rgyal bo stong gas yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag gi 'og tu rgyal po dka' thub spyod ces bya ba byung ste/

rgyal bo dka' thub spyod kyi bu tsha rgyud dang/ tsha bo dang/ mang tsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal bo brgyad khri bzhi stong gas yang grong khyer kusha ldan du rgyal srid kya dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag gi 'og tu

rgyal bo sa gso zhes bya ba byung ste/ rgyal bos gso'i bu tsha rgyud dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal po stong gas yang grong khyer wA ra NAsari rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag gi'og

tu rgyal po sa bdag ces bya ba byung ste/ rgyal po sa bdag gi bu tsha rgyud dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal po stong gis yang grong khyer 'thab mad du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag/
gi 'og tu rgyal bo sa 'dzin ces bya ba byung sta/ rgyal po sa 'dzin gyi bu tsha rgyud dang/ rmabo dang/ yang tsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong gas yang 'dres pa'i grong khyer du rgyal/

srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so/ de dag ga 'og tu rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba byung ste/ rgyal bo lha chen po'i bu tsha rgyud dang/ tsho bo dang/ yang tsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong gis yang

grong khyer 'dres par yang rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// thams cad kyang 'dres pa de nyidi dad lha chen pos a ma la de 'di du rgyal po'i drang srong du gyur te/ drang srong gis tshangs par

sbyong ba spyad do// de dag gi 'og tu rgyal po nges mkhyen zhes bya ba byung ngo// nges mkhyen gyi bu na mu khyud do// mu khyud kyi bu ni mu khyud brtan no// mu khyud brtan gyi bunatshon bo che'o// tshanango
tshe'i bu na za ba'o// zaba'i bu na nyi za ba'o// ka za'i bun za ba can no// za ba can gyi bun za ldan no// za ldan gyi bun gya nom snang ngo// gya nom snang gi bun mnyam lta'o// mnyam lta'i bun thos
pa7 pa'i sde'o// thos pa'i snya' ba ni chos kyi sda'o// chos kyi sde'i bu ni rtogs pa'o// rtogs pa'i bun rtogs chen no// rtogs chen gyi bun rtogs sda'o// rtogs sde'i khun mya nganamad do// mya ngan/
med pa'i bu namya ngan dang bral lo// mya ngan dang bral ba'i bu na mtshams brtan no// mtshams brtan gyi bun gan mtshams so// rgan mtshams kyi bu ni don du ma ra'o// dun du mar ban skya reng ngo//
sa re nga ga bu na phyogs bdag go/ phyogs bdag ga du na brtul bzang ngo// brtul bzang ga bu na bde byed do// bde byed kyi bun kun dga' 'o// kun dga'i khun mi long zhal lo// me long zhal gyi
bun skyed pa'o// skyed nga 'a bu na rgyal ba'i khyu mchog go/ rgyal ba'i khyu mchog gi bu ni bza' btung ldan na// bza' btung ldan gyi bu nabaza' btung mad de// bza' btung bod kyi bun thub med do/
thub mod kyi bu na gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// gzhan gyis ma thub pa'i bun brtan pa'o// brtan pa'i bu na rab brtan no// rab brtan gyi bu nastobs po che'o// stobs po che'i bun bzhon pa mang ngo/
ba zhen ba mang ba'i bun blo bzang ngo// blo bzang ga bu na brtan bzhen na// brtan bzhon gyi bu na gzhu bcu'o// gzhu bcu pa'i bu na gzhu brgya'o// gzhu brgyapa'i bun gzhu dgu bcu pa'o// gzhu dgu
bcu pa'i bu na rnam par rgyal ba'o// rnam par rgyal ba'i bu na rnam par rgyal ba' gzhu'o// rnam par rgyal ba'i gzhu'i bu na gzhu bkra'o// gzhu bkra'i bu na gzhu sla'o// gzhu sra'i bu ni gzhu bstan/

no[]gzhu brtan gyi bun shing rta bcu pa'o// shing rta bcu pa'i bu nupishade rtabargya'o// shing rta brgyapa'i bu narishAng rta dgu bcu pa'o// shang rta dgu bcu pa'i bun shing rta sna tshogs pa'o/ shing rta sna

tshogs pa'i bu ni shing rta rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o// shang rta rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bu na shing rta sAri po'i// shing rta snying po'i bun shing rta brtan pa'o// rgyal po shing rta brtan pa'i bu mo rgyud dang//
tshabo dang/ yang tsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal po bdun khri bdun stod gsi grong khyer legs par smad du rgyal sridi kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag gi 'og tu rgyal bo nam mkha' bdag

po zhes bya babyung ste/ rgyal bo nam mkha' bdag po'i ba na klus bsrungs so// rgyal bo khrus bsrungs kyi bu tsha rgyud dang/ tsha bo dang/ mngatsha'i rgyud kyi rgyal bo brgyas grong khyer wA NA sar rgyal srid kyi
dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag gi 'og tu rgyal po kri kro zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'atshobcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgru bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
zhabs su ldan b/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ blan med pa// lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs
'jig rten du byung ste/ ra byang chub sems dpas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs las/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su byang chub pa'i phyir smon lam btab cing/
tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes te/ ded namo tshod ji srid pa de srid du gnas so// rgyal po kri kri'i bun legs par skyes zhes bya bar gyur to// rgyal po legs skyes

kyi bu tsha rgyud dang/ rmabo dang/ lang tsho'i rgyud kyi rgyal bo brgyas yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbad byas so// de dag gi 'og tu rgyal bo rna ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ rgyalapo

[rnaba'i bu go'u ta ma dang/ ba ra rA dza gnyis so// de gnyis la go 'a ta ma'i bun bu ramang shang pa zhes bya'o// rgyal po bu ram shing pa' bu tsha rgyud dang/ tsha bo dang/ yang tsha'i rgyud bu ram shing ba'i

rgyal po brgyus yang grong khyer gru 'dzin du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas so// de dag gi 'og tu rgyal po 'phags skyes bo byung ste/ rgyal po 'phags skyes po'i bu bzhi la 'di lta ste/ bzhin
'bar dang/ lag rnad/ glang chen 'dul dang/ rkang gdub can rnams te/ rkang gdub can gyi ba na gnas 'jog go/ gnas 'jog gi bun ban lang gnas so// banalang gnas kyi khu
naseng ge 'gram dang/ sang ge sgra gnyis so// sang ge 'gram gyi bu bzhi la 'di lta ste/ zas gtsang dang/ zas dkar dang/ bre bo zas dang/ bdud rtsiwas so/ bu mo na gtsang ma dang dkar
mo dang/ bre mo ma dang/ bdud rtsi ma rnams so// zas gtsang ga bu gnyis la/ bcom ldan 'das dang/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'o// zas dkar gyi ba gnyis la/ tshe dang ldan pa rgyal ba dang/
bzang ldan no// bre bo zas kyi bu gnyis la/ mang chen dang/ ma 'gags pa'o// bdud rtsi zas kyi bu gnyis la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ lha sbyin no// bdud rtsi ma'i bu ni bzhalinano//

bcom ldan 'das kyi bun sgra gcan zin no// de ltar na mang pos bkur ba'i rgyud ni sgra gcan zin la thug cing/ sgra gcan in duthadade/sgra gcan zin gyis mjug bcad nas/ srid pa'i lugs chad cing skye ba'i rgyu zad do//
nga srid par skya ba med do// 'jig rtenab zhig pa las tshigs bcu gcig pa'o// bam po bdun pa// sdom la/ rlung dang chu

dang sa gzhi deng// nang dang phyi ya rgya mtsho dang// ri rab kyi ni des rnams dang// rtse mo bad rimar rnams te// san ji ltar byung ba dang// rlung dang mun ba gnas pa// de dag thams cad rams bzhin du// rab

du bshad kyis rtogs par gyis// gang la chun rab gnas pa'i// rdzing rlung phyadapa' rlung mar ni// nam mkha' lasan ldang bar 'gyur// rlung dang sa dang chu rnams dang// ra dang gling na bzhapo rnams// chu mig

mtshodang 'bab pa dang// nyamagi 'dzin khri gang ba ya/ rgya mtsho chen po yangs pa dang// 'byor cing rgyas pa'i ljongs dang na/ grongadag dang na grong khyer rnams// de dag thams cad s chen la// rims kyis
sun rab tu gnas/ nam mkha' gang la rlung gi dkyil 'khor gnas pa las/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor de'i rngams su ni dpag tshad sa ya gcig dang drug 'bum yod de/ rgyar ni grangs med tshad med do//
la rlung gi dkyil 'khor gang la chu'adakyil 'khor gnas pa'i chu'i dkyil 'khor de'i rngams sun depag tshad brgyud 'bum med do// rgyar na dpag tshad sa ya gcig dang nyis 'bum bzhi brgyalngabcu yod do//
mtha' skor dun dpag tshad sa ya phrag gsum dang/ drug 'bum sum bskyalnga bcu yod do// chu'i dkyil 'khor gang la gsar gyi sa gzhi chen po gnas pa'i gsar gyi sa gzhachen po de'i rngams su ni dpag tshad
00 sum 'bum ni khra yod do// rgyu na dbag tshadas ya gcig dang nyis 'bum bzhi brgya lnga bcu yod do// mtha' skor du ni dpag tshad sa ya phrag gsum dang/ drug 'bum sum brgya lnga bcu yod do// nang gi

rgya mtsho chen bon chur dbag tshad nyis 'bum bzhi khri/ zheng du yang dbagatshad nyis 'bum bzhi khro yod do// mtha' skor du na dpag tshad dgu 'bum drug khri yod do// thubs su ni dpag tshad brgyad khri
med de/ gsar gyi sa gzhi chen po la rten no// phyi rol gyi rgya mtsho chen bo na zhing du gling ma gtogs par dpag tshad sum 'bum nyi khri yod do// gling gtogs par na zhing du dpag tshadasum 'bum khri

nyis stong yod do// chung na yang de dang 'dra'o// mtha' skor du ni tshad med do// zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri yod de/ gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brten to// ri'i rgyal po chen po ri rab na dpag tshad

brgyad khrin thur du gsar gyi sa gzhi chen po la brten to// dpag tshad brgyud khrin chu las gyen du 'phags te/ 'phang du dpag tshad 'bum drug khri yod do// chur na dpag tshad brgyad khra/ zheng du yang
dpag tshad brgyad khra yod do// mtha' skor du na dpag tshad sum 'bum nyi khri yod do// dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa yin te/ de la sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
lha rnams gnas so// ra'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ngos na bzhi yod de// shar phyogs kyi ngos dang/ lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs kyi ngosaso// shar phyogs kyi ngos na shi la las/
grub pa'o// lho phyogs kyi ngosan ba zurlu las grub pa'o// nub phyogs kyi ngosan dngul las grub pa'o// byang phyogs kyi ngosan gser las grub pa'o// ra'i rgyal po ri rab

1 kyi rtsomo nabazhi yod de/ shar phyogs kyi rtse mo dang/ lho phyogs kyi rtse mo dang nub phyogs kyi rtsa mo dang/ byang phyogs kyi rtsa mo'i// shar phyogs kyi rtse mo ni chur dpag tshad brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga//

zheng du yang dpag tshad brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga mtha'askor du dpag tshad lnga brgya yod do// dpag tshad phyed dang ldan ri'i rgyal po ri rab las gyen du 'phags te/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes

pa bshel las grub pa lta/ de na gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje rnams gnas so// lho phyogs kyi tsha mo na chur dang ga tshad brgya shu rtsa lta/ zheng du yang dpag tshad brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad

lnga brgya yod do// dpag tshad phyed dang lda ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab las gyen du 'phags te/ dbyibs legs shang blta na sdug la mdzes pa bezlurgya las grub ste/ de na gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje rnams gnas

so nub phyogs kyi tsha mo ni chur dpag tshad brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga/ zheng du yang dpag tshad brgya 'ashu rtsa lnga/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad lnga brgya yod do// dpag tshad phyed dang ldan ri'i rgyal por rab las

gyen du 'phags te/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dngul las grub pa ste/ de na gnod sbyin lagan rdo rje rnams gnas so// byang phyogs kyi rtse mo na chur dpag tshad brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga/

zheng du yang dpagatshad brgya tishu rtsa lnga/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad lnga brgya yod do// dang ga tshad phyed dang ldan ri'i rgyal po ri rab las gyen du 'phags te/ dbyibs legs shang blta na sdug la mdzes
ba gsor las grub pa ste/ de na gnod sbyin lag na rdo rdzo rnams gnas so// ra'i rgyal po ra rab kyi bang rim na bzhi yod de/ bang rim dang po dang gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa'o//

khanga'akha dang bo na chu las dang ga tshad khris gyon du 'phags la/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab las dpag tshad khri drug stong phyir 'phags te/ dbyangs legs shang blta na sdug la mdzes pa ran po che snabazhi
las grub pa sta/ den lan yol go thogs kyi lha rnams gnas so// bang rim gnyis pa na bang rim dang bo las dang ga tshad khris gyen du 'phags la/ ra'i rgyal po ri rab las dpag tshad brgyad
stong ba'i 'phags te/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa lta/ de na 'phreng thogs kyi lha rnams gnas so// bang rim gsum pa ni bang rim gnyis
pa las dpag tshad khras gyen du 'phags la/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab las dpag tshad bzhi stong phyir 'phags te/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa ste/
da na rtag tu myos pa'i lha rnams gnas so// bang rim bzhi pa na bang rim gsum pa las dpagatshad khris gyen du 'phags te/ ri'i rgyal po ro rib dag las dpag tshad nyis stong phyir 'phags te/
dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa ste/ de na rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams gnas so// ra'i rgyal po gnya' shing 'dzin ces bya ba

[Or]1ni ri'i rgyal po ri rib nas dpag tshad brgyad khra bor to/ dpag tshang brkyang khrin chu'i 'og gsar gyi sa gzhi chen po la brtan to// dpag tshad bzhi khri ni chu las rkyen du 'dzags so// zhing du
yang de dang 'dra ste/ dbyibs legs shang blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser las grub pa ste/ de na rgyal bo chen po bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ ljongs gnas so//
ci'i phyir ra'i rgyal po ba/ nya' shange 'dzin ces bya zhe na/ smras pa/ ri'i rgyal po gnya' shang 'dzin gya rtse mo dbyibs legs shang blta na sdug la mdzes pa ni/ dper na shang rta' gnya' shing
ba zhan te/ de bas na nu'i rgyal po gnya' shang 'dzin ces bya'o// ra'i rgyal po gshel mda' 'dzin ces bya ba na/ri'i rgyal po gnya' shing 'dzin nas dpagatshad bzhi khro bor te/ dpag tshad
brgyad khrin chu'i 'og gsar gyis gzhi napo la brtan no// dpag tshad ni khron chu las rgyan du 'phags so// zhed du yang de dang 'dra ste/ dbyibs legs shang blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser las
grub pa sta/ de na rgyal po chen po bzhi'i lha rnams kyi grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ ljongs gnas so// de ci'i phyir ra'i rgyal po gshol mda' 'dzan ces bya zhen/ snyasapa/ ri'i rgyal po gshol
mda' 'dzin gyi rtsa mo dbyibs legs shang blta na sdug la mdzes pa na/ dpar na gshol mda' bzhin te// de bas na ra'i rgyalapo ga shol mda' 'dzin ces bya'o// ri'i rgyal po seng ldeng can/
zhes bya ban/ ri'i rgyal bo gshol mda' 'dzin nas dang ga tshad nyi khri bar te/ dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu'i 'og gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brtan to// dpag tshad khri ni chu las gyen du 'phags
so zheng du yang de dang 'dra ste/ dbyibs legs shing bltan stag la mdzes ba gser las grub pa ste/ de na rgyal chen bzhi pa'i grod dang/ grong khyer dang/ ljongs gnas so// ci'i phyi'i

ra'i rgyal po seng ldeng can zhes bya zhen/ smas pa/ ri'i rgyal po song ldeng can gyi phyogs de dang de dag na/ ji ltar gsar gyi seng ldeng yod pa de bzhin du/rogazhan dag la med de/ de bsan ru'i rgyal

bo seng ldeng can zhes bya'o// ri'i rgyal po blta na sdug ces bya ba ni/ ri'i rgyal po seng ldeng can nas dpag tshad khra bor te/ dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chur 'og gsar gyi sa gzhi chen po la brten to// dang

tshad lnga stong na chu las gyen du 'phags so// zheng du yang de dang 'dra ste/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes ba gsar las grub pa sta/ don rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi grong dang/ grong
khyen dang/ ljongs gnas so// ci'i phyir ra'i rgyal bo blta na sdug ces bya zhe na/ smras pa// ra'i rgyal po blta na sdug gi rtsa mo dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa bzhin du ri gzhan/
dag la med de/ de bas na ra'i rgyal po blta na sdug ces bya'o// ri'i rgyal po rta rna ra zhes bya ba na/ra'i rgyal po blta na sdug nas dpag tshad lnga stong bor te/ dpag tshad brgyang waM
na chu'i 'og gsar gyi sa gzhi chen po la brtan to// dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgyan chu las gyen du 'phags so// zheng du yang de dang 'dra ste/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gser

kaM las grub pa ste/de na rgyu lachen bzhapa'i lha rnams kyi grong dad/ grong khyer dang/ ljongs gnas so// ci'i phyir ri'i rgyal po rta rnar zhes bya zhe na/ smasapa/ ri'i rgyal po rta rna ri'i rtse mo dbyibs

legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa na/ dpar na rta'i rna ba bzhin te/ de bas na ra'i rgyal po rta rna ra zhes bya'o// ra'i rgyal po rnam par 'dud ces bya ba ni/ ri'i rgyal po rta rnar nas dpag tshad nyis

stong lnga brgya bor te/ dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu'i 'og gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brtan to// dpag tshad stong nyis brgya lnga bcu na chu las gyen du 'phags so// zheng du yang de dang 'dra ste/ dbyibs legA
shange bltan sdug la mdzes pa gsar las grub pa ste/ don rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi grong dad grong khyer dang/ ljongs gnas so// ci'i phyir ni'i rgyal bo rnam bar 'dud ces bya zhen/ snas pa/
ri'i rgyal bo rnam par 'dud kyi rtse mo dma' zhing 'dud pa ni/ dper na sman ru bawan te/ de bsan ra'i rgyal po rnam par 'dud ces bya'o// ra'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin ces bya ba na/ ri'i rgyal po rnam

bar 'dud nas dpag tshad stong nyis brgya lnga bcu bor te/dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu'i 'og gsar gyi sa gzhi chen po la brtan to// dpag tshad drug brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga chu las gyen du 'o lags so// zheng
du yang de dang 'dra ste/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa gsar las grub pa ste// don rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ ljongs gnas so// ci'i phyir ra'i

rgyal po mu khyud 'dzanicas bya zhen/ smras pa/ ri'i rgyal po mu khyud 'dzin gyi rtse mo dbyibs legs shang pa lta na sdug la mdzes pa ni/ dbar shang mu khyud 'dzin bzhon te/ de bas na ra'i rgyal po mu khyud

'dzin ces bya'o// ri'i rgyal po der lug gi ri zhes bya ba na phyi rol gyi rgya mtsho bor te/ dpag tshad brgyud khrani rtsi'i 'og gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brten to// dpag tshad sum brgya rtsa phyed dang bcu gsum
na las gyen du 'a bags so// zheng du yang de dang 'dra ste/ dbyabs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa lcags las grub pa ste/ de na gnod sbyin gos sngon po can rnams gnas so// ci'i phyir ri'i
rgyal po khor yug ra zhes bya zhen/ snyas ba/ ri'i rgyal po ler yug de'i phyogs de dang de dgan ji ltar gsar gyi 'khor lo yod pa bzhin du/ ri gzhan dag la mad pa dang/ gzhan yang ra'i rgyal ngo
khor yug ris glang bzhi pa 'di 'khor lo'i tshul du bskor te/ de bas na ra'i rgyal po khor yug ra zhes bya'o// gnya' shing 'dzin gyi 'phang du na// dpag tshad bzhi khri yong par bstan// gshol mda'
]'dzin n ni khri ste// khrani seng ldeng can gyi ra ]blta na sdug gi 'phang du na// dpag tshad lnga stong yod par bstan// dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgyar na// rta rna ra'i mngon par 'phag/

stong dang nyis brgyalnga bcu yas// grangs snyed rnam par 'dud pa 'phags// mu khyud 'dzin gyi 'phang du na/ drug brgya rishu rtsa ltar bstan// rgya mtsho 'di ya pha rol na// rgya mtsho gang gis bskor ba yi/
khor yug dpag tshad sum brgya dang// dpag tshad phyad dong btsugasum yod// don khor yug rar bshad de// 'jig rtan bar mtshams phan chad du/ 39zla de bzhin skar ma dang// rgyu skar tshogs rnams
rgya chen kun// khor yug ma 'da' 'jig rten gyi// bar mtshamasu phanargyud mun par 'dug/ mu khyud 'dzin dang rnam par 'dud// de bzhin rtarna ra dang na// blta na sdug dang sang ldeng can// gshol
mda' 'dzin dang gnya'ashang 'dzin// ri bo de dag bdun po rnams// ra ya mchog ste gsar las grub// rareb la sogs ri bo rnams// de dag gsar gyi gzhi la brten// 'jig rten bzhag
n+ti pa las tshigs bcu gnyis pa'o// sdom la/ ro la mtsho rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor// glang de dag dang gling phran rnams// steng dang 'ogan stag bral gyi// shes pas nyams su myong ba
yod ra'i rgyal po gnya' shing 'dzin dang/ ri'i rgyal po gshol mda' 'dzin gyi bar de'i skabasan/ gnya' shang 'dzin gyi rol mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/ zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri yod la/
gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brten te// zheng du dpag tshad bzhi khri yod de/ dbyibs legs shang blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ chu bsal zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bu s gang ste/ klu'i rgyal po dag gas rgyas
bar 'dug go/ ra'i rgyal po gshol mda' 'dzin dang/ ri'i rgyal po seng ldeng can gyi bar de'i skabs na/ gshol mda' 'dzin gyi rol mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/ zabs su nu depag tshad brgyad khri

yod la/ gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brten to// zhing du nu dang ga tshod 'a khri yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa// chu bsal zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bu s gang ste/ klu'i rgyal po dag
gas rgya sa par 'dug go/ ri rgyal po seng ldeng can dang/ ri'i rgyal bo blta na sdug ga bar skabs na/ seng ldeng can gyi rol mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/ zabs sun dang ga tshad brgyad khri yod la/ gsar

gyi sa gzhi chen po la brten to// zheng du dang ga tshad zhwa yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ chu gsal zhing chu sbrang rtsa lta bu s gang ste/ klu'i rgyal po dag gis rgyas par 'dug go/

ra'i rgyal bo ba lta na sdug dang/ ri'i rgyal po rta rna'i bar de'i skabs na/ blta na sdug gi rol mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/ thabs su na debag tshad brgyad khri yod la/ gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brtan to//

zheng dun dbag tshad lnga stong yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes ba/ chu bsal zhing chu sbrang rtsa lta bu s gang ste/ klu'i rgyal po dag gas rgyas par 'dug ge/ ri'i rgyal po rta rna ra dang//
ra'i rgyal po rnam par 'dud kyi bar de'i skabs na/ rta rna ra'i rol mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/ zabs su na dpag tshad brgyad khri yod la/ gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brten to// zheng

[Or ]du na dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ chub sal zhing chu sbyang rtsa lta bu s gang ste/ klu'i rgyal bo dag gas rgyas par 'dug go/ ri rgyal po rnam
bar la dud dang/ ri'i rgyal po mu khyud kyi bar de'i skabs na/ ra'i rgyal po rnam par 'dud kyi rol mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/ zabs su na dpag tshad brgyad khri yodal/ gsar gyi sa gzhi chen po la brtan
do zheng du na dpag tshad stong nyis brgya lnga bcu yod de/ dbyangs legs shang blta na sdug la mdzes pa// chu bsal zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bu s gang ste/ klu'i rgyal po rag gas rgyas par 'dug go/
gzhungashang 'dzin gyi rol mtsho ya ]mtshams na gnya' shing 'dzin gyi ro/ gshol mda' 'dzin gyi rol mtsho ya/ tshatshams na gshol mda' 'dzan gyur// seng ldeng can gyi rol mtsho ya ]/
pha rol seng ldeng can gyi ro// blta na sdug ga ril mtsho ya/bar mtshams nan blta na sdug/ rtan ra ya ril mtsho ya ] bar mtshamasanan rtan ra/ rnam par 'dud kyi rol mtsho ya ]/pha rol ri
bo rnam par 'dud// mu khyud 'dzin gyi rol mtsho ya ]'bar mtshams na na mu khyud 'dzin// chu 'dzani rol mtsho bdun po rnams// dang ba'i bi blun mchog bzhin// rab tu bsal ba'i chu dag dang/ [1]
0 sbrang rtsi lta bu 'chus kyang gang// me tog dus kyi rjes 'brang bas// rol mtsho mdzes byas rgya sos 'khrung// de bzhin bal bu spyang ltos dang// smananasna tshogs dag gis gang// de bzhin 'jig
shing lus che ba// drug cari mi bzad 'dug pa la// klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis rgyas// rol mtsho bdun po de 'ong ba// ri bo rig gi 'od rnams dang// ma' 'od zer rnams kyis kyang//
nyi ma 'char ka thadatsagatsam// phyogs bcu dag tu lam mi snang// gser gyi ri bo bdun po yasi// rol mtsho bdun po kun nas bskor// ra rnams gtso bo ri rib na// rtse mo bras pa bzhin du
'phags// ra'i rgyal po ri rab kyipishar phyogs kyi ro'i rgyal po gnya' shing 'dzin gyi stengan/ rgyal po yul 'khor srung ga pho brang 'khor yul 'khor srung zhes bya pa zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad
nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad nas brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes shang gsar gyi ra bas bskor// ra bas 'phang du
dpag tshad phyed yod de/ rab de dag gi rtsig skyabs gsar las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas ba dang/ ba zurma las byas pa dang shel las byas pa rnam pa bzhi yod do// mda' yab dang//
zam ba rgyud ma rnam pa bzhi yod de/ de dag nang gi sa gzhi dbyibs legs shang blta na sdug la mdzes te/ bris shing legs par bris pa tshon sna brgyartsa gcig gis bris pa ste/ 'jam zhing shin tu
'jam pa na/ dang ra na shang bal rgya la tha ram/ ras bal gyi lab bzhin te/ dang ba thazhag nananams zhes byed/ rkangang btoganan nga ra zhes byed la/ ma tog man+tar ba dag gas samonub patsam du/

yongs su khebs te/ mam yan pa rnams kyi rlung ga mthus ma tog redi pa rnams 'dor bar byed/ me tog gsar ba rnams ni legs par 'grems te/ 'di skad du/ yul 'khor srung gi bsod nams dbang gi mthus/ yul 'kho'i

ba srung ga grong khyer rlung chen ldang// ma tog rnying pa rnams na 'do bar byed// sa tog gsar pa rnams na legs par 'grems// zhes kyang bya'o// de'i nang na lam srang tshun dpagatshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang

gnyis pa zhig yod de/ dbyibs legs shangobaltan sdug la mdzes pa gsar gyi phye ma bdal zhing tsan dan gyis chag chag btab pa/ de' glo g.yas g.yonan rdzong bu byas pa dag yod de/ rdzing bu de dag 'di ltasta/ gsar las

byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ baiDUrma las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa'ipha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs u0f7a/ rdzing bu de dag gi phyogs bzhin/ them skas byas pa dag yod de/ them skas de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ gsar/

las byas pa dang/ dngul las byas pa dang/ bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang/ shel las byas pa'i pha gu rnam pa bzhis brtsigs so// rdzing bu de dag kyang lan kan rnam pa bzhis skor ro// dbyibs legs shang blta na sdug la mdzes

pa chub sal zhing chu sbrang rtsi lta bu s gang sta me tog ut+pal dang/ pad+ma dang/ ku mu ta dang/ pad+ma dkar pos yongs su khebs te/ nas skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan tsang 'jebs pa dang skad yang du 'ong

ba dang/ skadamarten pa dang/ 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can dag skadasnyan pa 'byan to// rdzing bu de dag ga nyin kor na me togag shang dang/ 'bras bu rishang yod ba rnams legs par skyes shang dbyibs legs

la yongs su grub pa ste/ de dag 'phrang bar bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa na/ dbar na me tog 'phreng rgyud dam/ me tog 'phreng rgyud kyi slob ma mkhas pas 'phreng ba khra gu la brgyus pa dang/ me tog gi rna rgyan
legs par byas pa bzhin te/ thang las skyes pa'i bya sna tshogs skad snyan tshadi 'bas pa dang/ skad yad du 'ong ba dang/ skad mnyin pa dang/ 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can dag skad snyan pa 'byin

to// de dag gad la don dpag bsams kyi shing sngon po dang ser po dang/ marapo dang/ dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// pa zhag gos sngon po dang ser bo dang/ mar bo dang/ dkar bo rnam pa bzhi yod do// dbag bsams skyo

shing las byung ba'i gis sngon po dang/ ser bo dang/ dmar bo dang dkar po rnam pa bzhi yod do// lag rgyan dang/ rkang rgyan dang/ rgyan snang ba dang ma snang ba rnams 'byung ba'i rgyan gyi shing rnam pa bzhi yod de/ lha 'am lha'i
ba mo dag gis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyang ma thag tu de lta bur de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs pa wang dang/ glang bu dang/ pa wang rgyud gsum pa dang/ 'khar
rnga dang/ bshang rnams 'byung ba'ashadi dag yod de/ lha 'am/ lha'i bu mo rnams kyis ji lta bur 'dod par sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu de dag gi lag tu 'ong bar
'gyur ro// bdud rtsi rnam pa bzhi dang/ sbrang rtsa deng/ sbrang char ga btung ba dag kyang yod do// yang thog rnams dang/ khang pa brtsegs pa rnams dang/ khyim rnams dang/
[? ]khang bzad s rnams dang/ bsal khang rnams dang/ ltad mo lta ba'i sa rnams dang/ zam pa rnams bud med kyi tshogs kyis mdzes par byas shade lha'i bu mo mang pos bstan pa dang/ sal snyan dang/
thog rdob pa dag ga sgra snyan pa sgrogs pa dang/ grwa sna tshogs kyis legs par bsgos pa dang/ kha zas dang/ btung ba dang ldan pa yod de/ de na rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung 'khor dang bcas pa

[6 ]rtsa zhang dgar dgur spyod de/ rang ga las kyi 'bras bu nyams su myod ngo// ra'i rgyal po ra rib kyi lho phyogasan ra'i rgyal po gnya' shing 'dzin kyi steng na/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po'i pho

brang 'khor 'phags bar skyes zhes bya ba zhig yod de// chur dang ga tshad nyas brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad stong yod la/ dbyibs legs shing blta

awaM na sdug la mdzes ba ste/ gsar gyur bas bskor la/ ra ba' 'phang du dang ga tshad phyed yod de/ snga ma bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o// ra'i rgyal po ri rab kyi nub phyogs kyi ra'i rgyal po gnya'

shing 'dzin gyi stengan/ rgyal bo chen po mgi ma bzang gi pho brang 'khor sna tshogs gzugs zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dpag tshad nyis brgyalta bcu/ mtha'

skor du dpagatshad stong yod la/ dbyibs legs shang blta na sdug la mdzes pa sa/ snga ma bzhin du thams cad brjod par bya'o// ra'i rgyal po ra reb kyi byang phyogs na ro'i rgyal po gnya' shing 'dzan gyi steng

na rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i thobrang lcang lo can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/chur dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ zheng du yang dang ga tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu/ mtha' skor du dpagatshad stong yod de

dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa ste/ snga ma'azhan du thams cad brjod par bya'o// dri za dag ga debang po'i rgyal// shar gyi phyogs rnams skyong byed pa// rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung//
grong khyer yul 'khor srung na gnas// grul bum dag ga debang po'i rgyal// lce ya phyogs rnams skyong byed pa/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po// grong khyer 'phags par skyes na gnas//
klu rnams kyin bdag po'i rgyal// nub kyi phyogs rnams skyong byed nga// rgyal po chen po mag ma bzang// grong khyer sna tshogs gzugs na gnas/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag po'i rgyal// byang
ga phyogs rnams skyong byed pa/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu/ grong khyer lcang lo can na gnas// shar phyogs na na gnas srus po// lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes pa// nub phyogs na ni mig
ma bzang// byang phyogs nan ku be ra/ rgyal po chen po 'di bzhadeg/ 'jig rten skyong ba garba brjid ldan// phyogs bzhi dag na skyong ba ste// rdzu 'phrul che la stobs kyang che// de dag tshogs ni
gsum bo rnams// bsrung ba'i phyirin spro ba ste// sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang// sangs rgyas bde ba gzags pa dang// 'khor lo tshes bzhin bskor ba yi// ljongs kyi

bdag po gang yan pa// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i de la yang// bsrung ba'i phyir na slob yani// ji'i rgyal po ri rab kyi shar phyogs kyi phyi rol gyi rgya mtsho chen pon/ shar gyi lus 'phags zhes bya ba'i gling
ka nang rgyache la/ phyi la zla gam ltar grub pa yod de/ dpag tshad brgyad brani thur du gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brtan to// stangan chu dang mnyam par 'dug ste/ shar gyi lus 'phags po'i glingag

ngos nang ga ring po gang yin pa de la ni dpag tshad nyis stong yod de/ nang gzung ngu gang yin ba de la ni dpag tshad sum bskyalnga bcu yod do// mtha' skor du na dpag tshad drug stong sum brgya lnga bcu yod de/
dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa sa las grub pa ste/ de nashar gyi lus 'phags po'i mi rnams kyi grong dang/ grong rdal dang/ grong khyer dang/ yul 'khor dang/ pho brang 'khor gnas so// ri'i

rgyalapo ra'ib kyi lho phyogs kyi phyi rol gyi rgya mtsho'i na bon/ 'dzam bu gling zhes bya ba'i gleng nang rgya che la phyi rol shing rta'i dbyabs ltar grub pa yod de/ dpag tshad brgyad khri ni zur du gsar gyi sa gzhicin

bo la brten no// stengan chudang mnyam par 'dug ste/ 'dzam bu gling gi ngosanang gi rong po gang yan pa de lan dpag tshad nyis stong yod do// nang ga thung ngu gang yaning de la na dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi yod do//
mtha' skor du dpag tshad drug stong yod de dbyibs legs shang blta na sdug la mdzes po sa las grub pa ste/ de na 'dzam bu gling pa'i ma rnams kyi grong dang/ grong rdal dad/ grong khyer dang/ yul

'khor dang/ pho brang 'khor gnasaso// ra'i rgyal po ri rab kyi nub phyogs kyi phyi rol gyi rgya mtsho chen po na/ nub kyi ba lang spyod ces bya ba'i gludi nang rgya che la phyi rol kun nas zlum por grub pa yod de/
dpag tshad brgyad khri ni thur du gsar gyi sa gzhi chen po la brtan to// stong na chu dang mnyam par 'dug ste/ nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling ga skya na dpag tshad sa stong lnga brgya mtha' skor na
dpag tshad bdun stong lnga brgya yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pas las grub pa ste/ de nanub kyi ba lang spyod pa'i mi rnams kyi grong dang/ grong rdal dang/ grong khyer dang/

yul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gnas so// ra'i rgyal po ra rib kyi byang phyogs kyi phyi rol gyi rgya mtsho chen po na/ byang ga sgra ma san ces bya ba'i gling nang rgya cha la/ phyi rol grub

lham par grub pa yod de/ dpag tshad brgyang khra ni thur du gser gyi sa gzhi chen po la brten te// stang na chu dang mnyam par 'dug ste/ byang gi sgra ma snyan gyi gling ga chur dpag tshad nyis stong/
zhing du yang dpag tshad nyis stong/ mtha' skor du dpag tshad brgyad stong yod de/ dbyibs legs shing blta na sdug la mdzes pa sa las grub pa ste/ de na byang gasgra mi snyan pa'i ma rnams/
gnas so// gang phran brgyad yod pa la 'di lta sta/ lus dang/ lus la phags dang/ ngal ba dang/ rnga yab gzhan dang/ g.yo ldan dang/ nyaba'i g.yo ldan dang//
sgram snyan dang/ sgra ma snyan gyi zla rnams so// gling phran brgyad po 'di dag gnangan/ bdun nan mo rnams so// gcig nan ma ma yin ba rnams gnas so// rgyal chen bzhi ba'i lha rnams ni 'og
ma la shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go/ gong ma lanam yan te/ rdzu 'phrul lam/ gzhan gyi mthun ma gtogs so// de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba rnams dang/ dga'
ldan pa rnams dang/ 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang/ tshangs ras pa rnams dang/ tshangs pa'i mdunan 'don pa rnams dang/ tshangs pa chen po ba rnams dang/
'od chung ba rnams dang/tshad med 'od pa rnams dang/ 'od gsal ba rnams ngang/ dge chung ba rnams dang/ tshad med dge ba rnams dang/ dge rgyas pa rnams dang/ sprani med pa rnams dang/ bsod nams

skyes pa rnams dang/ mchi ba rnams dang/ ma gdung ba rnams dang/ gya nom snang ba rnams dang/ shin tu mthong ba po rnams kyang 'og ma la shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug gi/ gongam la ma lan te/ rdzu 'phrul lam
gzhan gyi mthu nam gtogs so// 'og man gyi lha rnams na thims cad du shes pa'i mthong ba 'jug go/ mnar med pa 'i sems can dmyal ba chen po 'og ga gzhan/ 'di nas thur du dpagatshad bzhi khri la

thug go/ mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po'i steng gi nges na 'di nas mar thur du dang ga tshad nyi khri la thug go/ de'i steng nasems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba 'dug go/ de'i steng na sems can dmyal ba
chen po tshab 'dug go/ de'i steng na sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod chen po 'dug go/ de'i steng na sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod 'dug go/ de'i steng na sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom
'dug go/ de'i stang na sems can ngamyal bachen po thag nag 'dug go/ de'i steng na sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos 'dug ste// sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po 'di dag na mtho dman du rim pas
gnas la/ lhag pa'i de la 'khor bcu drug bcu drug yod do// 'di nas dpag tshad bzhi khri'i steng nan rgyal po chen po bzhi pa'i lha rnams 'dug go/ rgyal bo chen po bzhi pa'i lha rnams yan chad nas/

dang po yan chad kyi tshad ji tsam pa de sradi na/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'dug go/ de bzhin du rgyas bar bya ste// dang po yan chad kyi tshad ji tsam pa de sladin/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnam pa tsam 'dug

go gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yan chad nas/ dang po yan chad kyi tshad na dzatsam pa de sring na/ shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'dug go/ shani tu mthong ba lha rnams yan chadanas/ dang po yan chad kyi ji
tsam pa re sang ra/ 'og man gyi lha rnams 'dug go/ sngan na brgyad yod de/ sbran nang gi mthon po gang yin pa der 'phang du nadapag tshad phyed dang gnyis yod do/ gnyis pa ni dpag tshad gcig dang/
[z/ ]@#// dpag tshad kyi bzhi cha gcig go/ gsum pa ni dpag tshad gcig go/ bzhi pa na dpag tshad gcig las bzhi cha gcig med pa'o// lnga pa na dpag tshad phyad de// drug pa na rgyang grags
gcig se// bdun pa na rgyang grags phyed do// brgyad pa na rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha gcig go/ 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshigs bcu gsum pa'o//gleng gzhi ni mnyan du
tsa yod pan ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa dge slong dag gnod par 'gyur ba dang/ gnod par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i chos rnams bshad kyis/ de 'on la legs
parang shun tu yade la byos shig dang ngas bshad do// gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams gang zhen/ skyes pa 'an/ budamad gang yang rung ste/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims can dang/ sdig pa'i chos na lus

kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa dang/ ga ga tas par spyod pa dang ldan ba dang/ yadi kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa de ni/ gang ga tshi nad kyis thebs shing sdug bsngal bar gyur la/ nad tshabs chen pos btab
nas khri'u la 'dug gam/ khra la 'dug gam/ sa la 'dug gam/ nyal yang rung ste/ las kyi tshor ba sdug bsngal zhing ma bzad la rtsub cang tsha ba dang/ yade du ma 'ong zhing srog gcod par byed pa

rnams kyis thebasan/ de la sngon gyi lus kyi nyis par sbyod pa dang ngag gi nyes par spyod pa 'am/ yadi kyi chos par sbyod pa yang rung sto/ gang byung ba de de'i tshe/ de la dmags par 'gyur zhing cher
dmags la mngon par dmages par 'gyur te/ dpar na phyam red kyi dus su ra chen po rnams sam/ ri'i rtse mo rnams kyi grib ma shod du 'bab cung cher 'bab ste/ mngon par 'bab par 'gyur ba de bzhin du//

de la sngon gyi lus kyi nyes par spyod pa 'am/ ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dang/ yad kyi nyes par spyod pa yang rung ste/ gang byung ba de'i tshe de la dmags par 'gyur zhung/ cher dmags la mngon par dmags
par 'gyur te/ de 'ad snyam du kyi hud bdag gi sdig pa 'di lta ste/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yadi kyis byas so// kyi hud bdag gis bsod nams 'di lta ste/ lus dang/ dag dad yad kyis ma
byas so// sdig pa rnams byas pa dang brlang po rnams byas pa dang/ gdug pa rnams byas pa dang/ bsod nams dag ma byas pa dang/ dge ba dag ma byas pa dang/ 'jigs pa dang skyag pa rnams kyi

skabs ma byas pa rnams kyi 'gro bgang yan pa'i 'gro ba de dag tu tshe phyi ma la bgrod dgos so snyam du sems te 'gyod par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag 'gyod bzhin du 'chi ba na 'degs pa ma yin no// dus byed

pa na legs pa ma yane no// tshe phyi man li gas pa ma yanano// de lus kyi nyes nga ra spyod pa spyad tsang/ ngag dang/ yod kyi 'os par spyod pa spyad pa las/ de'i rgyudang de'i rkyen gyis lus dang bral te/
sha pha'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur te 'di ni gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams zhes bya'o// gnod par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i chos rnams
@##// gang zhe na/ skyes pa 'am/ bud med gang yang rung sta/ tshul khrims dang dge ba'i chos can lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa dang/ ngag ga legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa
kyi 1 dang yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa de na/ gang ga dzi nad kyis thobasangashang sdug bsngal bar gyur la/ nad tshabs chen pos btab nas/ khri'u la 'dug gam/ khri la 'dug gam/ sa la/
'dug gam/ kal yang rung ste/ lus kyi tshor ba sdug bsngal 'di ma bzad la rtsa ba cing che ba dang/ yod du ma 'ong zhing srog gcod bar byed ba rnams kyis thebs na/ de la sngon gyi lus kyi legs par
spyod pa 'am/ ngag gas legs par spyod pa 'am/ yadi kya legs par spyod pa yang rung ste/ gang byung ba de de'atshade la mgas par 'gyur zhing cher dmagis la mngon par dmags par 'gyur te//
dper na phyam red kyi dus su ra chen po rnams sam/ ri'i rtsa mo rnams kyi grib ma 'od du 'bab cing char 'bab ste/ mngon par 'bab par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ de la sngon gyi lus kyi legs par spyod
ba 'am/ ngag gas legs par spyod pa 'am/ adi kyi legs par spyod pa yang rung ste/ gang byung ba de de'i tshe de la dmagasangashang char dmags la mngon par dmigs par 'gyur te/ de 'di snyam du/
kye ma bdag gis bsod nams 'di lta ste/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyis byas so// kye ma bdag cag gas sdig pa 'ad lta ste/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yad kyis ma byas so// bsod nams
0dag byas ba dang/ dge ba dag byas pa dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ skrag pa rnams kyi skyabs byas shaji sdig pa'i las rnams ma byas pa dang/ b.rung po rnams ma byas pa dang/ gdug pa rnams ma byas/
par 'gro ba gang yin pa'i 'gro ba de dag tu tshe phyi ma la 'gro bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems te/ 'gyod pa med par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag 'gyod pa med par 'chib na ligasaso// dus byed pa ni legs
so tshapa ma na legs te/ de lus kyi legs par spyod pa spyad cade/ ngag dang/ 'di kyu legs par sbyod pa spyad nas/ de'i rgyu dang de'i rkyen gyis lus dang bral te/ sha ba'i 'og tu bde
'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams kyi nang na skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni gnod par 'gyur ba ma yin pa 'a chos rnams zhes bya'o// dge slong dag gnod par 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i chos rnams bshad par
bya'o zhes ngas smras pa gang yin pa de bshad pa 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad ces gsungs nas/ gzhan yang ston pas 'di skad du//
ma rigs 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis// 'dir ni gnod 'gyur rnams byas pa'i// 'grob phyi ma gang yin pa// dmyal 'gro nga dag nga las nyen/yang sos dang na thig nag dang// bsdus gzhom dang na nge 'bod
gnyis// gzhan yang mnar med chen po dang// tsha ba dang narab tu tsha// dmyal ba brgyad po 'di dag na// thar nga ra dka' ba bstan pa ste// brlang ba'i las byas rnan kyi gang// re re'i 'khor na
[n ]@#// bcu drug yod// cha bzhi dang ni sgo bzhir ldan// tshaba'i nang na rnam par phye// lcags kyi ra bas kun nas bskor// lcags kyus su ni shin tu khebs// lcags kyi sa gzhi rab
tshab[]'bar zhing gzi brjid ldan ba ste// dpag tshad brgya phrag du mar yang// me lce dag gas mchod bar gnas// 'jungs pa 'dul ba drag po ste// me lcer ldan zhing bsten nga ra dka'// de dag
ba spu slong ba'i gzugs// 'jigs shing 'jigs byed sdug bsngal ba// drang srong dag dang sdom can dang// dka' thub can la kha zer ba// rkang pa mtho zhing spyi'i tshugs su// dmyal ba der na ltung
shu bar 'gyur// dbang po nyams pa de dug 'tshad// nya ni skam la bor ba bzhani/ de ltar nyes byas las byed pa// nyin dang mtshan du tshe nges 'debs// de na sgra chen rab tu sgrogs// 'phang mdung gis
phog glang chen bzhin// lus kyanyis pa sbyad byas shing// ngag gi nyes pa spyod rnams dang// yid kyis pa spyad byas nas// sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye// zhes gsungs so// sems can
dmyal ba chen po yang sos zhes bya ba la ci'i phyiras mas can dmyal ba chen po yang sos zhes bya zhen/ smras pa/sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos su sems can gang skyes pa dang/ kun tu skyes pa dad/
byung ba dang/ kun tu byung ba dang/ phyin pa dang/ mngon par grub pa dang/ 'thon par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag gi sdig pa ma dag ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ lcags kyi ral gri rno zhing
shani tu rno la spu rkyen kar rmong pa dag lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// sems can de dag kyang sems can gcig gsalatsaga mthong na/ shas cher sdang ba'i sems dang/ gsad pa'i sims skabar gnas/
par 'gyur te/ dparan rngon pas dgon pa'i ro degs mthong na/ shas cher sdad pa'i sems dang/ gsad pa'i sems nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba de bzhani du/ sems can dgasems can gcig la gcig
mthong na/ shas cher sdang ba'i sems dang/ gsad pa'i sems nye bar gnas par 'gyur to/ de dag ral gri de dag gis gcig la gcig kun tu gcodatsang kun tu phug ste/ kun tu gtung cing kun tu gshag
par byed de// kun tu gtub nge kun tu gashag ste/ kun tu gtubs shing kun du gshegs nas/ gang gatshigatsagags pa/tsag pasad do/ shi bar gyur ba de'i tshe phyogs gcig tu 'du'o// dus

gzhan zhig na sems can dmyal ba chen po ya nga sos su rlung bsal ba ldang nga de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod de/ 'di skad dusems can khyed rnams yang sos par gyur cig/ sems can khyed rnams

la sos pa 'gyunatsakeces sgra yang grags ba'agyur te/ de nam sems 'dedagayang 'tshobs gya lo de nas yang sems can de dag gi snag pa ma dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ lcags kyi ral gri dag lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro//
de nas yang sems can de dag kyang sems can gtsug gis gcig mthong na/ shas cher sdang ba'i sems dang/ gsad pa' sems nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ dpar na rngon pas dgon nga 'i ra degs
@#// mthong na/ shas cher snang ba' sems dad/ gsad pa'i sems nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ sems can de dag gcig gis gcig mthong na/ shas cher snang ba'i
[ ]sems dang/ gsad pa'i sems na bar gnas par 'gyur te/ de dag ral gri de dag gis gcig la gcig kun tu gcod cing 'bugs te/ kun tu gtubs shing kun tu gshag par byed do// kun tu gacod/
la tsang kun tu zug ste/ kun tu gtubs shang kun tu gshags nas/ gang gatsho gcig gis gcig bsad cing sha bar gyur pa de'i tshe phyogs gcig tu 'du'o// gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chen po
yang sos su sems can gang yang skyes ba dang/ kun tu skyes pa dang/ byung ba dang/ kun tu byung ba dang/ phyin pa dang/ mngon par grub pa dang/ 'thon par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gi sdig pa
ba ma dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ lcags kyi shang lang rno zhing shani tu rno la spu gyen kar chod pa dag lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// sems can de dag kyang gcig gas gcig mthong na//
shas cher snang ba' sems dang/ bsad pa'i sems nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ snga ma bzhin no// de dag la shang 'ang de dag gis gcig gis gcig kun tu gcodatsang kun tu rab gs te/
kun tu gtub tsang kun tu gshag par byed do// kun tu gcod cing kun tu 'bags te/ kun tu gtubs shang kun tu gshags nas/ snga ma bzhin te/ gang gi tshishi bar gyur pa de'i tshe
phyogs gcig tu 'du'o// dge slong dag sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos su rlung bsal ba ldang pa re'i dus nga yid la/ de' skabs kyang 'bod de/ 'di skad du sems can khyed rnams yang sos/
par gyur cig/ sems can khyed rnams yang sos par gyur cig ces sgra yang grags par 'gyur te/ de nas sems can de dag yang 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de nas sems can de dag gi sdig pa mi dge
ba'i las de'i rnam bar snyan pas/ lcags kyi shang lang rno zhing shan tu rnol pa gyen du ched po dag lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// sems can de dag kyang sems can gcig gis gcig mthong na/ snga
ma bzhin du gsad pa'i sems nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ de dgashang lang de dag gis gcig la gcig kun tu gcod cade kun tu 'bags la/ kun tu gtub cing kun tu gshag par byed do//
snga ma bzhin du sha bar gyur nas phyogs gtsageg tu 'du'o// gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos su sems can gang skyes pa dang kun du skyes pa dang/ byung ba dang/ kun tu byung
ba dad phyin pa dang/ mngon par grub pa dang 2 'thon par gyur nga 'asems can de dag gi sdig pa ga dge ba'i las de'i rnam par sman pas/ lcags kyi chu gri lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro//
sems can de dag kyang sems can gtsagigs gtsagi mthong na/ shas char stong ba'i sems dang/ gsad pa'i sems nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ snga ma bzhin no// de dag chu grwa de dag gis
gtub cange rab tu gtub la/ kun tu rab tu gtub bar 'gyur ro// gtubs shang rab tu gtubs la/ kun tu rab tu gtubs nas/ gang gi tshe gcig gis gcig bsad/
[v ]de shi bar gyur pa de'i phyogs gag tu 'du'o/ dus gzhan zhig na sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos su rlung bsal ba ljang ba de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod de/ 'ad skad
du sems can khyed rnams yang sos par gyur cig/ sems can khyed rnams ya nga sos par gyur cig ces sgra yang grags par 'gyur te/ de nas sems can de dag yod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang
sems can de dag ga sdig pa mi deg ba'i las de'i rnam par sman pas/ lcags kyi chu gri dag lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ba nas/ gcig gis gcig bsad de sha bar gyur pa de'i tshe phyogs gcig tu/
'du ba'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chen po yang ses su sems can gang skyes pa nas/ sdig pas dge ba'i las do'i rnam par smin pas/ lcags kyi sen mo ni/
zhing shan tu rno la/ ral gri'i so lta bu dag lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ba' bar du snga ma bzhin du rgyas par bya'o// sems can de dag kyang sems can gcig gis gcig mthong na/ shas cher snang ba'i
sems dang/ bsad pa'i sems lta bar gnas par 'gyur te/ snga ma bzhin no// de dag sen mo de dag gas gshag cing rab tu bzal te/ gcig gso gcig gshag cing rab tu bkral nas//
gang ga tshog tsag gas gcig bsad de sha bor gyur pa de'i tshe phyogs gcig tu 'du'o/ dus gzhan zhig na sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos su rlung bsal ba ltang ba de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i
skabs kyang yod de/ de nas yang sems can dag yang 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// de nas yang sems can de dag gi sdig pa ma dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ lcags kyi
sen mo rno zhing shin tu rno la/ ral gri'i so lta bu dag lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// sems can de dag kyang sems can gcig gas gcig mthong na/ snga ma bzhin te/ sha bar gyur nas phyogs
gcig tu 'du'o// gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos su sems can gang skyes pa nas/ 'thon par 'gyur ba'i bar du sta/ sems can de dag ga sdog ngang ma dge ba'i las de'i rnam
par smin pas/ lcags kyi mdung thung rno zhangashan tu rnol/ ral gri'i so lta bu dag lag tu 'ong bar 'gyura'o// sems can de dag kyang sems can gcig gis gcig mthong na/ shes cher sdang ba'i sems
dang gsad pa'i sems nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ snga ma bzhin no// de dag mdung thung de dag gi gcig la gtsug kun tu 'bagasangashang nges par 'bags te/ gang gi tshe gcig gis gcig bsad
nas sha bar gyur ba de'i tshe phyogs gcig tu 'du'o// dus gzhan zhig nasems can dal ba chen po yang sos su rlung bsal ba ldang ba de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod de/ de nas sems can
de dag yang 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// de nas yang sems can de dag sdig pa ma dge ba'i las de 'a rnam par sman pas/ lcags kyi mdung thung lag tu 'ong bar
'gyur banas/shi bar gyur nas phyogs gcig tu 'du ba'i bar du rgyas par bya'o/ gzhan pa ngasems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos susems can gang skyes pa nas/ 'thon pa'i bar du snga mabazhin no//
sems can de dag gi las de'i rnam par smin pas/ lcags kyi tho ba lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// sems can de dag kyang sems can gcig gas gcig mthong n shas cher snang ba'i sems dang/
tsha gsad pa' sems 'o bar gnas par 'gyur te/ dper na ljon pa khazhani de snga ma bzhin no// de dag tho ba de dag gso gcig la gcig 'dzoms shing rab tu 'joms la/ kun tu 'joms te/
bcom zhing rab tu bcom la/ kun tu rab tu bcom nas/ gang gi tsho gcig gis gcig bsad de/ sha bar gyur pa deb tsha phyogs gcig tu 'du'o// dus gzhan zhig na sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sa
su rlungabasal ba ldang ba de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'askabs kyang yod de/ 'daskad du sems can khyed rnams yang sos par gyur cig/ sems can khyed rnams yang sos par gyur cig ces sgra yang grags par
gyur te/ de nas yang sems can de dag yang 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang sems can de dag ga sdog pa ma dge ba'i las de'i rnam par sman pas/lcags kyi thob dag lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro//
sems can de dag kyang gcig gas gcig mthong nas/ sha bar gyur nas phyogs gcig tu 'du ba'i bar du snga ma ngani no// shor 'tsho dang/ jo[E]rtsa gcig pa dang/ mtshon tshu gcig pa dang/
'phang mdung dang/ gzhu la sogs pa'i mtshon rnams kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya ste/ mabazad pa de dag dang/ mo de ga de dang/ 'bras bu da ngag dang/ rnam par spos pa de dag gsan//
sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos zhes bya ste/ den sdug bsngal zhang abazad la rtsub cing tsha ba dang/ yadi dum 'ong zhing srog gcod par byed pa las kyi gnod pa gzhan dang/ gzhan mang po
dag kyang yod de/ 'di skad du/ phan tshun 'khon 'di zhe non la// ma rnams ma la bsod pa dag/ lon byi ba brag stong/ yang cadi gsad cing phyi ni pad rAtshe// zhes kyang bya'o// gang dag
pha ma sangs rgyas dang/ nyan thos rnams la sdang ba na// ngamyal ba chen po thag nag tu// sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar 'gyur// sems can dmyal ba chen po thaganag ces bya ba la/ ci'i phyir sems
can dmyal ba chen po thaganag ces bya zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can ngamyal ba chen po thag na/ ngu sems can gang skyes pa dang/ nu sa pa dang/ byung ba dang/ kun tu byung ba nas/ 'thon par 'gyur
ba'i bar dag ga sdig pa ma dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma dag kas/ sems can de dag lcags kyis gzha 'bar zhang rab tu 'bar la/ kunutu rab tu 'bar//
te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa la/ gan kyal du bzhag nas/ lcags kyi thog gas btab ste/ lcags kyi ste'u 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te//
bar ba gcig tu gyur pa dag gas 'jog cing rab tu 'jog la/ kun tu rab tu 'jog ste/ dper na shang mkhan gyis shang sa la bzhag nas thag gas btab ste/ stos 'jogatsang rab 'jog la/ kun tu
rab tu 'jog pa de bzhin du/ sems can dmyal ba chen po'i srungs ma dag gas/ sems can de lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu mchod cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba
gcig tu gyur pa la gan kyal du bzhag nas lcags kyi thog gis btab ste/ lcags kyi ste'us 'jog cing rab tu 'jog la/ kun tu rab tu 'jog go/ gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chen po thag
nag tu sems can gang dag skyes panas/ 'thon par 'gyur ba'i bar dag gi sdig pa ma dge ba'i las de'i rnam par sman pas/ sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma de dag gso/ sems can de dag
lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nga la gan kyal du bzhag nas/ lcags kyu thage gis btab ste/ lcags kyi sta re 'bar zhang
rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pas bsal to/ dpar na shang mkhan gyis shang sa la bzhag nas thag btab ste/ sta res bsal ba de bzhan du sems can dmyal
[c]ba' srungs ma dag gas/ samasacan de dag lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ 'bar bkacag tu gyur pa la sta res bsal ba'i bar du snga ma bzhanano// gzhan/
yang sems can dmyal ba chen po thag nag tu sems can gang skyes pa nas/ 'thon pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// stag pa ma dge ba'i las de'i rnam par sman pas/ sems can dmyal ba'i srungs
ma dag gas/ sems can de dag lcags kyis gzha 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa la/ mgo thur du bstan te bzhag nas/ sog le kha
gnyasasam kha gsum mam kha mang du gshag par byed de/ dper na shang mkhan gyis shang sa la mgo thur du bstan te bzhag nas/ kha gnyis sam/ kha gsum mam/kha mang du gshag par/
byed pa de bzhin du/ sems can dmyal ba dag ga srungs ma de dag gas/ sems can de dag lcags kyis gzhi 'bar ba la mgo thur du bstan te bzhag nas/ kha gnyis sam/ kha gsum mam/ ka
mang dugshegs pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin du rgyas par bya'o// gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba thig nag tu sems can gang dag skyes pa dang/ kun tu skyes pa nas/ 'thon par 'gyur ba'i bar dag ga sdig pa/
ma dge ba'i las de'i rnam par sman pas/ sems can dmyal ba'agashengam dag gis 2 sems can de dag lcags kyi rgyud 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tugyur
pas mgo bo dkra bar byed do// mgo bo dkris nas mgul ba dkrab r byed do// mgul ba dkris nas phrag pa gnyis dkri bar byed do// phrag pa gnyis dkras nas lag pa gtus
da 1 dkra bar byed do// lag pa gnyis dkris nas mchan khung gnyis dkri bar byed do// mchan khung gnyis dkras nas sta zur gnyis dkra bar byed do// sta zur gnyis dkas nas brla gnyis dkra bar
byed do// brlagatas dkris nas rdzongar gtas dkra bar byed do// rje ngar gnyis dkris nas long bu gnyis dkra bar byed do// long bu gnyis dkris nas rkang pa'i bol gnyis dkra bor byed do//
rkang pa'i bol gnyis dkras nas rgyud de'i thir to nas bzung ste/ senamo yan chad kyang dkra bar byed de// sems can de dag ga pags pa dang/ sha dang/ khrag yan chad thams cad phyi'i 'byung ngo//
ba de la sogs pa de las gzhan pa'i gnod pa rnams kyang brjod par bya sta/ ma bzad pa de dag dang/ me tog de dag dang/ 'bras bu de dag dang/ rnam par spros pa de dag gsan/ sems can dmyal
ba chen po thag nag ces bya ste/ den sdug bsngal zhing ma bzad la/ tsung cang tsha ba dang/ yod du ma 'ong zhing srog gcod par byed pa las kyang gnod pa gzhan dang/ gzhan mang po dag kyang yod de//
'di skad du/ bya man byed du 'jug pa dang// ma rnams mdza' bo 'byed pa dang// phram brdzun smasgyu byed pa// thag nag tu ni skye bar 'gyur// zhes kyang bya'o/
bam po brgyad pa ste tha ma'o// bar sdom la/ ral grishang lang chu gri dang// sen mo mdung thung tho ba rnams// sta'u sta re sog le dang// rgyud bzhi dag na thagi nag ga/ sngag pa
rnam gsum byas pa dang// dge ba rnam gsum ma byas pa'i// blo ngan bsdus gzhom song nas ni// sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom zhes bya ba la/
ci'i phyir sems can dmyal ba bsdus gzhom zhes bya zhen/ smras pa/ sems can dmyal ba chen pa bsdus gzhom du sems can gang skyes pa dang/ kun tu skyas pa dang 2 byung ba dang/ kun tu
byung ba dang/ phyin pa dang/ mngon par grub pa dang/ 'thon par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gi sdig pa ma dege ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ lcags kyi sa gzhi dpag tshad mang po dang//

dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po drang/ dpag tshad stong phrag mang po dang/ dpag tshad brgya stong phrag mang po yod par 'byung ngo// de nas sems can de dag gnas tshol zhing skyabs tshol la/ 'byung ba'i
thabs tshol te/ der rgyug cing der rab tu rgyug lo/ der kun tu rab tu rgyugaste/ de dag der phyogs gtsag tu 'du'o// gang gatsho brgya phrag mang po dang/ stong phrag mang po dang/ brgya stong/
phrag mang po 'dus par gyur pa de'i tshe/ de dag 'khod pa'i steng du lcags kyi dra ba 'byung bar 'gyur te sems can de dag 'gebs shing rab tu 'gebs la/ kun tu rab tu 'gebs so// bkab
cang rab tu bkab la/ kun tu rab tubakab nas/ de dag 'khod pa'i steng du lcags kyi tho ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sems can de dag 'jom zhing rab tu 'jom la/
kun tu rab tu 'jom mo// bcom zhing rab tu bcom la/ kun tu rab tu bcom nas/ gang gi tshabasad de sha bar gyur pa de'i tshe steng du ma snang bar 'gyur ro// de dag de lta bu'i tshul gyis lo mang po

'a7 dang lo brgya phrag mang po dang/ lo stong phrag mang po dang lo brgya stong phrag mang po sdug bsngal zhing ma bzad la rtsub cing tsha ba dang/ yade du ma 'ong zhing srog gcod par byed pa'i tshor ba dag nyams

su myong bar 'gyur te/ de dag nam sems can dmyal ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'asdig pa mdige ba'i las de dag gtan nasam zang ma byang gi bar du re zhig 'chi ba'i dus byed par ma 'gyur ro// gzhan yang
sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhes dusems can gang skyes banas/'thon pa/ra 'gyur ba' bar du snga ma bzhin de/ sems can de dag ga sdig pa ma dag ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/

pa/ lcags kyi sa gzhi dpag tshad mang po dang/ dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po dang/ dpag tshad stong phrag mang po dang/ dpag tshad brgya stong phrag mang po yod par 'byung ngo// de nas sems can de dag gnas
tshol zhing skyabs tshol la/ 'byung ba'i thabs tshol te/ der rgyug cing der rab tu rgyug la/ der kun tu rab tu rgyug ste/ de dag der phyogs gcig tu 'dub nas/ brgya phrag mang po'i bar du snga ma
bzhan te/ de' tsha de dag 'khod pa'i steng du lcags kyi dra ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sems can de dag 'gebasangashang rab tu 'gebs la/ kun tu rab tu 'gebs so// de'i tshe de dag 'khod pa'i steng
du glang po che dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sems can de dag 'chag cing rab tu 'chag la/ kun tu rab tu 'chag go/ bcags shing rab tu bcags la 2 kun tu rab du bcugs nas/ gang ga tsha bsad de

shabar gyur pa de'i tshe steng du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de dag de lta bu'i tshul rgyas la mang po nas/ ma byang ma zad kyi bar du snga ma bzhin no// gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom du
sems can dmyal ba gang skyes pa nas/ 'then par 'gyur ba'i bar du ste/ sems can de dag gi sdig pa ma dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma dag gis bzung nas/

lcag kyigatunagyi nang du bcug ste/ lcagakyagatun dag gis myur ba myur bar brdung zhing rab tu bzung la/ kun tu rab tu brdung ste/ dper na ma rnams kyis gtun gyi nang du 'bras blugs nas/ gtun bus myur ba
myur bar brdung zhing rab tu brtung la/ kun tu rab tu bzung ba de bzhin du/ sems can dmyal ba' srungs ma dag gis sems can de dag lcags kyi gtun gyi nang du bcug sta/ lcags kyi gtun bu zhes
bya ba nas/ kun tu rab tu brdungs te/ de dag de lta bu'i tshul gyis lo mang po zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom du sems can gang skyes pa nas/
'then par 'gyur ba'i bar du rgyas par bya ste// sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma de dag gas sems can de dag bzung nas/ lcags kyi sgrom gyi nang dubcug ste/ lcags kyi
gtun bu dag gas bzung zhang rab tu brdung la/ kun tu rab tu brdung ste/ dperan ma rnams kyis sa gar sgrom gyi nang du blug nas brdung zhing rab tu brdung la/ kun tu rab tu bzung ba de bzhin du/
sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma dag gsasems can de dag lcags kyi sgrom gyi nang du bcu gnas / lcags kyi gtun bu dag gas zhes bya ba nas/ ma byang ma zad kyi bar du snga ma bzhin no// gzhan
tshe8 yang sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom du sems can gang skyes pa nas/ 'thon par gyur ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du rgyas par bya ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma dag gas bzung nas/
lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor dag gnang du bcug ste/ 'tshar zhang rab tu 'tsher la/ kun tu rab tu 'tshare te/ dper na ma rnams kyisabu ram shang dag 'khrul 'khor gyi nang du bcug ste/ 'tshar zhing rab
a du 'tsher la/ kun tu rab tu 'tsher ba de bzhin du/ sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma dag gis sems can de dag bzung nas/ lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi nang du bcug pa nas/ kun tu rab tu 'tshari

ba'i bar du'o// de dag de lta bu'i tshul gyis lo mang po dang/ lo brgya phrag mang po dang/ lo stong phrag mang po dang/ lo brgya stong phrag mang por sdug bsngal zhing ma bzad la rtsub cade tsha ba dang/ ya

0 du ma 'ong ba'i tshor ba dag myong bar 'gyur de/ de dag nam sems can dmyal ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa ma dge ba'i las de gdan ma byang ma zad kyi bar du re zhig dus byed par ma 'gyur ro// gzhan
yang sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom du sems can gang skyes pa dang/ kun tu skyes pa dang/ byung ba dang/ kun tu byung ba nas/ 'thon par 'gyur pa'i bar du ste/ sems can de dag ga stag

pa ma dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smon pas/ ri rin po rgya che ba dpag tshadamang po dang/ dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po dang/ dpag tshad stong phrag mang po dang/ dpag tshad brgya stong phrag mang po yong nge
stong ga res na mi'am zhing sdug la/ 'og nan khrag 'byin par byed pa 'a lcags yod ngo// de nas sems can de dag de'i skyug tsang der rab tu rgyug pa/ der kun tu rab tu rgyug ste/ gnas tshol zhing

skabs tshol la/ 'byung bo'i thebs tshol zhing de dag de'i phyogs gcig tu bu ga ste/ gang ga tsho brgya phrag mang po zhes bya ba nas/ rgyas par bya ste/ de' tshi ra de sems can de dag ga steng du ltung ste//

sems can de dag glemasangashange rab tu glem la/ kun tu rab tu glem mo// them zhing rab tu glem la/ kun tu rab tu glems nas/ gang ga tshe bsad de sha bor gyur pa de'i tshe steng du ma snang bar gyur to// de/

dag de lta bu 'atshul gyis lo mang po dang/ lo brgya phrag mang po zhes bya ba nas/ rgyas par bya'o// gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom du sems can gang skyes pa dang/ kun du skyes pa'i
[r/ ]@#// bar du snga ma bzhin te/ sems can de dag gi sdig pa ma dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ ri'i sul chen po dag dpag tshad mang bo dang/ dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po'abar

[Or]1 du snga ma bzhin no// de nas sems can de dag der rgyug cing der rab tu rgyug pa nas/ 'byung ba'i thabs tshol ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// de dag der zhugs pa nas/ brgya phrag mang po'inang du zhugs
pa'i bar du ste/ de' tshor yul de dag phyir byed de/ sems can de dag 'jags pa dang/ sngangs pa dang/ spu ldang bar byed do// de nas sems can de dag 'jigs shing skag la ya chud de/ ba
spu langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'du'o// gang gatsho brgya phrag mang pa dang/ stong phrag mang po dang/ brgya stong phrag mang po dag 'dus par gyur pa de'i tshi/ ra de dag phyogs gnyis ka nas 'dus te/
( sems can de dag bcom zhing rab tu bcom la kun tu rab tu bcom mo// bcom zhing rab tu bcom la/ kun tu rab tu bcoms nas/ gang ga tshibasad de sha bar gyur pa de'i tshe phyir 'gyed do//
de dag de lta bu'i tshul gyis lo mang po'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom du sems can gang skyes pa dang/ 'thon par 'gyur ba'i bar du ste//

sa mas can de dag gi sdig pa ma dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 2 lcags kyis gzhi de'anang nags tshal dpag tshad mang po nas/snga ma bzhin no// da nas sems can de dag der rgyug cing der rab tu rgyug la

der kun tu rab tu rgyug nga 'a bar du rgyas par bya sta/ de dag de'i nang du 'gro'o1/ gang gatsho brgya phrag mang po dang/ stong phrag mang po dang/ brgya stong phrag mang po nang du zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe de dag
'khod pa'i 'og dang/ stang dang/ phyogs bzhi nas me lce 'byung ste/ sems can de dag 'jags pa dang/ dngangab dang/ spu ldang bar byed do// de nas sems can de dag 'jagesangashang skrag las ya

chad de/ smra langs nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gang gi tshabargya phrag mang po 'dus par gyur pa'i bar du rgyas par bya ste/ de'i tshe me de dag gis sa gzhi rib tu 'bar bar byed de// sa gzhi rab tu
'bar bar byas nas/ nags tshul rab tu 'bar bar byed do// nags tshal rab tu 'bar bar byas nas/ sems can de dag rab tu 'bar bar byed do// de nas sems can de dag 'bar zhango rab tu 'bar la/
kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas sIshar phyogs su 'gro na yang ma 'ba' zhig mthong ngo// ci ste lho dang/ nub dang/ byang du brgyugs na yang me 'ba' zhig mthong zhing tshag ste/

nga lta bu'i tshul gyis lo mang po nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de gtan nas ma byang ma zad kyi bar du snga ma bzhinate/ 'ad skad du/ ba langar lug ma he dang// ri dgas phag dang bya
gag dang// de bzhin gzhan gyi srog gcod pas// bsdus gzhom du na bcom par 'gyur// zhes kyang bya'o/// sdom la/ sa ga'angang na theba'i sgrom// 'khrul 'khor dang ni 'dzoms
dngar// de nas ra sulanags tshal rnams/ bsdus gzhomanan gnodapa brgyad// de la sogs pa'i gnod pa mang po brjod par bya ste/ ma zad ba de dag dang/ ma tog de dag dang/
'bras bu de dag dang/ rnam par spres pa de dag gis na/ sems can dmyal ba bsdus gzhom zhes bya ste/ de na sdug bsngal zhang ma bzad la rtsub cing tsha ba dang/ yid du ma 'ong bsrog gcod par byed pa//
las kyi gnod ba gzhan dang/ gzhan mang po dag kyang yod do// srog gcod pa yi sems can rnams// brlung zhing khrag ni 'byung ba dang// ngan pa'i las na kun spyod pa// ngu 'bod

chung ngur 'gro bar 'gyur// sems can dmyal ba chen bo ngu 'bod chung ngu zhes bya ba la ci'i phyir sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chung ngu zhes bya zhen/ smras pa/ sems can dmyal ba chen bo ngu 'bod chung ngur
sems can gang dag skyes pa nas 'thon par 'gyur ba'i bar du ste/ sems can de dag ga sdog pa ma dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ lcags kyi sa gzhadapag tshad mang po'i bar du rgyas par bya'o/
de'i nang na nags thibs po yod de/ de nas sems can de dag gas dor rgyugacing/ der rab tu rgyug la/ der kun tu rab tu rgyug ste/ gnas tshol zhing skyabs tshol la/ 'byung ba'athibs tshol to// de dag
der phyogs gcig tu 'du'o// gang gatshibargya phrag mang po nas/ 'dus par gyur pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin te/ de nas de dag ga'og dang/ stang dang/ phyogs bzhi nas mo 'byung ste/ sems can de dag
'jigs pa dang/ skag pa dang/ ya ched de/ snga ldang bar byed do// de nas sems can de dag 'jigs shing stag la 3ya chad de/ ba snga langs par gyur nas/ nags thibs po'i nang du 'gro'o// gang gi
tshob phragamang po nas/ de dag a par gyur pa'i bar du sta/ de'i tshom des sa gzharab tu 'bar bar byed de/ sa gzharab tu 'bar bar byas nas/ nags thabs po rab tu 'bar bar byed do// nags
thibs po rab tu 'bar bar byas nas 2 sems can de dag rab tu 'bar bar byed do// de dag der 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas/ tsa sta shar phyogs su

brgyugs na yang ma 'ba' zhig mthong ba na/ de dag de lta bu'i tshul gyis ma byang ma zud kyi bar du snga ma bzhan taM/ ma bzad pa de dag dang me tog de dag dad/ 'bras bu de dag dang/ rnam par spros pa de

ngag gsan/ sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chung ngu zhes bya ste den sdug bsngal 'ang ma bzang la rtsub cing tsha ba dang/ yadi du ma 'ong ba srog gcod par byed pa las kyi gnod pa gzhan dang/ gzhan
mang po dag kyang yod de/ 'di skad du/ ma rnams brlang 'debs rgyu byed pa'i// skye bo dgan bisdus nas kyang// ngu 'bod du na rib bsgrags cade// 'jigs pa'i nga ro tsho rjes 'debs// zhes kyang bya'o//
lta ba'i thibs pos khebs pa dang// sred pa'i bcing bas bcings pa dang/ 'doma' ba'i las kyakun spyod pa// ngu 'bod chen por skye bar 'gyur// sems can dmyalab chen po du 'bod
chen po zhes bya ba la ci'i phyir sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod chen po zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod chen por sems can gang dag skyes pa nas/ 'thon par

[O"]1 'gyu ba'i bar du sta/ sems can de dag gi sdig pa ma dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ lcagasakyis gzhi dpagatshad mang po'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// nags thibs po de'i nangan khyim yod de/ de nas sems can
