tshayaM dedag skyug pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// de'i tshe de dag gi 'og dang/ stang dang/ phyogasabazhi nas me byung ste/ sems can de dag 'jigs pa dang/ skrag pa dang/ spu ldang bar byed do// de nas sems can de dag 'jigs shing

skrag la ya chad de/ ba spu langs nas/gas thabs po'i nang du 'gro'o// nags thabs po'i nang du zhugs nas/ gang gi tshobargya stong mang por zhugs par gyur pa de'atsho/ mi des sa gzhu rab tu 'bar bar byed do// sa gzhu rab

tu 'bar bar byas nas/ nags thibs po rab tu 'bar bar byed do// nags thabs po rab tu 'bar bar byas nas/ khyim rab tu 'bar bar byed do// khyami rab tu 'bar bar byas nas/ sems can de dag rab tu 'bar bar byed do//

de nas sems can de dag 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tugyurapa nas/ nam sems can dmyal ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdog pa ma deg ba'i las de gtan nas ma byang ma zad

kyi bar du snga ma bzhin no// de lasogs pa'i gnod pa'i las rnams brjod par byaste/ mi bzad pa de dag dang/ me tog de dag dang/ 'bras bu de dag dang/ rnam par spros yang dag gsin/ sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bodachen

po zhes bya ste/ de na sdug bsngal zhing/ srog gcod par byed pa las kyi gnod pa gzhan dang/ gzhan mang po dag kyang yod pa'i bar du rgyas par byas te/ 'ad skad du/ don sgyu byed pa'i mi rnams ni/ du 'bodachen por song/

gyur nas// tshig cingaskya yang ldang gyur la// khyim gyi nang du sung zhing srog/ ces kyang bya'o// skye bo mang la gnod byas gang// tshabar gyur ba'i las byas pa// blo ngan tshabar song nas ni/ sdug bsngal tshor ba nyams su myong

sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba zhes bya ba la/ ci'i phyir sems can dmyal bachen po tshazhes bya zhe na/ smras pa// sems can dmyal ba chen po ma bar sems can gangaskyes pa dang kun tu skyes pa nas 'thonapar 'gyur ba'i bar du ste//

sems can de dag gi sdig pa ma dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas sems can dmyal ba'asungasam dag gsi/ sems can de dag bzung nas lcags kyi sa gzhi la deng 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/
'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa'i nang du rab tubasngogs nas/ lcags kyi skam pas phyir byung ste/ lcags kyi titsal bzhaka nas/ lcags kyi tho bas brdung zhing rab tu brtud// kun tu rab tu brtungs te/ dper
na lcags mgar gyis lcags dang tshon mo steng ga mgar bas tshon mo stang dang/ lugs mgar gyis lugs su bya ba dang/ zha nye'i mgar bas zha nya dang/ gser mgar gyis gser dang/ dngul
mgar gyas dngul mdag ma'i dong du bsregs nas/ lcags kyi skal pas phyung ste/ lcags kyi tu tsi la bzhag nas/ lcags kyi tho bas brdung zhing rab tu brdung la/ kun tu rab tu
mad spya// brdung ba de bzhin du/ sems can dmyal ba' srungasam dag gas/ sems can de dag lcagasakyi dong 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur

pa'i nang du bsregs nasaM/ lcags kyi skam pas phyir phyung ste/ lcags kyi titso la bzhag nas/ lcags kyi tho bas brdung zhing rab tu brdung la/ kun tu rab tu brdung ste/ de dag de lta bu'i tshul gyis zhes
'a bya ba nas/ rgyas par bya'o// gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha bar sems can gang skyes pa dang/ kun tu skyes pa nas/ 'thon par 'gyur ba'i bar du snga ma bzhani te/ de dag sems can
dmyal ba'i srungs ma rnams kyis bzung nas/ lcags kyi mdung rtse gsum pa'i stan 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa la 'dug tu bcug ste/ rtse mo
gcag gsanadi'i rkub g.yas logs su brtol te/ phrag pa g.yas par phyung ngo// rtse mo gnyis pas na rkub g.yon logs su brtol te// phrag pa g.yon par 'byung ngo// rtse mo gsum pas na lto'i nang
pa/ nas brtol te/ spyi bor 'byung ngo// de' mog gi bu ga gnyis nas kyang ma 'byung la/ rnab dang/ sna dang/ kha'i nang dang/ ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas me 'byung ste/ de dag de lta bu'i tshul
gyis lo mang po zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chen po tshabar sems can gang skyes pa dang/ kun tu skyes pa dang/ 'thon par 'gyur ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin te/
sems can de dag sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma rnams kyis bzung nas/ dbugs pa'i gnod pa chen po byed de/ de'i mig ga bu gu gnyis nas kyang ma 'byung la/ rna ba gnyis dang/ sna dang/ kha'amed/
dang ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang me 'byung ste/ de dag de lta bu'i tshul gyis lo mang po zhes bya ba nas nam sems can dmyal ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdug pa ma dge ba'i las de gtan/
nas ma byang ma zad kyi bar du de la sogs pa'i gnod pa mang po dag brjod par bya ste/ mi bzad pa de dag dang/ me tog de dag dang/ 'bras bu de dag dang/ rnam par sbos pa de dag gsan/ sems can

ngamyal ba chen po tsha ba zhes bya ste/ de na sdug bsngal 'ang ma zad pa dang/ rtsub shang tshub dang/ yadi du ma 'ong ba'i srog gcod par byed pa las kyi gnod pa gzhan dang/ gzhan mang po dag kyang yod de//
de skad du/ dge sbyong bram ze dge ba dang/ de bzhin gang zhig pha ma la/ gnod pa man pas gnod byed pa// de na tsha bar rab tu srog/ ces kyang bya'o/ 'a bde 'gror 'gro ba'i las dang nadi
'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'gyur ba song// blo ngan 'ded mni las byed pa// de ni rab tu tshabar sreg/ sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba zhes bya ba la/ ci'i phyir sems can dmyal bachen po rab tu
tshab zhes bya zhen/ smras pa/ sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha bar sems can gang skyes nga nas/ 'thon par 'gyur ba'i bar du ste/ sems can de dag gi sdig pa ma dgaba' las po'i rnam
par sman pas/ sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma rnams kyis bzung ste/lcags kyi mtshon gyis dum bu dum bur bcang nas/ lcags kyi gsal shing la btsugs te/ lcags/
kyi dong 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa'i nang du srog cing zlog par byed de/ dper nagayos mkhan gyi sha mtshon gyis dum bu dum bur bcad nas thur ma la

btsugs te/ mdag ma'i dong bur bsrogatsangabasregatsang zlog par byed pa de bzhin du/ sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma nas/ de lta bu'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba'i bar du thams cad rgyas par brjod par bya'o//
gzhan yang sems can ngamyal bachen po rab tu tsha bar sems can gang skyes pa dang/ 'thon par 'gyur ba'abar du snga ma bzhinate/ sems can de dag gi sdug pa ma dge ba'i las de'i rnam par snyan pas/
sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma rnams kyis sems can de dag bzung nas lcags kyi mtshon kyis dum bu dum bur bcad de/ lcags kyis ga' 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/

'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa la rab tu bsgre zhing shin tu rdzobar byed de/ dparan g.yesa mkhan gyis sha lcags kyi mtshon gyis dum bu dum bur bcad nas snod du bcug ste/ rab tu bsgra zhing shin tu rdzogs bar
byed de/ khu ba yang skam par byed pa de bzhin du sems can dmyal ba' srungasam nas de dag de lta bu'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas bar bya'o// gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chen po
0 rab tu tsha bar sems can gang skyes pa nas/ snga ma bzhin te/ sems can de dag sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma dag gas bzung nas/ lcags kyi mtshon gyis kha ba'as sam kha gsum mam/ kha mang/
du gshag sta/ lcags kyis nga'aning du bcu gnas rdzobar byed de/ dpar na nya dum bu gnyis Msam/ gsum mam/ dum bu dum bur gtubs nas/ sla nga' nang du bcug ste rdzob de bzhin du[ ]sems

can dmyal ba'i srungasam rnams kyis zhes bya banas/ de lta bu 'atshul gyis zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du rgyas par bya'o// gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha bar sems can gang dag
skyes pa nas 2 snga ma bzhin te/ lcags kyi rdza ma dga' ba zhes bya ba dang/ na dga' bya ba gnyasi yod pa la/ rdza bum dga' ba lan chur dpag tshad lnga bcu/ zhing du yang dpag tshad lnga bcu/ 'phang

du dpagatshad drug cu/ sboms su dpag tshad brgyalnga bcu yod do// rdza bum nya dga' lan chur dpagatshad brgyalnga bcu rtsa gcig/ zheng du yang dpag tshad bculnga bcu rtsa gcig/ 'phang du dpag tshad drug
cu sboms su ni dpag tshad brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum yod la ba tsha'i chu khol bas gang ste/ sems can de dag sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma de dag gis bzung nas ]rdza bumaraga' ba dang/
nyi dga' gnyis kyi nang du spyi'i tshugs su bor te/ de dag de na zhabs su yang 'gro ste/ skol zhang 'tshad la/ stang du yang 'gro ste skol zhing 'tshod do// phyogs dang/ phyogs 'tshams su yang 'gro/
[F ]@#// ltaskol zhing 'tshad do// dbusan na de bu ba 'dus shang 'dug ste/ dperan tol lam/ 'bras sam/ mon sran gre'u 'am/ rgya shug ga 'bras bu 'am/ rgya sran nam//

dag1 mang po snod kyi nang du blugs te/ 'o gnas me drag tu sban/ 'og tu yang 'gro ste skol zhing 'tshad la/ stong du yang 'gro ste skol zhing 'tshed do// dbusan na dbu ba 'dus shing 'dug pa de bzhin du//
sems can dmyal ba'i srungasam nas/ nam sems can dmyal ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa ma dge ba'alas de dag gtananas mabyang ma zad kyi bar du rgyas par bya'o// de la sogs pa'i gnod
pamang po dag kyang brjod par bya ste/ mabazad pa de dug dang/ me tog de dag dang/ 'bras bu de dag dang/ rnam par spros pa de dag gsan sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba zhes bya'o// de sdug
bsngal gzhan dang/ gzhan mad po dag kyang yod de/ snga ma bzhan no// 'di skad du/ dge sbyong bram ze dge ba dang// de bzhanegang gi pha ma dang// gang zhig bla ma gzhan gsod pa// de ni rab tu/
tsha bar srog/ ces kyang bya'o/ sdom la/ dong dang lcags dang dbug pa dang// tsha ba dang na gnod pa gsum// gsal shang snod dang sla nga dang// rdza bum bzhin du rab tu tsha// ngan
'gror 'gro ba'i las rnams las// shasacher byas par gyuranan// blo nganamanar med song nas kyang// sdug bsngal tshor ba myod bar 'gyur// sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med ces bya ba la/
0 ]ci'i phyir sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa zhes bya zhen/ sbas pa/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par sems can gang skyes pa nas/ 'thon par 'gyur ba'i bar du ste/ sems can de dag
gi sdig pa ma dge ba'i las de'i rnam par sman pas/ sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma dag gas bzung nas/ lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig/
du gyur pa la gan kyal du bzhag nas/ ma bzad pa'i bcang ba rnam pa lnga'i bcing bas gnod pa byed de/ lag pa gnyis kyang lcags kyi phur pas 'debs la/ rkang pa gnyis dang/ dbus su sAng
kar yang lcags kyi phur pas 'debs te/ de dag de lta bu 'atshul gyis zhes bya ba nas/ rgyas par bya'o// gzhan yang sems can dbu lab chen po mnar med par sems can gang skyes zhes bya ba nas/
snga ma bzhin de dag soms can dmyal ba'i srungs ma dag gis bzung nas/ lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la// kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ 'bor bu gcig tu gyur pa la gan kyal du bzhag/
nas/ kha nas lce phyung ste/ lcags kyi phur pa brgyas bskyangs nas/ sems can de dag gi lce dag lcags kyi phur pabargyas bskyangs pas gnyer ma rangs par 'gyur zhing/ thang chad par 'gyur te/
dper na gling ga ko ba lcags kyi phur pa brgyas bskyangs nas/ gter ma rangs par 'gyur zhing/ thang chad par gyur ba de bzhin du/ sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma zhes bya ba nas/ rgyas par de dag de lta
bu' tshul gyis zhes bya ba'abar du snga ma bzhin no// gzhan yang sems can dmyal bachen bo mnar mor par sems can gang tshes pa dang/ kun tu skyes bde dag sems can dmyal ba'i
sbyang sam dag gas bzung nas/ lcags kyis gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa la sbya'u tshugs su bzhag nas/ gle gnyis ka nas pags pa bshus/
ti/ ltag par thug par bshus nas/ lcags kyi shing rta 'dren du bcug skyo/ lam gyi brgyad mdor gang 'dod pa dang/ ca dga' ba dang/ ji sridi du 'dod par 'gror bcug cade phyir yang zlog par byed de/
dper na rtagasung pa bzhi dang sbyar ba'arigange rta srab mda' dang pa dang/ rnyed pa dang/ lcags dang sbyar te/ lam gyi bzhi mdo chen por bzhag pa de gnya' shang gas 'dul ba'i kha lo ba mkhas pas
myur zhing myur bar zhon te/ lag pa g.yon pas na srab mda' bzung/ lag pa g.yas pas na zhu ba'i lcags thogs te/ lam gyi brgyad mdor gang du 'a dod pa dad/ ca dga' ba dang/ ji srid
'dod par 'gror bcug cang/ phyir slar yang bzlog pa de bzhin du bya sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma dag gis zhes bya ba nas/ rgyas par de dag de lta bu'i tshul gyas zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma
bzhin no// gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par sems can gang dag skyes pa nas/ 'thon par 'gyur ba'i bar de dag sems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma dag gas bzung nas/
lcags kyis gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa la bzhag nas/ lcags kyi zhib mas lcags kyi mngag ma 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun rab
du 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa 'khrab tu 'jug cade gsag tu 'jug ste/ de dag de lta bu'i tshul gyis lo mang po zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// gzhan yang sems can ngamyal bachen
po mnar med par sems can gang skyes pa nas/ 'thon par 'gyur ba'abar du ste/ de dag sems can dmyal ba'i srungasam drag gis bsrungs nas/ lcags kyi ra 'bar zhing/ rab tu 'bar la
kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig du gyur pa la 'dzeg tu 'jug pa'i phyir yang 'bab tu bcug ste/ de dag de lta bu'i tshul gyis lo mang po zhes bya ba nas/ rgyas par bya ste/ nga la sogs pa
de las gzhan pa rab tu mang po dag kyang brjod par bya ste 2 ma bzad pa de dag ngang me tog de dag dang/ 'bras bu de dag dang/ rnam par sgros pas de dag sa na/ sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar
mad pa zhes bya ste/ de na sdug bsngal nang ma bzang la rtsub shing tshab dang/ yade dum 'ong zhing srog gcod par byed pa las kyi gnod pa gzhan dang/ gzhan mang po dag kyang yod de/ 'di skad du/
gang zhig chos la chos mni dang// chos ma yin la chos su smA/ skye bo dam pa dag la snang// med par lta ba mnar med ltung/// sdom la/ ma bzad 'chang ba'i gnod pa dang// de nas
@#// lcen phur brgyas brgyangs// shing rta khridi dang 'khrab dang ra// gnod pa lnga tshan sbyar ba yani// sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i shar phyogs kyi sgo 'byed pa de'i dus kyad/
yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod de/ de nas sems can de dag rgyugatsang rab tu rgyug la/ kun tu rab tu rgyug ste/ gnas tshol zhing skyabs tsholal/ 'byung ba'i thabs tshol te/ nges par 'bros par
! bya'o snyam mo// de dag phal cher der phyin na shar phyogs kyi sgo gcad par 'gyur te/ de dag der snad cing sa te/ 'gyel nas gtsagi ga steng du gcig 'phungs par 'gyur te/ dper na rtswa 'am shang
bzhan la/ nyam thag pa'i skad kyis tshe nges 'debs te/ sdug bsngal zhang ma bzod la tsha zhing rtsub pa dang/ yadi du ma 'ong ba'i chos nyams su myong ste// sems can dmyal ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur
ba'i sdig pa ma dge ba'i las de gtan nas ma byang ma thang kyi bar du re zhig dus byed par ma 'gyur ro/ 3lho dang/ nub dang/ byang phyogs su yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// yun ring mo zhig 'das
pa nas/ yang sems can dmyal ba chen po mnanamad pa'i pishar phyogs sgo 'byed pa'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod de/ sems can de dag rgyug cing rab tu rgyug la/ kun tu rab tu rgyug ste/
gnas tshol zhing skyabs tshol la/ 'byung ba'i thabs tshol te/ 'di'i byung ste 'di nas 'bros par bya'o snyam mo// de dag de nas byung nas 'bros te/ byis pa de dag na thar pa ma yin pa la thar pa'i 'du
shes te/ ma shes pa'o// de nas yang lhag par 'khor myong bar byed pa yang nyams su myong bar 'gyur te// sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa de' 'dab drung 'di na/ me mar mur pus mo nub pa

tsam la dpag tshad mang po dung/ dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po'abar du rgyas par byas te/ de dag rer rgyug cing rab tu rgyug la/ kun tu rab tu rgyug ste/ gnas tshol zhing skyabs tshol la/ 'byung ba'i
thabs tshol te/ de dag der rkang pa bzhagan ni pags pa dang/ sha dang/ khrag kun zhags par 'gyur la/ rkang pa bteg na na pags pa dang/ sha dang/ khrag kun phyir yang skyo bar 'gyur te//
de dag de lta bu'i tshul gyis lo mang por zhes byab nas/ snga ma bzhin no// me mar mur dus mor phyin pa tsam gyis 'dab drung nyudi na ro myags pa dang/ phyi sa' 'dam dpag tshad mang po'i bar du
rgyas par bya ste/ 'phang dun ma yas la brtsog cang drang ba dang/ pashul zhang yadi dang 'thun pa ma yin pa yod do// de nas sems can de dag gnas tshol zhing skyabs tshol la/ 'byung ba'i thabs
tshol te/ rgyug cing rab tu rgyug la kun tu rab tu rgyug ste/ 'bros par byed do// ro myags pa dang/ phyi sa' 'dam de na 'bu mchu rnon zhes bya ba thal kar du 'dug cadi mag bo gnag la
mchu khab 'dra ba dag gnas taM sems can de dag gi pags pa 'bags so// pags pa phug nas nigasha 'bags so// sha phug nas rgyus pa 'bags so/ rgyus pa phu gnas rus pa 'bagA
so rus pa phug nas rkang 'bru ste/ de dag de lta bu'i tshul gyis zhes bya ba nas/ rgyas par bya'o// ro myags pa dang/ phyi sa'i 'dam rgya 'dab drung nyid na lam po che'i spu gri'i sa

bltams pa zhes bya ba yod de/ dpag tshad mang po zhes bya ba nas/ rgyas par bya'o// de nas sems can de dag gnas tshol zhing skyabs tshol la/ 'byung ba'i thabs tshol te/ rgyug cing rab tu rgyug la/ kun
tu rab tu rgyug go/ de dag der rkang pa bzhaganan pags pa dang/ sha gcod cing khrag 'byin to// rkang pa bteganan pa shas pa dang/ shadang/ khrag kun phyir yang skyes te/ de dag de lta bu ' tshul gyis

lo mang po zhes bya ba nas/ rgyas par bya'o// lam po che spu gri'i so bltams pa zhes bya ba'i 'dab drung nyang na lo ma ral gri'i so lta bu ' tshil/ shang a ma ri la sngon po ltar snang ba yod de/ dpag tshad

mang po zhes bya ba nas/ rgyas par bya ste/ sems can de dag gnas tshol zhang skyabs tshol la/ 'byung ba'i thabs tshol te nang du 'jug go/ de dag der zhugs nas de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par sman pa

las byung pa'i rlung tshob ltang sta/ ral gri de dag rtsa ba nas klog ste/ sems can de dag gi steng du lhung nas lag pa dag kyang gcod cing/ rkang pa dag dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dag dang/ yan lag dang/ 'ang

lag dang/ gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang gcod de/ de dag de lta bu'i tshul rgyas zhes bya ba sa/ snga ma bzhinano// lo ma ral gras lta bu'i tshal de na khya nag bkra zhes bya ba gnas te/ sems can de dag sa la

[4]/ spyi'u tshugs su brdabs nas/ mchan g.yas g.yon gyi pags pa dang/ sgal tshigs phyung zhing byung 'di za'o// lam ral gri'i so lta bu'i tshal de ra 'dab drung nyidi na/ lcags kyi shing shal ma la dpag tshad

mang po zhes bya ba nas/ snga ma bzhun te/ ma 'greng brgya phrag sa ya'i sridi tsam yod pa tsher ma rno zhade so bcu drug ba la tshul sngon po'i 'phreng ba ltar snang ba yod de/ sems can de dag de'i nang du 'gro 'di
gnas tshol ba nas/ snga ma bzhin te/ de dag de la 'dzog go/ de dag de la 'dzeg na tsher ma rnams kha thur du lha la/ phyir 'bab na tsher ma rnams kha gyen du lta'o// lcags kyashal ma la'i tshal de na
lA lcags kyi mchu can zhes bya ba dag gnas te/ sems can de dag gi phrag pa 'am/ mgo bor 'dug nas mig 'bru zhing 'bru zhang za'o// mgo bo brtol nas klad pa 'bru'o// lcags kyi shing shal ma/
la'i tshal de na lcags kyi rdza rum dang/ 'khar zangs ba tsha'i chu khol bas gang zhig 'dug pa yod de/ gang gi tshesems can de dag lcags kyi []ringashal ma la'i la las snad cang lcas te/ 'bab par
gyur pa de'i tsho/ sems can dmyalaba' srungs ma dag gsasems can de dag bzung nas/ lcags kyi rdza rum 'khar zangs kyi nang du spyi'i tshugs su 'dor ro// de dag de'i nang du 'og tu yad 'gro ste
skol zhing 'od do/ de bzhin du stong dang/ thad ka dang/ phyogs mtshams su yang 'gro ste skol zhang 'tshad pa na/ dper na dul lam/ man sran gre'u zhes bya ba nas/ de dag de lta bu'i tshul
gyis zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// lcags kyi shing shalam lab tshal do'i 'dab drung cha dan/ chu klung rab med ces bya gzhag yod de/ batsha'i chu khol bas gang ba dpag tshad

kyi mang go zhes bya ba nas/ rgyas par bya sta/ sems can de dgags rgyang ring posa mthong an zhu grangamo 'drab r snang go/ de nas sems can de dag gnas tshel zhing skyabs tshol la/ 'byung ba'i thabs tshol/
tshe te/ rgyug cing rab tu rgyug la/ kun tu rab tu rgyug ste/ 'bros par byed do// chu klung de'i 'gram g.yas g.yonan/ gshin rje'i mi 'ganaral gri thogs pa dang/ lag na mdung thung thogs pa dang/
lagan 'phang mdung thogs pa dag 'dug ste/ sems can de dgabargal du langamastar/ phyi'i 'byung du yang ma sararo/ de dag dag gnangan 'og tu lang 'gro sta skol zhing 'tshed pa ni/ dperan tul lam
'bras sam/ rgya shugag 'bras bu nas rgyus par bya ste/ dengag chu klungarab med ces bya ba denachu'i 'bab phyogs su skya thams cad byi zhing/ bsdu thams cad pags pa dang/ shadang/ khrag thams cad
'jig ste/ keng rus 'ba' zhig lus pa 'gyuro// de dgasems can dmyal ba'i srungasam dag gis lcagasakyi skyes 'bcub bzhin du bcus nas/ lcags kyis gzhi 'bar ba nas/rgyas bar bya ste/
gan kyal dumanananas/ kyisems can dag pa'i dod cesa'abrego/ de dag gis smras pa/ kye bdag cag nyid kyang reshes la/ bdag cag nyid kyang mi mthong ngo// khen kyang bdag cagan pe kres so zhes
nas/ de dag sems can dmyal ba'asrungs ma dag gse lcags kyi spyad kyis kha phye nas/ lcags kyi skam pas lcags kyi phu lum 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ 'bar ba
gcig tu gyurapa dag khar 'dzud de/ sems can de dag gi ma chu dag kyang tshig cing/ lce dang/ rkanadang/ lkog ma dang/ med pa'i sbugs dang/ snying dang/ snying ka'i gnyer kor dang/ rgyumadang
gte ma rnams kyang tshag nas thur du 'byung ngo// gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba'i sungs ma de dag gis sems can de dag mchal pas nya dbyung ba bzhin du phyung nas/ lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing
rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa la gan kyal dmanananas/ kye sems can dag su 'ded ces 'driyaM/ dadag gis smras pa/ kyabadag cag nyid kyang mi
shes la/ bdag cag nyid kyang ma mthong ngo// 'on kyang dag ca gnas kom mo zhes nasaM/ de dgasems can dmyal ba'i srungs ma dag gis lcags kyi skad kyis kha phye nas/ zangs kyi skor ba
'bar zhing rab tu'abar la/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa khar blugs te/ sems can de dag gamachu dag kyang tshig panas/ thur du 'byung ba'i bar duste/ dedag de lta
bu'i sdug bsngal gyis zhes bya banas/ rgyas par bya'o// de dgamathu nyams shing gzi byin nyams la/ brtson 'grus nyams te/ rab med kyi 'gram 'khod de// rab med de'i 'graman lA lcags gzhu
[he]@#// can zhes bya ba dag gnas te/ sems can de dag gzhis bya ba nas/ sngam pazhanano// de la sogs pa'i gnod pa mang po dag byed de/ der namasems can de dag gi sems can//

dmyal ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa midage ba'i sa de gtan nas yongs sum byang m thad kyi bar du de dag la ngachu klung rab med la 'bag go/ lcags kyi shing shal ma li'i tshal de la 'dzegage/ 'am/
'gaM b.lagri lta bu'i 'du 'jug go/ lam po che spu gri'i so bltams pa lta bur 'gro'o// romugs pa dang/ phyisa'i 'dam du 'bogage/ mamagur dus mor phyin pa tsam du 'gro'o// de nas yang sems can dmyal

bachen po mnar med pa'i shar phyogs kyi sgo 'jug go/ ji ltar sems can dmyal ba chen pomanar med pa rishar phyogs kyi sgo'i skabs su bshad pa de bzhin du/ lce dang/ nub dang/ byang phyogs su'ang brjod par
bya'o// ji ltar sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa 'khor dang bcas par bstan pa de bzhin du/ sems can dmyal bachen po tshab dang/ rab tu tsha ba dang/ ngu 'bod chen po dang/ ngu 'bodadang/
bsdus gzhomadang/ thig nag dang/ yang sosa rnams kyang 'khor dang bcas par brjod par bya'o// de dag tu nam sems can de dag gis sems can dmyal ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa de dgag sdog

pami dge ba'i las de gtan nasamabyangs zad kyi bar du gyur pa de dag gnas de dag nas shi 'phos te/ kha cigani dud 'gro rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyo bar 'gyur/ kha cig na li dgasa rnams kyi nang du/
khacig nim rnams kyi nang du/ bcag na rgyal chen bzhi pa'il rnams kun ng du/ kha ci gnas um cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang/ 'thab bral ba rnams dang/ dga' ldan pa rnams dang/ 'phrul dga' ba cham/

dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyo bar 'gyur ro// de la sems can sngon mar gyur pa'i tsho da chos ma yin pa spyod cing ma rigs pa byed de/ gcig tu gnas pa'i las byed
byed pa las sems can dmyal ba dag tuskyes pa gang yin pa de d gnas ems can dmyal banas shi 'phos nas sdug bsngal ba dang/ ya de ma bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa mang po dag gaskal ba can du 'gyur ro// de la
sems can sngon mar gyur pa'i/ chos spyod cing rigs pa byed la/ gcig tu dkar ba'i le sa byed byed pa lase/ zhes pa spyod pa bag ba zhig gis sems can dmyal ba dag tu skyes pa gang yin pa dedag ni//

sems can dmyal ba nas sha 'phos nas bde ba dang/ lade bde ba mang po'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lha'i pho nyalnga lung bstan pa 'amado'os 'di skad du/ dge slongadagasems can

dmyal ba chen pomanar med pa'i shar phyogs kyi sgo 'byed pa de 'dus kyang 'dod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod de zhes bya ba nas/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro zhes rgyas

par sbyar te/ dge slongadag de la sems can gangadag mar ma 'dzin pa dang/ phagam 'dzin pa dang/ dge sbyong dum 'dzin pa dang/ bram zer ma'adzan pa dang/ rigs kyi nang na rgan rabs la ri mo ma byed pa dang/
bya ba'i rigs pa ma byed pa dang/ bsod nams ma byed pa dang/ 'jig rten 'dideng/ 'jig rten pha rol la ban ma tho ba rnams kyis 'jogos par ma lta ba dang/ sbyin pa dag ma

zhingabasod nams dag ma byed la/ zagacig pa la ma gnas te/ tshul khrims yang dag par blangs nas ma 'dug pa de dag ni tshul 'di lta bur sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid m pa de ba'i ske la ba can du 'gyur te//
dper nasems can dmyal ban 'dug pa'isems can rnams bzhin no// de la sems can gang dag ar 'dzin pa dang/ phar 'dzin pa nas/ sngam bzhin te/ de dag gi tshul 'di lta bur bde ba dang/
yid bde ba'i skal ba can du 'gyur te/ dper nagazhal med khang na gnas pa 'a lha rnams bzhin no zhes gsungs so// de la gnod par 'gyur zhes bya ban mo dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams te/ srog

gtsad pa nas/ lag par lta ba'ibar dag go/ byas nasazhes bya ba ni yang dag par blangs te 'dug ces bya ba yin no// ma 'oges 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyis// zhes bya ba la ma legs pas 'tsho ba zhes bya ba rin
pa dang/ byagag 'tshong ba dang/ phag 'tshong ba dang/ bya pa dang/ ri bong rgyas 'chor ba dang/ nya pa dang/ ri dgas kyi ljon pa dang/ chom rkun ngang/ gshed ma dang/ ba lang gsod pa dang/ sprul

tshogs can dang/ btson srungs dang/ gra ma can dang/ gnod byed dang/ de la sogs pa gzhan la nga gang zag gang yin pa de dag ces bya ba'i bar du rgyas par bya'o// 'gro ba phyi ma gang yin pa/ zhes bya/

banasogs pa byed pa dang/ marigs pas 'tsho ba gang yin pa de dag la nga dag par blangs pa de lta bu dang/ yang dag par spyad pas de lta bu'i las ngesasems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad podag tu skyo bar 'gyug
do/ dmyal ba brgyad po 'di dgan/zhes bya ban yang sos nas bzung ste/ mnar med pa'i bar ram/ langanamanar med pa nas bzung ste/ yang sosakyi bar dag go/ de bas na/ dmyal ba
brgyad po 'di dagazhi// zhes bya'o// bstanaces bya ba nasas rgyas rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams dang/ dam pa rnams dang/ yang dag pa ra zhugs pa rnams dang/ skyes bu dam
pa rnams kyis yang dag par bstan pas/ de bas na bstan ces bya'o// thar par dka' ba zhes bya ba nasems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po 'di dag nas thar par dka' zhing 'da' bar dka' ba yin te/ de bas

nathar par dka' ba zhes bya'o// bsrung ba'i las byas rnams kyis kyang// zhes bya ba na shes pa nas gnodapyad kyi bar dag gi brlung ba'i las byas te/ de bas na dmyal ba brgyad po 'di dagan ther par bstan
pa ste/ bamang ba'i las byas rnams kyis gang// zhes kyang bya'o// re re'i 'khor ni bcudrug yod// ces bya ba nisems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa'i shar phyogs na/ lhag pa'i 'khor bzhi yod de
rimugs pa dang/ phyisa'i 'dam dang ( lo ma rnams ral gri'i so lta bu'i tshal dang/ lcags kyang shange8shalam la'i tshel dang/ chu klung rnam par rga ces bya ba rnams so/ shar phyogs ji lta ba de
[. ]@#/ de bzhin du/ lce dang/ nub dang/ byang phyogs kyang de bzhane no// sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa nas ji lta ba bzhin du/ soms can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi bdu
da1 yang de bzhin te/ de bas na/ re re'i 'bo ni bcu drug yod// ces bya'o// cha bzhi zhes bya banasems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa la cha bzhi yod de/ shar dang/ ldedang/ nub dang/ byang thog
kyi che'o// mnar med pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du/ yang sos kyi bar du yang de bzhin te/ de bas na chab zhi zhes bya'o// sgo bzhi zhes bya ba na sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa la sems can dmyal
bab sgo bzhi po de dag/ shar dang/ lha dang/ nub dang/ byang phyogasakya sgo rnams so// mnar med pa la ji lta bde bzhin du/ yang sos kyi bar du yang de bzhin te/ de bang pan sgo bzhi zhes bya ste/
cha yi tshad ni rnam par bya// zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa chung ji tsam pa de bzhacheno// zhing du yang de tsam ste/ de bas na/ cha tshad ni rnam par phye/ zhes bya'o// lcag
kyir pas kun nas bskor// ces bya ba na sems can dmyal ba chen pomanar med pa lcags kyi bas kun nas bskor te/ mnar med pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang sos kyi bar du yang de bzhinate/ dengs na lcag
byar bas kun nas bskor// ces bya'o// lcags kyis sad+d+hishin tu khebs// zhes bya ba nas mas can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa lcags kyi drabs yongs su khebs te/ mnar med pa ji lta ba
de bzhin du/ yang sos kyi bar du yang de bzhinate/ de bas na/ lcags kyis ni shin tu khebs// zhes bya'o// lcags kyis gzhi re ba tsha bo// 'bar zhing gzi brjid ldan pa ste// dpag
tshad brgya phrag dumar yang// me lca rnams nam chod par gnas// zhes bya ba na sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa dpag tshang mang po dang/ dpag tshad brgya phragamang po dang/ dpag tshad
stong phrag mang po dang/ dpag tshad brgya stong phragamang por lcags 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu r btu 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur cing sreg pa'o// sems can dmyal ba chen po
mnar med pa ji lta ba bzhanadu yang sos kyi peradu lang der zhon te/ de bas na/ lcags kyi sa gzhi batsha ba// 'bar zhing gzi brjid ldan pa ste// dpag tshad brgya phrag du mar yang// me lce
rnams nu mched par gnas// zhes kyang bya'o// 'jus pa 'dul ba drag po ste// me lce ldan zhingabasnyen par dka'// de dag bsdu slong ba'i gzugs// 'jigs shing sdug bsngal 'jigs par
byed/ ces bya ba la/ 'jungs pa zhes pan/ gang dag ser sna tsan sngar 'dums shing/ yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin la sbyin pa dag kun tu 'gyed par mi byed pa gang yin pa de dgage/ gzhan yang

gang thagagang dag nyes par spyod pa' las rnam pa snatshogs byed pa de rnams yin te/ de bsan 'jungs pa zhes bya'o// 'jus pa dedag ni sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po de dag shin tu tsha zhing ba tu
tshal/ yos su tshabar 'gyur te/ de bsan/ 'jungs pa 'dul ba drag po ste// zhes bya'o// me lce ldan zhing bstan par dka'/// zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba chen
bo brgyad po 'di dag me 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas bskor te/ 'jungs pa de dag gis ma bzod cing brnag par dka'aste/ dengs na/ ma rtse ldan zhing bstan par dka'// zhes bya'o// de dag ba su slong ba'i
'a gzugs// 'gas shing 'ajigs byed sdug bsngal ba// zhes bya banasems can dmyal ba brgyad po 'di dag 'jus pa dag 'jigs pa dang/ skrag pa dang/ yi chad par byed cing ba spu slong bar byed
la sdug bsngal skyod par byed de/ de bsan/ de dag ba sa slong ba'i gzugs// 'jigs shing 'jigs byed sdug bsngal ba// zhes kyang bya'o// drang srong dag dang sdom can dang// dka' thub can la
kha zer ba// zhes bya ba la/ drang srong zhes bya ba sangs rgyas rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams te// donams dang mimathun pa'i lus kyi las kun tu spyod pa dang/ mim thun pa'i ngag gi las
dang/ yid kyi las kun tu spyod pa ste/ de bas na drang srong dag ces bya'o// sdom can zhes bya ba ni/ lus sdom pa dang/ ngag sdom pa dang/ yid sdom pa rnams te/ de bas na sdom can zhes bya'o/

dka' thub can zhes bya ba ni sbyangs pa'i yon tanasna tshogs yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir/ dka' thub can zhes bya ste/ de bas na dka' thub can zhes bya'o// rkang pa mtho zhing spyi'i tshugs su// dmyal ba der/

[4/]ni ltung bar 'gyur// zhes byaban 'jungs pa de dag gas nyes par spyod pa de dag de lta bur yang dag par blangs pa dang/ kun tu spyad pas sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po de dag tu 'der te/ de bas na/ rkang
pa mtho zhinge 'tshugs su// dmyal ba der na ltung bar 'gyur// zhes bya'o// dbang po nyams pa de dag 'tshed/ ces bya ba nadi dag dbang po ma dul ba'i phyir sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po 'di dag
du skye zhing/ nyin mtshand 'tshod de/ de bas na/ dbang po 'oms pa de dag 'tshed// ces bya'o// zhaskam la bor ba bzhin// zhes bya ban dzoltar nya chu nas brten te/ skamasar per ba rnams sdug
bsngal zhing nyam thag nas 'dar ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos nas sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po dag tu bar te/ sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag nas 'dar te/ de bsan/ dbang po
nyams pa de dag 'tshod// nya ni skam la bor ba bzhin// zhes bya'o// de ltar nyes byas las byed pa// nyin mtshan du 'tsho sa 'debs// zhes bya ba las dkar bo sngangs shing mi dege ba'i chos la

zhugs pa de ngagasems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po de dag tu skyes nas/ rtag par rgyunamachad par yun ring por nyam thag pa'i nga res tshe ngas 'debs te/ sdug bsngal zhing ma bzed la rtsa ba tsang tshab dang/

yid du ma 'ing 'tsher ba nyan mtshan du nyams su myong ste/ de bsan/ de ltar shes byas las byed pa// nyin mtshan du ni tsho nges 'debs// zhes bya'o// de ni sgrachin rab tu sgrogs// 'phangamadung gis phog
glang chen bzhin// zhes bya ban de dag sdug bsngal makhazad pas zil gyisan te/ glang bo che dag 'thangamadung gis phog pa dang/ lcags kyus drangs pa bzhin du skad shanicu
chebs sgasgrogs te/ de bas na/ de nasgra chen rab tu sgrogs// 'phang mdung gis phog glang chen bzhin// zhes bya'o// mi rnams kyi lo sum khragang yin pa don sems can dmyal ba kha
'a cig gi nam gyi cha stod de// kha cig gzhinam gyi gung thun gyi bar ro// kha cigeganinam gyi cha smad kyi khar go/ lo dgu khri lanamtshan gcig go/ la dgu khri lan nyin gcig go/ 'a'abum phrag
b+hU brgyad khral nyin zhag gcig go/ mi rnams la ni 'i dedagan// dag khri red na gang yin te// dmyal ba dganamtshan gacig ste// nyin gcig tshad kyang de tsam mo// byas pa ma 'omasong ba rnams//
(brlung ba'i lasana'i ba rdzogs pas// 'di lta bu ya la khagrangs par// yun ring dug tu 'tshed par 'gyur// 'di dag dang ni gzhan yang rab mangamatha' las pa'i/ sdug bsngal dmyal ba rnams su
a sa ba dag gis myong// de dag mtha' yas pas na brjod bar sla batshani// bdag gis sun phyogs tsam gcig brjod par zad// 'jig rten bzhag pa las tshigs bcu bzhi pa ste 'jig rten bzhag kha
rdzogs so///rgyagar skad du/ u dAn bar ga/ bod skadang/ ched du brjod pa'i tshoms/ bam po dang po/// thams cad mkhyen pa la
phyag 'tshal lo// bkra shis par gyur cig/ rgyal bas ched du brjod gsungs pa// bdagags rab tu bshad par byas// gnyid dang rmugs pa rnams so la la// yade la dga' ba bskyed de nyon/
thams cad mkhyen pa skyob pa po// thub pa rjes su thugs brtse ba// sku la pham 'dzin pa yi// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs// kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag/ skye zhing 'jig/
pa'i chos can yin// skyes nas 'jig par 'gyur ba ste// de dag nye bar zhi ba bde/ de ltar rab tu 'bar ba la/ zhig dgar lo dmagur ci yod// mun pa'i nang zhugs gnas pa dag/ ci
phur sgron ma tshel mi byed// sa pa dzaba'amadog 'drab// kher ba gang yin 'di dag ni// phyogs dang phyogs su rnam 'thor ba// de mthong 'di la cazhige'aga'// gang zhig nubamo 'a nanas//

mngal du dang po 'jugapa'i mi// de na sdod med 'gro 'gyur zhing// song ba las kyang lhag pa med// snga dro skya bo mang mthong ba// phyi dri kha cige mthong ma 'gyur// phyi driskya bamang yatheng pa// sngadra kha
cig mthong ma 'gyur// skyes pa bud mengamang pe dang// dar la bab pa 'ang 'chi'agyuran// de la ma 'dug zhen zhes te// gson pa'i gdeng drod ci zhig yod// kha cige mngal du 'chi bar 'gyur// de
bzhin kha cig btsas pa'i sar// de bzhin kha cag geg tsam na// de bzhin 'acig yongs rgyugan// la la rgan dang la la gzhen// la la dar la bab pa'i ma// rims kyis rab tu 'gro 'gyur te// 'bras
bu smin pa ltung ba bzhin// dper na 'bras bu smin pa rnams// ltung bas rtag tu 'jigs pa ltag/ de bzhin skyes par gyur bas// rtag tu 'chipas 'jigegs bur 'gyur/
gnadaben rdzaa'a mkhan po yis// 'joms pa lasanasnod byas pa// thams cad thamar 'jig pa ltar// ma rnams srog kyang de bzhinano// dbaranazagasan brkyang ba las// spyan ni gang dang
'chi gang bcug pa// spyanan gting la gtugs pa ltar// mi rnams srog kyang de bzhinano// dpe nangs pa gsod pa dag/ gom pa gang dang gang bor bas// gsod pa 'drung du bsnyen pa lta'i//
ni mi rnams srog kyang de bzhin no// chu klung drag tu 'bab pa'i rgyun// ldog pamed pa ji lta bar// de bzhin mi la tsho'agrob// sun ldog par 'gyur ba med// dka' ba nyid dang thung ba dang// de
yang sdug bsngal ldan pa dag/ myurab khel 'jig 'gyur te// chu la dbyug gus bris pa bzhin// dper na phyugs rdzi dbyug thogs kyis/ phyugs rnams gnas su phyin byed ltar// de bzhin
dang rga bo yis// mi rnams 'chibadag drung du skyol// chu bran gyin chu lta bur// rtan dangamtshan mo 'das pa las// ma rnams tshe yang zad 'gyur zhing// srog kyang te ngar 'jig par 'gyur// el
tshe khyed la mtshan mo dang// lam gyis dub 'dra rgyang grags dang// atshos rnam pa gam shes pa'i/ byis pa rnams la 'kherab rang// bdag la bu yodade bzhin du// nor yod ces bas byas pa brlag
00/ gyi lanang na bdag med na// su la bu yan tsazhige'o// skyes pa bud med rnams kyi rigs// brgya dang stong phrag mang po dang// longs spyod legs par bsgrubs pa yang// 'chi bdag dbang du
'gro bar 'gyur// bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing// bslang ba'i mtha' 'gyel bar 'gyur// phrad pa'i matha' na'i bral ba ste// gson pa 'a mtha' ni'i chib yani// gsonamatha'a'achi po
man pas na// sems can thams cad 'chi 'gyur zhing// dge sdig 'bras bu nyer 'gro ba'i// ji bzhin las kyi rjes su 'brang// sdugapa'i las kyis dmyal ba dang// bsod nams byas=
ba de 'gro ste// gzhan dag gis ni lam bsgoms pas// zag med mun 'das par 'gyur// gang yang sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos kyang// sku lus 'di
na sloba mdzad na// skye bo phal pa smos ci dgas// gangadu gnas kyang 'chi bas mi tshugs pa'i// sa phyogs de na yod pa ma yin te// bar snang la med rgya mtsho'i nang na med// ra de rnams kyi gseb
tu zhugs na'ang man// byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa// kun gyis lus 'di btang nas 'gro ba dang// de kun 'jig nga ramakhas pas rtogs gyis te// chos la gnas kyis tshangs par
spyad pa spyod// rga ba mthong zhing nad kyis sdug bsngal dang// sems dang bral ba'arisha bas thango nas ni// brtan pas bon ra 'dra ba'i khyim spangs kyi// 'jig rten phal pas 'dod spang nus re skan/
rgyal bo'i ngeshang rta shan tu bkra ba'ang 'jig/ de bzhin lus kyang nye bar rga par 'gyur// dam pa rnams kyi chos 'didam pa ste/ mi mchog gzhan rtogs khyed cing ga mi 'gyur/
po/ dra ba khyon blun zhing ngan// khyonganam rigs byed pa ste// sId du 'ong ba'i gzugs bdo yang// khyod kyisa mngon par btsem par 'gyur// gang zhig len brgya 'tsho ba// de yang 'chibadag nyid kyis
khrid// 'di dag rga bar 'gyur ba 'am// yang nan pa'i m 'chibs 'ams// rtag tu ldog pa med par 'gro'agyur zhing// nyan dngamtshan du rab tu 'jigs pa dang// skye dang 'tshe ba'i sdug bsngal

dang ldan pa// chu tshananang du gdungs pa'i 'dang 'dra// tshe 'di nyid dang mtshan mo dang// 'gro ba dang ni 'dug pa na// chu klung chen po'i rgyun bzhin du// re ma ldog par 'gro bar 'gyur/ chu klung nang gi nye
lta bur// gang zhig nyin zhag 'da' ba yis// tshe shin tu thung 'gyur na// de la dga' bar bya ci yod// gsomatha'a'achib yin pa'i phyir// lus 'di yongs su rgya pa dang/ nad kyi tshang 'di myur 'jig
cing/ rnag gatshogs kyang 'jig par 'gyur// kye ma lus 'domi thogs par// stong zhing rnam shes dang bral nas// dur khrodaper ba'am gal dum ltar// sa yi stong du 'gyel bar 'gyur// rgyun dund

kyis ma shog dung zhing// rtag tu mgatsang 'dzag pa dang// nadang 'chi bas 'tsher 'grib dang 'a// lus 'di'i ma cing ma'ing// myur du 'jig cing na ba dang// rnag dang ldan pa 'dus 'di yis// grubangang bde ba/
named// zha mchog rten du gnyer bar gyis// dgun kadang dpyid ka dang// dbyar ka 'direg bya'o zhes// byas pa rnam par sems byed pas// bar chadamathengabar mgyur te/ dbudang nor phyugs 'byor pa
la// mi yi laden rnam chags pa// 'chingadag gis na blangs nas 'gro// nyal grong chu bos bdas pa bzhin// 'chiba'adus la bab pa na// bu rnams skyabs sum 'gyur zhing// pha yang m yin ganyen
'dunamin// khyed la skyabs su 'gyur ba med// 'di ni bying byas zin don 'di bya// de dag byas nas bdag gis 'di bya zhes// de ltar min yongs su shom pa na// rgadang dbacas 'chi bsa mngon du

bcom// de ltas rtag tu ting 'dzin la dga' manyam par zheg/ brtson pa skyed pa skyo ba dang rga ba'i mtha'am las// bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa a ngon par thale non la// dge slong dag go skye shi'i pha rol
'gro bar gyis// ma lhag pa tshoms te dang po'o/// kun rtog las ni 'dod skyes pas// 'dod pa'i rtsa ba shes gyis te// khyed nakun rtogs byed dang// des na khyod la 'byung ma'agyur// 'dod pa
rnams las mu ngan skyes// 'dod pa rnams las 'jigs pa byang// 'dod pad gan rnam spangs n// mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med// dga' ba rnams las mya ngan skyes// dga' ba rnams las
'jigs pa byung// dga' ba dag ni rnam spangs na// mya nganamed cing 'jigs pa med// 'dod dga'i rnam smin sdug bsngal te// dang po mngar la 'bras bu tsha// me sgron lag nas ma bor ba// mjug tu byas
pa srog byed bzhin// nor bu'i rnam bu mo la// yongs su chags sems gang yan la bltas na// lcags shing gres ma las byas chings ma gang// de dag dam po man zhes 'phag
pas gsungs// 'dod pa'i chos ma gang yin de lhod kyang// rab tu dgrol bar dka' zhes 'phags pas gsungs// brtan rnams 'dod pa'i bde la mi blta bar// dedagagatubs nas myur du 'gro bar byed//
'jig rten sna tshogs gang de 'dod min gyi// skyes bu'i kun rtog 'dod chags 'ded pa yin// 'jig rten sna tshogs de bzhin gnas kyang na// 'on kyang brtan rnams 'di la 'dun pa 'dul/ mi rnams la ni rtag
ba'i 'dod pa med// 'dod can gang la chags te mi rtag pas// rang sred med pa'i sems kyis rab spongs la// 'chi ba'i gnas ma 'gyur bar byas zhes gsungs// 'dun pa skyes 8shange zag par ma byed
dang sems la skyon med pa dang dran pa dang// 'dod pa rnams la so sor ma chags gang// de ni gong du 'pho ba yin zhes gsungs// mgar ba yisan dngul bzhin du// blo gros ldan pas mi pa bzhin
skad cig skad cig nung zad tsam// rang gi drin pasal par bya// lcam ma khan gyis le pa dag/ longs su spungs nas lham byed ltar// 'dod pa gang dang gang sngas pa// de de pa de ba phun sum ldan// gal
tabade ba kun 'dod n// 'dod pa thams cad yongs su spongs// 'dod pa thams cad yongs spangs pas// mchog tu bde ba thob par 'gyur// jisrid 'dod pa'i rjes 'brang pa// de srid bar du ngoms mi
[zc]'gyur/ de las gang dag shes rab kyis// ldog byed de dag tshim pa 'thob// 'dod pas ngems par ma 'gyur bas// shes rab kyis na ngems pa skyid// shes rab kyis na ngems pa'i m// srid pa'i/
dbang dum 'gyur go/ 'dod la chags pa ma gang yin// de dag kyi ma chos man dga'// nung zad gson por 'dug pa na// bar chadamatho bar ma 'gyur ro// blo ngan la ngas spyod kyis bcom pas//
pha rol tshel bar ma byed cing// bsam brlag 'dod la sred pa yis// bdag dang gzhan yang rdung bar byed// kar sha pa Na'i char babs kyang// 'dod pa rnams kyis ngoms ma 'gyur// 'dod pa
mnog chung nyesamangabar// mkhas pa rnams kyis khengadu chud// lha ya'adod ba rnams la lang// lhag par dga' bar ma 'gyur gyi// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams// sred pa zad pas
dgyes par 'gyur// gangs can dang na mnyam pa yi// gser gyi ra bi yod gyur kyang// nor des gcig kyang ma tshim par// rtogs par gyis la legs par sbyong// gang dag sdug bsngal de la'i rgyus
shes pas// de dag nam yang 'dod la dga' ma 'gyur// 'gi rten dgan zug rngu'i rgyur shes nas// de dag gdul phyir brtan pa slob par byed// 'dod pa'i tshems te gnyis pa'o//
lus can rnam par rtogs pas rab bcom pa// 'dod chags mi bzang gtsang bar rjes lta bas// 'dodo chags phyir zhing rab tu 'phel 'gyur te// rang ga 'ching ba de yis dam por byed//
gang dag rnam rtog nye bar zha dga' zhing// ma sdug bsgom pa rtag tudran byed de// de la sridi ba rab tu sbyangs ba yis// rang ga 'ching ba de dag rul bar byed// 'dod ban nag
da 1 'dra bas g.yogs// sred pa'i dgab pas bkab pa dang// bag yod 'ching bas bcings pa dag/ tshe mar chud pa'i nya dang 'dra// skyes bu bag med rab tu spyod byed pa// 'khri shing bzhin du sud pa

lawaM 'thal 'gyur zhing// rga dang 'chi ba'i rjes su 'gro 'gyur te// ma drung nu zho 'dod pa'i 'u 'dra// midag dran par byed dngachags byed dang// yadi bde ba la rtog par byed pa dag/ de las yang dang yang du
tshu khor bar 'khyam// tshal nang 'bras bu 'dod pa 'a 'dang mtshungs// ma gang rtag tu bde ba 'dod byed pa// skye dang rga bar nye bar 'gro 'gyur zhing// skye dgu srid pa rnams kyis mdun du bdar/
rgya nang na cing yongs su rgyug pa bzhin// srid pa rnams kyis mdud pa'i sems can dag/ srid dang srid min dag la sems chags shing// kun sbyor de la dga' ba'i byas pa rnams//

yang dang yang du sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur// skye ba drug dang bde rnams dang bral zhing// bdud kyi sbyor ba dag dang ldan pa de// na dang 'chi ba'i rjes su 'gro 'gyur te// ma drung nu zhe 'dod pa'i be'u
dang 'dra// 'di ni srid pa de 'dra spong byed pa// srid dang srid man dag la sred bral zhing// dge slong sridi pa zal gyis gnon byed pa// lhagam med pa yongs su mya ngan 'da'// gang zhig 'jig rten/
spang dka' ba'i// sridar 'i bud med 'dis bkol ba// de ni mya ngana'aphel 'gyur te// rtsa la char pa bab pa bzhin// gang zhig 'jig rten sngas dka' bgi/ sred bababud med 'di stongs pa//
da ya mya ngan ldog 'gyur te// pad+ma las chu thigs bzhin// de phyir stod 'dir lcags pa// khyed la sgra yis khyed bde zhig/ u shing phu ni rtswa bzhin du// srid par bcas drungs nas phyung
skyes bu sred pa dang 'grogasan// yun ring dus su 'khyam 'gyur dus/ sred pa drungs nas phyung zhig dang/ mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med// yang dang yang du nyer len cing// yang dang yang du
mngal du 'du// gnas skabs 'gyur dang gzhon 'gyur bas// sems can 'ong dang 'gro bar byed// 'dir ni sbyang dka' spyod pa de// sros las ben tshed cog dang// de la sred pa med 'gyur zhing/
de ni yang du 'khor mi 'gyur// dal 'byor chud nas gsan par// gang gis lha dang mi rnams su// den nyer bcas nas 'ag byed pa// lul la sred pa de las rgol// sems can dmyal bar
skyon yang// dal 'byor thal bas 'gyed par 'ong// gang phyir srid 'tsho rgyur gyur pa// yul la sred pa 'bras kyi gzhi// 'khri shing dra bas khebs byed pa/ gdung bar byed pa ma btulan// sdug

bsngal 'din yang dang yang// rnam pa kun tu ldegam 'gyur// dper na/ ljon shang rtsanas ma bton na// bcad kyang phyir zhing skyob khanar zad// de bzhin srid pa 'i phra rgyas ma btonan// rangadang 'dang
du sdug bsngal 'dim ldeg/ dper na bdag nyid kyisan byas pa 'a mtshon// de las rkun po 'amathu yis bdag gsong ltar// de bzhin nang gsems las byung ba yi// srid
du 1 pas lus can nye bar gsod par byed// de ltar srid las sdug bsngal bdag/ 'byung ba'anyis dmagis shesakyis te// srod ljongs nye bar lanamed dang// dran ldanudage slong kun du rgyus// srid
a pa'i tshoms te gsum pa'o////bag yod 'chimed gnas yin te// bag med pa ni 'chi ba'i gnas// bag yod 'chi bar ma 'gyur// bag med pa ni rtag tu 'chi// de
ya khyad par de dge pas// mkhas pa rnam ni bag dang bcas// bag yod pa la rab dga' ba// 'phags pa'i sbyong yul dga' ba can// de la rgyun du bsgoms pa dang// rtag tu pha rol gnon/
brtan pa'i// brtan pas grub bde bla na med// myan 'das la reg pa yin// gang tshe mkhas pas bag yod pas// bag medabatsem pade yi tshe// shes rab khang bzangs stong 'dzegasanas//
tshomya ngan med pas gdungs bcas dang// brtan rnams ri bo'i so dag las// sa steng byas pa rnams la lta// brtson 'grus dang ni bag yodadang// yang dag sdom dang dul ba yis// mkhas pas

gling du byas nas// chu bo chen po mngon du zlog/ brtson 'grus ldan zhing dran dang ldan pa dang// spyod pa gtsangazhang pa rtags nas byed pa dang// yang dgasdom dang tshes kyi batsho ba dang// bag yod rnams kyi
grags pa mngon par 'phel// lhag pa'i sems la bag bya ste// thub pa'i thub gzhi rnams la bslab// nyer zhing rtag tu dran ldan pa'i// skyob pa mya ngan med pa yin// dman pa'i chos la ma bsten cing//
ba med pa la bstanam bya// leg par lta la 'dod med dang// 'jig rten 'phal bar ma bya'o// 'jig rten pa yi yang dag lta// chen po su la yod gyur pa// de ni tshe rabs stong du yang// ngan 'gror
'gro bar ma 'gyur go// bag med pa la sbyor byed nga// skye ba byas pa bsam brlag yin// tshong dpon nor rnams bsrung ba ltar/ ma 'as pas bag dang ldan par bya// bag med pa la ma sbyor zhing// 'dod
la dga' ba mi sogs dang// rtag tu bag yod sems byed pa// zag pa zad pa thob par 'gyur// zag pa zad pa ma thob kyang// dus 'dir bag med mi bya ste// ri degs ma yas sang gi ltar// bag
med pa dag gsad par 'gyu// bag med pha rol bud med sten byed pa'i// mi gang yan pa gnas skabasa'adi bzhi 'byung// bsod nams mi 'thob bde bar ma nyal dang// gsum pa smad 'gyur bzhi pa
jamul bar 'gyur// bsod nams ma thob sdig pa'i 'gro ba dang// 'jigs dang bag tsha lhan cig bde ba chung// rgyal po'i chad pa chen posagacod 'gyur zhing// lus zhig sems can dmyal ba rnams su 'tshod//

gangazhig bdag bde lta 'dod pa// des n ging ma bzhin du bya//byis pa shing rta bzhin 'gyur bas// brtan pas brtson 'grus zhanam bya/dper na byis pa'i shing rtadag lama chen bazang ngo bo nas lam nganangag du 'gro byed pas/ mi
[r @#// chags sems khong chud pa ltar// de bzhi ni ches na spangs nas kyang// chos min rjes su 'jug byed pa'i// byis pa 'chi bdag dbang 'gro zhing// ma chags bzhin du bcom pa thob
gang zhig bya ba rnam pas naas// ma bu ba dag byed pa dang// bag med pa yis rlom byed pa// de dag rnams kyi zag pa 'phel// gang gi thag pa 'phel 'gyur ba// de yi zag pa rkyang m na// gang zhig lus
'khaM gtogs dran pa dag/ rtag tu legs par brtsams pa dag/ bya bam yin mi byed cing// rgyun du bya ba med pa dang// dran dang shes bzhin ldan pa de'i// zag pa rnams ni zad par 'gyur// gang gi theg pa
zad 'gyur// des n zag med thob par 'gyur// ji tsamamang du smra byed pa// de dag dmachos 'dzin ma yin// gang dag 'di ni this nyung yang// lus kyis tshes dag mang no sum byas// gang dag chos
la bag byed pa// de dag dam tshes 'dzin pa yin// gal te rigs bcasazhung du sus kyang na/bag med mi dag de ltar byed ma 'gyur// dper na phyugs rdzas gzhan gyi phyags bgrangs ltar// de dag dge sbyong

skal ba thob ma yin// gal te rigs bcas nyung du smra byed kyang// chos kyi rjes su chos la spyod pa dang// 'dod chags zhe sdang gtimug spong byed pa// de dgadage sbyong skal ba thob pa yin// bag yod bsngagrwa
pa rjod byed cing// rtag tu bag med la yod pas// bag yodamachod sbyin brgya pa yang// lha rnams nang nagatse bir gyur// bya ba byas rung ma byas rung// mkhas pas bag yod bsngags pa brjod//

bag dang bcas pa'i mkhas pa yis// den gnyis rab tu len par byed// tshe 'di 'den na se/nga ya na dang// phyi ma 'i den na se/nga yan pa// de dag nga tshan ngas rtogs pas na// mkhas pa zhes na be rjod pa
yan/ dge sbyong bag yod la dga' zhing// bag med pa la 'jigs lta khas// bdag nyid ngan bgro la sa 'dren te// 'dam rdzab las ni glang chen bzhin// dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing// bag med pa
la 'jigs lta bas// sdig pa'i chos rnams smyug par byed// rlung gis ljon shing lam bzhin// dge slong bag le da la dga' zhing// bgamed pa la 'jigs lta bas// kun tu sbyor ba phra sbom dag//
ma yasabasregs pa bzhin du 'gro// dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing// bag med pa la 'jigs lta bas// kun tu sbyor ba kun zad pa// rim gyis nyams su myong bar 'gyur// dge slong bag yod
la dga' zhing// bag med pa la 'gas lta bas// 'du byed nyer zhi zhi ba yi// zhi ba'i go 'phang so sor rtogs// dge slong bag yod la dga' zhing// bag med pa la 'jigs lta pa// tshungan//
'das dang de ba'i phyir// yongs su nyams 'gyur mi srid do// brtson 'grus ldan zhing bag yod dang// chos sngad legs par sbyod byed pa// 'ag rten 'dapeng ba rol tu// chos spyod pas ni bde ba
'thob// zhaphyor bslab pa la brtan dang// rtsol ba dang ni brtson 'grus bskyong// ma dran pa dang bag me pa dang// brtson 'grus chung dang kun sdom med// gnyid dang snyoms dang gde nga ba ste// 'di
dag bslab pa'i kher chad pas// khyed kyis yan lag de gsal// dran b chud nam gsan cagi/ dge slong tshul khrims bzang ba dang// bag yod pa la dga' ba yis// kun/ dag bslab pa'i bar chad pas// khyad kyis
(ka1rtog legs par mnyam bzhag ste// rang gsams rjes susungs// brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya// sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhi'i// 'chi bdag sde
yaM gzhom par bya// gang zhige tshes 'dul 'di nyid la// bag dang ldan par sbyong byed pa// skyo ba'i 'khor ba rab sangs nas// sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur// bag yod pa'i tshems te bzhi pa'o/
sdug pa rnams las mya ngan skye// sdug pa rnams las 'gas pa skye// sdug pa dgan rnam spang na// mya ngan med cing 'jigs pa med// sdug gum lasamyang n sgyu
sngag las sdugabasngal sdug las 'jigs// sdug gum dag gzhagyuran// ya mug 'gyur ba theb par byed// 'jig rten sdug bsngal rnam pa dum dang// mya ngan sma sngagasaM 'don pa ji snyed pa//
zla de dag sdug po dag las ston te byung// sdug pa spangs na de dag yod ma 'gyur// gang phyir 'jig rten 'gab na'ang sdug med pa//gang yin de dag bde zhig mya ngan mang// de bas gdungamed rdul bral

don gnyer byas// nam yang sdug par byed pa mi bya'o/ sdug pa ma mthong sdug bsngal la ma sdug mthong nade bzhin bsaM/nam yang sdug dang phradamapyadamasdug dang yang phrad mi bya sdug pa dang ni bralangang/ ma sdug
pa dang phrad pa las// gang gis mi dag rgas byed pa'i// mya ngan ma bzad skye bar 'gyug/ sdug pangashi bar gyur pa na// gnyen 'dunamadza' bshes mang po dag/ mun rang dus su myang nadang// sdug
dang bral bas sdug bsngal 'gyur// gang la sdug dang sdug min byed// de la ma dud pa lo dman pas// de ltas sdug nyid sdig can la// sdug par byed pa mi bya'o// sdug la bltas te don btang bas
bde sbyor rnams la ma 'jug cing// bdag nyid mi bde'i sbyor ldan dag/ bde sbyor don ldan rnams la smon// gzugs sngag bde bas bsdams pa dag/ lcami so so'i rigs dag tu// sdig pa byed cing
yongs nyams nas/ sgo dang 'chiba'i dbang du 'gro// gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su// bag yod gzugs sdug spong byed pa// des ni spang dka' ba dung rdzas dang// sdig pa'i rtsa ba drungs nas phyung
legs min legs pa'i tshul dang ni// sdug ma'i sdug ra khi tshul gyis dang// sdug bsngal bde ba'i tshul gyis su// bag med rnams ni mngon du 'joms// gal te bdag la dga' byed na// chos
par byed par bde ba dag/ bde blag te ra ma pheb paso// 'di na sdug la ga zhug mi bya// gal te bdag la dga' byed na// legs par byed pas bde ba dag/ bde blag kho nar 'thob 'gyur bas// 'di ni
sdig la gzhug mi bya// dpe na dgon pa'i grong khyer dag/ brtan pa'i 'obs kyis bskor ba ltar// gal te ba ngag la dga' byed na// 'di ni bsrung bas legs par bsrungs// gal te bdag la
nga// dga' byed na// thun gsum gang yang rung ba la// mkhas pas mel tshe bya ba la sa// 'di ni sba bas legs par sba// dper na dgon pa'i grong khyerang// byin srung bar
byed pa ltar// dal 'byor chud nam sa pa// de ltar bdag ni ngesrung bar bya// sems can dmyal bar skyes n yang// dal 'byor thal bas 'gyed par 'ong// phyogs rnams kun tu sems kyis
'tsha yongs portags kyang// bdag las ches sdug 'ga' yang ma mthong bas// de ltab sosor gzhan la'ang rang sdug pas// de phyir bdag 'gas gzhan la gnod ma bya// thams cad la la nga srog
[ ]'disngag/ thams cad chad pas 'jigs pas na// rang gi nyams las dpag gyis te// bsdig par mi bya gsad mabya// rgyang thag bcad par sprugs pa'i m// ri nas nye zhim du 'ongs na//
gnyenaTashes mdzab bo lhags nas su/ 'a 'gazhes mngon par dga'/ de bzhin bsod nams byas pa'i mi// 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu/ phyin tshe gnyen bzhi'i bsod nams dag/
ts+tsa ngos nas mngon par dga' bar byed// de bas 'jig rten pha rol gyi// ched du bsod nams bsags par gyis// bsod nams 'jig rten pha rol du// lus can rnam+pa kyi gnas su 'gyur// gang
zhig legs spyad spyod byed pa'i// dge la lha rnams stod par byed// 'di na'ang smad par ma 'gyur la// mtho ras su yang dga' ba 'thog/ chos gnas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs// ngo
tshashes shing bden pa ra sma/rang ga bya ba byed pa la// skye bo gzhan rnams dga' bar byed// rang gi rten ni byed pa la// 'di ltar gzhan rnams dga' 'gyur zhing// ma thong ba'i tshes la bsngags
pa dang// pha rol du yang bde 'gro 'gyur// gtamasan gnang ba'i tshigasmad ng// mi rigs spyod las bzlog pa la// dam pa rnams ni dga' bar byed// dam pa ma yin dga' ma 'gyur// de bas
mchog dang mchog min pa// shi 'phos bral bar gyur na// dam pa ma yin dmyal bar 'gro// dam pa mtho si 'gro bar 'gyur// sdug pa'i tshoms te lnga pa'o//
par 'gyur dang mar 'thob dang// pha rol bde 'gror dga' 'gyur ba'i// bde ba gsum po den gnyer ba'i// mkhas pas tshul khrims bsrung bar bya// 'phags dang mthong ba phun tshogs dang// 'jig rten
zhib ston 'gyur ba'i// gnas gzhan 'di daga mthong ba las// mkhas pas tshul khrims bsrung bar bya// lus n yongs su gdung med par// tshul khrimes kyis bde ba 'thob// mtshan mo bde bar
nyal ba dang// sad pan yang dga' bar 'gyur// sbyin pa tshul khrams ldan pa dag/ mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pasod nams kyis// 'di dang pha rol dag tu yang// rtag tu bde ba 'thob par 'gyur// rgan pa'i
ba la tshul khrims dge/ dad la rab tu gnas na legs/ a yi ni chen shes rab ste// bsod nams chos bos 'phrogs par dka'// dge slong tshul khrims la gnas shing// dbang po rnams kyang bsdams
'a@#// pa dang// zas kyi tshon ragab dang// mi nyal ba la 'bad pa ste// de ltar gnas nas brtson ba dang// nyamtshan snyoms las ma byed ba// mya ngan 'das dang nye ba'i phyir// yongs su
nyams 'gyur mgrodid// min tshul khrims la gnas nas// sems d shes rab sgom pa la// brtson shing des gnas dge slong gis// sdug bsngal zad pa thob par 'gyur// de phyir rtag tu tshul khrimI/
dang/ ting 'dzin rjes su bsrung ba dang// lhag mthong gi bslab pa dang/ shes bzhin sese dran par bya// des na kun sbyor zad byas nas// yod bral lhag ma med 'gyur te// lus zhig shes rab ldan
ba 'as// bgrang dumed pa'i tshungan 'das// gang zhag tshul khrims ting 'dzin dang/ shes rab 'di gsum legs bsgoms te// shin tu dri med mthar phyin cing// gdung med yang srid zad gyur dang// chag
pa'i 'ching las rnam grol zhing// lus spangs shes rab ldan pa dang// bdud kyi yul las 'das pa dag/ nyi ma bzhin du lam mer 'bar// dge slong phyi dang nang rtade la// bgamed rlom par byed pa la/

tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab rnams// yongs su rdzogs par ma 'gyur ro// sngon gyis khebs las char 'babatsang/ nam thang ba las char ma 'bab// de bas khebs pa so 'kha cig dang// 'di ltar tshan pa 'bab

mi 'gyur// de ltar rtag tu mthong pa dang// dge slong tshul khrims sdom pa yi// mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i lam// myur ba len rnam pa ra pa dag/ ma tog drin rje phyogs mnam bgro/ rtsa brgya spos tsan dan rnams
kyang min// dam pa'i drazhirdza phyogasanan 'gro ste// phyogs rnams kun tu mchog dri la se khyab/ rgya spos dang ni tsan dan dang// utu la dang ma la ka/ sos kyi rigs na 'di rag pas// tshul khrims

dri bsung phul du phyin// rgya sos tsan dan gang yin pa'i// dri bsung 'din chung ngu yi// tshul khrims ldan pa'i dri bsung gang// des n 'di'i ngamatho ras khyab// de ltar bag lo nga gnas bu zhange// tshul
khrims rnam par dag par bya// yang dag shes pas rnam grol na// bdud kyi lam na red mi 'gyur// 'di ni bde bar 'gro lam ste// rnam par dag byed 'gag 'di 'o// rab tu zhugs te bsgos nas
kyang/ bdud kyi 'ching ba spangabar gyis// tshul khrims kyi tshoms te drug pa 'o/// lus kyis nyes par spyod spang zhing// lus kyis legs spyad spyad pa'i phyir// lus kyi nyes chen
las dasungs na// lus n pe stau pa byas par 'gyur// ngag gi nyes par spyod spang zhing// ngag gas legs spyad spyad pa'i phyir// ngag ga nyisachen las bsusan// ngag bsdamU pa byas par 'gyur// yid
kyis nyes par spyod spang zhing// yid kyi legs spyad spyad pa'i phyir// yi dkyanyis chen las bsrungasan// ya nganabasdoms pa byas par 'gyur// lus kyis nyes par spyod spang zhing// ngag gi nyes par
stod bsas// yid kyi zhes par spyod spang zhing// skyon gzhan ldan pa gang yin spangs// lus kyi dge ba rnams bya zhing// ngag gi dge ba phal chen bya// yid kyi dge ba rnams bya zhing// tshad med bzhi
dang bral mi bya// lus kyi dge ba rnams bya zhing// ngagadang lad kyis byas nas ni// 'dod ng pha rol dag tu dang// rtag tu bde ba thob par 'gyur// rtag tu 'dusan bsam
pa'i phyir// thub pa 'tshe ba med pa yin// den 'chi med gnas 'gro zhing// gang du song na'ang mya ngan med// rtag tu ngag nabasdoms pa'i phyir// thub pa 'tshe ba med pa yin// den 'chimed gnas 'gro

'tsho zhing// gang du song na'angamu nganamed// rtag tu yid na bsams pa'i phyir// thub pa 'tshe ba med pa yin// de ni 'chi med gnas 'gro zhing// gang du song na'ang mya nganamed// brtan pa rnams kyi lus
bsdams shing// brtan pa rnams kyis ngag kyang baspyams// brtan pa rnams kyis yang bsdam zhing// brtan pas kun tu bsdam byas na// de dag 'chi med gnas 'gro zhing/ gang du song 'dang spyi
named// lus kyi sdom pa legs pa ste// ngag gi sdom pa 'ang legs pa yin// yid kyi sdom pa legs pa ste// thams cad du ni bsdams pa legs// kun tu bsdams pa'i dge slong ni// sdug
bsngal kun las rab tu 'gro// ngag rnams bsrung zhing yid na legs bsdams te// lus kyis ma dge ba dag spyad ma bya// las lam gsum po 'di dag rnam sbyang san// drang srong gsungs pa'i lam ni
thob par 'gyur// legs par spyad pa'i tshoms te bdun pa'o///gang dag byas bzhin ma byas zer ba dang// brdzun du sma ba dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur// mi de gnyis ka 'drab r
pha rol du// song nas dman pa'i tshes dang ldan par 'gyur// skyes bu skyes pa'i kha nas ni// tshig ngag smra bar byed pa yi// tshig gis re skyes gyuranas// bdag nyid gcod par byed par 'gyur// gang

zhige smad 'os skye bo stod byed dang// bstod 'os skye bo rnam par smod byed pa// den kha las 'thab krol kun sogs pa'i ng// 'thab krol can gang des na bde ma 'thob// gang 'dir tshe 'os rang nor pham byed
nga 'thabakre den cung zad tsam du zad// gang zhige bde bar gshegs pa yade 'khrug pa// de 'du'i 'thab krolo shin tu chen po yin// ngag la da 'dzags pas smad pa'i sngoge brtenan// bye bar chu bur/
can dang stong phrag na// bzhi bcu gcig tu tshubur rdol pa yi// sems can dmyal ba rnams su 'gro bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i sems kyis ma nyes skyon brjod pa// bdag nyid gsad phuri dmul ba sde la bar thang
stobs ldan nyes med pa dag brjod byed cing// de la sems kyang 'khrug par ma byed de// bsam brlag gang zhig sdig can gyi// lta la bsten nas 'phags pan// dgra bcom tshes kyis 'tsho ba dang//
bstan pa spong bar byed pa dag// smog ma 'bru chags lta buran// den ngag 'bras bu gsod// tshig bzang len sma bya pa// sngag pa can dag snyam bya// sdig can gdung byed sna ba bas// tshig bzang
sna bar byed parung// byis pa sdig can sna byed nga// sma ba'i tshe na 'ching 'gyur la// gal te snas nagazhan srong bo// de dag 'phags pa mi gsung ngo// dge slong dag gi bsdoms pa dang// nga'
dbus sna zhing+ge rlom pa med// gang zhig chos ldan ngon ston pa// de nasnyan par smob yon// legs par smra ba mchog ces 'phags pa gsungs/ snyan sna mnyanam ya na de gnyis
[r]1 pa// bdenasmabardzun pa ma yin de gsum pa// ches sna phal pas lan bzhi pa de'o// tshig bden rnams ni bya zhing// gang gis bdag kyang mi gdung la// pha rol la yang gnod med pa'i// tshigade legs

a/ par smra bar bya// gang gis mngon par dga' gyur zhing// gang gis sdug pa ga spyod dang// skas ngas pha rolo'aga' gyur ba'i// snyan tshig kho nas smra bar bya// bden pa 'tshig na bdung rtse ste// bden pa'i
tshig ni bla med yin// donodang tshes la rab gnas ba// bden pa yin zhes dam pa gsung// sdug bsngal thams cad spang ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas kyis na gsungs tshig gang// bde ba mya ngan 'das 'gro ba'i
gde ba na med pa'i yin// tshigag tshoms te brgyad pa'o///chos gcig las ni rab 'das shing// 'jig rten pha rol bcom pa yis// lus can brdzun du sma ba yis// sdig pa mi
bya ci yang mang// lcags sgong me lce 'bar 'dra ba// thos pa ra gyur pa ches sla yis// tshul 'chal legs par ma sdoms pas// yul 'khor bsod snyoms zami rung// khyod ni sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs shing

khyed la sdug bsngal m sdug na// mngon sum dag gam lkogatu'ang rung// sdig pa can gyi las mi bya// gal te sdig pa'i las byas sam// byed kyang rung ste khyed kyis ni// kog cas langs te bris byas kyang//
sdug bsngal las tharam 'gyur// gang du gnas na las kyis mi tshugs pa// sa phyogs de na yod pa ma yin te// bar snang la med rgya mtshe'i nang na'ang me da// ri bo rnams kyi gseb tu zhugs kyang min//
pha rol po la brtags nas gang// sdig pa can gyi lasamathengab// de dag bdag gisam bya ste// sdig byas las ni rjes su 'brang// las gangashade dum bzad dang// zol byed gzhal lugs 'chos pa
ma la 'tshe bar byed pa dang// gzhan la byed du 'jug pa yi// las de mi yi rjes 'brang bas// de yi g.yang sar ltung bar byed// malos dge ba'am sdig pa yi// lasan gang dang gang byas pa'i//
las rnams chud zar ma 'gyur te// de lta de ltar 'bras bur 'gyur// de la tshogs pa ji srid bar// de srid 'dzin rung bar byed// de la bzhin dag rdung byed de// rdung byed ngan brtag bar 'gyur// 'di'i
bdag rjes ma 'brang zhes// byis pas ma brtags byas pa yi// sdig pa 'a las kyi 'gro ba dag/ pha rol tu shes par 'gyur// gal te byas pas ma shes par// sdig pa'i las zhi byes pa dag/
nam zhig nan de nyid kyis// rnam smin tsha ba so sor sten// rang gi las kyis de'i 'og tu// me yis bsregs pa bzhin du gdungs// byis pa shes rab chung ngu dag/ bdag la dgra bzhin byed pa yis//
gang zhig 'bras bu tshar 'gyur ba'i// sdig can las ni spyod par byed// gangadagabyas ba gdungs 'gyur zhing// mchin sa gdeng yog ngu bzhin du// rnam smin so sar stan pa yi// las de dganag byas
legs// gang shag byas na ma gdung zhing// ngag 'a zhing 'di ni bde ba yis// rnam smin so sorastan pa yis// las de dag na byas pa legs// bdag nyid bde ba 'dodo
ka7 pa'i phyir// dgod bzhin sdig pa'i las byas pa'i// sdig las de la rnam smane dag/ du bzhin nyams su myong bar 'gyur// nges par sdig las 'phral du ni// ma lta bur 'gyur mi byed//
thal bas g.yogs pa'i m lta bur// des na byis pa srog par byed// sdig las 'phral du nges bar na// mtshon bzhin gcod par ma byed kyang// sdig pa'i las kyi 'gro ba dag/ pha rol tu ni mngon
par 'gyur// gang du de dag rnam smin gi/ tshab so sor ston pa yi// sdig pa'i las kyi 'gro ba dag/ pha rol du ma'i shis par 'gyur// lcags las g.ya'an langs gyur pa// langs pa ngeg na de ni
za// de bzhin ma brtags byas pa lani// rang gangs kyis ngan 'gror 'gro// las kyi tshoms te dgu pa'o// dad rang ngo tsha tshul khrims sbyin pa ste// chos 'di rnams na skyes
budam pas bsngags// 'di las lha pa 'jig rten 'gro 'gyur zhing// lam 'danyid kyis lha yul 'gro zhes gsungs// 'jungs rnams lha ya 'jig rtenama'agro zhing// de yas byas pa spyan
pa'i bsngags mi brjod// brtan rnams sbyin la rjes su yi rang ba// des nadi dag gzhan du bde ba myong// 'din skyes bu'ano mchog dang pa ste// 'danachos la legs sbyong bde ba 'thob//
bden pa kho narang bo rnams kyi phul// shes rab kyis 'tsho 'tshe ba'a mchog ces gsungs// mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba yi// dgra bcom chos la dad bskyed de// mkhas pas gus par mnyanas na/
de dang de yange shes rab 'thob// bgacan gyis ni rgya mtshodang// dad pas chu bo rnams las sgol// ban 'grus kyisan sdug bsngal spong// shes rab kyis yongs dag 'gyur// dge slongadad pa
grogs ldan zhing// shes rab kyis ni gtams pa dang// mya ngan 'das la mngon dga'i bas// 'ching ba thams cad gcod par 'gyur// gang gso dad dang tshul khrims dang// shes rab nyidi ni
legs bsgoms shing// mkhas pa skyon rnams stong ba de// legs pa 'angang tshul can zhes brjod// dad dang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs// gtong ldan 'jus pa rnam spangs pa// de ni ga ga
dang gar song ba// de dang der naechod par 'gyur/ mkhasagang 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten na// dad dang shes rab ston byed pa// de dag de yaner atshog ste// de yanor gzhan phal par zad// 'phags pa blta
bar 'dod pa dang// dmatshes nyan par dga' ba dang// ser sna'i dri ma rnam spangs pa// de na ded pa can zhes bya// dad pa'i lam brgyags bskur bar bya// bsod nams tshem pos dbrogamanus// chom
rkun 'phrog par byed ba bzlog/ dge sbyong rnams kyis blangang nas dga'/ mkhas ba ra ga sbyong 'ongs pa la// mngon par dga' bar byed 'gyur zhing// skye bo rnams ci rigs bar/ dad pa ji bzhin sbyin
[t]@#/ byed cing// gzhan gyi zas dang skom de la// gang zhag yang na mebade ba// des n tan dngamtshan rnams su// nga 'dzin thob par ma 'gyur ro// gang gis ta la'amag bcad lta/
[Pr]de 'dra kun tu gcod byed pa// des ni tanedangamtshan rnams su// ting nge 'dzin dag theb par 'gyur// khron pa skam po ji lta bar// dad pa med pa bsten ma bya// ci ste de la yongs brkos kyang// dam
chudang 'byung bar 'gyur// chumang rnam pa dang ba dang// bsal bar gyur cing rig med pa 'i// mtsho la chu 'dod ji lta bar// shes rab can gyis ngang ldan bsten// chagasasamam chags kyang rung ste//
de yas thub sku ma nges pas// a dad pa dgaspang bar bya// dad pa rnams 'i nye bar bstanadad pa 'tshims te bcu pa'o///sngom la/ mi rtag 'dod dang srid pa dang// bag yod de
bzhin dga' po dang// tshul khrims legs spyod tshag dag dang// las dang dad pa de ngag bcu// bram zes 'dod pa rab spang zhing// brtson 'grus kyis ni rgyun chod cige/ 'dod pa rab tu ma sbyangs
'gro par/ thub pa gcig gis ma thob po// kun tu rgyu ba zhan pa dang// nyon mongs phyir 'ad kun sogs ngas// brtson 'grus brtan po kho na las// bya ba de nyid byed la rag/ zhan pa 'alasan ji snyed
dang kun nas nyon mongs dka' thub dang// tshangs spyod yongs su ma dag ste// don chen 'gyur snyam ma byed do// ji ltar mada' ni gzung nyes pas// lag pa tshong par 'gyur ba ltar// dge slong
[p/]bsrung ba bya nyes dang// dmyal bar nye bar khrid par byed// dzaltar mda'an gzung legs pas// lag pa chod par mi 'gyur ltar// dge sbyong bsrung ba bya legs no// mya ngan 'das par che bar 'dren
dge sbyong rnam par ma shes dang// rgal bar dka'adang bzod dka' dang// gang dag zhan pa 'gyed 'gyur ba'i/ sdug bsngal mang po de dag 'byung// yang dang yang du 'gyod pa las// kun rtog dpang/
du 'gro ba yi// sems ni bzlog par ma byas par// dge sbyong spyod pa jaltar bya// nyes par rab byung zhes dga' ba// khyim 'dug nyes rtsom byed pa dag/ sdug bsngal mnyam med sten ba dag/
yang srid sdug bsngal sogs par zad// tshem bu ra smig gyon pa dag/ phal cher yang dgam sdol zhing// sdig pa 'chos can sdig la dga'// sdig can di dag ngan 'gror 'gro// sA la'i shing

la 'khri gong ltar// gang zhig shin tu khrims 'chal te// ji ltar rang la dgra bzhin no// de na de ltar byed par 'ded// mgo bo skya bor gyur bar du// da dung rgan rabs ma chud pa// de na lang tshog tug
pa ste// de ni rgan blun zhes bya'o// gang zhigadage dang sdig pa dag/ spangs shing tshas par spyod pa dang// sde tshogs spangs nas spyod byed pa// de ni rgan rabs zhes bya'o// brtul zhugs med cing
rdzun smra na// mgo bo bregs tsam dge sbyong in/ rmongs pa 'dod la zhugs pa dag/ jig dge sbyong yin nam ge/ brtul zhugs med cing brdzun sman// mgo bo bregs tsam dge sbyong min// gang zhig
sdug pa zhi gyu de mkhas pa dge sbyong yin par shes// brtul zhugs med cing brdzun sman// mgo bo khrigs tsam dge sbyong man// gong dag sdig pa che phradog/ kun la btags nas

ka byed pa dang// sdig pa zhib de dag ni// dge sbyong nyideces brjod par bya// sdig pa spangs pa bram zes// zhi bar 'dod padage sbyong yani// bdag gi dram pa sngas pa// des na rab tu byung zhes brjod/
dge sbyong gi tshoms te bcug cig pa'o/// gang tshe 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi// shes rab kyisana mthong ba dang// lan 'darab tu shis pa las// srid pa'i srid pa rab tu
'dral// dper na rlung gis rdul bslang ba// char pa bab ngas zhi byed ltar// gang tshe shes rab kyis mthong ba// de tshe kun rtog zhi bar 'gyur/ gang zhig legs par rtogs pa yis// sa yi legs par
nga nas snang/ 'gananges 'byed 'gyur ba yi// shes rab de nagatse ba yani// bden pa'inang na bden bzhadang// lam nang yan lag brgyad pamatsheg/ rkang gnyis nang na mig can dang// chos kyi nang
na chags brala mchog/ 'du byed thams cad m rtag par// gang tshe shes rab kyisa mthong s// de tshesdug bsngal las ya nga 'byung// lam 'di rnam par ngag da ra 'gyur// 'du byed thams cad sngagabasngal

bar// gang tshe shes rab kyis mthong ba// de tshe sdug bsngal las yid 'byung// lam 'di rnam par dag par 'gyur// 'du byed thams cad stong nyid du// gang che shes rab kyis mthong ba// de tshe sdug bsngal lA
0 yid 'byung// lam 'di rnam par dag par 'gyur// 'du byed thams cad bdag med par// gang tshe shes rab kyis mthong ba// de tshe sdug bsngal las ya de 'byung// lam 'di rnam par dag par 'gyur/ srid
ba'i zug rtagacod byed lam// ngasan khyed cag rnams la bstan// de bzhin gshegs pa ston pas// khyed cag rnams kyis bya dgos so// srid pa'i zug rdusal ba'i lam// ngasan khyed cag rnams la
bstan// de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa ste// khyed cag rnams kyis bya dgos so// lta ba rnam par dag byed pa// lam 'dim gtogs gzhan med pas// ting nge 'dzin la rab zhugs te/ bdud kyi bachong
baspang bar gyis// 'di ni dran lam 'di na pha rol gnon// mtsho la ngang pa'i srang ltar bgrod pa gcig/ shakyazub pas mnyam gzhag gang gsanas// tshogs la yang dang yang du ba shad pa 'di/skyashi
mtha' rtogs phan mdzad thugs brtse bas// bgrod pa gcig lam rab tu bstan mdzad pa'i// lam 'dis nub rnams las sngon rgal zhing// de bzhin rgal bar 'gyur zhing rgal bar mdzad// shin tuathagatug

gdul bya dag bya dang// 'khor ba'i skyo shazad bar bya ba dang// khams rnams dum so sor rtog bya'i phyir// spyan dang ldan pas lam 'dirib tu bstan// dzaltar chu klung gang+gA'i chu rgyun zhugs// rgya mtsho'anang
du 'bab par 'gyur ba ltar// de bzhon shes rab yangs pas bstan pa'i lam// 'dazhibaid thob par bya phyir 'jug/ gang zhig 'byung bo kun la thugs brtse bas// snganachad ma thos chos kyi 'khor lo
bskor// skyob ba lta dang ma rnams 'du la mdzad pa// srid pa'i mthar phyin de la phyag 'tshal lo/ rnam rtog dge ba gsum nabartag bya zhing// dge bam yanagasum
kan/ yang rnam par spang// kun nas rdul langasachagyis mnan pa ltar// des rtog dang dpyod ba zhi ba// de nas sems la rnam rtog nyer zhiges// bla med byang chub bde la reg par 'gyur// de'adzazhigs
tshabo rnams la yid gtad cing// bden pa las skyes tshad med bsgom par bya// dran ldan mkhas pas mdud pa zhi bya zhing// gsum po rnams kyis gnas gsum rab tu zhi/ shes rab mtshon dang btson
'grus stobs dang ldan// dran ldan mnyam gzhag ting 'dzin la dga' bas// 'jig rten skyodang 'jig par rtogasanas ni// kun las rab tu rnam grol de 'og yin// 'jig rten mtha' ma legs par rtogs
gyur nas// 'jig rtena mtharason pa rol phyin ces brjod// gang gis zhi ba 'phags lam yan lag brgyad// lam srang bsgoms pa des ni bdud rtsi'id// de ltar spyod pas bde 'dod bde ba 'thob// snyan pa
tsho'athob cing grags pa 'phel bar 'gyur// lam gyi tshoms te bcu gnyis pa'o/// ched du brjod pa'i tshoms bam po gnyis pa/// dri'i mo rang
gi mngal gyis dang// 'dam busmig ma 'bras bus dang// chu shing 'bras bus phung ba ltar// pho bshal bkur stis phung bar 'gyur// jisod blun pomachod byas pa// de sridarab tu brlag par 'gyur// byis

[s/ ]pa'idakar po ba cha 'grub cing// de las be'ang nges par nyams// ngan pa red 'dod pa dang// dge slong ba'akher na 'ded pa dang// gnas la ser sna byed pa dang// rigs gzhan dag gis mchod pa dang// rab tu

byung dang khyim pa dag/ gang yang rung bas bdag 'dzugs te// bya ba byas dang ma byas rung// bdag dbang gyur na re stes zhes// de ltar byas pa kun rtogasan// sems la 'dod chen 'phel bar 'gyur// red pa'i/
thabs ni gzhan yin la// mya ngan 'das 'gro'i gzhan yin zhes/ de ltar ci rigs shes nas su// bkur sti dag lama dga' zhing// dben pa rim gyis 'phel byed pa'i// dge slong sangs rgyas nyan thos yin/

thams cad lan mi stsol zhing// ma las 'phrogs par ma gyur dang// 'tsho ba gzhan la ma brten cing// chos la tshong pa bzhin ma spyad// rang gi 'dab blang bya zhing// gzhan gyi lan 'dod m skyed// dge slong

gzhan gyi 'dod byed pas// ting 'dzin thob par ma 'gyur ro// gal te bde bar 'tsho'i ded cing// dge sbyong ba la lta 'dodon// dge 'dun gyi ni tshes gis dang// bza' btung byin par gyur na blang// gal te bde

bar 'tsho 'dod cing// dge sbyong 'di la lta 'dod n// bya ba'i khung nas sbrul lta bur// gnas mal dag la bstan par gyis// gal te bde bar 'tshe 'ded cing// dge sbyong 'di la lta 'dod n// nganangon tsam gyis
tshog shis shing// tshes gcig po lang bsgom par bya// gal te mang po mi shes shing// tshul khrims legs par mnyam bzhag na// de shes pa dag 'tsho dag cing// snyoms las med ces stong par byed//
gal te 'chi bdag nyams byed pa'i// zag med rig pa gsum ldan na// blun pos ci yang mngeshis zhes// bsams nas de la 'phya lang bla// gang zag sdig pa la tshes can la//
ka/ gal te bza' dang btung ba la/ ked pa gdang ldan gyur na// de la dedagamachod pa byed// mgo brogs ngur smig gyon pa yi// bza' bdang ni btung ba dang// gas dngamal cha red pa ltar// dgra byed mang
ba kho nar zad// de ltar bkur sta 'jigachen gyi// skyon rnams khong du chud byas nas// 'phrigs chung sems khral bskyangs nas su// dran ldan dge slong kun tu rgyas// kham gyi zas kyis sems zhare a
'gyur yang// 'tsho ba 'di phyi mkhe tha'aa bya ste// kha zas kyis ni lus dag gnas 'gyur ba// de ltar rtogs la bsod snyoms dag la rgyus// rigs kyis phyag byas machod pa gang yin 'ad/ zug rduphu
modabyung bar dka' ba ste// ma las bzod dka' bkur sta gang lan 'di// 'damadang 'dra bar rab tu rtogs par gyis// bkur sti'i tshoms te bcu gsum pa'o//sdug pa'i las
na mo byed pa// 'khu bya min la gang 'khu ba// 'jig rten 'dideng pa rol du// de nyid sdig pa rnams kyis gos// dang por bdaganuphung byed cing// phyashes gzhan yang phung byed pa// khra yas gzan/
ma'i bya lta bur// phung zhing gzhan yang phung bar byed// rdeg par byed pas reg pa 'thob// khon du 'dzin pas len can mthong// de bzhin gshe bas gshe bsko/ khro bar byed la khro ba 'byung// 'di gzhan
dge sbyong byas pa ste// dmapa 'tshos la mi mkhas pa// yongs su tshe thung 'di'i yang// rgyana' phyir na bon par byed// 'dana mchog ces bsams nasasu// so sor sna zhing 'thun 'jug pas/ 'don
dge 'dun 'byed pa'i tshe// sbyor stobs medasems m byed// u pa gcogatsang srog gcod la// rta phyugs nang na 'brog pa dang// yul 'kho'adzems par byed pa yang// phyi nas mjal dum byed
pa ltar// mkhas pas brtags shing gsungs pa'i tshig/ spyod yul ston par byed pa yi// chos 'ad rnam par shes na go/ khyed cag ci'i phyi'i byed ma 'gyur// khyod ni mi ma khas lugs can te//
kha bya ya san rtsol byed pa// pha rol bo dgam ngeshes pas// bdag ni 'di la brtson par byed// 'di na mkhas pa gang yin pa// dedagagazhams pa'i tshig gis ni// bdag la kha zer bdag lagangshegs
bdag pham bdag pham byed pa'o zhes// 'di gangasams la 'dzin byed pa// de la yon na zhim 'gyur// bdag la kha zer ba dag la gshe// bdag pham bdag pham byed pa 'ozhes// 'di gang sems
la ma 'dzin ba// de ya len na zhe bar 'gyur// 'dan len gyi khenatsanadag/ nam yang zha ser 'gyur ba med// bzod pas bonan zhe 'gyur ba// 'dun chos kyirang bzhin yin// khen gyis khan can
nam yang zhimo 'gyur// khanamed rnams kyis khanan zhi bar byed// sha khen zhugs pa lus can la gnod pas// de phyir mkhas pas len par mi bya'o// brtan pa legs gnas lhan cig spyang pa
gla@#// ya/gregs po mkhas pa gal te red na// nyon mongs thams cad mngon par zil mnan nas// dran ldan dga' ba' yid kyis de dang spyad// brtan pa legs gnas lhan cag
kha1sprad pa yi// grogs po mkhas pa gral tem re dan// yul 'bar yas pa sbyangs pa'i rgyal bo ltar// gcig bus spyad bya sdig pa mi bya'o// bdag dang 'thun par spyod pa la// grogs bzang red
par ma gyu// byas pa grogs sum 'gyur bas// gcig pus spyod pa brtan par bya// byis pa grogs su mi 'gyur bas// gcig pu spyod pas byed bla bas// mo tang dgon pa'i glang po ltar//
sems khral bskyangs te gtsag du slad// 'khu ba'i tshoms te bcu bzhing 'o//gangs rgyas kyis na bstan pa bzhin// gang zhig dbugs dbung brngubadran pa// yongs su rdzog
bas legs bsgoms pas// rim gyis yongs su byang gyur te// sprin bral tam zla ba ltar// 'jig rten 'di na kun nas gsal// 'greng dang 'dug dang de bzhin nyal ba dang// lus dang de bzhin
sems ni 'jog byed cing// dge slongadran pa de legs 'dzeg pa na// snga phyi'i khyad par rnams ni 'thob par 'gyur// snga phyi'i khyad par rnams thob gyur nas// 'chi bdag rgyal pos bltar yang
med par 'gro// lus gtogs dran pa nye bar bzhag nas su// reg pa'i skya mched drugan bsdams byas te// gang zhig rtag tu mnyam par 'jog byed pa// de bdag nyid kyis mya ngan 'das pa rtogs//
[gang zhig rtag tu rnam pa thams cad du// lus gtogs dran pa nye bar 'jog byed pa// bdag 'demed cing bdag gir 'dzin pa med// bdag tu ma 'gyur bdag gir 'dzin mi 'gyur// de ltar dge slong
mnyam 'jog myur du na// yul la sred pa dag las rgal bar 'gyur// gang zhig dran dang shes bzhin mnyam 'jogodang// dga' dang rab tu dang bas dus dus su// chos 'di la spyod che la tshe byed pa de//

skye rga nas las rgal bar 'gyur zhes gsungs// de ltar rtagatumel tshe byed stan cing// dge slong mkhas pa dran ldan brtson pa las// skye 'a kun tu sbyor ba spangs nas su// des ni khed las mya ngan 'du
pa 'theb// gnyid lag dedagasad byed pa 'di/ mel tshebadag la khyod nyon cig/ nyal bas me la tshe byed pa ste// mel tshe byed la 'jigs pa med// mel tshe byed par brtson ba dang// nyin mtshan rjes su
slob byed cing// 'chib med la lcag mos pa'i// zag pa rnams ni zad par 'gyur// gang zhig nyanedang mtshan rnams su// sangs rgyas rjes su dran byed cing// gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs song
ba[]de dag mi la red pa yin// gang zhige nedangamtshan rnams su// chos rnams rjes su dran byed cing// gang dag chos la skyabs song ba// de dag mi ArAd pa yin// gang zhiganyanedang mtshan
rnams su// dge 'dun rjes su dran byeng cing// gang dag dge 'dun skyabs song ba// de dag ma yas red pa yani/ gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su// sangs rgyas rjes su dran byed pa// ga'u/
gtam ya nyan thos de// legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur// gang zhig nadang mtshan rnams su// chos rnams rjes su dran byed pa// go'u dam pa nyan thos de// leg
par sad pa sasad par 'gyur// gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams s// dge 'dunarjes su dran byed pa// go' dam la nyan thos de// legs par sad pas sad nga ra 'gyur// gang zhig nyin dang mtshan
ka/ rnamasu// tshul khrims rjes sa ngan byed pa// go'u tam yanyan thos de// legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur// gang zhig nyanadang Atshan rnams su// gtong ba rjes sudran byed pa// go'i tu
