ma la nyan tho [ ]de/ legs par sad pasasad par 'gyur// gang zhig tan dang mtshan rnams su// lhani rjes su dran byed pa// ga' dam pa nyan thos de// legs par sad pas sa da par 'gyur//
gang zhig tan dang mtshan rnams su// rtag tu lus gtogs dran byed pa// ge'atam li kanathos de// legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur// gang zhig nyen dang mtshan rnams su// rtag tu
nga 'dzin bzhi dran pa// go'itam la nyan thosad// legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur// gang zhig nyin dang mtshan mas su// 'tsho bamed la yid dga' ba// go'u ta ma yanyan thos de// legs
par sad pas sad par 'gyur// gang zhig tanemtshan rnams su// gnodasems med la lade dga' ba// ge'o tam yanyan thos de// legs bsad pas sad par 'gyur// gang zhig nyin dang mtshan
[rnams su// bsgom pa lan yid dga' ba// go'u ta ma yi nyan thos de/ legs pa sad pas sad par 'gyur// gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su// stong pa nyidi la lade dga' ba// ge'u tam
yinyanAthos de// legs pasad pasasad par 'gyur/ gzhasitanadang mtshan rnams su// mtshan ma med la yid dag rab// ge'am yatan thos de// legs par sad pasasad par 'gyur// gang
zhig tan dang mtshan rnams su// dben pa lan yado dga' ba// ga'u dum ya nyan thos de// legs sad nga sa sad par 'gyur// gang zhag zhidang mtshan rnams su// nges par 'byung la ya de dga'
ba ge'o tam yAtan thog de// legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur// gang zhig tanadang mtshan rnams s// tsal nga med la yid dga' ba// go'utam ya nyan thos de// legs par sad pasasad par
'gyur// gang zhig nyin dngamtshan rnams su// mya ngan 'das la yid dga' ba// go'u tum yanyan tshes de// legs par sad pas sad par 'gyur// dran pa batshoms te bco lnga pa'o/

sa bdag gi bya ba bya ba'i dus ga yo bas// dang po lenang bya ba'i me la tshe gyis// bdagagase dang por de ltar byas nan// bya ba bya ba'i dus ltar zad 'dod tsang// jaltar 'dod pa de bzhin 'byor 'gyur
bas// de yi ring bzhin nga yis mthong bsan// ji srid don phun sum tshogs 'gyur pa// de srid bar du mi lo sa bsgrim par gyis// bsgrim zhing brtson par bya ba yis// bdag nyid gling du 'gyur bar
dbya/ mgar pa yasan dngulabazhin du// rang ga dram sbyang bar gyis// dri sbyangs pa skyon 'byung// zhes skyo dang ma'atheb// nga tshatshan la re zhing// ngo tshab la ngamo
tsha// mi 'jigs pa la bas lta dang// 'jigs lam 'dzugs lta ba yi// log par lta ba blangs pa yi// sems can na'agror 'gro bar 'gyur// 'don gang sngon bag med las// phyi nas bag
'gaM dang ldan gyur te// sprin bral nyi ma zla ba ltar/ 'jig rten 'din kun nas gas la// 'di gang sngon bag med las/ phyi nas bag dang ldan 'gyur te// 'jig rten 'din sred pa las// dran pa legs par
'da' bar 'gyur// gang zhig gzhon nu rab byung nas// sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug pa de// sprin bral nyi ma zla ba ltar// 'jig rten 'di na kun nas gsal// gang zhig gzhon nur rab byung nas//
sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug pa de// 'jig rten 'din sred pa las// dran pas legs par 'da' bar 'gyur// gang zhig sdig pa'i las byas ba// dge bas 'gebs par byed pa de/ sngon bral tam zlo
ba ltar// 'jig rten 'din kun nas gsal// gang zhig sdog pa'i las byas pa// dge bas 'gebs par byed pa de// 'jig rten 'di na sred pa las// dran pas legs par 'da' bar 'gyur// gang
zhigagason lam dga' ba// de shin 'ang mya nganamed// brtan pa ga'aphang mthong ba de// mya nganadabusan gdung ma 'gyur// gang zhig gson la ma dga' ba// den shana'ang mya nganamed// brtan pa ga
0 'phang mthong bde// gnyebadun dbusan lam mer 'dug/ dge slong dkar po bsgom gyas la// nag bo 'tshis ni rnam par spongs// khyim nas khyim med song nas su// spyod yul dben pa gang yin pa//

de la mngon par dgababaslabatsange// 'dod pa ci yang med par sbyongs// rtagatu snying po dag pa dang// rtag tu gso sbyong dag pa dang// gtsang ma lasanadig pa de// brtul zhugs phun sumatshegs par 'gyur//

zhing ga skyonan yin ltar// skye dgu'adi la 'dod chags skyon// de bas 'dod chags bral rnams la// byin na 'bras bu chen por 'gyur// zhangag skyonan rtswa yin ltar// skyedagu 'di la zhe sdang skyon// dengs

zhesdang bral rnams la// byishin 'bras bu chen bor 'gyur// zhang gi skyon ni rtswa yan ltar// skye dgu 'di la gtamug skyon// debasagatimug bral rnams la// byin n 'bras bu chen por 'gyur// zhing gi skyonani

rtsa yan ltar// skye dgu 'ad la nga rgyal skyon// de bsang rgyal bral rnams la// byanen 'bras bu chen por 'gyur// zhing gi skyonan rtswa len ltar// skye dgu 'di la chags pa skyon// de bas chags dang bral

rnams la// byinen 'bras bu chen por 'gyur// zhing gi skyon ni sku yin ltar// skye dgu 'di la sred pa skyon// de bas srod dang bral rnams la// byin na 'bras bu chen por 'gyur// drug pa bdag po rgyal bo
sto chags par gyur nachags can yin// ma chags gyuran ma chags yin// chags pa byas pa zhes brjod do// 'dod chags zhe sdang nga rgyal dang// 'chag pa gang du gnas pa yi// grong khyer rus pa'i
rab na/ sha dang khragags zhal zhal byas// rgyu las kun nas bslang ba las byung sdug bsngal can// de'a mthong na de nadi dag 'chang 'gyur zhing// de dag rtogs na chu bo rnams
kun btu spongs// phyi rol ba la chags pa de dag song bamed// sal khu'i tshoms te bcu drug pa'o// de dag khyim la ma dga' bar/ dran dang ldan pa 'bad pa yis// ngang pas mtsho
cha na sbyong ba ltar// dedag khyim sgang chu ba rgal// brtan pa 'jig rten nges byung nas// bdud kyisdo rnams rab bcom ste// ti'i lamanas ngang pa ltar// rdzu 'phrul gyisanamakha' la 'gro// tshangs
bar smod pa ma spyod cing// gzhon nu'i nor nag red pa// mtshongon ta nyung ngogs dgon/ nu skyung gnasems bzhin du 'gyur// tshangs par spyad pa ma spyad cing// gzhon nur nor nam red ba// sngan tshod/
byas pa rjes dran zhing// lus bsnyum nas niatil bar 'gyur// sdig pa chung byas bdag nyid kyi// phyi bzhin ma 'ongs semasungashog/ chu yi bges pa ltung ba las/ dusachen gang ba ji bzhin du// cung
zad cung zad bsags pa yi// sdig pas byas pa gang bar 'gyur// dge ba chung byas bdag 'dikyi/ phyi bzhin a ringam sems shage/ chu yatshoges yo lcangab yis// bum chen gang ba ji bzhin du//
cung zad cung zad bsags pa yi// dge bas brtan pa gang bar 'gyur// gang zhig rags brtsigs mtshongon pas// rgya mtsho'ichu brgal 'dod pa// skye bos gzings na bi casan/kyang// skye bos wA/
pa rgyal bar byed// brgal nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// bram ze skam sar gnas par mdzad// de la dge slong khrus byed cing// nyan thos rnams kyis sa thanges kyang bcas// jalta mtsho chen

zab mo dag/ rab tu rnam dang ga med ltar// de bzhin mkhas pa rab dang pa// 'di nAtshesan rten par byed// 'di ltar kun nachu yod pas// su zhage tshol zhing rgyu byed de// khron pa'i chi lta ci zhig dgos/
srid pa rtsa nas gcad par gyis// btso blag mkhan dag chus 'khru zhing// mad 'a mkhan mesan sring ba dang// shing mkhan shing la 'gasbyong ltar// mkhas pas bdag de gdul bar bya// nam
mkha' lta bur chags med cing// sgo them lta bur g.yo ba med// 'og pa can gyi mtsho lta bur// mkhas pa 'khor ba la mi dga'// chu yi tshoms te bcu bdun pa'o//ltar
bcasag shunasde'an jig rten 'ad/sastang las rgyal gang zhig la gos// me tog lta bur rab 'dod pagi/ chos gzhi legs par ston mkhas gang// lhar bcas gshin rje'i 'og rten 'di'i//
sa stong las rgyal slob pa yin// me tog lta burar ba 'dod pa'i// chos gzhi 'gas par ston makhas te// nags tshal lasan 'jig skyes phyir// nagasatshul gcad kyi shing sa yin/ nagA
dang nags sbyor tshod cig dang// dge sbyong mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// gal te nags sbyoram bcad na// phra rab kyis kyang ma rnams skyo// madrung nu zho 'dod be'u ltar// de yis yid ni rab tu 'ching//
[r] ]@#/// lag pas ston ka'i bats+tshaltar// bdag la dga' ba bcad nas su// rgyal gsungasamya ngan 'dasu phyir// zhiba'i lam nyid bskyed bar gyis// ji ltar me tog yade 'ong ba// kha
'a1 dog bzang yang dramod ltar// de bzhin legs par gsus pa 'tshig/ 'bras bumed par m byed cig/ ji ltar bung ba me tog gi 'deg dro la mi gnod par// khu ba gzhibasanas 'phur ba ltar// de bzhin
thub pa grongad rgyu// gzhan gyi skyon la mi brtag cing// gzhan gyis byas dang ma byas man// bdag nyid kyisan rigs pa dang// chags pa la brtag par bya// ltar phyag dar phung bo dag/ mgatsang
chu namad 'di las// pad+ma kha bya gtsang ba dang// dri zhim yid 'ong rab skyes ltar// de bzhin so so'i skye bo dag/ mdongasagyur phyag dar phung 'di las// gas sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dag/ shes rab

( kyisan gsal ba byung// ji ltar me tog phung po las// me tog 'phrengargyudamang byed ltar// de bzhin mang na skyes pa yis// dge ba pha la chen rnams kyang bya// ji ltar dbyar ka ba ku la'i// me tog rab tu
rnam 'phrul ltar// de bzhinadage slong 'dod chags dang// zhesdang gti mugasrang bar gyis// ma la lade la rna mchogs dag/ me tog bzhin du rab bsags pa// 'chi bdag gsan blangasanas 'gro// nyal
'gratshubs bdas ba bzhin// ma la yade la rnam chags dag/ me tog bzhinadu rab bsags pa// 'dod pa rnams kyisam ngoms shing// 'chi bdag gis ni dbang du byed// mi yi yid la rnam chags dag
ma tog bzhin du rab bsags pa// longs spyod skye bar mi 'gyur zhing// 'chi bdag gis ni dbang du byed// mi yi yid la rnam chags dag/ me tog bzhin du rab bsags pa// bya ba ma thaganam phyin
par// 'chi bdag gsani dbang du byed// lus 'di bum pa 'dra bar rtogs byas shing// de bzhin chos rnams smig rgyu 'drar shesanas// bdud kyi mi rtog mchog na'arigatsad pa// 'chi bdag rgyal phyogs
bltar yang med par 'gro// 'jig rten 'di dag bum pa'i drar rtogs shing// de bzhin chos rnams smig rgyu 'drar shes nas// bdud kyi me tog mchog ni 'diregacod pa// 'chibadag rgyal pos bltar
yang med par 'gro// lus 'di debu ba 'dra bar rtogs byas shing// de bzhin tshes rnams smig rgyu 'drar shes nas// bdud kyi me tog mchog ni 'dire gcod pa// 'chibadagargyal pos ba ltar lang med par
'gro// 'jig rten 'di dag dbu ba 'drar rtogs shing// de bzhin tshos rnams smage rgya 'drar shes nas// bdud kyi me tog achog na 'dir gcod pa// 'chi bdag rgyal pos bltar yang med par 'gro// srid/

pa u dum wa ra'i me tog ltar// sAnge po med par sems pa'i dge slongagang// de ni pha rol min pa'i pha rol po// song ste sprulargas lags rnying brje ba bzhin// chu skyes rtsa ba'i me tog chu gnas lta'/

'dod chags ma lus gcod byed dage slong gang// de na pha rol min pa'i pha rol po// spong ste sprul nas lo gsar de brje ba bzhin// chu skyes rtsa ba'i mi tog chu gnas lta'i/ zhe sdang ma lus gcod byed dage slong
gang// de ni pha lan na pa'i pha rol po// slong ste sprulanas lags ring brje ba bzhin// chu skyes rtsa ba'i ma rtog chu gnas lta/ gti mug ma lus gcod byed dge slong gang// den

ka pharel mni pa 'pha rol po// song ste sprul rgas lngagasaradi larje ba bzhin// chu skyes rtsa ba'i me tog chu gnas lta'i// nga rgyal ma lus gcod byed dge slong gang// den kha la min pa 'i pa rol bo// sngo

su sbal rgas lcags dang brje ba bzhin// chu skyes rtsa ba'i mi tig nu gnas lta'i// chags pa ma lus gcod byeng dge slong gang// den pha rol man pa'i pha rol po// stong ste sprul rgas lngags rnying pa rjes/

ba'i bzhin/ chu skyes rtsa ba'i mi togachu gnas lta'i// srid pa ma lus gcod byed dge slong gang// den pa la man pa'i wA rol ba// song ste sprul nas lcagasarAnge brje ba bzhin// me tog gi tshoms te btse
rgyu brgyad pa'o///jaltar rta bzang lcag gis gzhus ban// skrag cing shugs grags 'gro byed ji bzhin du// dad pa tshul khrims ting 'dzin ldan pa dang// chos rnams rnam par
gtan la 'bebs ldan zhing// dbang po mnyam gzhag bzod ldan 'grogs bde ba// skyob pa de rnams srid pa ma lus spong// jaltar rta bzang lcag gse gzhus pa na// skrag cing shugs drag 'gro
byed ji bzhin du// dad pa tshul khrims ting 'dzin ldan pa dang// tshes rnams rnam par gtan la 'bebs ldan zhing// rig dang rkang par ldan zhing dran ldan pa'i// skyob rnams sdug bsngal na lus song
bar mdzad// 'dul sbyor byed pas legs btul rta lta bur// gang zhig dbang po legs par bsngags pa las// khro ba spong zhing zag pa zad byed pa// thub de rnams kyis lha yi bar du myong/
bag yod pa yas bgamodadang// mi nyal mang pos gnyid 'gadang// rta bzang gsanarte rgod ltar// shin tum khas pas spangs nas 'gro// rta bzang la ni lcag bzhin du// gang zhig nga tsho
shes ston cing// shes rab legs par mnyamagazhag pa// des na sdig pa sel bar byed// dul pa 'dunasar 'gro byed cing// dul ba rgya po lhag par zhon// gang zhig tshig ngan bawed byed dang
dul ba mi yi nang na mchog/ glang bobanang na glang chen dang// sin cang shes rta dang ni// dre'u 'dul byed pa gang yin pa// de bas bdag nyid 'dul ba mchog/ bdag nyid legs 'dul gang yin pa 'di/

mkhas des zhi ba thob 'gyur gyi// bzhon pa de dag rnams kyisani// sa dem ngon par 'thob mi srid// glang po'i nang na glang chen dang// sin du'i cang shes rta dang ni// dre'u 'dul byed pa gang yin pa// de

bdag nyid 'dul ba mchog/ bdag nyade legs 'dul dran ldan gang// des na sdug bsngal mthar phyin gyis// bzhen pa de dag rnams kyis ni// sa de mngon par 'thob mi srid// glang po ri nang na glang chen dang
san du'i cang shes rta dang ni// dre'u 'dul byed pa gang yin pa// de bas bdag nyid 'dul ba mchog/ bdag nyid legs 'dul dran ldan gang// des na 'gro rnams spong 'gyur gyi// bzhon pa de dag rnams
kyis ni/ sa de mngon par 'thob mi srid// glang po'i nang na glang chen dang// sin du'i cang shes rta dang ni// dre'u 'dul byed pa gang yin pa// de bas bdag 'di 'dul ba mtsho
bdag nyid legs 'dul gang yin des// 'ching ba bcad nas 'gro 'gyur gyi// bzhon pa de dag rnams kyisan// sa de mngon par 'thob mi srid// 'dul sbyong byed pas rta bzang ltar// bdag nyid
khen gdul bar bya// bdag nyid legs par 'dul ba las// sdug bsngal rnams kyi pha mthar phyin// bdag nyid kho na bdag mgon// bdag nyid bdag gi skyabs yazhe pas// 'dul sbyong byed sa
rta bzang ltar// de bas bdag nyid 'dul bar bya// rta'i tshims ti bcu dgu pa'iko/khro ba spangs shang nga rgyal rnam pa ngasan// kun sbyor kun las nan tu 'da' 'gyur zhing//
mang dang gzugs la chags pa med de dag/ ca yang med pas chags pa'i rjes ma ltung// skyes ma thag tu khro ba spongs// skyes nas 'dod chags spangs par gyis// brtan pas ma rig rab tu spangs//
bden pa mthong na bde bar 'gyur// khro ba spangs na bde bar nyal// khro ba spangs na gdung ma gyur// dge slong khro ba bde 'joms pa 'a/dugag rtsa ba chems shig dang// 'phags pa rnams kyis
bsngags 'gyur zhing// khe btsem pa yis mya ngan med// gang khros bdag gis legs byas kyi// ma legs tshan zhes rab sna pa// de na khro ba zhi 'og tu// me yis bsregs bzhin gdung bar
'gyur// ngo tsha med cing khrel med pa// khro ba can la brtul zhugs med// khro bsam ngon par zil non pa// de la su la ngan ma byed// gang zhig byis pa 'a mthu stobs can// de la stobasan stobs
med yin// byas pa chos dang bral ba la// bslab par bya ba yo da re skan// gang zhig stobs dang ldan 'gyur yang// stobs chung rnams kyis bzod byed pa// de nib bod pa'i mchog ces gsung//
nyam chung ba lta rtag tu skur// gang zhig gzhan gyi dpon khyur kyang// stobs chung rnams kyis bzod byed pa// den ted pa'i metshog ces gsung// nyaachung blta rtag tu skur// gzhan gyis
gang zhuge bzed byed pa// de na bzod pa'i mchog ces gsungs// nyam chung ba lta rtag tu sgar// gang zhige pha la khres rige nas// bdag nyid nye bar zhi byed pa// de na bdag dang gzhan dag gi de
'jigs chen dag las skyobs ba yin// gang zhig pha rel khros dgenas// bdag nyid nye bar zhi byed pa// de na bdag dang gzhan dag gi/ gnyis ka'i den ni spyod pa yin// bdag nyid dang ni
gzhan dag dang// gnyis ka'i don na sbyong de la// skye bo chos la ma ma khas rnams// byas pa yin zhes sems kyang bla// gtso bo'i tshigan 'dzags phyir brjod byed dang// thabs zla'i tshigani
'thabs gcugs rgyu brjod pas// gang zhig dman pa'i tshig la bzod byed de// bzod pa 'a mchog ches dam pas rab tu gsungs// byis pa khres nas tshig rtsub dag/ skyas

[?]na rgyal bar 'gyur snyam sems// gang zhigatshig dag brjod byed pa// de ni rtag tu rgyal ba yin// bdenapar sna bya khri ma byi// slong la chung lang sbyin par bya// rnam pa 'di gsum gnas se ni// lce

'thaM yi gnas su 'grobar 'gyur// khro ba'i zol gyis non pa'i mos/ rang gi don kyang ma rtogs pas// 'khor gyi nang du bag skyong la// khro ba med pa 'a tshagasmos shig/ gang zhig sa la slar khro dang//
de na sdug pa can 'gyur bas// khres la spur na ma khro dang// thub par dka' ba'i g.yul las rgyal// khro ba med pas khro ba thub// legs pas legs pa ma yin thub// sbyin pa yisan 'jus pa thub
bden pa sabaden pa ma yin thub// dul zhing rigs pas 'tsho ba dang// khro ba med pa ga la go/ yang dag shes pas rnam grel ba// mkhas pa rnams la khro ba med// khrel med dang 'tshe med la//

'phags pa'i skye bos rtag bsten kyang// skye bo sngagican khro bo dag/ ri bo bzhin du sgyur bar byed// gang zhig khro ba byung pa dang// shing rta 'khyams las 'azhi byed de// 'dul sbyong mkhan du ngasagasus
zhabs 'debs skye bo phal pa yin// khro ba'i tshoms te nyi shu pa'o///sdom la/ dge sbyong lam dang bkur sti dang// 'bu dang ldadang dran pa ste// sa la bu dag dang chu dang
nam ka khrab bcu pa'o// 'jig rten 'di na kun ragis kun zil gnon// 'dazhitshes rnams kun gyis ma gos shing// kun sras srid zad rab tu rnam grol ba// nyid kyis mngon mkhyen pa la su
bstan// de bzhin gshegs pa lha mi'i ston pa ste// stobs rnams kun ldan thams cad mkhyen pa dang// byang chub b.redanas nyid kyis rab ston pa// mtshungs med mnyam med nga la su yis
bstan// ngana'ajig rten dgra bcom ste// 'jig rten dag na bla med dang// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ khadud rnams zal tshon rgyal ba dang/ nga dang 'dra ba med pas na/ nga la slob dpon su lang
med/ 'jig rten 'dun gcig pu yis// rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med b.res// gang zhig zag pa zad brnyes pa// rgyal ba nga 'drar shes par gyis// sdig pa 'i tshos las nga rgyal bas// de bas

[n9]'pho len par 'gyur ro// gzhan du sha'apho blangs pas/ 'di ltar gzhan du skye ba dang/ rgab dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mu ngan dang/ sma sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde/
ba dang/ 'khrug pa 'byung zhing 'di ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rten pa med pas spyod pa med par 'gyur ro// spyod pa med pas gzhol bar ma 'gyur ro//

gzhol bar ma gyur pas shan tu sbyangs par 'gyurare// shin tu sbyangs pas 'gro ba dang 'ong bar ma 'gyur ro// 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pas gzhan du shi 'pho len pamed par 'gyur ro// gzhan du 'chi 'pho len/
pa med pas 'di ltar gzhan du skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chib dang/ myang nadang/ skyesngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid m bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'gag pa 'gyur zhing//
'di ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung bo chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag ma skyes pa dang/ ma byung ba dang/ ma bcos pa dang/ 'dusam byas pa dang/ ma 'byung ba yod do// rgyu ba
dang 'byung ba dang/ bcos ma dang/ soms pas byas pa dang/ 'dus byas dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yodado// dge slong dag gal te askyos pa dang/ ma byung bdang/ ma bcos pa dang/
[oj]'dus byas dang/ ma 'byung ba medadu zinan skye ba dang/ 'byung ba dang/ bcos ma dang/ 'dus byas dang/ sems pas byas pa dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i nges par 'byung ba yodado zhes ngam/

snya'o// dge slong dag gang ni phyi'i 'dun ma skyes ba dang/ ma byung ba dang/ ma bcos pa dang/ 'dus ma byas pa dang/ ma 'byung ba yod pa de'i phyir skyob dang/ 'byung ba dang/ bcos mdang/ 'dus byas dang/ sems

bas byas pa dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i nges par 'byung ba yod do zhes nga sma'o// skyes dang byung dang 'byung ba dang// bcos dang 'dus byas ma brtan zhing// rgadang 'chingang rmongs pa ya ]/tshes can rab

tu'ajig 'gyur ba// thasakyi rgyud 'khas byung ba yi// 'jig 'gyur 'di'i dga' m bya// de la nges par 'byung ba'i gzhi// rtagodang dbyodadang zhib dang/ sdug bsngal chos rnams 'gag pa ste// 'du byed te bar
zhi ba bde// dge slong dag de ni gong du yang gnas par ma 'gyur te/ sa la gnas par mi 'gyur/ chu lam yani/ ma la ma yin/ rlung la ma yin/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la ma lan/ rnam shes
mtha' yas skye mched la ma yin/ tsalang med pa'i mched lam lan/ 'du shes yod min med man skye mched lam yin/ 'jig rten 'di la ma yani/ 'ag rten pha rol lam yani/ 'a ma dang zla
bganyis la gnas pa ma yin te/ 'dadamagis pa med par ngas mngon par shes so// dge slong dag de la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba yod par nga ma sna ste/ gnas par ma yin// 'cho 'e po yod pas nga mi sna
so/skye ba ma yin pa 'di lta bu 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yazheno// sa dang chudang me dang rlung// gang la'ang gnas pa ma yin pa// de la dkar bos gsal ma byed// de la
[P]1 mun pa 'ang lo dam min// de la zla bas snang ma byed// de la nyi masa mngon ma byed// thub pa bram zegang yin pa// des ni ngags rig pa yin// de ni gzugs dang gzugs med dang// sngag
bsngal kun las rab tu grol// mthar phyin 'jigs pa med pa ste// rlom med 'gyod pa med pa yin// srid pa'i zug rngu gtugs pa ste// lus kyi thamar gyur pa yin// 'di ni mthar phyin
'o rnams kyi mchog/ zhabe'agi 'phang bu med ba// mtshan ma thams cad zad pa ste// byang grolag 'phang ba med yan/ mtshungs dang ma mtshungs 'byung ba yi// 'du byed thub pas rab tu sbyangs
nang dmanyam gzhag dga' ba yis// sgong 'a sgrubs 'badra las byung// sbyin kun chos kyi spyan pas thub// dga' kuchos kyi dga' bas thub// stobs kun bzod pa'i stobs kyis thub// bde kun
sridar zad pas thub// mya ngan 'das pa'i tshims te nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//bdag las gzhan pa'i skyon dag ni// phul ma gtor ba ji bzhin du// gzhan gyaskyon mthong sla ba ste/

rang gi skyon mthong bar dka'// ga ngo bo thun che la 'jog ltar// rang ga de spod ba dang// gzhan gyi skyon la lta byed cing// rtag tu 'phyas la ngo 'dushesacan// de las ring du tshes ma mthong// g.yon phyog

chos n reb tu 'phel// spyi la byed cing 'brog rlom can// mgatsang las ldan kA lta bur// shin tu nyon mongs 'tsho ba can// ngo tsha med pa'i 'tsho ba sla// rtag tugatsangam 'tshob dang// thub tshod mi byed 'dzin/
bag can// 'tsho ba dag la lta ba ya/ nge tsho shes pa'i 'tshob dka'// 'jig rten mun par 'gyur 'diste// de las lhaga mthong ldan pa nyung// rgya las shor ba'i bya lta bur// mthe si la dga' shas tsam
zhig/ byas pa lus kyis bcingasagyur pa// mun pa 'khor gyis bskor ba yin// 'jig rten nor la chags pa dang// gzhan rdzas lta bur lta bar byed// bdagabs skyo dgu ba 'byung zhing// gzhan gyis byas so
snyam sems pa// bden patshan la bden lta bas// rtsiyang mthong bar 'gyuro// deni 'gags kyang ma mthong zhing/ zug rngu mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// yul sred gang la skye bo chags pa yi// thug rdu de dag

sngon chada mthong ba dag/ de ni bdag gis byas samama'adzin cing// de ni gzhan khyis khyas sam mi'azhi te/ skye dgu bdadeg nga rgyal ldan// nga rgyal 'chags nga rgyal bcas// da par gyur pa'i rtsa ba can/
kher []ga par mi 'gyu// thob par gyur pa gang yanadang// thob par bya ba gang yin pa// de dgaganyis ka rdul chus log/ rjes su nad pa slob par byed// gang zhig tshul khrims dang/ bslab pa dang/

brtul zhugs dang/ tshangs par spyod pa dang/ dka' thub dang/ rigs bar gnas pa snying bor byed pa 'di ni mtha' gcig go/ gang zhig de ltar lta zhing 'di skad ces 'dod pa'i gtsang ba'o// 'dod pa ni bsod nams
can na// 'dod pa na le ngos sbyad par bya'o// 'dod pan skyonamed pa yanizhes sla zhing// de dag lhag par 'dod pa rnams su ltung bar byed pa'i brtul zhugs len pa 'di yang mtha'agacig

kag/ mtha'aganyis 'di dag ni dung khrid 'phel bar byed pa ste/ 'di dgags dur khrod 'phel bar byas so// mtha' gnyis bo 'di dagama mthong ba kha ciganyen par byed cing/ kha tsage mngon par rgyug par byed

cing lcag bar rgyug par byed pa dgamag dang ldan pas mthong ngo// mtha' gnyis po de dag mthong ba gzhen par ma byed/ rgyug par mi byed la/ de dag lhag bzhin par mkhyidatsang/ lcag pa rgyag bar ma byed

ba langamig dang ldan pas mthong ngo// de dag de ltar ma byed cing/ de dag de ltar ma byed na/ dedagag lam du me/dgas pa 'di lta bur 'dzin sdug bsngal gyi mtha' lano// ji ltar chu bur mthong ba dang/ ji
ltar smig rgyugathengab ltar/ de bzhani'ag rten lta byed pa// 'a bdag rgyal pos mthong mi 'gyur// ji ltar chu bur mthong ba dang// ji ltar smig mthong ltar// de bzhin lus la lta byed pa// 'chi
bdag rgyal pos mthong ma 'gyur// gangal gyis lamanochags pa// de la mkhas pa chags mi 'gyur/ rgyal po'i shing rta bkra ba ltar// lus 'di rtag tu lta bar gyis// gang la byas pa rmongs 'gyur

ba/ de la mkhas pas rmongs ma 'gyur// rgyal po'i shing rta bkra ba ltar// lus 'adirtag tu lta bar gyis// gang du byis pa nyams 'gyur ba// glang rgan rdzob tu chud pa bzhin// rgyal po'i shing rta bkra ba ltar/
lus 'di rtag tu blta bar gyis// nod pa lta bur 'jig tshos can// rnabyung ba dang 'dra ba ste// gang yang bstan par mi gnas par// lus 'di rtag tu blta bar gyis// nad pa 'jig pa'i tshes can ltar/
gang yang brtan par ma gnas par// nor bu'i rna cha gdub kong rgyase/brgyan pa'i lus la blta bar gyis// ska na ren bu brgya byas shing// migasman gyis na bskus pa 'amage/ byas pa lcagang ra mid
byed kyang// pha la tshel bar mi byed do// mig sman gyisan gsar bris shing// rnag can lus ni brgyan par gyis// byas pa lhag par rmongs byed kyang// pha rolatshel bar ma byed do// lus nadre mi
gyis bskus nas// rkang pa bdag gis byugs pa dag/ byas pa lhag par rmongs phyed kyang// phal tshol bar ma byed do// gang zhig 'dod par kun sbyor 'brel chags shing// kun tu sbyor ba'i skyon rnaA
ma mthong// 'dod par 'brel la chags pa'i mi de yis// chu bo mtha' las yangs pa rnal ma 'gyur/ chags bral mchog dang tham thams cad du// 'di la bdagadang bdag gir mi blta zhing//
de ltar rnam grolasngon chadam rgyal ba'i// chuborab rgal yang sridamed par 'gyur// gang zhig tshalasangasatshalamed pa// nags tshal spangs nas nags su rgyug/ grol ba 'ching bar gcen pa yi// gang
zag 'di na ltas shig tshur// shing rta 'thun pa'i rtsibs ldan pa// yan lag yid 'ong gos dkar g.yogs// sdig med 'gro ba las la// 'chinges pa'i rgyunanams gcad par gyis// 'jigs pa
[4 ]@#// skrag pa'i m de gan// phal cher ri dang nags tshal dang// skyed mos tshal dang mchod gnas dang// ljon shing rnams la skyabs su 'gro// skyabs de gtso bom yin zhing// skyabs/
de mchog tu gyur paman// de la skyabs su song ba las// sdug bsngal kun las grol ma 'gyur// gang zhig sangs rgyas chos dang ni// dge 'dun lanabasagong zhong// sdug bsngal sdug bsngal kun
'byung dang// sdug bsngal yang dag 'das pa dang// bde bcu ngan 'das 'gro bgi/ 'phags lam yan lag brgyad pa ste// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag/ gang tshe shes rab kyis mthongs// ngoni
a skyabs kyi mchog yin zhing// de ni skyabs kyi dam pa yin// de la skyabs su song ba yis// sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur// mthong bas mtho zhing mthong bsam mthong mthong// ma mthong mi

mthong mthong bya mthong mi 'gyur// 'damatho lhag mthong thadad dngas por brjod// nyon mtshan naMm yang ldan cagi ma gnas bzhin// 'dra ba mthong bram thong mi 'gyur gal te mthong na 'dra ma na thang/ mthong

'dis 'dra ba ma mthong ste// 'dra mthong ma las mthong ba med// mi las tsam mthong na 'dra ba mthong/ zhoge mthong an 'dra ba mthong ma 'gyur// ji ltar 'di na 'drab mthong bdag// gang zhig med na 'dra

bar mtheng dang bral// gang tshe 'di las sdug bsngal ma mthong ba// de yi tshon bdag tu mthong bar 'gyur// ji lta ji ltar sdug bsngal rtogs gyur pa// des na bdag 'di 'dra bamatheng ma 'gyur// gang gas so so'i
skya bsgribs nas// 'du byed sdug bsngal ma mthong ba// de phyir 'dan 'dra mthong ste// de med 'dra ba mthong ngo// mthong ba'i tshoms te nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// stage pa thams cad ma
bya ste// dge ba phunasum tshogs par bya// rang gi sems n yongs su 'dul// 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin// sbyin pas bsod nams rab tu 'pha la// legs bsdams dgra bsogs mi
'gyur ro// dge dang ldan pas sdig pa spong// nyon mongs zad pas mya ngan 'da'// mkhas dang 'dre dang byas pa'i skye bo dang// lhan cig spyang dngagacog du gnas kyang rung/ ngang pas chu las 'os
'thung bltar// mkhas pa sngog pa can rnams rab tu snang// 'jig rten ltasadamigs mthong pa dang// 'gog par 'gyur ba'i chos mthong bas// 'phags pa sdig la dga' ma byed// sngage can dge la
dga' ma 'gyur// legs par r zhib ri dang ni// rab tu dben pa'i re shes pa// misand med cing sngage med lo// tshes la dga' ba'a'i dag 'thung// sems kyis zag pa med pa dang// sems
ni'aching bas ma bcom la// dge dang sdig pa rab sbyangs pa// ngan 'gro rnams kyi 'dzags pa dang// gnas mne zlog dang legs smad ng// nyes dmigs ston par byed pa dang// ma khas ba tshar
bcad sna byed pa// de lta'i skye dgu bstan par bya// de lta bu dag bstan byas na// sdig par mi 'gyur legs par 'gyur// nye bzhi zhing rab zho la// dal bus smazhing khengs med pa// sdig pa'i
tshes rnams sdug byed de// rlung gis ljon shing lemo bzhin// gang zhig skyes bu dag cing nyon mongs med// rab tu sdang med mal khro byed pa'i/ byis bde la sdug pa//
phyir 'go ste// rdzogs phyogs su na rdzul rnams gtor ba bzhin// dge ba byed pas dge bdang// sdig pa byed las sdig pa ste// mi yis gang dang gang byas pa// de de rang gis mthong bar 'gyur// bag
gas sdig pa byas nani// de dag len kun nyon mongs// bdag gis sdig pa ma byas na// bdag nyid khen rnam par dag/ gzhan gyis gzhan sbyong mi byed kyi// dag dang ma dag rang rang byed// bdag
nyid kyisan sngog pa dag/ byas shing nye bar bsags pa yis// bsam brlag mngon du 'gas par byed// rdo rjes nor bu 'bags pa bzhin// mig ldan 'gro bar byed pa las// nyam nga'i lam dag
jalta bar// mkhas pas 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten 'dir// sdig pa dag ni yongs su spang// nor chen gyis na grogs nyung dang// tshong pas 'jigs bcas lamadang ni// gson par 'dod pas dug lta bur//
mkhas pas sdig can longs su spang// gal te lag mthil rma med na// lag pas dug na bzung byas kyang/ ma medagazhim 'dren ltar// ma byas pa lasdig pa med// bdag la mi phan bya ba dang// leg
pa ma yin bya bar sla// gang dag ban zhing bder 'gyur ba// de mchog tu byabard ka kha// dam pas legs par byasu yi// dam pas sdig pa bya bar dka'// ngan pas sdig pa ba sla ya// 'phags pas sdige
pany+tsa// ngasad ma sa la// de srid shes pa dngar bar sems// gang tshe sdig pa smin gyur pa// de tshe denatshe bar sems// srid sdig pam smin pa// de srid sdig b.rung bar lta// gang tshe

sdig pasmanegyur pa// de tshe sdug pa mthong bar bgyur// srid bzang bo la sman pa// de srid bzang po sdog par mthong// gang tshe bzang posmin gyur pa// de tshe bzang po mthong bar 'gyur// sdoge pasdug
bsngal sogs pa na// de la dga' bar mi bya'o///brgya la sdig pa byas na yang// yang dang yang du dem bya// bsod nams bde ba sogs bas na// de nyid lan dga' bar bya//
gal te bsod nams byas n yang// de ni yang dang yang du bya// sdig la yang mngon dga' ba// bsod nams dal bus byed 'gyur bas/ sbag pa las sems bzlog cing// bsod nams mngon
par myur te bya// sdig pachung du byas pas kyang// 'jig rten pha rol 'jigs chen dang// phung khrol chen po byed 'gyur te// khong par song ba'i dug bzhin no// bsod nams chung du byas pas kyang// 'jig

rten pha rol bde bar 'dren// denachen dag kyang byed 'gyur te// 'bru rnams phunasum 'byor pa bzhin// gang zhig nyes med tshad pas gcod// snang ba mne la rab snang ba// gnas gzhan gang yang rung ba bcu/
myud thob pa kho nar 'gyur// tshor ba ma ba zad pa dug gam// yan lus ni 'dral ba 'am// gnod pa'i tshor ba tsha pha'ang rung// yang na sems 'khrugs thob par 'gyur// gnyen 'dun rnams dang bral ba 'am//
longs spyod zad par 'gyur ba 'am// rgyal po'i gnod pa 'byung ba 'am// ma snyan shan tu mi bzad dam// yang na khyim name chen pos// nges par sreg par byed par 'gyur/ shes/
rab 'chal pa lus zhig nas// bcu pa ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// sdig pa byas pas bag dbab ma byasko// rang byas rkyang mar byas kyang bag mdabab// dben par byas kyang bag dbab ma bya ste// de la a
smon yod pas bag mi dbab// bsod nams byas pas bgan debang bya ste// rang rgyas rgyang ring byas kyang bag dbab tsang// dben par byas kyang bgan dbab par bya// de yi rnam smin yod pas bag dbabab//

bdagags sdig pa byas pas myan byed// rang dang rgyang 'dri byas pas mya ngan byed// bdag gis dben par byas pas mya ngan byed// de la rnam smin yodangs mu ngan byed// bdag nyidi nag po'i las dang ldan atheng

! nas 'di'i yang mya ngan gzha4 bang mya ngan byed// sdig pa byas pas gnyis kar mya ngan byed/ don tshu nganade rab mya ngan byed// bdag gis bsod nams byas pas dga' bar 'gyur// ming dang rgyang 'di byas pas
dga' bar 'gyur// bdag gis dben par byas pas dga' bar 'gyur// de yi rnam smone yod pas dga' bar 'gyur// bdag nyid rnamadag las dang ldan mthong nas// 'di na dga' 'gyur gzhan du'ang dga' bar
'gyur// bsod nams byas pas gnyis kas dga' 'gyur zhing// de nyi dga' 'gyur de rab dga' bar 'gyur// bdag gis sdig pa byas pas gdung 'gyur zhing// rang byas rgyang ring byas pas gdung bar 'gyur//
bdagags dben bar byas pas gdung 'gyur zhing// de yi rnam smin yod pasag dungabar 'gyur// bdag nyidi nag po las dang ldan mthong nas// bdon gdung 'gyur pa rel gdung bar 'gyur// sdig pa byas pas
gsakar gdung 'gyurazhing// denag dung 'gyur de rab gdung bar gyur// bdag gis bsod nams byas pas dga' 'gyu zhing yi byas rkyang ring byas pas dga' bar 'gyur/ khadagags dben par byas
bsadagab 'gyur zhing// de ya rnamasmin yod pas dga' bar 'gyur// bdag nyid dkar po 'o lo sa dang ldan mthong anas// bdenadega' 'gyur pa la dga' bar 'gyur// bsod nams byas pas gnyis kar
dga' 'gyur zhing// de ni rig 'a 'gyur de rab dga' bar 'gyur// sdig pa byas shing bsod namasam byas la// tshes dang gal zhing chos min thob pa'i mi// sdig pa'i las can 'chabs 'jigs 'gyur te//
chu chen nang du grunganazhige pa bzhin// bsod nams byas shing sdig pa ma byas la// dam pa rnams kyis sngon gyi tshes spyad pas// ngananems kyang 'chi bas 'dzagis med de// brtan pa'i gru mas pha rol
'gro ba bzhin// sdig pa'i tshoms te nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o////jasrid nyamam shar ba'i// de srid srin bume khyer snang// nyi ma shar bgyur pa ni// snang bamed tsang sngon por gyur/
dzasride de bzhin gshegs nashar// de srid rtogasaM ge pa rnams snang// 'jig rten rdzogs sangs rgyas shar ba// rtog caganyan thos bcas mi snang// gces man gces par blos 'dzin cing// gces la
[9{ ]/ gces pa man rtog pa// leg bar kun spyod yul can// des na gces pa thob mi 'gyur// gces pa man la gces min dang// gces la gces par 'du shes la// legs
par kun rtog spyod yul can// den gces ba thob par 'gyur// 'di lta dang tan lam na zhen pa'i// 'chingasam gsar du 'phel ba dag/ 'khor bar rgyag cing 'gro dang stod 'gyur te// seng dba'i

'a phyo ma le ba dang 'dra// 'di la myong 'gyur gzhan la myong 'gyur ba bam// 'di'i thi a tha dadasnyed pa// dedag tshangs par spyad sbyong 'bad pa dang/ sems par byed pas rab tu rnam par sbyong/ gang
zhoge snyigs ma yod bzhin du// ngur smig gsanan byed pa// dul dngades pa med pa des// dug smig gyon pa'i 'os ma yin// gang zhig snyags ma rnams spangs nas/ tshul khrims legs pa
pa mnyam gzhag pa// dul dang sa par ldan pa des// dur smag gyon pa'is lanano// galo sgyu 'jus dang ldan pa'i m// kha dog dang zhig thugs ldan pa'i m// yang na sla bar byed tsam gyis/ pho
mchog yin par mi chud de// gang zhig chos gsum de dag rnams// ta la'amago bo bzhin bcad chos// blo ldan skyon ni bsal ba des// tho mchog yin par brjod par bya// 'jig rten 'di na legs/
bar m bsdams bas// phal cher legs bsdams rtagasakyis rgyu byed pas// legs pa ram brtags par ng mdig gis/ mdog gzugs lan 'ga' mthong bas ya ma no/ 'gan kha bskyar lta bur mi
'tsham zhing// lcags khyadagasar rgyasogalegs pa ji lta bur// khong par bagadug phyi rol 'phags tshul rgyas// 'jig rten 'dage 'khor dang bcas par rgyu// gang zhig rje 'gengs gtade na ldog pa dang//

nyin dang mtshan du 'gre ldog nyal byed pa// rdzab nang dpag chen lus rgyas ji lta bar// yang dang yang du smad pa'i mngal du 'jug/ min rtag tu nadang ldan pa dang// rtag tu kha zas kyi ni shes ba// de
yi sdug bsngal chungabar 'gyur ba dang// dal bus 'jubs tshe yang 'ang bar byed// gang zhig dbang po ma bsams shing// zas kyi tshod ni mi shes la// dran pa nyams dang le lo can// gtsang par lta
zhing gnas byed pa// de ni 'dod chags rnams kyis bcom// rlung gis mi brtan ljon shing bzhin// gang zhig dbang po legs bsdams shing// zas kyi tshodanangashes pa dang// so sor dran bzhin brten
'gus ldan// mi gtsang lta bas gnas byed pa// de na 'dod chags kyis ma tshoms// rlung gis ri bo ga yos pa bzhin// dgon pa dga' bar bya 'os pa// de la skye bo dga' yang// de la 'dod
chags bral ba dga'// 'dod pa tshel bar byed rnams mne/ dgon pa 'am yang na grong dag gam// gshong ngam thang budag kyang rang// gang na 'phags pa bzhugs pa yi// sa de yid du 'ong ba
yin/ dam pa nge nas snang 'gyur te// gangs can gyi re ba bzhin// ngan pa te langam snang ste/ mun khred mda'an 'phangs pa bzhin// mkhas pa donasems byed pa yi// dam pa nyid dang 'grogs
na// don chen 'gyur zhing zab mo la// shes rab so sor rtog pa 'gyur// gzhu yis mda' 'phangs bsnan pa yis// g.yul de'aglang chen ji bzhin du/ tshul 'chal skye kho
[' mang po las// ma snyan s pa bzod par bya// mgang tsam 'bigs byed pa dang/ dad pa medatsang byas zhi gza// go skabs bcomo dang skyags pa za// de skyes bu dam pa yazhi// pham dag na pasad
byas shing// rgyal po gtsang sbra can ganyis dang// yul 'khor 'khor dang bcas btseman// min dag par 'gyur zhes bya// gang dag kun tu sogs med cing// gang dag la zas yongs shes pa//
stong dngamtshan ma med pa dang// dben pa nyid kyi spyod yul can// de dag 'gro ba rtogs dka'aste// nam mkha' la ni phyi rjes bzhin// gang dag kun tu sogs med cing// gang dag la zas yongs shes pa/

stongadang mtshan ma med pa dang// rtag tu bsam gtan spyod yul can// dedag 'grob rtogs dka' ste// nam mkha' la ni bya rjes bzhin// gang dag kun tu sogs med cing// gang dag kha zas longs shes pa//

byed pas// gang dag ba rol 'ge byed pas// ma yo skye bo de dag nyung// gangadag legs par gsungs pa yi// chos la mis kyi rjes su lta// skye bo de dag skyo sha yi// mtsho chen la dka' ba de la 'gro// skyobs
tsha rab ta rnam grol zhing// dus 'das mya ngan bral ba dang// mdud pa thams cad sangs pa la// yongs su gdung ba yod mi 'gyur// 'jigs dang bcas pa'i lamargyalang// g.yang sa yongs su spangs pa

dang/ sbyor dang mdud pa las grol bas// 'dod chags kyizhi dug kun btsem// 'dod pa lta bu'i 'dam rdzab med// zhe sdang lta bu'i gdonomad do// gamug lta bu'i rgya mad do// srid pa lta bu 'au klung med//
nam mkha' la ni rjes lta bur// phyi rol pa la dge sbyong med// byis pa sgros la mngon par dga'// de bzhin gshegs la spros mi mnga'// sbyor bas byis pa khrid pa'i phyir// mkhas pa sbyor ba 'joms
par byed// mkhas pa lha dang ma dag gi/ sbyor ba kun dang bral ba'i phyir// sdugabasngal kun las grol bar 'gyur// 'byor ba las ni srod pa 'byung// sbyor ba med pas srid med pa'i// lam 'di gnyis n/
shes gyis la// sbyor bas rab tu bda'akhya'i phyir// ma khas pas de la bslab par gyis// nyes par spyad pa byas pas gdung 'gyurazhing// ngan 'gror song ba 'a 'og tu'ang gdung bar 'gyur// legs par bcad
bar byas pas dga' khyu zhing// bde 'gror song ba'i 'og tu'ang dga' bar 'gyur// phyi nas gdung 'gyur de byed pas/ zhes n zhes sbyang ma byas bla// gdung bar ma gyur de bya ste/ legs bsad
pabyas na rung// ma las dang byas pa 'dres pa las// ma sbas shes par ma 'gyurabs// zhi ba'i ge'aphang smos shig dang// skas pa yis rishis par 'gyur// legs bshad dung srong rgyal mtshan/
te/ drang srong rgyal mtshan chos yin pa// tshesan bshad pas gsal bya zhing// drang srong rgyal mtshan bsgrengs byas// ma smasanAlang smod byed cing// mang du smras n smod par byed// dal bus smras
kyang skyod byed de// 'ge rtaganan mo smad med// gag tu smad par bya ba dang// gcig tu bstod par bya ba yis// da ltar yod pa ma mAnete// byung bar ma gyur 'byung mi 'gyur// gang dag la ni ma khe nas
spros med cing/ gang dag kun sbyoragadung las rab log pa// thub pa sred bral de dag rgyu mdzad kyang/ ltas bcas 'jig rten rnams kyisama'i shes so// gang gso dad da nga tshul khrims dang// blo la phan
nim byung bar// jalta ji ltar rtogs gyur pa'i// shes pa can dgastod byed de// de dag sus kyang skad 'os mni// 'dzam bu zla ngeg gser rgyan bzhin// ji ltar ridang phrag dag na// rlung gis g.yos bar
mi 'gyuraltar// de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis// mkhas pa rab tu g.yo ba med// sa la gang gi rtswa med pa// lamed lcag phranag la yod// 'ching ba las grol brtan pa ste// jigasus kyang
'a@#// snyad 'osain// gang zhigargyalabasam tams shinged/ 'jig rtenas rgyal cung zad med/ sangs rgyas spyod lul mtha' las de// 'gro medagem pa gang gis bkra// gang zhing
kyi/ rgyal lasam nyams shing// 'jig rtenamargyal nyung zad med// sangs rgyas mathu rtsal mtha' yas te// 'gro medagem ba gang gsi bkri// gang la khrid byed srid pa'i// lul srid 'dra ba 'ga'amed pa//
sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas de// 'gro medagom pa gangags bkra// gang la khrid byed srid pa na// yul srid 'dra ba 'ga'amed pa// sangs rgyas mthu rtsalamatha' las de// 'gromadagom pa gang
gis bkri// gang zhig rnam par rtog pa rnams bsal cing// nang ga kun rnam par rtog med pa// kun tu sbyor dang gzugs dang 'du shes 'das/ rnal 'byor bzhadeng srol la skye ba med// sngon bral
phyi ma dang bral zhing// dbus khralasrid pa'i pha rol phyin// rnam pa kun lasasems grol ba// skyeg phyi ma 'dren ma 'gyur// thugs kyi tshoms te nyi shu dgu pago//rgyal la
las ni bon 'byung zhing// pha rol pham pa sngag bsngal 'thob// rgyal dang pha rol pham spangs n// nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba 'thob// gzhan la sdug bsngal bskyed pa yis// gang zhig bdag gi bde
'dod pa// dgra dang mi 'bral 'gregs pa dang// dezhisdug bsngal las ma 'grol// bde ba 'dod phyir 'byung bo la// gang zhig 'tshozhang tshad pas gcod// bdag gi bde ba 'dod pa de// phalo
du na ba de ma 'gyur// gang zhig bde ba 'dod pa dag/ 'byung bo lan mi 'tshe nga// chad pas ma gtsed bde 'dod pa// de dag pha rol bde ba 'thob// chos spyod legs par spyad bya zhing// nyes par

spyad pa de ma spyad// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// chos spyad pas ri de ba 'thob// tshes la legs spyod bde bskyed pas// chos spyod chos kyis bsrung bar bya// chos spyodangan 'gror ma 'gro ba// chos
la legs spyod phan lon de'o// yas pa gdugs kyis dbyar ka ltar// chos sbyong chos kyis bsrung bar bya// chos spyod ka'agre'oma'agrob// chos la legs spyod phan lon de'o// bgamed mi
bas chos min sbyang nan// 'gro ba gang yang rung pa'i m ngan 'gror 'gro// 'di la sprulanag/danas bzung ba ltar// chos min spyod pa de dag brlag par 'gyur// chos dang chos mazhiganyis ka ya/
rnamasman 'dra bar ma gyur te// chos ma lanibasadmyal bar 'gro// chos kyis bde 'gro thob par byed// sbyin pa khyed pas dus dang g.yul 'gyed dus/ rgyu las longs su bzung bar 'du bas
sbyin pa byed dang g.yul 'gyed 'dra zhes gsungs/ yon tanade gnyis ma n gnas nyen ma byed// shin tu legs par mas ras gcig lus kyang// legs par ma chas 'phyes las rgyal byed
ltar/ gal te dad bskyod chung dubyon pas kyang// des nadedag gzhan ngabade bar 'gyur// 'di na lan brgyar g.yul bzlogadaba' ba bas// ser snadagrar gyur zil gyis mnan nas su// gang
zhig gsamedasems kyis sbyin byed pa// dedagachesadapa' yin par sa gsungs so// bsod nams rnam smin bde ba ste// man par bsam pa 'byor par byed/ myur
kangazhape dam pa yi// mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur// bsod nyams byed pa rnams lani// gzhan las byung ba'i gnod pa dang// lhadangabadud kyi i rnams kyis// bar chad bya ba ma nus so// gal
te sdug bsngal zad bya'i phyir// 'phags dang shes pas gtong ldan la// de yis 'bad rtsol byas zhani// lhag mthong gisanarig par 'gyur// somasa'ib tu nam dang bas/ chos la dga' byed de
ba 'thob// 'phags pas gsungs pa bzhis dag la// mkhas pa rtag tu dga' bar byed// gang dag sems ni bsam gtana dga'// gang zhig skye meda dga'ab dang// napa tapar gzhag bzhiring
byang chub yan lag bdun dag dang/ rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi mas dang// yan lag brgyad lam gang dga' ba// de dag chos gos 'tshang ba dang// bsod snyoms bde bar za bar byed// de dga' dang nag
tshalan// bde bar 'achags par byed pa dang// ded gabade 'thob bde ba ni// mthong ba'i tshes la chu sha'ada'// khanadang 'jigs pa kun 'das shing// 'jig rten lul gyi sride'as rgal// sa
thos pa dang mthong ba dang// dben par dga' ba bde ba ste// 'jig rten srog chags 'byung po la// 'tshemed la/nga dag sdoms pa bde// 'dod ba rnams las rab 'das shing// mgi rten 'dod chag
bral ba bde// nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dug/ ba tul ba de dag mchog tu bde// rgas khar tshul khrims ldan pa bde// dad la rab zhu gnas pa bde// na ldan tshig la dga' ba bde// sdig pa byed pa dag bde
'ag rtenan par 'dzani bde/ de bzhinam la nga 'dzin pa bde/ 'jig rten dge sbyong 'dir bde// de bzhin bram zer 'dzin pa bde/ sangs rgyas rnams na'i byung ba bde// d bzhi nitshos rnams bstan pa bde
dge 'dun rnams 'thun pa bde// 'thun pa rnams kyidaka thub bde// tshul khrims ldan pa mthong ba bde// mang du thos pa mthong ba bde// yang srid rnam par grol ba yi// dgra bcom pa dag mthong ba
bde// 'jug ngogs bde ba'i chu klung bde// chos kyis rgyal kha'i skyo ba bde// shes rab thob par 'gyur ba bde// nga 'ong rgyal zad pa bde// 'phags pa rnams na mthong ba bde// dam pa dag dang 'grogs
ba bde// byis pa rnams nama mthong an// rtag tu bde ba nyid du 'gyur/ rnam pa kun tu dag 'dra ba'i// byas dang 'grogs pa sngagabasngal zhing// byis ba dag dang 'grogs byed pa// yun ri rjes su
'gyod par 'gyur// skyes bu cang shes dkon pa ste// de dag kun tu 'abyungam yani// brtan pa rnams dang 'grogs pa dag/ gnyenudang phrad pa lta khurab de// gang du brtan pa de skyes pa// de yi rigs
gsobade ba 'thob// bram ze na 'das pa dag/ rnam pa kun tu bde bar 'dug/ gangazhig 'dodo bas ma gos shing// zagamed rab tu rnamagrolas// srid pa thams cad gtubs pa dge/ skor
la sa 'anyisand rnam par basal// sems kyis zhape thob pa rnams// nye bar zhi zhing bde bar 'dug/ gang zhig bde bar las 'dod cing// bde ba chung du gtong 'dod pa'i
brtan pas bde chu spang byas na/ bde ba la ngas pa legs par mthong// 'ag rten 'dod bdegang lanadang// lha yul pa de ba gang yin pas/ sred pa zad pa'i bde ba de'i// bcu drug char yang ma bod do
'khaM khur byas sdug bsngal sbyangs pas na// khur bor nan bde bar 'gyur// lcaba'i khur dag nge sa bodon// phyi nas gzhan dag len ma 'gyur// kun sbyor thams cad zad bya'i phyir// sred pa thams cad
tshungs tu spangs// phung bo thams cad yongs shes na// srid pa phyi mar 'gro bamed// denams bskrun pa lan grogs ldan bde// srog dag rab tu gtugs la bsod nams bde// ngan ngon tsam
gyis legs par chog shes bde/ sdug bsngal phams cad nges par nub pa bde// 'din men 'bar ba'o// lcags kyi phebs brgyab pa yis// mi gyis nye bar 'gyur te// ltar song bas shes
ltar/ 'dod pa'i 'dam rdzab chu rgal cing/ go'ayang mag po theb pa dang// legs par rnam par grol rnams kyi// 'gro ba gdags su med pa lani// gang zhig khongon 'khrugs pa med pa dang/
gang zhig srid dang srideman las log pa// de dag 'jigs bral bde zhing mya ngan med/ lhasakyang blta zhing bsal dumed pa 'gyur// 'di na gang dag tshes mang thos pa dang// gas shang rang

med pakya'i bde// skye bskyo ba'i u0f7a u0f7a lus la rab chags shing// cung zad yod pa brlag par gyur la ltos// 'di gang dag tshosamang thos pa dang// gsangashinge tsa yi nga med pa kye re bde// skya goskye
bo'i lus la rab chags shing// cung zad yod pa brlag par gyur la ltos// skya bo tsa mid yon tan rtogs pa dang// skye bo co la nga ma dpar gyur pa bde// skye bo skye bo'i sems lar ba chags shing//

cung zad yod pa brlag par gyur la ltos// skye bo tsamid lonatan rtogs pa dang// skyabatsa yang yod par gyur pa bde// skyo ba skyo bo'i ng+ge lus la rab chags shing// cung zad yod pa brlag par gyur la ltos//
gzhan gadebang gyur kun sdug ste// rangadabang yodapa thams cad bde// sbyor ba shin tu spras dka' ba// thun mong tshurapas brlag par zad// zhen par gyur pa'i min na// zhen pa med pa/ra gnas pa dang/
zhen pa'inangan ma zhen par// kye ma'o shani bde bar 'tsho// nad kyis thebs pa'i menang na/ nad med pa nanas pa dang// nad pa'i nang na nad med pa// kye ma 'o shin tu bdeb 'tsho// 'tshob
gumo nangan/ 'tsho ba med par gnas pa dang// 'tsho ba'i nang na 'tshe med pa// khyema'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho// gnod sems can gyi moneng na// gnod sems med par gnas pa dang// gnod
sems can nang gnodamadab// kyema'o shin tubadeb 'tsho/ sha khornacan gyim nen// sha khonamed par gnas pa dang/ sha khonacan nang khon med pa// kye ma'o shin tu bde bar 'tsho// mtsho la//
dag rab bsregs kyang/ nga'atsal nga tshig lamed// ngalagang dag tsamad bas/ tshema'oshin tubade bar khatshe// ngalatsa yang medamod kyi// dga' ba za bar byed pas

sdug bsngal gyis// skyes bu dam pa mtho dman ma 'gyur zhing// brtan rnams 'dod pa 'i rgyu las oM 'khyil bar// skyes bu dam pa kun tu 'gro bar byed// bde ba'i tshoms te sum cu ma lo/
chedadu brjod pa'i tshoms bam po bzhi pa sa tham ba zung bar dka' zhing yang ba dang// gang du dga' bar 'gro ba la// sems dul ba ni legs pa
ste/ sems dul ba yas bdaba'adren/ bdud kyi gzhu dag sbyong ba na// tshubo'a gnas nias rab bton te// thang la bdo ba'anyi ltakhur// bdag gsomasazhayisasugayo// nyis lasan bod zer ltar
bdagag sems nasosor chug/ de dgamakhas pas nges bzlogs// lcags kyu yas nagling chen bzhin// nga la donomed spyod ba dang// bltar med snying bo med pa des// rtag tu gdul bar bya ba'i
phyir// sems de nange skya'o// sems 'di sngon chad ji ltar 'dod pa dang// dga' dgur spyod cing rgyu bar byed pa dag/ glang chen myos lam las lcags kyu ltar// dezhatshul bzhin byas pas de

gzungang// khang khyim byed pa 'di yin// rang yang skyeba'asdug bsngal can// skyeba'a'a'a'o pa dum zhige/ da ltar phan chad khyedakyas byung// khang khyig byed pa khyoda mthong bas// khyim gyi khe dung
chen rnams bcom la// phyams rnams thams cad bca gnas su/ tshun chad khyim byed ma gzhug go/ sems 'du byed dang phral nas// 'di nyid lanazid par 'do// sems ni g.yo zhing ban
pa ste// ring du 'gro zhing bzlog dka' pa// mda'a mkhanam yas srong ba ltar// yid gzhungs pa las bsrung bar bya// gang zhige lus med phugan gnas// gtsag turgyu zhing rang 'gro ba/ sems
dgadul bar byed pa na// 'jigs pa che las thar bar 'gyur// log ba'i smon ldan sems gang gsi// bdag 'di sdug bsngal m 'gyur ba// de ltar bon gyis zho canodang// dgrabs dgra la'ang
byed ma 'gyur/ yang dag smon lam sems gang gis// bdag nyid bde bar byed 'gyurab// de ltar yadangam dag dang// gnyen gzhan gyis kyang byed ma'agyur// ltar khang steng g.yog nyesan//
char pa longasasu 'dzag pa ltar/ der zhin sems ni ma bsgoms pa// 'dod chagasa rnams kyis yongasasu btsem/ jaltar khang steng g.yog le gsan// char pa rnam par m 'dzag pa// de
bzhin 'gas par bsgoms pasims// 'dod chags rnams kyis re ngas mtshims/ dzaltar lang ste la/log tesan// char pa yongs su 'dzag pa ltar// de bzhin
kasams nas bsgoms pa// zhesngang rnams kyis longs su btsem// dza ltar khang steng g.yog legasan// char pa rnam pa ma 'dzag pa// de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i las//

legs par bsgoms pa'i soms// nga rgyal rnams kyis yongasam tshems// ji ltar khang stengagalog tesan// man pa longs su 'dzag pa ltar// de bzhin sems nam bsgoms pa// chags
pa rnams kyis yongs su bcom// dziltar khang steng g.yog legasan// char pa rnam par yaM 'dzag pa// de bzhin legs par bsgoms pa'i soms// chags ba rnams kyis lo ngas ma tshoms//
0 dza ltar khang steng g.yog nyesan// char pa yongs su 'dzug pa ltar// de bzhin sems ma bsgoms pa// srid pa rnams kyis yongs su bcom// jalas khang steng g.yog legasan/ char ba rnam
pa dzam 'dzag pa/ de bzhin 'dogs par bsams lagasems/ gsar pa rnams kyis long mos/ chos kyisond pad 'gos sa la gogs pa ba'i tsho ses ma'ang
gtugs pa las// snas sam langan byas kyang rung// de yis de nasdug bsngal 'thob// 'khor los mgo bo bcad pa bzhin// chos kyi sngon du lad 'gro ste// 'di mgyogs pa/den gtso bo yin
gal te yid rab dang ba yis// smasasam langan byas kyang rung// de yis de be de ba thob// grib ma rjes su 'brang ba bzhin// brtsad pached cher 'dzin pa dang// sems nanyon mongs gyur pa yis//
glags skabs tshol bar byed pa yis// legs bshad legs par ma shes so// sngang pa'i m yang na 'khrug pa 'am// dad pa med pa'i sems dag gis// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa las
dam chos kun shes mi nus so// gang gas bag med sems dngan/ khro ba rnam par btul ba dang// 'din gnodasams rab yangs pa/ des n yigs par bshad pa shes// sems kyi brtan ba
med pa las// daa tshesa rnam par shes mi 'gyur// dad pa 'gyur ldog byed pa yis// shes rab yongs surdzogs ma 'gyur// kun rtog la chums rten ba ma// lta ngan sum dum drug gis//
chu bo'i rgyananagang yin pa// lad kyi rgyun las rab tu 'bab// dga' sems dbang po phal pa dang// sems kyi rjes 'brang shan pa yi// mi de'ags 'grab 'bras lhag

kaM gong med pas khyedanamangu zhig/ ldang ba'i dus tshe 'dug par byed pa dang// lang tshostobs ldan ma 'bad khyim 'dug dang// bsam pa rdzogAtshel la byed pa yi// mi yi se shes rab lam rtogs
mi 'gyur ro// phran tshogs rnam rtog zhib mor rnam rtog pas// nang na gnas pa'i yo de ni g.yon yang spyod// yod kyi rnam rtog de dag ma shis na// 'khrul sems yang dang yang du rgyug par byed/
gang zhig dran ldan nas 'byed pa tshon pa dang// rnam par rtog la mkhas pas de shes na// nang na gnas pa'i yi den g.yon skyod pa// thams cad ma lus blo yis rab tu spong// lus 'di bum pa
'dra bar rtogs byas shing// grong khyer 'drab 'asims kyis srin btsugs nas// shes ba mtshon gyis bdud dang yul sdad de// btul nas gnas med par na bsrung bar bya// 'jig rten 'di
dag bum par 'dra rtogs shing// de bzhin chos rnams smig rgyu 'drar shesanas// shes rab mtshon gyis kha dud dang bag tshul sdud de// btul nas gnas med par bsrung bar bya// lus 'di da du ba
03 'dra bar rtogs byas shange// grong khyer 'dra ba'i sems kyis sran btsugs nas// shes ba mtshon gyis bdud dag yul sprad de// btul nas gnas med par na bsrung bar bya// 'jig rten 'di
dag dbub 'drar rtogs shing// grong khyer 'dra ba'i soms kyis sranabatsugs nas// shes rab mtshon gyis bdud dang g.yul sprad de// brtul nas gnas med par bsrungabar bya// gang gso byang
chub yan lag bdun// sems kyis legs par bsgoms pa dang// gang zhig len la mi dga' zhing// len par ba tu sbyangs pa dang// zag zad skyon rnams bsal ba de// 'jig rten
dganamya ngan 'das// gang zhigegayagarnga'i rtse mo ltar// rang gsems nas bsrung zhing// 'byung po rnams la blta byed pa// de ni bde ba yong mi nyams// gang phyiri glang bo'i glang po che
mche ba bzang ba'i glang chen dang/ sems dang sems ni mnyam pas na// de phyir gcig bu nags su dgyes// gangag yid la gnod med cing'// 'byung po kun la brtse ba dang// 'byung po kun 'khyaA
byed pa// de lanams kyang len mi 'gyur// gangal gnod pa 'isimasamed cing// 'byung po kun la brtse ba dang// srog chags kun lakhyams byed pa// de lanams kyang len mi 'byung// gang
la gnod pa sems med cing// 'byung po rnams la brtse ba dang// sems can kun la byams byed pa// de la nams kyang lo ma 'gyur// mdza' bshes kun dang 'grogs kun dang// 'byung
bo kun la brtse ba dang// byams pa'i sems zhi bsgoms byas kyang// bde ba shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur// gal te gang zhig srog chags 'ga' la'ang sngangamed sems//
ka 1 byams par byed na de yas de na dge ba yis// sems can thams cad la ni yid kyis brtse byas na// bsod nams phal chen 'phags pas rab tu sgrub par 'gyur// mgang dga' khasoms
dngan// zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis su// dge ba'i tshes la sgom byed pa// grub pa dang na bde ba 'thob// yang dag shes pas rnam grol zhing// skyo ba nye bar zhi gyur ba// de las paden

gang yin ting 'dzin la dga' ba// dedag 'dod pas rtsi mi byed// gang zhig cung zad gdung ma du pa'i// skyob pa bde bar nyal bar 'gyur// gang yade tang 'dzani la dga' ba// de dag bdod pas
na ma byed// gang zhig cung zad gadung med pa'i// thub paskyema'od ga' bar 'gyur// gang gsems ni brag lta bur// rab tu g.yo ba med 'dug pa// chags pa 'a gnas la mi gnas te//
khro ba'i gnas la 'khrug med par// gang 'ded ltarigyur pa de// sdug bsngal thob par ga la 'gyur// skur lami gdab gnadam phye// soserathar pas bsdam par bya// zas 'di tshod kyang

dang/ rab drang sems pa 'a 'grus skyong can// zang zing med pa'i dga' ba myong// gang zhig la d gzhungs bden ngaga' bden gnas pas// rtag tu rang ga lus kyi skyod lam dang// sna dang yid
ni srung bar byed pa de// mya ngan spong zhing sdug bsngal thobam 'gyur// ma bsrungs pa la sems dag ni// log par lta bas bcom pa dang// gnyid dang rmugs ris zil chen pa// bdud kyi
dbang du 'gro bar 'gyur// de bas sems nibasrung byas te// yang dag lta bas mdun bdar cing// yang dag kun rtog spyod yul can// yang dag skyo dang 'jigs pa shes// gnyid dang rmugs pa
zil gnono pa ba/ dge slong sdug bsngal zad pa 'the'o// bag yodasems ni bsrung ba dang/ sems dul yang dagasdom pa bde// skye dgu sems kyis bslus pa dag/ gcig tu sems can

bdang// sems dul yang dgasdom pa bde// skye dgu sems kyis bslus pa dag/ gcig tu yodagasa rnams su 'tshod// bag lod sems ni bsrung ba dang// sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde//
skye dgusems n bsrung ba dag/ gcig tum yin du dga'// bag yod sems n bsung ba dang// sems dul yang dag sdom pa bde// skye dgu rnams n pe srung ba dag/

min// dge slong 'dod pa kun spangs shing// mdun na gnas pa'i rdul gsal dang// bdag med thub pa brtan pa yis// gzhan la sla bar byaa tigos// skye bo ma bsdoms tshig gas gnod byed pa//
mi bzad brjod pa'i tshig de thos gyur kyang// dge slong snang sems bral la ci ma snyam// g.yul der glang chen mada' yis bsnun pa bzhin/ skye bo ma bsdams tshig gas gnod byed pa// ma bzad brjod
pa'i tshig de thes gyur kyang// dge slong yid legs gzhag la cam snyam// g.yul ri glang chen mada' yis bsnun pa bzhin// bzo yaMsam 'tsho yang zhing bdag la dga'// dbang po dul dang kun las/

bag bsha' bya ba dang// spyod yul tsho ga mkhas par bya// lag pa legs bsdams rkang ba legs bsdams dang// tshig rnams legs bsdams dbang po legs bsdams shing// gcig pu nang du/
mnyam par 'jog la dga'// chog shes de nadage slong yin zhes gsung// dge slong chos la kun dga' zhing// chos dga' tshes la sems pa dang// tshes la rjes su dren pa dag/ chos las yongs
su nyams ma 'gyur// dge slong khang stong zhugs nas su// nang la lta bar byed pa dang// chos rnams legs pa mthong bdag/ lul dga' dang ldan par 'gyur// lta ji ltar byung bo la// skye
dang 'jig par legs rtogs pa// de lta de ltar de las ni// dga' dang mgu ba nyid kyang 'thob// dge slong dga' ba ma nga bo las// sdug bsngal zad pa thob par 'gyur// ji ltar brag gi ri bo dag rlung
gis rab tu mi g.yos ltar// de bzhin dge slong 'dod chags dag/ zad pa kun tu rab m g.yo// ji ltar brag ga'i bodag/ rlung gis rab tu ma grwa los ltar// de bzhin dge slong zhe sdang dag/ zad pa kun
tur bam galo// ji ltar khrag gi ri bo dag/ rlung gis rab tu mig yos ltar// de bzhin dge slong gtilug dag/ zad pa kun tu rab m ga yo// ji ltar brag gir bo dag// rlung gisarab tu mi g.yo sa ltar//
de bzhin dge slong nga rgyal dang// zad pa kun tu pham g.yo// lta'akhrag gi'o ba dag/ rlung gis btum g.yos ltar// de bzhin dge slong chags pa dag/ zad pa kun tu ra bzhi
g.yo// jaltar brag gir bdag/ rlungagasarab tu ma g.yos ltar// de bzhin dge slong srid padag/ zad pa kun tu rab mgayo// gangal kun sogs med tsange// gang la bdag ga'i byed med na/
gang dag menang ma gdung ba// denadege slong zhes barjod de// re zhigagazhan la slong ba ma// jig dge slongamed pa snyam/ greng pa'i tshisana'adzin byed pa// ja gdage slong man pa snyam// gang
zhig dag dang sdig pa dag/ rab sangs tshangs par spyod ldan shing// sde tshogs spangs nas spyod byed pa// de na dge slong zhes brjod do// dge slong gang zhig byams gnas shing// sangs rgyas bstan
la rab dang ba// des ni b.labasam ngoms pa'i// zhiba'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur// dge slong gang zhige byams gnas shing// sangs rgyas bstan pa rab dang des// 'du byed nyer zhi zho ba las//
zhiba'igi 'a yang thob bar 'gyur// dge slong gang zhig byamasa gnas shing// sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang bas// des na kun sbyor kun zad pa// argyas mngon sum byed par 'gyu// dge slong gang
zhig byams gnas shing// sangs rgyas bstan la rab dang bas// bdag nyid ngan 'gro las 'dren te// 'dam rdzab las ni klong chen bzhin// dge slong gang zhig byams gnas shing

tu ba'i phyir// yongs su nyams 'gyur masrided// sams dga' yid n bzang ba dang// dga' dang mi dga' zil gnon pa'i// dge slong dga' ba mang po yis// sdug bsngal zad pa thob par
'gyur// lus zhingegan zho be dang// sems zhalegs par atam gzhagatsang// 'jig rten zang zing slas pa la// dge slong nyizhi yin zhes brjod// ting 'dzin med la shes rab med// shes
rab med la ting 'dzin med// shes rab ting 'dzin ldan pa des// dge slong yin zhes brjod par bya// de bas ting 'dzin shes rab la// mkhas pa rnams kyis 'jug bya ste// de bzhin shesal
dge slong gi/ dang por bya ba 'di yonen// tshog shes dbang po bsdams bya zhing// so so thar pas bsdams par bya// zas 'di'i tshod kyang shes par bya// bsamatha'adagon par gnas bya zhing
lcag pa sems la rnal 'byor bya// 'dazhes ngs rgyas bstan pa yin// gang ga lus dang ngag dang na// lade 'anyes byas med gyur ba// de na dge ba'i tshul khrims can// ngo tsha'i yid ldan dge
slong yin// gang gis rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi// phyogs tshes bdun legs bsgoms pa// de ni dge ba'i chos can te// mnyam gzhag dge slong yane zhes gsungs// 'di ni gang zhigabadag
nyid kyi// sdug bsngal zad 'bu shes la// dge zhing shes rab ldan pa de// zad med duge slong yin zhes gsung// zag pa zad pa ma thob na// tshul khrims brtul
zhugs can dag gam// langan pas lo mang bo 'am// dben pa dag tu gnas kyang rung// ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur kyang ngal// gdeng dod ched pa'i dge slongamani// phung re lan bdag zer ba'i//
tsha 'jig rten 'di dag gdung ba skye// rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde ba ni// 'phags pas nga ston pa mngon du bya// lta dzaltar ba sams byas pa// de ltade ltar gzhan du 'gyur// gzhan du 'gyur ba'i
'ag rten 'di// srid pa la chags srid la dga'// srid la mno chags srid la lta// sred pa nyid la ma zho par dga'// dga' bya gang yin desdug bsngal// skyi g.ya' gang yin de bde pas/
srid pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir// 'di'i tshangs par spyod paso// dge sbyong bram ze ji snyed pa// sred pas srade las nges 'byung zer// de dag thams cad srid pa las// nges byung man shes brjod

'chos med cing rtog mad gnas// rig byed mthar phyin tshangs par spyod pa spyad// dus su ska byed de 'tshengs pa smra// gang zhagasmra lam gnas nga rgyalamed// gang zhig chags med bdag chod re ba med//

par nga mis// yongs su 'dzin med len med pa// bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so// gang zhig lus dang ngag dang na// 'ad kyi nyis byas ma byed cing// gang zhig gnas gsum legs bsdams//
bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so// gang gi tshig dag ma rtso pa cing// go byed yid 'ong smra ba dang// gang gis nyon mongs ma skyed de// bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so// gang zhig gsod 'ching gsho ba
dang// sdang ba'am la bzod byed de// brjed pa'i brtul zhugs stobs tshog sacan// bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so// khro ba med tsang tshul khrims can// brtul zhugs ldan 'ang sems
khral med// dul zhing lus mthar gnas pa de// bram za yin par ngs gsungs so// gang zhige rab byung byas pa dang// de bzhin gnyis karama'adre zhing// 'dod chung khyim nas ma byung de//
bram ze yin par gsusaso// ma 'ongs pa la mgo ma dga'/ 'das pa rnams la gdung med pa// 'khrig pa'i sbyorakhralagayul rgyal te// khramaze yin par s gsungs so// ma 'ongs pa
lamano mi dga'// 'jus lagadung med rdul bral zhing// zhi ba mu named pa de// bram ze bzhi par ngasagasungs so// gang zhig 'dod chung gzhan ma gso// dul zhing snyi'i
bor rab gnas la// zag zad skyon rnams bsal ba de// bram ze lane par ngas gsungasaso/ gang zhig pha rolatshurol dang// pha rol tshurel gtusemed cing/ tshes rnams kun gyisa mthar/
phyin te// bram ze pa ni par ngas gsungs so// gang zhig pha la tshul dang// dza lo tshu rel gtas med cing// gang zhig gnas gsum ma chags de// bram ze yin pa rangs gsungs so//
gang zhig thung dang rang ba dang// phra sbom dge dang mi dge dang// 'jig rten cung zad m len de// bram ze ran par s gsungs so// gang zhig 'di de rab shes shing// rang gi sdug bsngal zad pa
dang 'dod chags bral zhing ma ldan de// bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so// gang zhig dge dang sdige pa dang// gnyis ka las kyang ma gos pa// gos med rdul bral zhi bde// bram ze yin
bar ngas gsungs so// gang zhige dge dang sdig pa la// chags gang yin de rab 'das shing// chags las rab 'das rnam grel de// bram ze yin par sagasungs so// gang zhig sngon ngang phyim
dang// dbus kyang lodapam yin pa// rdulakhral 'ching ba las grol te// bram ze yin par ngas gsungasaso// pad+ma'i 'dab 'chu ltar dang// sbyang bu'al yungs kar ltar// gang zhig sdug
lam bo/nas de// bram ze yin par ngas gsungasaso// pad+ma'i 'dab latshu ltar dang// smyung yu'u la yungs kar ltar// gang zhig 'dod la ma gnas de// bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so// dpa'

'dabal chu ltar dang// rlung bu'i rtse la yungs kar ltar// srid la dga' ba yong su spangs te// bram tha yin par ngas gsungs so// zla ba drag cing dri med la// skyon bral rab tudang ba ltar// gangazhige
sreg pas ma gos te// bram M ze yin par sa gsusaso// zla ba dbatsang dri med pa// skyon sprul pa tu da nga pa ltar// gang zhig 'dod pas ma gos te// bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so// zla bdag
cing drai da la// skyon bral 'batudang ba ltar// srid la dga' ba yongs spangs te// bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so// 'dam rdza ba kyis namakha' ltar dang// rdul gyis zla ba dza le bar// gang zhig/
sdig pas ma gos te// bram ze yazhe ngar ngar ba/ ngaso// 'dam rdzab kyi namakhaltar dang// rdul gyis zla ba ji lta bar// gang zhig 'dod bsam gis tu/ bram ze yazhi par ngas gsungs so//
'dam rdzab kyis ni mkha' ltar dang// rdul gyis zla ba ji lta bar// srid la dga' ba yongs srongasade// bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so// gang zhig 'dug nas rdul bral ba// sems shing zag zad bya ba
byas// dul zhing lus mtha'a gnas pa de bram ze ran pa las gsungs so/['] shes rab zab cing yid gzhungs la// lam dang lam man rnams la mkhas// gang zhig don mchog rjes theb de// ma
za @#// ze yin par sagasungasaso/ min gang yang rung ba dag/ slosayo tsam gyis 'tshe ba dang// bdag medasul gnodam byed// brtan ldan tshangs par sbyod pa na// kun shes spyod phyi/
ka chos ston te// bram ze yin par sagasungs so// gang zhig 'dod pa legs pas shang// khyim med par nir ba byung ste// 'dod pa'i zag ba mos thad de// bram ze ya langasagasusaso// 'gro
dang na gnas pa yi// 'byung po chad pasam gecodacing// gsodaed gsod du ma 'jug de// bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so// gang zhig mimathun 'thun byed cing/ chad pas gcod pa dang du len// 'byung
po rnams la brtse phand// bram ze yin par gsungs so// sbyang bu'i rtse la lungs kar ltar// gang zhige 'dod chags zhe sdang dang// nga rgyal 'chab pa 'choms pa de// bram ze lan par sag sus
so// gang zhig srid pa'i rdzong 'dingang// 'khor ba'i klong las rab rgalaM zhing// brgalanas la rol 'grobar sems// bded nyid kyisazhimo bkra shing// gang zhig len pa las legade// bram ze lan par sa
gsungs so// gang zhig 'jig rten 'di din// pha rol la yang sridamed cing// srid pa'i srid pa longs zad de// ma ze yin par s gsungs so// gang zhig 'jig rten 'din// pha rol la yang
chags med cing// chags med rnam par bral ba de// bram ze yin par ngas gsungasaso/ dga' dangam dga' spangs pa dang// bsal bar gyur cing thag khamed// 'jig rten kun zil gnon ba rtan de//
bram ze lan par ngas gsungs so// ma ya sbyor ba spangs nas su// lha yi sbyor ba rab 'das shing// sbyor ba kun dang rnam bral de// bram ze yin par dus gsungs so// gang zhige lca dang du ze dang
ma yi 'gro ba mi shes shing// zhi ba 'gro pa ma reshas re// bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so// gang gis tshes rnams m shes pas// ma mthong ban med gyur la// shes bya mtha' yas blta ba de//
bram ze yin pa dngasag susaso// gang gsesngon gyi gnas rtogs shing// mtho angan song mthong ba dang// de nas skye bzad thob pa'i/ thub pa mngon shes la brtson pa// sngag bsngal tha mar pa she
de// bram ze lan bas gsungs so// sems kyi rnam grol shes pa dang/ da'adod chags kun las grol ba dang// rig pa gsum dang ldan pa de// bram ze yin par ngs gsungs so// gang gi nges se/
can 'achi ba bo dang/ skye ba thams cad rtogs gyur pa// thogs med spyan ldan sangs rgyas de// bram ze yin par ngs gsungs so// gang shage kun sbyor kun 'dus shing// yongs sugadung ba med pa dad

dga' med dran ldan ston pa de// bram ze yin par ngas gsungasaso// thub pa rnam rgyal drang srong che// khya mchog rab a tshog glang po che// bkur byed khrus byas sangs rgyas de// bram ze lan par ngasagasus
so// gang zhig srid 'asakun zil gnon// chu babs na la rnam par 'dren// rnam grol la rol phyin pa di// bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so// sdig can rnam par ma sems shing// mi sgom smra bar mi
zaka @#// byed par// 'dug nas rdul bral sems pade// bram ze ran bar sagasungs so// gang zhig phyag dar khrod 'chang zhing// ngetsho shes shing 'dod ma lta// shing drung dag tu gnas pa de//
ka! bram ze ni khar sagasasaso// gang zhig sdug bsngal kun spang phyir// zhi ba 'bags lan lan lag brgyad// drang po sgom par byed pa de// bram ze yin par ngas gsungasaso// gang la cung zad gnas
brtsamed cing// 'du shes ladeganyis zug rdumed// 'aid go 'phang thob pa de// bram ze yin par sa gsungasaso// gang zhig lus med phugan gnas// gcig pu rgyu zhing rid 'gro/ gdul bar dka' ba'i
sams dul de// bram ze yin par ngas gsungasaso// gang zhige gzugs medu bltar med mtha' las la// shin tu blta'amed phra zhing gzhi mngon rtogs// rtag dran kun sbyor thad rgyu sangs rgyas la/ bi
rten 'din dazhi khram ze yin// gangags sogasamag 'ching gtubs te// changesaargyang thag bcad nas su// yongasasugadung spaasangs rgyas de/ bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so// gang gis red
kyi 'dod sdig can dang/ sogs mig chings yagatubs gyugatsang/ sred pa rtsad bcad drungs phyung de// bram ji yin par ngas gsungs so// brtson pas chu bo'i rgyun bcad cing// 'dod pa thams cad rab b
dang/ 'du byed rnams kyi zad shes pa// sdigamedagang na bram ze yin// bad nga ma ni bsad byas shing// rgyal ba gtsang sbra can gnyis dang// yul 'khor 'khor dang bcas bcos pa// sdigamed/
ba zhigang lan bram ze lani// khadang mnabasad byas shing// rgyal po gtsang sbracan ganyasedang// mi bzad pa bstag bsad pa// sdig med gang yan bram ze yan// gang zhige bram ze rdeg pa blun// skyod
par byed bde dngan pas// bram ze rnams la brdeg mo// bram ze bskrad par mi bya'o// gang zhig chos rnams rnam shes na// rgan nam yang na gzhon yang rung/ de la bkur zhing phyag bya ste// bram ze
gtsang masazhe bzhin no// gang zhige chos rnams rnam shesan// rgananem langanag zhen yang rung// de la bkur zhing bsnyonabakur te// bram zeg tsangamasamabazhinano// gang zhigegs pa'isangs rgyas
kyis// bstanapa'itshes rnams rnam shesan// de la bkur zhing phug bya ste// bram ze gtsang masam bzhin no// gang zhig rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// bstan pa'i chos rnams rnam shes na//
da la bkur zhing bstan pa kur te// bram zegatsang mas me bzhin ne// gang zhig bras the tshos rnams kyi// pha rol phyin par gyur pa na// de tshe sha za ba ku la// gcig po las kya shin tu 'das// gang

tsho bram ze chos rnams kyi// pha rol phyin par gyur na// de nas des mthong tshor ba rnams// thams cad nub pa nyid du gyur// gang tshe bram ze tshes rnams kyi// pha rol phyin par gyur pan// de tshe de le
mthong bas na// rkyena rnams thams cad nub par gyur// gang tshe bram ze chos rnams kyi// pha rol phyin par gyur pan// de tshe de las mthong bsan// kun sbyor thams cad nub par gyur/ gang tshe bram/
[ra/]@#// ze chos rnams kyi// kharol phyin par gyur pan// de tsheskye dang rga ba dang// 'chib rnams las shin tu bdas// taMnemo tshu e gsal bar byed// mtshan zla ba snang byed ltar//
kan rgyalarages go chas chas pagasal// bram zesams par byed na gsal// nyin mo nyi ma gsal bar byed/ mtshan mo dru bsnang byed ltar// rtag tu sangs rgyas gzi brjid che// nyin dangamtshan dugs

wa bar byed// ji ltar mi sdug pa las lade ldog pa// de 'dra bram ze rnams la nyung zad med// jaltaji ltar de yi lade ldog pa// de lta de ltar kun rdzogs bden par zad// gang tshe bram ze brtson pas si mA
pa na/ gang gis chos rnams rgyur bcas la shes pa// tshes 'di rnams la rab tu 'byung 'gyur te// de tshe de la som nyami lus spong// gang tshe bram rje brtson pas sems pa na// gang gis sdug bsngal
rgyurab cas ra ba shes pa/ chos 'di rnams la rab tu 'byung 'gyur te// de tshe de la som nyin lus stong// gang tshe bram ze brtson pas sems pa na// gang gis tsher ba zad par theb 'gyur ba// chos 'di
rnams la rab tu 'khyung 'gyur te// de tshed yasom nyi ma lus spong// gang tshe bram ze brtson pas 'bad pa na// gang gis rkyen rnams zad pa thob 'gyur ba// chos 'di rnams la rab tu 'byung 'gyur te//
de tshe de la som nyame lus spong// gang tshe bram ze bzhi pa sasems khan// gang gis thag pa thad pa theb 'gyur pa// chos 'di rnams la rab tu 'byung 'gyur te// de tshe de yisom nyame lus slong//
gang tshe bram ze zho pasasems pa na// ji ltar mkha' la nyi ma shar ba ltar// 'jig rten thams cad snang byed 'jug 'gyur pa// chos 'di rnams la rab tu 'byung bar gyur// gang tshe bram ze brtson
pas sems pa na// blo las kun smyor rnams las rab grol te// bdud sde rnam par bsal nas 'dug 'gyur ba// chos 'di rnams las rab tu 'byungapar 'gyur// bram ze 'tshems te sum cu rtsa
gsum pa 'od sngo ma la/ de bzhin gshegs dang thos dang bdag/ bsgo dang mdza' bshes lnga ba'o// myang n 'das dang mthong ba dang// sdig dang sdugs dang bden pa dang// mA
dang dge slong tshoms dag dang// bram ze la banatsem lani// ched du brjod pa'i tshoms dgra bcom pa tshes skyob kyis bsdus pa rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po pa ri ka ra
srakhyudang// lo tsa ba bane nechen mchog gse bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi 'dotsa ba bane dpal brtsegs kyis zhus nas gtan la phab pa//
gar skad du/ ko lakaM pradzub ti ka na tsa keb/ bodoskad du/ mdzod dang 'jig rten brjod pa'i mdabam po gcig g// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jig rten gyi gzhi ji
lta bur gnas/ sems can gyi 'jig rtenan ji lta buraskyo zhing 'khog lus dang de'i tshadan ji tsam/ 'khor ba'i rgyud na gang yin/ mya ngan las 'das pan jolta bu/ gang gis na 'kher/ thar pa'i
thabasna@#/ 'gan lta bur sgom/ snyas pa/ de thams cad sems can gyi las las gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi gzhi jo lta bura gnas shes pa ni de'adi las/ sa 'di'i 'og na gsegyi
pa'/ gzhi'o// de'i 'og na chu dkyil 'khor lo// de'i 'gan rlung ga dekyil 'khor te/ rlung gdekyil 'khor de'i 'og nanam mkha' sA des za kha' la gnas so/ ngag dekyil 'khor de'i 'bang gi

'a tshad nAde pag tshad 'bum drug khri yod de// zheng la'atshad med do// rlung gdekyil 'khor gyi bams ni/ mthu ba tsho'i rdo rjes kyang yong mi tshugs so// rlung gid kyi 'khor lostan/ chu'idagyila 'khor

rlung de lasapa tsa'i sngon las te/ chang gnya' shing tsam gyi rgyun babs nas/ chu'adekyi 'buradagyur to// de ba'aphang tshad nadepag tshad 'bum sum khri yod do// de la rlung chen po langs te/ srubs shang
bengos nas dbu bar gyur/ dgu ba las 'thas te/ gser gyis gzhi gyur te/ dpe 'am spris ma dang 'dra'o// de'age yang tshad ni dpag tshad lnga khri yod do// 'og gi chu dang gser gyi gzhi de gnyis ka'i

'phang tshad ni// dbag tshad 'bum brgyad khri yod de// chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhing dang/ gser gyis gzhi'i zhing tshangamanyam ste/ dbag tshad 'bum nyi khri sum stong lnga brgya yod de// gsetshugazhi de'i steng nas/

rib ba'irgyal po dang/ de'i 'khor gser gyi bdunagyen du byung ngo// di'i rgyaban klong chen po bzhi la sogs ba gnas te/ de'i bar dang mtha'anib tshab chus gang bo/ de'i lang chu thab ni lcags kyi lor khor yug

03gas bskor te/ de ltar na 'jig rten 'di rnams kyang gazhinam mkha'adangagaser la brtenate/ rab de 'tshad dngadabyibs dang rgyun 'di lta ste/ 'phang tshad nadi pagatshad 'bum drug khri las/ brgyad khrin chu'i nang du zhag

nas gser gyi sa gzhi la thugage/ brgyad khra ni gyen du byung ngo// dbyangesan grubazhi snyoms pa ste nges gcig kyang dbag tshad nyi khri ni khri yod de// rgyun rin po che bzhi sto/ gser dang/ dngul dang/ mi rtsusladang shel

te/ shelarishar phyogs kyi sa/ gserani byang/ dngulananub/ brgya na lho phyogs kyis te/ de lta bsan nam mkha'i 'od be cha ts+tsha'i deb deg tu snang ngo// 'i bar 'i rgyal bo de'i kho ra khor yugatu/ bang rim gyen

dub zha yodado// de'i yang tshad mis kyis gcig kyang bla gag bar na/ dpag tshad khri yod de mtshungs so// zheng duna'i rab las bang rim tha man dpag tshad khri drug stong byung ngo// gong ma gnyis n dpag tshad brgyad

song/ gsum pa na dibag tshad ba stong bzhi pa na de pag tshad nyis stong byung ngo// de la ri'i rgyal po de'i 'khor/ gser gyi ri bdun dang po ni/ mang zung 'dzin ces bya ste/ 'phang duzhuchu las gyen du dpag tshad
bzhi 'a yod/ zhib dang degs kyibang nadapag tshad brgyad khri yodado// de'i rgyab gsegyi'i gnyis pan/ gshol mda' 'dzin ces bya ste/ 'phang du dpag tshad tu khri yod do// ri dganyis kyi bar na rang

dbag tshad bzhi khri yod do// de'i rgyab gser gyi ri seng ldeng zhes bya ste/ 'badudapag tshad khri yod do// deganyis kyi kher ri bag tshad ni khri yod do// de'i rgyab bzhi ba ni po rang snang zhes bya ste/ 'phang dudapag tshad
lnga stong yod/ snga ma dang gnyis kyi bar na depag tshad khri'o// lnga pa na rta na zhes bya ste// 'bang du du pag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya'o// sngaa gnyis kyi ban bgatshad lnga stong yod do//

drug khan khyad khar 'byin ces bya ste/ 'phang du dpag tshad stong nyis brgya lnga bcu yod do// lnga pa dang gnyis kyi ban dpag tshang nyis stong lnga brgya yodago/ gser gyi ra ba ma bdun bani rmang 'dzan ces bya ste// 'phang

dudapag tshad drug brgya zhishu rtsa lnga yodado// snam dang gnyis kyi bar na dpag tshad stong nyisabargya lnga bcu lodade// rinang 'dzanadang/ 'khor gyis bskor ba'i bar dpag tshad sum 'bum nyi khro yo dade/ lcags kyi

gi ber khor yug ga 'i yang na/ batshwa'i chu las rkyen du dpag tshad sum brgya rtsa phyed dang gsum yod de// lcags kyi ri deng gsal gyi 'i debadunachar yang zhing tshad 'dra ste/ 'bang dzatsem pa dang mnyam mo// ra la
dang gser gyi'i bdun po dedagag pa na yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'chus gang ste/ de'i gting yang gso gyi gzhi la thug go/ yon tan brgyad po ni/ bsil ba dang/ rozhomi pa dang/ nga ba dang/ 'jam

bdang/ dang ba dang/ dri zhim pa dang/ mgrin pa la mi gnod pa dang/ kheng lam gnod pa brgyad do// rir ba kyi bang rim tham ni/ byamo 'dzin ces bya ba'i gnod sbyin rnams gnas so// de'i go ngag la ni'i phrad

ba'adzin ces bya pa'i gnod sbyin rnams gnas so// de'i gongam lani rtag tu myos pa zhes bya ba'aganod sbyin rnams gnas so// de'i gongom bang a bsha ba la ni/ phyogs bzhir rgyal bo chen po bshalenas te/

ba0 shar phyogs nanagis srungs po zhes bya ba gnas so// lce lug san na 'phags skyes bo zhes bya ba gnas so// nub phyogasazhanamog ma bzang zhes bya ba gnas so// byang phyogs na ning la bso ba zhes bya ba

gnasati/ 'jig rten skyong ba'i rgyal po chen po de bzhiso sen gnas te/ rib kyi rtse mo'isnang ni gru bzhaste/ so gcig kyang dpag tshad nyi khri tsho khro yodare// de'agrware ren ngos gcig kyang dpag tshad lnga brgya

pa/ rin po che'i khang bubartsogs pa/ grwa bzhi pa re re yod do// de'i nangan 'gan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin rnams gnas so// zhib kyi rtse mo'i dbusan/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po'a gnas khazang snang zhes bya

bde'i grong khyer chen po yod de// sagacig kyang srid dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya'o// 'bang du dpagatshad phyed dang gnyis te thams cad kyang rin po che las byas so// grong khyer de'i dedusan brgya byin gyi lha khang

chen po rin po che las byas pa lo da do// sa gcig kyang srid du dpagatshad nyis brgya lnga bcu yod do// grong khyer bzang snang de ni phyogs bzhin/ lhan masarol pa'is/ skyed mos tshal chen po bzhi yod do//

gcig ga mong rishing rta brgyan ces bya ba dang/ khra bzhes bya ba dang/ 'dres tshal zhes bya ba dang/ dga' tshal zhes bya ba dang bzhi'o// de ril phyogasadang/ byang gamatshamasan/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i

lha thams cad kyibasam pa rdzogs par byed pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba'i bskal pa'i shing kun 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ ri rab kyi stong lhodang nub gzhis kyi mtshams nani/ lha rnams kyi 'dunasatshos
/ @#// bzas khang zhes bya ba yod de/ der lha rnams dus drug gatsho 'dus nas/ mi'o'ag rten dang/ lha' 'jig rten/ legs nyes ci byed pa rnams rtog cing dpyod de// ma 'danems
kani dge ba byed de/ bdag cag gakhrigs su lha yul du skye'o zhes ti/ de dgasrung zhungemagon byed babasngos nas/ mde dag la byams par soms so// mi 'di dag ni mi dge ba'i stoge pa byed pas sonA
ka can dmyal ba la sogs par skye ste/ ga la srid ces 'gyod cing mi dga' ba'i sems 'byung ngo// de la khug 'dus pa ba rnams rtog cing dpyod nu phan tshun gcig gcig chos 'chad cing bsod nams bdade/

zla 'i bu rnams dregs ma bkur ba la sogs pa rnam pa mang por chos 'chad de// gling bzhi'i lho phyogs su zhi'adzam bu'i gling zhes bya ste/ de 'khor gling phran g.yoganang ma'achi pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gling

phran lnga brgya yod de/ 'dzam bu gling ga debubasanasogs pa 'dra ste/ sa gsum gyi saden mtshungs te/ gcig kyang dpagatshad nyis stong yod do// 'grin phra ma'i srid na de pag tshad phyed dang gsum yod do/

rgyashar phyogs kyi glingana'us 'phags gozhes bya ste/ de ba le khor gling phran lus dang 'phags po zhes bya ba la sogs pa lnga brgya yod de// glang lus 'phags po'i dbyashesan zla ga ma 'dra ste/ ngos gsum

gyi srod kyi tshad 'dzam bu'i glingedang 'dra'o// zlum po'i sa tham ni dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu yod// byang phyogs kyi glang na byang ga sgro masnyan ces bya ste/ de'i 'a khor gling phran byed pa dang/ sgra snyan ces/

cha bya ba la sogs kha lnga brgya yod do// gling sgram snyan gyi dbyibs gru bzhaste/ sa gcig kyang dpag tshad brgyad stong yod de// nub phyogs kyi gling ni nub kyi ba lang spyod ces bya ste/ de 'khor gling phran ni/

g.yo dang blogalcag ces bya ba la sogs pa lnga brgya yod do// grang ba lang spyod de'i dbyibs na zla ba nya ba'i bzhin du zlum ste/ kher khor lugasAde dudapag tshad drug stong lnga brgya yod do// 'dzam bu'i gling
'og thur dudapag tshad nya khri las 'das lan/ sems can dmyal bachen po mtshams med pa zhes bya ba yod do// dbyibs gru bzhi sa gcig kyang srid dpag tshad tu khri khro yod do// 'phang du la nga de
bzhin no// sems can gang las thams cad gcod par byed pa'i sdog can rnams na gnas der skye'o// de na sdug bsngal shan tu gnod pa ma bzad pa'i rgyun bar chad pa med bsan/ mtshams med
