zhes bya zhen/ smas pa sprul pa rnam pa gnyis te/ skyes nas thob pa dang/ bsgoms pa las byung po'o// de la skyes nas thob pa gang yin pa de nasems yod pa zhes bya'o// bsgoms pa las byub
gang ngan pa den sems med pa zhes bya'o// sprul pa gang dag gi sems kyi dbang gis 'gyur zhes bya zhen/ smas pa/ sprul pani rnam pa gnyis te/ skyes nas theb pa dang/ bsgoms pa las byung ba'o//
bya de la skyes nas theb pa gang yin pa de ni/ sems can de 'i sems kyi dbang gis 'gyur zhes bya'o// bsgoms pa las byung ba gang yin pa de ni/ sngal la po 'asams kyidabang gis 'gyur zhes bya'o// bar

ma do'i srid pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi las byung zhes bya 'am/ 'on te 'byung ba chen po bzhi las byung ba ma yin zhes bya zhen/ smras pa/ 'byungab chen po bizhi las byung ba zhes bya'o// bar m de'i sridapa rgyu las
byung ba'i gzugs can zhes bya ma/ 'on te rgyu las byung ba'i gzugasaMcan ma yin pa zhes bya zhe na sa pa/ rgyu las byung ba'i gzugs can zhes bya'o// bar ma do'i srid pa sems yodaces bya 'am/
'on te sems med pa zhes bya zhen/ smas pa/ sems yod pa zhes bya'o// bar mdo'i srod pa gangagasems kyi deb gas 'gyur zhes gshen/ smras pa/ rang gi sems kyi dbang gis 'gyur ba zhes bya'o//
sngal pas thos pa gang yin pa de/ sbal pa 'am sprul pa po gang ga lter 'dzu bar 'gyur nyen/ sas ba sngal pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/ skyesenas thob pa dang/ bsgoms pas byung ba'o// de la

skyes nas thob pas zes pa gang yin pa don sprul pa'i ltari'aju bar 'gyur ro// bsgoms pa las byung bas rjes pa gang yin pa rinasprul pa po'i ltar 'jular 'gyur ro// ci sprul pa med par 'gyur ba zhes bya 'am/
'on te med par 'gyur ba ma yin pa zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ sprul pa'i rnam pa gnyis te/ skyes nas thob pa dang/ bsgoms pa las byung ba'o// de la bsgoms pa los byung ba gang yines de namid par
'gyur ba zhes bya'o// skyes nas thob pa gang yin pa de lan med par 'gyur ba'ang yod/ med par ma 'gyur ba'ang lo da de// med par 'gyur ba gang zhe na/ smras pa/ dben
'am lha ma yin nam/ gzugs bzang po 'am/ gzugs ngan par sprul pa de ni med par 'gyur ba'o// mad par mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na/ smras ba/ ring du song du zin kyang/ de'i 'og tu rang
bzhin ji lta ba len bzhin du nas pa gang yin pa den mid par mi 'gyur ba'o// ci'i phyir sprul pa du bar 'thul zhen/ smras pa/ sngal pa po'i debang gsi 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe sprul pa po 'di snyam du
sems te/ sprul pa du bar 'thul kharagyur cig snyam pa de'atshi du bar 'thul bar 'gyur te/ rgyu des n sprul pa du bar 'khrul la// tsa' phyir sprul ba mar 'bar zhen/ snas po// sprul pa ba'i
lhodabang gis 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe sprul po 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma sprul pamer 'bar bar gyur cig snyam pa de 'tshe mer 'bar 'gyur te/ rgyudes na sla pa mer 'bar ro// ci'i phyi'i sprul pa rang
zla ga gis dang/ rang gi lus srog bde byed la// gzhan gyi gos dang gzhan gyi lus sreg par mi byed cen smas pa/ skyal pa po'i dbang gis 'gyur te/ sgrub pa pos 'dag par gyur cigesnyam du
bsamasan/ de tshig par 'gyur te rgyudes naslal pa rang gi ges dang/ rang gi lus srog par byed kyi/ gzhan gyi lus srog paru0f00 byed d// ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa gyadabu nor gyisanam mkha' la
bdag nyid kyi nangag me'i khams kyis lus bsregs te tshig par byas na/ dud pa'i ng mad/ thal ba'i lhag ma lus pa'i ng med ce na/ sbas ma/ tshe dang ldan pa gyadakhunor gyis nam mkha' de
las gzhi sprul te/ sogs budang/ 'chag sa dang/ khra deng ldan pa'i sa gzhi sprul nas/ stags bu dang/ 'chags dang/ khri dang/ me dang/ me'i rgyur sprul te// me dang me'i rgyur sprul nas/
bdag nyid kyi nang gi ma'i khams kyis lus bsregs te tshig bar byas na/ dud pa'i ng mid/ thal ba 'am/ lhag ma lus pa 'angamed do// rgyu des tshe dang ldan paspyod bu nor gyis bdag nyid kyin ng
gi me'i khams kyis lus bsregs te tshig par byas n dud pa 'ang yod/ thal ba'am/ lhag ma lus pa tsam yang med do// chos mngon pa'i bstan bcos chen po rgyu gdags pa las
tshigs bcu gcig pa 'o//rgyagadags pa bam po drug pa// sngomani/ gzholo dang gang zab dus rlabs dang/ lan tshwarin chen chen po gnu
rul ba'i re dang gcig ma gnas// chu klung rgyun dang sna tshegasamadog/ rgya mtsho chen po ni byin gyis gzhol zhing pan gyis 'bab la/ byin gyis babasto/ mu khonanas gad par 'dug pa ma yin
zhes gsungs pa de/ ci'i phyir rgya mtshonan po byin gyis gzhol zhing bshigyis 'bab la/ byin gyis bab ste/ mu kho na nas gad par 'dug pa ma yazhen/ sapa/ rgya mtsho chen ponabyin
gyis gzhol zhing byin gyis 'bab la// byin gyis babapa'i ng ma yin/ mu khenanasagad par 'dug pa'i ng ma yin gyis/ glang de dag de ltar 'dug ste/ dper na nas kyi
phung po 'am 'bras kyi phung po thunagyis gzhol zhing byin gyis 'bab la/ byin gyis babaste rgyu des n rgyu mtshe chen po byon gyis gzhol zhing byin gyis 'bab la// byin gyis babasu/ mu le na/
nas gad par 'dug pa ma yin ne// rgya mtshorin po ni zab cing/ mur thug pa redakaba'e zhes gsus pade/ so' phyir rgya mtsho rin po zabatsang mur thug par dka' zhe na/ smras pa/ rgya mtsho/
po na zab cing ur thug pa ra dka' ba ma yin te/ rgya mtsho chen po ni zabs kyi tshad dang/ rgya tshad kyang yod kyi/ de'i nang na 'dug pa'i chu la chu 'di tsam zhig yod de zhi'am/ chu bum pa gcig
gam/ chu bum pa brgya 'am/ chu bum pa stong ngam/ chu bum pa 'bum zhes gzhal bar mi nus te rgyu des n rgya mtsho chen po zab cing mur thug par daka' 'o// rgya mtsho chen po na ngas glu
la bab na yol bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa de ci'i phyir rgya mtsho chen podus rlabs la bab na/ yol ngar ma 'gyur zhen/ stsas pa dus rubasazhiganyis te/ nang pa ra dang/ yum
nged kyi dus dang/ dus rlabs chen po'i nang par dang phyes med kyi dus rlabs gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa'i srog chags bkres shing nyam chung bar gyur te/ zas tshel kha

rnams nang par sngar chu'i nang nas byung ste thang la 'gro la/ de dag bkres bzhin du phyem red phyir ldog ste/ de dag gyen du 'byung ba dang phyir ldog pa las dus rlabs kyi rlabs 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'di ni/
nang par dang phyem red kyi dus rlabs zhes bya'o// dus rlabs chen po gang zhen 'di lta ste/ rgyamatshe chen po'i nang na gnas pa rnams tshes brgyad dang/ tshes bcu ba'i dang cho 'phrul gyi zla ba
dzad dang/ de la ses pa'i tshes grangs dag du chu'i nang nas thang la byung nas/ zlob la dad pa rnams na zla ba phyag tshal/ ma la dang pa rnams zhi ma la phyag 'tshol/ skem byed la ngang pa nas+sa
ni sgom byed la phyag 'tshal/ sangs rgyas la dad pa 'dug bsana rnams nagi so stong gnas par byed de/ de dag gyenang 'byang ba dang tshur ldog pa las dus rlabs chen pe rlabs 'byung bar 'gyur te//

rgyu des na rgya mtshe chen po'angs rlabs la bang na yol bar mi 'gyur ni/ rgya mtsho chen po zhi 'dra bar lan tsha' rer ro gcig ge zhes kaMsungs pa de ci'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po 'dra bar lan tshwa'i rer ro gcig tse na/

smos pa/ rgya mtsho chen po' nangan srog chags skye'ang skye/ rgo'ang rga/ 'chi'ang 'chi ba ngag yong de/ de dag gi lus kyi dri ma dang/ lus kyi stag snyig gas rgya mtsho chen po la lan tshwa'i re bre bar 'gyur ro//

gzhan yang rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nalan tshwa'i ri dag yod de/ de dag zhu ba las rgya mtsho chen po lan tshwa'i ri bro bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gling rnams la ma 'bod pa rnams kyis rtswa dang/ shing dang/ yal ga
chub// dang lam dang/ lem khri'u dang/ 'dab ma rnams chu klung gseng du porapa de dag kun tu rul bas rgya mtsho chen po lan tshwa'i rigs bri bar 'gyur te/ rgyu des na rgya mtsho chen po 'dra bar lan

tsha ra gcig go/ rgya mtshochen pon rin po che mang po dang/ rin po chesnatshegs kyis gang ngo zhes gsungs pa ngo/ ci'i phyi'i rgya mtsho chen po rin po che mang po dang// na po che sna tshogs kyis gang bar gyur
cen smas pa/ 'jig rten 'chags pa na rgyu'i mchog dang/ snying po mchog dang/ bzang po'i mchog dang/ zong ga mchog gang yin pa de phyogs der bsdus te/ de las ra'i rgyal po rarab dang/

gser gyi ri bdun po rnams grub bo// khamasaMbazang po lhagama rnams na de nyid du byang ba'aphyir ro// gzhan yang rgya mtshochen po 'a nang na klu dbang che bar grags pa rnams kyi gnas rin po che ang bo dang/ na

po tshosAtshogs kyis gang ba yod de/ rgya des n rgya mtsho chen po rin po che mngab dang/ rin po che snatshogs kyis gang ngo// rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nasems can chen po rnams gnas so zhes gsungs pa de/
'a phyi'i rgya mtshopo'anang na sems tsana rnams gnas shen/ smas pa sems can gang dag sngon mar gyur cing 'dug 'dug pa rnams kyis ches a yan pas 'angs spyod rnams bsgrubs nas/ bdag nyid

kyang bde bas tshim par byas/ budang/ chung ma dang khromaru dang/ zas dang skom gyis rgyas par byas pa de dag nyos par sbyang pa de dang/ yang dag par blangs pa de lta bu dang/ yang dag par bzung ba de
lta bu s lus zhig nas sha pa'i 'og tungan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur la/ de dag sems can dmyal ba rnams nas sha 'a pos nas kyang/ las kyi lcag ma des/

rgya mtsho chen po 'i nang du dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ dedag der lus che ba dang/ mngad thabar 'gyur// de dag srog chags stong phrag mang po dag gis bza' bar 'gyur la de dgakyang mang po rnam

la za bar 'gyur te/ glonge gang dag tu gnas nas sngagi pa mdage ba'i las kyi rnam par stan pa nyams su myobar 'gyur ba'i go skabs kyang mad de/ rgyades na rgya mtsho chen po 'inang nasems can chen po rnams gan

so// rgya mtsho chen por ba'i ri dang lhan cigam gnas so zhes gsus pa de/ ci'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi gnas shen/ smras pa/ rgya mtsho chen po gnang na klu gtsang sbra spyod pa
rnams kyi gnas dag yod de/ klu'a gnas gang gi stong du shi ba'i re gnas par gyur pa des de'i mtshan manyidir klu'i gnas gnyis par phul la do/ gnas gnyis pa nas gsum par phul lo// gsum pa nas

bzhi par phul te/ de lta bu'i rim pas 'gram du bskyal nas thang la 'dor te/ rgya des nargya mtshechen po shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi gnas so// rgya mtsho chen por na 'dzam bu'i tshal gyi chu klung 'bab pa gang yin pa

rnams dang/ bar snang las char gyi rgyun shing rta'i sregangashing tsam 'bab kyang/ sa rgya mtsho chen po de 'grub par 'gyur ba'ang med/ gang bar 'gyur ba'ang med de zhes gsungs pa de/ ci'i phyir 'dzam bu'i
[d/ g]@#// tshal nas chu klung 'bab pa gang yin pa rnams dang/ bar snang las char gyi rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam 'bab kyang/ des rgya mtsho chen po de'agrab par 'gyur ba'ang med/ gang

bar 'gyur ba'ang med ce na/ smas pa/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na gnas pa'i srog chags rnams kyi longs spyod du 'gro la/ lhagam rlung dang nyi tshan kyis zad cing gtugs par gyur te/ rgyu des nargya mtsho chen
po 'grib par 'gyur ba'ang yod/ gang bar 'gyur ba'ang med de/ rgya mtsho chen po bzheng na srog chags kha dag snatshogs dang/ rtagos sna tshogs dang/ dbyibs sna tshogs dang/ []kha deg du ma dang//
rtags du ma dang/ dbyibs dum yod de zhes gsungs pa de/ ci'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nA/ srog chags kha dog sna tshegs dang/ rtags sna tshogs dang/ dbyibs sna tshegs dang/ kha dog du
ma dang/ rtag sa du ma dang/ dbyibs du ma yodacen/ smras pa/ sems can gang sngonamir gyur cing 'dug 'dug pa rnams kyis lus kyis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las ji lta bu byas pa dang/ ngag gis ji lta

zhi bu smas pa'i sa par spyad pa de dang/ yang dag par blangs pa de lta bu dang/ ngadapa nga rab zung de 25 lus zhages shi ba'ig tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar

'gyur la/ de dgasems can dmyal po rang nar sogs 'phos nas kyang las kyi lhag ma des rgya mtshochen po 'a nang du dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ dedagader kha dogasna tshogs dang/ rtags sna tshogs
dang dbyibs snatshegs dang/ khadog dus dang/ gas dumadang/ dbyibs du mar 'gyur te/ rgyu des na rgya mtsho chen po'inang nasrogachags khradog sna tshogs dang/ rtags snatshogs dang/
dbyibs sna tshog sadang/ khadog dumadang/ rtags dum dang/ dbyibs dum yod do// chos mngon pa'o bstanabs chen po rgyagadags pa las tshigs bcu gnyis pa'o//
sngo ni/ gtsag tu gyur dang gnyis m yin// rtsig pas chod dang sa la 'dzul// chudang nam mkha'anyizla dang/ tshangs gnas 'chag dang 'greng 'dug nyal// de gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur

zhes gsungs pa de/ ji ltar na gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ 'di la dge slong 'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang dang gang la ci 'dod pa bzhin thob pa dang/ dka' ba medra bar thob pa
dang tshegs med par thob pa des skyed cing bstan te/ yang dag par skyed cing yang dag par sgrub par byed la/ gsal bar byed do// des de skyod cing bskrunate/ yang dag par bskrun cing yang dag
par bsgrubs la/ gsal bar byas nas/ glang po che'i lus sam/ rta'i lus sam/ shing rta'i lus sam/ dpung bu chung gi lus sam/ khya mchog galus sam/ bya'i lus sam/
shing g lus sam/ rtsig pa las sam/ cirang ci 'dod pa phyi rol du mngon bar sgrub tsanga mngon par spyod do// mngon par brtson par byed la/ mngon par bsgrubs shing mngon par sbyar te//
@#// mngon par brtsams pa de dag grosgo nas de ltar gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur// demang por gyur nas gtsag tu 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa de/ ji ltar namang por gyur nas
gtsag tu 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ 'di'i dge slong gis rnam pa gang dag dang/ rtags gang dag dang/ mtshan ma gang dag gas/ glang po che'i lus dang/ rta'i lus dang/ shing rta'i lus dang
dpung bu chung gi lus dang/ khya mchogagi lus dang bya'i lus dang/ shing gi lus dang/ tshug pa'i lus rnams kyi phyi rol du mngon par bsgrubs shang man par spang de/ mngon par brtsams
pa'i sbyor ba de dag de btang/mtshan ma rnams kyang m snang bar byas nas/ sbyor ba rnams btang zhing/ mtshan ma rnams ma snang bar byas pa de lta bu mang por gyuranus gcig tu 'gyur zhes bya'o//
des snang bar gyur cing ma snang bar 'gyur ba shes pa dang mthong khar nyamasasu myong ngo zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar na/ snang ba las mi snang bar 'gyur zhe na/ smas pa/ desems can de dag la snang
bzhin du 'dug pa las/ 'di snyam du sems te/ tsa nas bdag ma shes par bya'o// cinas bdagamam thengo bar bya'o snyam te/ dader rtsig pas ched pa 'am/ brag gis chod pa 'am/ rabs
tshod par mos par byed de/ de ltar nasnang bzhin du 'dug pa lasam snang bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar namasnang zhing 'dug pa las snang bar 'gyur zhen/ smras pa/ desems can de dag la mi snang zhing
'dug pa las 'di snyam dusems te/ can s bdag shes par bya'o/ ci nas bdaga mthong bar bya'osnyam su/ de de dang nye zhing thug par mos par byed de/ de ltar na de mosnang zhing 'dug pa las
snang bar 'gyur ro// de ltar na snang bar gyur cing ma snang bar yang 'gyurab rnams la snang zhing 'dug pa las masnang bar 'gyur ba dang/ masnang zhing 'dug pa las snang bar 'gyur la/ shes pa'i ng
de yan/ mthong ba'ang de yin te/ dge slong gsangashes pa dang mthong ba de myong zhing so song myong la/ rig cing nyams su myong ngo// de la shes pa dang mthong ba ni rtogs pa dang/ yongadag par rtog
pa dang/ te bar rtogs pa dang/ bsten pa dang/ yang dag par khongadu chud pa dang/ mang du shes pa dang/ yid gzhus pa dang/ blodang ]mkhas pa dang/ shes rab dang/ skyed pa dang/
lcaga mthong gang yin pa ste/ de ltan snang bar gyur pa 'as/ masnang bar gyur pa shes pa dang mthong bas nyams sumyongango// de tshig pas tshod pa 'am/ brag gas ched pa 'am ra bsamed pa las lus
mi thegs par 'gre ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no zhes gsungs pa de/ ji ltar rtsig pas rnyed pa 'am/ brag gis chod pa 'am/ ra bos rnyed pa la lus mthigs par 'gro ste/ dpar
nanam mkha' la bya ba bzhin zhe na/ smras pa/ nam mkha'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pas na/ rtsig pasachod pa 'am/ brag gs tshed pa 'aa rakhasatshed pa la lus mi thogs/
par 'gro ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhan te/ de ltar n tsug pas ched pa bam/ brag gse ched pa 'am/ rabs chod pa la lus nam thogs par 'gros/ dper na/
ba nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no// des la ngan 'byung pa dang/ byi'u zul byed de/ dper na chu la byab zhin no zhes gsungs pa de/ ji ltar n sa la steng du 'byung ba dang/ byi'u zul byed de dper na chu
ts+tso la bya ba bzhinano zhan/ sa pa/ chu'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pan/ sa la steng du 'byungs dang/ phyi'i zul du byed de/ dpor no mu la bya ba bzhin/ de lta nas la steng du/
'byung ba dang/ bya'i zul du byed de/ dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhinano// de chu rkyen la mnub par 'gro ste/ dperan sa la bya ba bzhin no zhes gsus pa de/ ji ltar n tshu'i rgyun lam nub par 'gro/
rgyu dper na sa la bya ba bzhin zhen/ smas pa/ sa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pas na chu'i rgyun la minupa bar 'gro ste/ dper nasal bya pa bzhin te/ de ltar na chu'i rgyan lam nub
pa 'gro ste/ dper na chu la bya ba bzhinano// denam mkha' la skyal mo krung bcas bzhinadu 'gro ste/ dperan 'dab chagaso bya bzhinen zhes gsungs pa de/ ji ltar nanaam kha' la skyil mo krung bcas
bzhin du 'gro ste/ dper na 'dabachags bya bzhin zhen/ sa la/ 'di la dge slong 'jig rten pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa gang dang gang la ci 'dod pa bzhin theb pa dang/ dka' ba med par thob pa dang/
xxx
tshul gsal bar byas nas/ phyogs gangan 'grings/ 'dug gam/ nyal yang rung ste/ des der e 'am/ ma lce 'am/ dud pa 'am dud pa'i rtags can nam/ rlung ngam/ rlung gi dkyil 'o ba'i/
du mos par byed de/ de der me 'am/ me lce 'am/ dud pa 'am/ dud pa'i rtags can nam/ rlung ngam/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor du mos nas kyang/ de'i 'ogatu bdag rlung gi dkyil 'kher gyis gyen du khyer
bar gyur cig snyam dumasasam/ yang na glang po che'am/ rta'am/ shing rta'am/ dpung bu chung ngam/ bya'am/ rtsig ba 'am/ shing khyer bar gyuracigasAm dums par byed de/ ji lta ji ltar mos

pa de ltade ltar gazhan gyi sha' mige tha mal pas mthong ngo// de 'disaa dusems te/ kyes rdzu 'phrul 'di lta bu zhig myong bar bya'o// so sor myong bar bya'o// rigs par bya'o// nyams su myong bar bya'osAm
du bsams na/ de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'dulta ste/ rdza'aphrul gyi rkang ba rnams legs par bsgoms pa'i phyir ro// de ltar nam mkha' laskyo la mo krung bcas pa bzhin 'gro ste/ dperan 'dab chagI

bya bzhin no// des nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis lag pas 'dzin tsang kun tu zhug par byed do zhes gsungs pa de ji ltar na nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis lag pas 'dzin cing kun tu zhug par byed cen/ sa pa/ rtim zhes bya ba
na nama'i dkyil 'khor yin no// zla ba zhes bya ban zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin te/ dge slong des lha me 'a dekyil 'khor 'di dang/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la nye zhing thug pa os nas

da 1 lag pas 'dzin tsang kun tu nyug par byed la/ nom zhing kun tu nom ste/ de ltar n nyim dang zla ba 'dig nyase lag pas 'dzin cing kun tu nyug go/ detshangs pa'i 'jig rten du lus kyis dbang byed de zhes
( gsungs pa ste/ ji ltar na tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du lus kyis dbang byed ce na/ pas nga/ dge slong 'jig rten pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang la ci 'dod pa bzhin theb pa dang/ dka' ba med par thob pa dang/

tshegs med par thob pa des de skye datsang snyan te/ yang dag par skyed cing yang dag par sgrub par byed la gsal bar byed de// des de bskyed cing bskrun te/ yang dag par bskyed cing yang dag par bsgra/
la gsal bar byas nas/ lus kyang sims la 'jog la/ sems kyang lus la 'dzeg par byed de/ lus sems la bzhagal/ soms kyango lus la bzhag nas kyang gcig tu 'gyur zhing kun tu //
pa/ 'dres te/ dper namar ram/ 'bumar ram/ sbrang 'am bu ram gyi dbu ba chu dang gcig tu 'gyur zhing kun 'adres pa de bzhinedu/ dge sbyor gis lus sems la bzhag tsang sems kyang lus la
bzhag nas lus la nga ba'i 'dushes dang/ 'jam pa'i 'du shes bskyod nas/ 'phag par byed cing/ yang dag par 'thag par byed la/ gyen du 'gro bar byed cing/ kun tu gyen du 'gro bar byed de/
dper na za ma tog khyer ba'i mis zas go blangs te/ blangs nas kyang 'phag par byed tsang/ kun tu 'thag par byed la/ 'gro bar byed cing/ kun tu 'gro bar byed pa dang/ dge slong bsod snyoms
pas kha zas lhung bzed kyi snod du bcug nas/ 'phag par byed cing/ kun tu 'phag par byed la/ 'gro bar byed nang/ kun tu 'gro bar byed pa de bzhin du/ dge slong gis lus la yang ba'i 'du shes
dang 'jam pa gi'adu shes bskyodanas 'thag par byed tsang/ kun tu 'phag par byed la/ gyen du 'grobar byed cing/ kun tu khyon du 'gro bar byed de/ lus la tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bsams na//
samasabaskyod pa'i mod la dbang yod bdang/ 'gro ba dang/ rag las pa dang/ bdag po dang/ mthu yod pa dang/ skal ba can dang/ dbad byed pa dang/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na gnas pa zhes brjod

do// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'astsal tre/ kun dga' ba yod kyi rdzu 'phrul 'dase tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang du phyin par bsa mngon par shes so// de skad ces
bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldanu'adas la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol te/// gzugs can rags pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi las byung ba'i sku 'das tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang du
gshegs bar bam ldan 'das kyis mngon par mkhyen tam/ kun dga' bogazugasacan rags pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi las byung ba/ pha dang ma'omi gtsang ba mar mar po las byung pa/ 'bras chan
dang zanadren gyis bskyed pa// rtag tu dril ba dang/ khrus bya ba dang/ ma'u dgos pa dang/ 'gyes pa dang/ 'thor ba dang/ rnam par 'jig pa'i tshis can gyi lus 'das
kyang tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang du phyin par ngas mngon par shesaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis dpe bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pas dpe bstanadu gsol/ kun dag 'a bo dper na lcags
kyi gang bu 'am/ lcags kyi stonganagang gatshe tsha ba yod tsang ma yod pa de'i tshe/ shin tu ches yang ba dang/ ches 'jam pa dang/ ches las su rung pa dang/ ches 'od gsal bar 'gyur la/
gang gi tshograng mor gyur cang ma mod pa de'atshi mchis lci ba dang/ ches sra ba dang/ ches las su mi rung ba dang/ ches 'od mi gsal bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ kun dga' khe gang gatshe de bzhin/
gshegs pa 'a lus sems la bzhagan+ti/ snyoms kyang lus la bzhugs/ lus la yang ba'i 'du shes dang/ 'jam pa'i 'du shes bskyedanani/ kun dga' bo gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs
pa'i lus shin tu ches yang ba dang/ chas 'jam pa dang ches las su rung ba dang che[0f7a]da gsal bar 'gyur ba dang/ sems kyi rgyu las 'byung ba dang/ soms la rten pa dang/ sems
la rag las par 'gyur te/ sems la brten nas lus la dbang byed do// ci'i phyi'i sprul pa nam mkha' la 'chag cen/ sbas pa/ sprul pa po'i bang gis 'gyur te sprul pa pos nam mkha'/
btsan ral stags bu 'am/ 'chag sa sprul bar byed de/ rgyu des n sprul pa nam mkha' la 'chag go/ ci'i phyir sprul pa nam mkha' la 'greng zhe na/ smras pa/ snga' pa po'i dbang gis 'gyur de
sprul pa pos nam mkha' de la sa ga zhi rim/ gnas sprul bar byed de/ rgyudes n sprul pa namam kha' la 'grongang// ci'i phyir sprul pa nam mkha' la 'dug ste na snas pa sprul pa po'i
dbang gis 'gyur te sprul pa po nam mkha' de la stananam 'dug sa sprul bar byed d// rgyudes nastsal pa nam mkha' la 'dug ga ci'i phyir sprul pa nam mkha' la nyal zhen/ smas pa
sprul pa po 'i dbang gis 'gyur te/ sprul pa pos nam mkha' de lamal lam khri sprul bar byed de/ rgyudes na sprul pa nam mkha' la nyal/ rdzu 'phrul gyi yon tan lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin
du rtogs par byas nas/ gzhi ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bya'o// chos ma ngon pa'i bstan bcos chen po rgyu gangags pa las tshags bcu gsum pa lo/ ngas/ sdomanaM mtho
dman brgyad dang char ma 'bab/ char 'babasos ka chu thagis dang/ sar ba kha ba glog dang 'brug/ phru ba dang ni bzhi drug bdun/ char pa jitsam na 'dug ste 'bar ce na/ smras pa hen brgyad
yod do// de la sngon dang po nadipagatshad phyed dang gnyis n 'dug ge/ gnyis pa na rgyang grags pa'i/ gsum pa na depag tshad gcig go/ bzhi pa sbyang grags gsum m/ lnga pa na depagatshang phyed do/
drug pa rgyang grags gtsagige/ bdun pa na rgyang grags phyed do// brgyad pan rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha gcigen 'dug ste char 'bab bam/ yang nam 'bab ba// ci'i phyi'i
bskal pa dang po 'ami rnams kyisan dpag tshad phyedadang gnyis su brjes tes thams cad du char 'bab la/ daltar gum rnams kyizhi dem 'banas char pa 'bab ce na/ smas pa/ bskal pa dang/
po pa'i ma rnams ni dbang che bar grags par gyur te/ dedag la klu dbang che bar grags pa dag spro bar byed de/ des n sngon dpag tshapyadadang gnyis su gyen du 'phags nas thams cad dumar 'bab/
zla la da ltar gyi mi rnams ni debang chung bar grags pa yin te/ de dag lan klu khang dbang chung grags pa rnams bar byed de/ des n da ltar dama' ba nas char 'bab ste/ rgyu des n bskal pa
dang po'i mi rnams kyi sngon dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis su gyen du 'phags tes thams cad du char 'bab la/ da ltar gyi mi rnams kyi no rima' ba nas char 'bab bo// ci'i phyir mar 'bab cen/
smas pa/ rgyunam pa brgyad kyis char 'babasto/ brgyad gang zhen/ sngon yang yod la/ glog kyang 'byung ba dang/ 'brug kyang zer la/ phyogs bzhi nas kyang rlung ngad bsal ba lta nga ba de'i dus
kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod de// lus pa rnams kyang ma rtogs par char 'bab bo zhes ston mod kyi/ 'on kyang chen po 'di lasame'i khams gyen du 'phagasanas/ char pa de bar ma
dor zad par byed de/ rgyudang po 'das na charam 'babab// gzhan yang sngon yang yod la/ glog kyang 'byung ba dang/ 'brug kyang zer la/ phyogs bzhi nas kyang rlung ngad bsal ba dag ldang ba de/
dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod de/ ltas pa rnams kyang ma rtogs par char 'bababo zhes ston med kyang/ 'on kyanam mkha' la rlung drag po dag ldang stede dag gis tshar ra de dan ta
ka'i dgon pa rnams dang/ ka ling ka'i dgon pa rnams dang/ ma tang ka'i dgon pa rnams dang/ dgon pa stong pa rnams ga la ba der 'dor bar byed de/ rgyu gnyis pa 'dis na cher ma 'bab bo//
gzhan yang sprin yang yod la/ glog kyang 'byung ba dang/ 'brug kyang zer la/ phyogs bzhi nas kyang rlung ngad bsal ba dag ldang ba de'i dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yod de/ ltas pa rnam
kyang ma rtogs par 'bab bo zhes ston modakyang/ 'on kyang lham yin gyi de bang po sgra gcan gyisam pa de lag pa gnyis kyis blangs nas rgya mtsho chen por 'dorobar byed de/ rgyu gsum pa 'disan char mi
'baba'o// gzhan yang sprin yang yod la/ glog kyang 'byungab dang/ 'brug kyang zer la/ phyogs bzhi nas kyang rlung ngad bsal ba dag ldang bde 'dus kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yodad/ ltas
ba rnams kyang ma rtogs par 'bab bo zhes ston mod kyi/ 'on kyang char 'bebs pa'i lca'abu rnams bag med cing bgamed par gnas te/ de dag bgamedacing bag med par gnas pas char ma 'bab// rgyu
bzhi pa 'dis nochar ma 'bab bo// gzhan yang sngon yang yod la/ glog kyang 'byung pa dang/ 'brug kyang zer la/ phyogs bzhu nas kyang rlung ngad bsal ba dag ldang ba de'i dus
kyang yod la/ de'i skabs kyang yodade/ ltas pa rnams kyang ma rtogs par char 'bab bo zhes ston mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma rnams tshes ma yin pa spyod cing mi mthun pa spyod de/ de dag ches ma yan pa spyod

( cang ma mthun pa spyod pa sa char mi 'bab ste/ rgyulta pa 'dis na char mi 'bab ba/gzhan yang rdzu 'phrul gyis char mi 'bab pa yod de/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu ba 'ga'i rdzu 'phrul gyisachar 'bab pa las
zla gcod par byed de/ rgyu drug pa 'dis nachar mi 'bab bo// gzhan yang tshes nyid kyis chag 'bab pa yodade/ char mi 'bab pa gang yin pa 'di ni 'jig rten gyi chos nyid de/ bdun pa 'das na char mi
'bapa po// gzhan yang bden pas bskul bas char 'bab pa yod// rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthuche ba la las bden pas char 'bab pa lasagacod par byed de/ rgyu brgyad pa 'disonacha ram 'bab bo//
phyi'i char 'bab ce na/ smas pa/ rgyu rnam pa brgyad kyis char 'bab ste/ brgyad gang zhen klu'amathudang/ gnod sbyin gyi mthu dang/ grul bum gyi mthu dang/ lha'i mthu dang/ ma'omathu dang [. ]rdzu
'phrul dang/ chos de dang/ bden pas bskal bas char 'bab ste/ rgyu des achar 'bab bo// ci'i phyi resos kadangad bya char cher 'bab ce na/ smras pa/ de'i tshi klu rnams bag ma len pa dang//
00/bag ma gtong ba dang/ dga' ston dang/ dus ston dag byed de/ dedag dga' zhing de dang de dag tu 'dong bar byed de/ dedag dga' zhing 'dong ba nachar cher 'bab bo/ gzhan yang a rnams kyis de lta
bur 'gyur ba'i las rnams byas shing bsags pas na/ sos ka dang dbyar char cher 'bab ste/ rgyangs nasos ka dang dbyar char cher 'bab bo// ci'i phyir chu'i thigs pa 'bab cen/ smas pa/
phyogs gnyis nas rlung chen po dag ldang ste// de dag gis chu dedagagatsagatu bsdus pas na de las chu'i thogs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang mi rnams kyis de lta bu'i las rnams byas shing
bsags te/ de dag byas shing bsags pa sam ma lan pa rnams 'khrugs nas chu'i thigs pa 'bab ste/ des de dag la gnod pachen por 'gyur/ rgyudes nachu'i thogis pa 'bab bo// ci'i
phyirasar ba 'bab cen/ smras pa/ phyogs gnyis nas rlung shan tu bsal ba dag ldang sto/ de dag gis chu'i khams degacig tu bsdus la/ sa'i khams kyis kyang srab r byas nas/ kha ba 'am sel
bar gyur pa de rlung gis thur du phab ste/ rgyudes naser ba 'bab bo// ci'i phyiri glog 'byung zhen/ snas pa/ phyogs gsanas rlung shin tu tsha ba dag ldang ste/ de dag thug pa las glog 'byung ste/
rgyu des n glog 'byung ngo// ci'i phyir 'brog zer zhe na/ snyas pa/ phyogs gnyisi nas rlung chen po dag ldang ste/ de dag brdabs pa las sgra 'byung ste/ rgyu des na 'brug zer ro// ci'i phyir phru ba
ludabyen/ smras pa/ 'og nas me 'jebs pa 'bar bas/ me'arishas che bar gyural/ me'i dusache bar gyur pas/ rlung gi shas che bar 'gyur ro// rlung gi shas che
bar gyur ras chu byakhodape bar 'gyur te/ rgyudes n phru ba lud do// ci'i phyir kha dogasngobar 'gyur zhen/ snus pa/ chu'i khams shas che ba'i phyir ro// ci'i phyogasar ba dang dmarangar 'gyur
zhen/ snas nga/ me'i khams shas che ba'i phyir ro/ rtaci'i phyir dkar bar 'gyur zhen/ smras pa/ khamasamasamanyam pa'i phyir te/ rgyu des na kha dog sngo ba dang/ ser ba dang/ dmar ba
ngang dkar bar 'gyur ro// ci'i phyirir kha pa dang/ skyur ba dang/ lan tshwa'i ro dang/ tsha ba dang bas bar 'gyur zhin/ smras pa/ khams mnyam pa'i phyir te/ rgyudes na ro kha ba dang/ skyur ba
dang / lan tsha'adi dang/ bas bar 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir dang ra bar 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ khamasamanyam pa'i phyir te/ rgyudasan dngar bar 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir lci ba dang/ rtsub pa dang/
kaM mkhrang ba dang/ sra bar 'gyur zhe na/ snyas pa/ sa'i khams shas che ba'i phyir ro/[/ ]tsa'i phyir ma rten pa dang/ 'jam pa dang/ las su rung bar 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ chu'i khams
shas che ba'i phyir te/ rgyu des marten pa deng/ 'jam pa dang/ las su rung bar 'gyur ro// chos m ngon pa'i bstan bcos chen po rgyug dgas pa las tshigs bcu bzhi ba'o/
00/ sdomani/ skye gnas 'gro ba yod pa dang/ ci'i phyir dmyal sogs mtho rigs dang// lcamo ma la se gas pa drub// 'o ma kha ba rgyal dang gdul// gleng gzhi na a 9na rdzong na ste/ skye
gnas niangezhi yod de/ sgo nga las skye pa'iskye gnas dang/ mngal nas skye ba dang/ drod gsher las skye ba dang/ rdzus te skye ba ste/ 'di'i skye ba nas yin par gsungs so// sgo nga las skya ba'i skye
gnas gang zhe na/ sa pa/ sems can gang dag sgo nga las skye ba rnams dang/ sgongan 'dug pa rnams dang/ sgo nga'i sbubs kyi spyis g.yogs pa rnams dang sgo nga'i sbubs brtol te skye zhing kun tu
skya la/ 'grubacing mngon par 'grub pa dang yang dag par 'grubatsang 'byung ba rnams te/ de dag kyang gang zhen/ smras pa/ 'di lta ste/ ngang pa dang/ khrung khrung dang/ rma bya dang ( ne tso dang/
risags dang/ khu byug dang/ shang shang te'u sogs pa dang/ klu khacig dang/ nam mkha' ldang bcig dang/ mi kha cig dang/ gzhan yang sems can gang dgasgo nga las skye ba rnams dang/ sgo nga
na 'dug pa rnams dang/ sgo pa'i sbubs kyi spros g.yogs pa rnams dang/ sgong 'i sbubs brtol te skye zhing kun tu skye la/ 'grub cing mngon par 'grub pa dang/ yang dag par 'grub cing 'byung ba rnams de
'di ni sgo nga las skye ba'i skye gnas zhes bya'o/ mngal nas skye ba'i skye gnas gang zhin/ smas pa/ sems can gang dag mngalan skye ba rnams dang/ mngal na 'dug pa rnams dang/ mngal gyi sngabs
@#// kyisag logs pa nags dang/ mngal gyi sbubs brtol te skye zhing kun tu skyel/ 'grub cing mno par 'grub pa dang/ yang dag par 'grub cing 'byung ba rnams te[+ ]de dag
gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ glang po che dang/ rta dang/ rngamo dang/ ba lang dang/ bong bu dang/ ma de dang/ ri dgas dang/ lag la sogs pa dang/ klu kha cig dang/ nam mkha' snang ba cig
paN+Na dang / yi dgas khacig dang/ mi kha cig dang/ gzhan yang sems can gang dag mngal nas skye ba rnams dang/ mngalan 'dug pa rnams dang/ mngal gyi sbubs kyis ga logs pa rnams dang//
mngal gyi sgrubs brtol te skye zhing kun tu skye la/ 'grub cing mngon par 'grub pa dang/ yang dag par 'grub cing 'byung ba rnams te/ 'dani mngal nas skye ba'i skyo gnas zhes bya'o// drod gsher las

skye ba'i skye gnas gang zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag phan tshun gyi dod dang/ phan tshun gyi mi dang/ pan tshun gyi rdul dang phan tshun gyi gnod pa dang/ phan tshun bar bas nyal nyal gyi phung
bo la brten tas/ stor khung phyis 'khe nus sam/ sharul lam/ nye rul lam/ zan dren tshul pa'i m/ rtswa lcagakho 'am/ nags tshal stug po'am/ rtswa'i spyil po 'am/ la ma'i stsal
'am/ chu rul pa 'am/ khyim gyisang sangangam/ sbrang bu'i tshang la brten nas skye zhing kun tu skye la/ 'grub cing mngon par 'grub pa dang/ yang dag par 'grub cing 'byung ba rnams te/ de dag
kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srin bu dang/ sbyar bu dang/ phyom leb dang/ sbrang bumachu ris dang/ til dang/ phub ma dang/ shing phab la sogs pa dang/ klu kha cig dang/ nam mkha'

ltang kha cig dang/ mi kha cig dang/ gzhan long sems can gang dag phan tshun gyi drodadang/ phan tshun gyi mi dang/ phatshun gyi rdul dang/ phan tshun gyi gnod pa dang/ phan tshun btsir bas skye zhing

kun tu skye la/ 'grubatsangan ngon par 'grub pa dang/ yang dag par 'grub cing 'byung ba rnams te/ 'din drodagasher las skye ba'i skyo gnas zhes bya'o// rdzus te skye ba'i skyo gnas gang zhen/ smras pa/
sems can gang dag yan lag dang/ nying lag thams cad dang ldan zhing rdzogs pa dbang po ma tshang ba med pa rnams cig car skyo zhing kun tu skya la/ 'grub cing mngon par 'grub pa dang/ yang
dag par 'grub cing 'byung ba rnams te/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/ lha thams cad dang sems can dmyal ba pa thams cad dang/ bar ma do'i srid pa thams cad dang klu kha cig dang/ nam
mkha' ldang ba cig dang yi dgas la cig dang/ mi la cig dang/ gzhan yang sems can gang dag yan lag dang nying lag thams cad ldan zhing rdzogs pa/ dbang po ma tshang ba med pa rnams
cig car skye zhing kun tu skye la 'grub cing mngon par 'grub pa dang/ yang dag par 'grub cing 'byung ba rnams te/ 'din rdzus te skyo ba'i skyo gnas zhes bya'o// 'gro ba lnga ni 'di lta ste/ sems can
dmyal ba'i 'gro ba dang/ dud 'gro'i 'gro ba dang/ ya dgas kyi 'gro ba dang/ lha dang ma'o// sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba gang zhen/ smas pa/ sems can sug
po 1ba pa rnams dang 'dra bar gyur pa dang/ grogs su gyur pa dang/ skal ba mnyam pa dang/ gnas thob pa dang/ gzhi thob pa dang/ skye mched thob pa dang/ sems can dmyal ba pa der skyes pa
kyis bsgribs la lung ma bstan pa'i gtsuka sa dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shesarang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de'ang sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang
lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang/ ngag gi nyes par spyod pa dang/ yid kyi nyes par spyod pa chen po kun tu bsnyen cing bsgoms te mang po byas pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro zhing/ sems can dmyal ba
rnams su spyi sku/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba deni/ soms can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o// gzhan langamang dang/ rnam pa'i tshig dang/ tshig bla dgas dang//
ming du btags pa dang/ kun tu rig pa dang gdags pa dang/ tha snyad kyisoms can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba'ang sems can dmyal ba zhes bya'o// dud 'gro'i 'gro ba gang zhen/ smas pa/ dung 'gre
rnams dang 'dra bar gyur pa dang/ grogs su gyur pa nas/ skya mched thob pa'i bar dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa der skyes pa rnams kyis ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugasanas rnam/
[04]bangashes pa 'ang ra ga nga lazhi pa de 'ang dud 'gro'i 'greb zhes bya'o// gzhan yang lus kyi las dang/ ngagakaM las dang/ yid kyi las yon po kun tu bstan cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas dud/
'gror 'gro zhing/ dud 'gro rnams su sa ste/ dud 'gro rnams su nying mtshams sbyor ba de na dud 'gro 'gro ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang mang dang/ rnam pa'i tshig dang/ tshig bla nga gas zhes bya ba
nas/ sngam bzhin du sbyar ro// yi dgas kyi 'gro ba gang zhan/ snas pa/ yi dgas rnams dang 'drab r gyur ba nas/ mched thob pa'i bar gang yin pa dang/ yi dwags de raskyes pa
rnams kyi me bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar gang lan pa de 'ang yi dgas kyi 'gro ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang ser sna kun tu bstanatsang bsgoms te mang
du byas pas/ yi dgas su 'gro zhing yi dgas rnams su skyo ste/ la dgasa rnams su nying mtshams sbyar pa de ni/ mi dgas kyi 'gro ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang ming dang/ rnam pa'i
tshig dang/ tshig bla dgas zhes bya ba nas/ snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// lta' 'gro ba gang zhe na/ smras pa/ lha rnams dang 'dra bar gyur pa nas/ skye mched thob pa'i bar dang/ lha des skyes
pa rnams kyim bsgribs la lung dum bstan pa'i gzugasanas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar gang yin pa de'ang lta'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang lus kyi legs par spyod pa dang/ ngag
[e/ ]@#// legs par spyod pa dang/ yid legs par spyod pa chen po kun bstan cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas ltar 'gro zhing lha rnams kyi nang du skyo ste/ lha rnams kyi nang du
rkang mtshams sbyor ba de ni lha'i 'gre ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang mang dang rnam pa'i tshes ces bya banas/ sngam bzhun du sbyar// ma'i 'gro ba gang zhe na/ smras pa/ mi rnams dang 'dra/
b+hU bar gyur pa dang ( grogs su gyur pa dang/ skal ba mnyam pa dang/ gnas thob pa dang/ gzhi thob pa dang/ skye mched dang/ skye mched thob pa dang/ mi 'dir skyes pa rnams kyis
bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'igazugs dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de'ang mi'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ gzhan yang lus kyi leg
par spyod pa dang/ ngag gi legs par spyod pa dang/ yid kyi legs par sbyod pa chung ngu kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas/ mi 'gro zhinge ma rnams kyi nang du skye ste/ mi rnamA
gyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba de ni mi'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o// gzhan yang mang dang/ rnam pa'i tshig dang/ tshig bla dgas dang/ mang du btags pa dang/ kun tu rig pa dang/ gdags pa dang/
thasnyad kyima'i 'gro ba'ang mi'i 'gro ba zhes bya'o// 'gro ba gang la skye gnas du yodacen/ snas ra/ sems can dmyal ba rnams na rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas gcig pu yod de// dung 'gro rnams la
skye gnas du yod ce na smas pa/ bzhi ba thams cad yod de/ yi dgas rnams la skye gnas du yod ce na/ snyas pa/ rdzus te skye bgacig pu yod do// la la na la degs rnams la
mngal nas skye ba'ang yod do zhes zer ba'ang yod de// ji lta zhen/ sa pa dparanaya degasam zhage gis/ tshodang ldan pa mo'u 'galagyi bu'i mdunang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ 'di'i
na nyin mo bu lnga btsas// mtshan mo gzhan lnga btsas gyur na// thos su zinakyang de dag gis// bdag ni 'grangs par ma gyur te// zhes smos pa lta bu 'o// lha rnams la skye gnas du lo nga ce na/
sbas pa/ rdzus te skyo ba gcig pu yod de// ma rnams la skye gnas du yod ce na/ smas pa/ bzhi po thams cad yod do// ma rnams la sgo nga las skye ba'i skyo gnas ji ltar yod cen/
s+sas pa/ dper na 'dzam bu gling pa'i tshong pa mang porgya mtsho'agramanas bskor ba rnams kyis khrung khrung gzhon nu ma gnyis mthong ba las/ gcig n bris/ gcig de nidi dag gis bzung
de dag dang lhan tsag tu 'tshes nas/ de dag dang 'tshos pa'i rkyen gyis sgong gnyis byung ste/ de gzhasasmon te rdol ba las/ byis pa gzugs bzang zhing bstan sdug la mdzes pa gnyis
byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ de gnyis kyis brtson pa dang/ sbyor ba dang/ 'bad pa byas pas mtshog ga 'bras bu dgra bcom pa nyidi mngon sum du byas te/
[7] ]// tshe dang ldan pa de gnyis rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar gyur to// brag dang nye ba'i brag ces bya ba gyur pa lta bu dang/ dper na rigs 'dzin gyi mas ga las sgo nga sum cu rtsa
'a1 gnyis byung ste/ de dag smin te rdol las byas pa gzugs bzang zhing brtan sdug lamadzes pa/ tshan po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa sum cu rtsa gnyis byung ste/ de dag gis nyes pa 'ga'
zhag byas pa 'phyi// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal skrag pas bsad pa lta bu dang/ dper na 'das pa'i dus na lngalen gyi rgyal po'i btsunamo pad+ma can las sgong lnga brgya byung ste/ de dag smin te/

rdzol ba las byas pa gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ tshan po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa lnga brgya byung ste/ de dag 'ga' zhig las skyo ba skyes nas/ skra dang kha spu bregs te rab tu byung
nas/ de dag brtson pa dang/ sbyor ba dang 'bad pas rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa lta bu 'o// de la sogs pa gzhan dag brjed par bya ste/ de ltar na mi rnams la sgo nga las
skyo ba'i skyo gnas yod de// ma rnams la mngal nas skye ba'i skyo gnas ji lta bod cen/ smas pa/ da ltar gyi mi rnams ji lta ba bzhin te/ de ltar nam rnams la mang lanas skye ba'i skyo gnas yod do//

ma rnams la drod gsher las skye ba'askye gnas ji ltar yod ce na sa la/ dperan rgyal po tshengs pas byin gyi khrang nas ther bu 'di lta ste/ shing bal gyi 'dab ma 'am/ sa pa la gyi 'dab ma lta bur 'jam

zhi shin tu 'dzam la gnod pa cung zad kyang med pa zhig byung// desmin te rdol ba las bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig skyes te/ phugadon 'phreng ldan zhes bya bar gyur nas/ de dus
gzhan zhigan/ skyes shing dbang po rnams longs su smin par gyur pan/ sngonam thos par tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu zhig dran te/ sbas pa/ mtsho rnams gang na ldeg par 'gyur/ lasani ga ngadu/
ldog par 'gyur// bde dang sdug bsngal 'jig rten// gang dum sa 'gag par 'gyur// zhes smasaso// de nas bram ze'i khye'ug cam bu mu cor skya bas brtol can zhig gis bu mo de la 'di skad du/ bu/

mo de na ci'ang ma yin pa zhig gzhis sbas pa dang/ bu mo de 'ingakod pa'i skye mched la snyoms par zhugs pa lta bu dang/ dper na rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi spyi bonas thor bu 'di lta ste/ shing ra la
lam/ ras bal lta bur 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam la gnod pa cung zad kyang med pa zhig byung ste/ desmin te rdol ba las byis pa gzugs bzang zhing bldan sdug la mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po'imtshan

sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig skyes te/ spyi bos skyes so// spyi bo nas skyes so zhes zer nas/ mngang lasanu nga las nu zhes bya bar gyur to/ byis pa de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthuche bar gyur te/
des kyang gling bzhir rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas pa lta bu dang/ dper na rgyal po nga las nu'abar g.yas pa las thor bu 'di la ste/ shing bal lam/ ras bal lta bur 'jam zhing shin tu 'jam
la cung zad kyang gnod pa med ba zhig byung ste/ desmin te rdzol pa las byis pa gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes la/ susakhu chen po 'amtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
brgyan pa zhig skyes te/ rkang pa ga las ba nas skyes so// rkang pa g.yas pa nas skyes so zhes zer nas/ mang mdzes pa mdzes pa zhes bya bar gyur to// byas pa de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar

zla gyur te/ des kyang gling gsum du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas pa lta bu dang/ da de ran rgyal bo mdzes pa 'ang rlu ga yon pa nas thor bu 'di lta ste/ shing bal gyi 'dabam 'am/ las ngal gyi
'dab ma lta bur 'jal zhing shin tu 'jam la cung zad kyang gnod pa med pa zhig byung ste/ de smin te rdol ba las/ byis pa gzugs bzang zhing ba ltan sdug la mdzes pa/ skyes bu chen po 'a mtshan sum

cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig skyes te/ rkang pa g.yon pa nas skyes so rkang pa ga yon pa nas skyes so zhes zer nas/ ming nye mdzes nyamadzes zhes bya bar gyur te/ byas pa de rdzu 'phrul che zhing

mthu che bar gyur te/ des kyang glang gnyis su rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas pa lta bu dang/ dpe ran rgyal po na mdzes kyi rkang pa'i stangag bel nas thor bu 'ang lta ste/ shing bal gyi la kha 'am/

ngas bal gyi lo ba la khur 'jam shin tu 'jam la gnod pa cung zad kyang med pa zhig byung ste/ desmin te rdol ba las byas pa gzugs pa tshang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes ba/ skyes bu chen po 'i mtshan la
nyurtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig skyes te/ rkang pa 'i sangag bilanas skyes so// rkang pa'i stong ga bel nas skyes so zhes zer nas/ ming mdzes ldan mdzes ldan zhes bya bar gyur te// byas pa de/

rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar gyur nas/ des kyang glingagacig tu rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas pa lta bu dang/ dpe na rgyal bo mdzes ldan gyi rkang pa'i 'og mthalas thor bu 'di lta ste/ shang ba/
gyil ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba lta bu 'jam zhing shin tu 'aa la gnod pa cung zad kyang med pa zhig byung ste/ de smin te rdol ba las byis pa gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa/ skyes
bu chen po 'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa zhig skyes// rkang ra 'a 'og gim thal nas skyes so rkang pa'og gi mthil nas skyes so zhes zer nas/ ming mdzes can s dzes can zhes bya bar

gyur te// byis ba de rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar gyur te/ des kyang 'dzam khu'i gling du rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas pa lta bu dang/ dper na yangs pa can n mang chen gyi skyed mos tshal du shing am
las bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhige skyes te/ mang ams skyong ma zhes bya bar gyur nas/ bu mo de'ang chos kyis tshogs kyi spyad par bya ba lta bu 'o// de la sogs pa gzhan
dag kyang brjod par bya ste/ de ltar na ma rnams la ded gsher las skye ba'i skyo gnas yod de/ mi rnams la rdzus te skye ba'i skyo gnas ji ltar yod cin/ smras pa/ dbor na bskal pa dang po pa/
[ ]@#/// thams cad rdzus te skyes pa lta bu dang/ dper na dge slong ma dgon pa ma skra bregs shing gos ngur smig gyon bzhin du dgon pa nas phyung ba lta bu 'o// de la sogs pa gzhan dag
kyang brjod par bya ste// de ltar na tsha rnams la rdzus te skyo ba'i skye gnas 'od do// ci'i phyir sems can dmyal ba rnams zhes bya zhen/ bas ba/ yid du 'ong ba med cing bde ba dang/ 'ad bde ba dang
ba/ bral ba'i phyi'ite/ rgyud nasems can dmyal ba rnams zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir dud 'gro rnams zhes bya zhen/ smas pa/ dud de 'gro zhing dud de 'ong bas na/ de'i phyir dud 'gro rnams zhes bya'o//
[ ]ci'i phyi'i mi rigs rnamaMs zhes bya zhen/ mas pa/ da ltar yi dwags rnams kyirgyal po ga sha'i rje skul bzhinate/ de'atshadi'i dusan yid bas rnams kyi rgyal kho pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ pha'i
yul du 'gro'o// tha'i yul nas 'ong ngo zhes zer nas/ ming la dgas yi dgas zhes bya bar gyur te/ rgyudason gdagasa rnams zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir mi rnams zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/
rgyal po nga las nu des bstan pa'i mi rnams ni las chen po 'a mchog blos skyes pa dang/ bsams te 'jal zhang bar bags nas/byed pa dang nga rtags shang gzhal te/ nye bar rtogs par byed pas
na ming ma zhes bya bar gyur te/ rgyu des nam rnams zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir lha rnams zhes bya zhen/ smras pa/ 'bar ba'i phyir na lha rnams zhes bya'o// gzhan yang 'gro ba rnams dang/ skye
kha rnams dang/ lus thob pa rnams kyi mchog lan pas na lha rnams zhes bya'o/ ca' khyer mtho ris zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can dag bde ba dang ldan zhing skyid la/ ga rnyed pa la da
cing gnod pa med pa'i tshes dang ldan te/ bde ba dang yid bde ba mchog dang/ gnod pa med pa'i bde ba dang/ bde ba'i tshor ba dang ldan pas na mtho ris zhes bya'o// ci'i phyi'i lha'i bu mo zhes
bya zhen/ sAs pa gsal zhing rtog pa med pa'i phyi'i lha'i khu'o zhes bya ba dang/ bag med cing dga' ba'ajishas ches ba'i phyi'i lha'abumo zhes bya ste rgyudes n lha'i bu mo rnams zhes bya'o//
rgyug dgas pa bam po bdun pa ste tha ma'o tsa'i phyi re ba zhes bya zhen/ mas ba/ nu zhesnyan par byed pa dang/ gso bar byed pa'i phyir ma zhu

bya ba dang/ mkhas shing blo dang ldan pa'i phyogi ma zhes byaste/ rgyu des na ma zhes bya'o// hra'aphyir ma zhes bya zhen/ snus pa/ skye ba 'grub pa la bu brgyud kyi las dang 'brel ba'i rgyu dang bo de yin pa/
dang rkyen pa'i bsan de 'phyi'i sa zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir zhang po zhig bya zhe na smos pa ma dang gas gcig tu 'brel bas na/ de'i phyir zhang bo zhes bya'o/[]/ci'i phyir tu bzhis bya'on/ snas pa
skyang ba'i ba la ni sa zhes bya ste/ 'di dag na bdag gi ba'i thabs so zhes bya bas na de'i phyir khu le zhes bya'odo ci'i phyir tshu nu zhes smos la/ gis las skal ba gcod pas na/ de'i phyir phu
u@#// zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir sring gozhas bya zhen sas ma/ gis las bkur stir bya ba dang bla mar bya ba dang/ rimor bya ba dang/ mchod pa'i bya ba dang/ a gror bya ba'i skal ba dbang
bsan/ de'i phyirasung lo zhes bya 'o// cu'i tshul las 'om 'byung la/ la las mi 'byung zhen/ skyas ba/ ma'i mngal nas skye ba dang 'brel bar gyur kyi/ phadang 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro//
gzhan yang ches lhag pa'i makhul khams kyi/ phan de ltar ma yin ti/ rgyudasan ma las 'o ma 'phyang g/ la las ma 'byungabo/ ci'i phyir bud med la 'gram pa dang kha pa med ce na/ snas la
ma ning khazhin du de'i dbang po rnams zhan pas na/ de'i phyir bud med la 'gram pa dang kha skya med go/ ci'i rimanang la 'gram skya dang kha spu med cen/ smras pa/ bud mad bzhin du de'i dbang po
( rnams zhan pas na/ de'i phyi ri 'gram myu dang kha spu med do// ci'i phyir rgyal bo zhes byazhin/ cas pa/ chos dang/ ngang tshul dang/ spyod tshul kun tu spyod pas 'khor ras par byed pas na/
de'i phyi'i rgyal bo zhes bya'o// ci'i phyi'i rgyal rigs zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ zhing rnams kyi bdag por gyur bas na/ de'i phyir rgyal rigs zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir bram ze zhes bya zhen/ snus
kha/ phyi rol du sems pas na bram rje zhes bya'o/ ci'i phyir rje'u rigs zhes bya zhe na/ smas pa nyon mongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i las byed pas na/ de'i phyir spre'arigs zhes
khya'o/ (pa'i phyir dmangs rigs zhes bya zhe na/ saa kha/ na las byed pa dang/ gzhed pa 'i las byed pas na/ de'i phyi'i dmangs rigs zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir gdol pa zhes bya zhe na/
snyas pa/ bskal pa dang po ba'i ma rnams su'ang kha la gyi malen ba las/ phyis zhig gas bar lo gyim byin par byas nas/ de rgyal po'asungs ma'i mis bzung ste/ rgyal rigs/
spyi banas dbang bskur ba'argyal bo'i khul nas/ lhamkhyen par mdzad du gsol// mi 'dasan parol gyim byin par blangs lags so// rgyal pos de dag las ba/ khyed deng la ma 'di
gsod cig cig byason/ mi de dag las su rangs de gsad par spro ba ma byung nas/ de dag las nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces smras te/ sumi 'dwagasod pa de la ngasazher gyi
phung bo chen po sbyin// de nas ma gzhan nor don du gnyer zhing der 'dod la nor la brkam zhinganor gyi des sdig can zhig gsal de bsad de// mi de bsad nas de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ mi 'di/
ni ga dum po zhig ste/ 'di lta skor den du gnyer ba rang/ nor 'dod pa dang/ nor la brkam pa dang/ der gyi nyes sdug gis mi sunas phyung zhing nyes pa med pa ngasad kyis/ mi 'di nangegs pa
med do// mi 'dizhig dum pa'o zhes zer nas/ mang ga ngol pa ga do' ba zhes bya bar gyur te/ rgyu des n gdol pa rnams zhes bya'o// chos mngon pa'i ngastan bcos chen po rgyug dgas pa las tshig
gru@#// balnga pa go//sdomani/ dud 'grosprul dang glang po rta/// jamo ba lang phyogs dang glang// rAdang 'jam dang drag pa dang// chu gnas bkren pa tshogs
po kyi sdom// ci'i phyir dud 'gro zhes bya zhen/ snyas pa/ sems can las ngashAn tu gnag pha dang ldan pa zhig 'od gsal gyi lca'i sa nas shi 'phos nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i mi rnams dang skal

bamanyam par bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ de 'are skyes nas des lag pa gnyis sa la btsugs te dud de 'gro ba las mang dud 'gro dud 'gro zhes bya bar gyur te/ rgyu des na dud 'gro rnams zhes
bya'o// ci'i phyi'i sbrul zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can las shani dug nag ma dang ldan pa zhig 'od gsal gyi la' ris nas sha 'phos nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam

par bskal pa dang po'i mo rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ de 'dir skyes nas rkang ba gnyis dang lag pa gnyis med par gyur te/ de ltos 'phyo ba'agyur bas na/ de dag la 'di skad du sems can 'di ltos 'bya'o/
sems can 'di ltos 'bya'o zhes zer nas/ ming lta 'phye ko'abyazhes bya bar gyur te/ rgyudes na skyul zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir glang po che zhes bya zhen/ smas pa/ sems can las ngan tu gnag pa dang
ldan pa zhige 'od gsal gyi lha'i rose nas shi 'i 'osanas 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par bskal pa dang po 'a mo rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ de 'dir skyes nas de lag paganyi

sa la btsugs te/ de'i sna ya nga rang bor gyur nas/ lag pas 'gro zhing/ lag pas 'ong bas minge glang po che glang po che zhes bya bar gyur te/ rgya des n mang bon rnams zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir rta zhes
bya zhen/ smas pa/ sems can lasangashanetu gnag pa dang ldan pa zhig 'od gsal gyi lcab ris nas sha 'ibos nas// 'jig rten gyi khams 'diri ma rnams dang skal ba mnyam par bskal pa dang po'i
ma rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ de 'dir skyes nas dgon pa'i gnasasu rgyu bar gyurato// de nas sems can de dag gis mthong nas/ 'di skad du e u'i zhes byas pa dang/ smas pa/ skye 'dinau'i
yang ma yin no zhes zer nas/ ming rta rta zhes bya bar gyur te rgyu des n rta rnams zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir rngamo zhes bya zhe na/ smas pa/ sems can las shan tuganag pa dang ldan pa zhig 'od gasal
gyi lha'i ris nas sha'e yos nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ma rnams dang skal ba mnyam par bskal pa dang po 'amo rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ de 'dir skyes nas mchu gnyis 'phyang la mgrin pa'i ng
gyi gu can du gyur nas// de dag 'di skad du mtshugs 'phyang ngo// mchu gnyis 'byung ngo zhes zer nas/ de dag gis de'i ming rnga mo zhes btags te/ rgyu des na rngamo rnams zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir kha/
lang zhes bya zhen/ sa pa/ sems can las shin tuganag pa dang ldan pa zhig 'od gsal gyi lha'i ring nas shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dires rnams dang skal ba mnyam par bskal
pa dang po 'i mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ de 'dir skyes nas sems can de tshogs kyi nang nas byung nas dgon pa ba gnas dgan zhing/ sems can de tshogs kyi nang du ma gnas/
ka pa'i lung de'i ming la lang zhes bya bar gyur te/ rgyudes nam lang rnams zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir phyugs zhes bya zhen/ smras pa/ sems can las shin tu gnag pa dang ldan pa zhig 'od gsal gyi lha'i
rgyu sa nas sha 'phos nas/ 'jig rtenagyi khams 'dir mi rnams dang skal bama'am kharakhaskag pa dang bo'amo rnams kyin ng du skyes te/ de'ar skyes nas dgon pa'i gnas rnams su rgyu ban/ mi'i
dag gis glanas 'dzin cing blo nas 'dzin pas na/ ming byugs zhes ba tags te/ rgyudasan zhing phyugs rnams zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir glang khu zhes bya zhen/ smras pa/ sems can las shanitu
gnag pa dang ldan pa zhig 'od gsal gyib risazhas sha'i khos nas/ 'jig rtenagyi khams 'diri rnams dang skal ba mnyam par bskal pa dang po'i mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ de 'di'i skyes

nas nigashanitu stobs che zhing kha la khyer ba'i phyir/ ming glang bu klung bu zhes bya bar gyur/ rgyudasan glang khu rnams zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir sems can khatsaganara'i stobs dang ldan/ khaci gnas dor
mo'astobs dang ldan/ kha cigamache ba'i stobs dang ldan par gyur cen/ sdusal/ sems can gang dag sngonamir gyur pan/ mtshon chas brgyan pa dang/ mtshonacha lag char thogs par gyute/
[@]dedag nyes ra spyod pa kun tu bsnyenatsang bsgoms te mang du byas pa de/ lus zhig nas sha ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro lig par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes te/ de dag sems can
dmyal ba rnams nas shi' bos nas/ las kyi lcag ma lus pa des dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur// der kha ciganadI'i stobs dang ldan/ kha cagazhisdor mo'i stobs dang ldan/ kha cig ni mche ba'i
stobs dang ldan par gyur te// myu des n kha cig norA'astegos dang ldan/ la cig na sder mo'astobs dang ldan/ kha cig naache ba'i stobs dang ldan par gyur to// ci'i phyir skyag shor bar gyur cen//
snas pa/ sa'i khams kyi shas che ba'i phyir ro// gzhan yang sam can gang dag sngon mar gyur pan/ lus kyi lasanub pa dang/ ngagag las rtsu ba pa dang/ yid kyi las rtsub pa de dag nyes par spyod
pa kun tu bsten cing bsgoms teadadu byas pa de/ lus zhig nas sha pe'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes te/ dedagadenas shi 'phos nas gal te mi rnams
dang skal ba mnyam par 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skyes na'ang las kyi lag ma lus pa des sdug shor bar gyur to// ci'i phyir sdu 'jam par gyur cen/ mas pa/ sems can gang dag sngon mir gyur pan/
lus kyi las rtsub pas khyas/ ngag galas rtsub pa ma byas/ yid kyi las rtsub pa ma byas te/ de dag legs par spyod pa kun tu bstan cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa de/ lus zhig nas shi
kha'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho se kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ des sha 'bos nas gal te a rnams dang skal ba mnyam par khams 'dir skyes na'ang las kyi/
lhag la lus pa des 'dzam par gyur te/ rgyu des n sba 'jam par gyur to// ci'i phyir dug drag par gyur cen/ smras pa/ gnod sems kyi shas che ba'i phyir ro// gzhan lang sems can gang
dag dug drag po dedag gi nang nas te zhingadu bas nye bosangashi 'phos pa rnams yin te/ de dag kyang gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sprul dang/ sdig pa dang/ sbrang rgod mdung gsum pa dang/ sbrang nod
mdung gsum pa chen po dang/ srin gyi mi la sogs pa ste/ rgyu des na dug drag por 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir dug drag poram 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ gnod sems med pa'i khams shas che ba'i/
byang re// gzhan yang sems can gang dag dug drag po ma yin pa de dag gnang nas nye zhing du bas nye bar sha'aphos pa rnams yin te// de dag kyang gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ drang srong rnams dang/ rab tu
byung ba rnams dang/ khyim bdag rnams dang/ gzugs dang/ gzugs med pan spyod pa'i lha rnams te/ rgyu des n dug drag por 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir chu na gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang
skal ba mnyam par skyabar 'gyur zhen/ sdus pa/ sems can gang dag skom zhing ga dus la bsams te/ tshul dod bzhin du 'chib de dag lus zhig nas chu na gnas pa'isims can rnams dang
skal bamahUm bar skye bar 'gyur ro// ci'i phyi'i bya rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur zhen/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag dog cing longs su gzir bar gyur te/ go skabs la
pa 'dod bzhin du 'chi ba de dag lus zhoge nas bya rnams dang skal bamanyam par skye bar 'gyur ro// 'gro bder smin par 'gyur ba'i las byas shing bsags pa las gyang 'gyur te/ chun gnas
pa rnams la'ang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// ci'i phyirasa' phyogs bkren pa zas dang skom nyung bams su skye bar 'gyur zhen/ smas pa/ sems can gang dag sngon mir gyur ban/ lus
kyi las rtsub po dang/ ngag gi las rtsub po dang/ yid kyi las rtsub por gyur pa de dag nyes par spyod pa kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te ming du byas pa de/ lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song
na 'gro log par lcang bsems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ gal te de nas shi 'phos nas khams 'di'i ma rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes na'ang las kyi lhag ma lus pa
des 'dings phyogs bkren pa zas dang skomanyung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyudas nas phyogs bkren ma thos dang skom nyung ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// ci'i phyires phyogs gshin pa zas

dang skom yod pa dag tu skyo bar 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag sngon mir gyur pan/lus kyi sna drang bo dang/ngag gi la drang bo dang/ li kyi las drang por gyur ba de dag legs par spyod pa kun tu
[e]// bsnyen cing bsgoms te mang du byas pa de lus zhig nas shakha'i 'og tu bde 'gromathoros kyi 'jig rten du lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ gal te de nas sha 'phos nas/
khams 'dirim rnams dang skal ba mnyam pa skyes na'ang/ las kyi lhag ma lus pa des 'dzungs phyogs gshin pa zas dang skoma med pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyu des nas phyogs gshin
pa thas dang skom mod ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// chos mngon pa'i bstanang chos dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rgyudang 'bras bu bstan pa rgyu gdags pa las tshogs bcu drug pa'o//
sngoman sems damu la sprul dang phyi ba tu// glang chen rta dang rngamo dang// ba lang bo khur dgas dang// ralug lnga rnams tshigs kyi sdom// sems can dmyalabadag nas shi 'phos pa
rnams kyi rnam pan gang dag yin/ mtshan man gang dag yin/ rtagasan gang dag yin zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dgaskal pa dang/ ngan pa la dga' ba dang mdegangan pa dang/
'jigs pa dang/ bag tsha ba dang snang skyen pa dang/ 'bros pa dang/ lus madog tshig pa ltar 'dug pa dang/ rmi lam na me dang/ ral gro dang// mdung thung dang/ mda' bo dang/ mtshon
cha nas 'bras lta bu dang/ mde'u thungadang/ lcags zangs dang/ 'khar zangs kyi nang du srogapa rmi ba'i dganaM/ kazhing du bas nye bar sems can dmyal ba d gnas shi 'phos pa yin
sems can dmyal ba dag nas sha 'thos ba rnams kyi rnam pan de dag yin no// mtshan man de dag yin no// rtags na de dag yonani/ padag gi nang nas ngasha 'thos pa rnams kyi rnam ban/
gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni kheng dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhen/ snas pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang/ rang bzhin gyis gnyid che ba dang/ rgod bag
can dang/ kha bub tu nyal ba dang/ nyal ba la rtag pa dang/ lce'abyin pa dang/ lce bldug pa dang/ khro skyen pa dang/ 'jebs par 'dug pa dang/ shas cher 'dug pa dang/ khon du 'dzin pa de
dag ni/ nye zhing du bas nye bar sprul dag gnang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ sbrul dag gnang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no// mtshan ma nadi dag yanen// rtags nadi dag/
yin no// bya ba dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pan gang dag yin M/ mtshan man gang dag yin zhen/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs ba dang/ rang
ba dang/ sumang ba dang/ gnod pa byed pa dang/ 'tshe bar byed pa dang/ khyig 'bigs pa dang/ mun pa'i nang du dga' ba dang/ kha zas myur ba myur bar za ba dang/ kha zas nyung ngus kyang chog
par 'dzin pa de dag ni/ te zhing du bas nye bar bya ba dag gnang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ bya ba dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no// mtshan man de ngag yane ne// rtags
na de dag yin no// kho dag gi nang nas sha'i thos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan man gang dag yin rtagasazhigang dag yin zhen/ smras pa/ sems
can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang/ sngarange ba dang/ myu mang ba dang sa gshor ba dang/ snying nye ba dang/ zas la gdung ba dang/ ngon shes pa la snang ba de dag ni/ nye zhing du
bas nye bar khyi dag ga nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ khyidag gnang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa nadi dag yin no// mtshan man di dag yin no// rtags na de dag yin no// glang po che dag gi nang
nas 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag len/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhen/ sa pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang/ su ring ba
dang/ spu mang ba dang/ spyi gshor ba dang/ lus ring ba dang/ che ba dang/ stobs dang ldan pa dang/ lte che ba dang/ lus kyi mdog ngan pa dang/ sna ring ba dang/ mdan la 'bur ba dang/ 'do
rtsi la dga' ba dang/ rkang pa zlum pa dang/ so drung mtho ba de dag ni/ na zhing du bas bar glang po che dag gnang nas sha 'gos pa yan te/ glang lo dgag nang nas sho'i phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni
dag yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag yin no// rtags na de dag yin no// rdo dag ga nang nas shi 'i phos ba rnams kyi rnam pa zhig bdag la// mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtagasazhigang dag yin/
zhen/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag shugs chung zhing mgyogs pa dang/ spurang bdang/ smra mang ba dang/ sdug shor ba dang/ rta skad 'byin pa dang/ brgyan pa la dga' ba dang/ rten mongs pa'i
shas che ba de dag ni/ te zhingadus bas nye bar rta dag gnang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pani de dag yin no// mtshan manAdedag yin no// rtagasan dedag yin no// rngamo dag gnang nas nigashi 'pho
pa rnams kyi chas pa nigang dag yin/ mtshan mgang dag yani/ rtagasazhigang dag lanI zhen/ saa pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang/ sa ring ba dang/ smra ang ba/
dang sngagashor ba dang/ stobs che ba dang/ skya ring ba dang/ mtshub phyang ba dang/ mgrin pa gye gung 'dug pa de dag ni/ nye zhing du bas nye bar dramo dag ga nang nas sha'i thos pa yin te/ o dag
gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pan de dag yin no// mtshan manadi dag yin na// rtags ni de dag yin no// ba lang dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam panagangadag yin/ mtshan/
man gang dag lan rtagasanagang dag yin zhen/ lcas pa sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang/ spu ring ba dang/ stsamang ba dang/ smra gshor ba dang/ lte tsha ba dang/ sto=
che ba dang lu ba dang/ zlosAshing bldad pa dang/ meng du za ba dang tsA'is 'bur ba de dgan/ nye zhing dubs nye bar ba lo nga dag gnang nas sha'i thos pa yin te/ ba lang dag gnang nas zhi
'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pan de dag yanano// mtshan man de dag yin no// rtags na de dag yanand/ bong bu dag ga nang nas sho de thos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yani/
mi 1 mtshan mnaging dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na/ sa pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang/ spu ring ba dang sba mang ba dang/ gsher ba dang bumAgasus
por 'dug pa dang/ sa rko ba dang/ sad a snyan pa dang dung skad can dang/ mi gtsang ba 'das pa de dag ni/ nye zhing du bas nye bar bong bu dag gi nang nas sha 'phos pa yin te/ bong bu dag gi nang nas
ha'e bos pa rnams kyi rnam panade dag yin no// mtshan manadi dag la rta no// rtagasanadi dag yin no// ri dgas kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pazhigang dag yan/ mtshan mani gang dag
yin/ rtags ni gang dag yA'e zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang/ sbyaring ba dang/ smra mang ba dang/ sbyagasher ba dang 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba dang/
pa snang skyon pa dang/ 'bros pa dang/ dgon par dga' zhing der mngon par dga' bad dag ni/ che zhing du bas nye bar ri dwags ngag gi nang nas sha 'as pa yan te/ ri degs rnams kyi nang nas shate sa
[']ba rnams kyi rnam pa na de dag yin no// mtshan a ni de dag yin no/ rtagasanadi dag yin no// ra dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/
rtags ni gang dag yin zhen smas pa/ sems can gang dag shug myur zhing mgyogs pa dang/ sa ring ba dang/ sra mang ba dang/ smra gsher ba dang/ shing 'cha' ba dang/ ya nga bar rgyu ba dang
nyi ma la dga' ba dang/ lcags pa la sngar ba de dgan/ rta zhing dungs te bang ra dag gnang nas sha'aphos pa yin te/ ra dag ga nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa na de dag yin no/ mtshan ma
na de dag yin no// rtags na de dag ya te nolug dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni legang dag yin/ mtshan ma naseng dag yani/ rtags ni gang dag ya zhen/ smras pa/ ses
nagang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang/ sbyarang ba dang stsa mang ba dang/ myu 'jam pa dang/ mong skul ba dang/ sa rdul myong bar byed pa dang/ mgo 'phang snang de 'greng dang/ snabs
palas kar kha seng re ni zhing sa'i bar lag dag gnang nas shi 'phos pa lan te/ lag dag ga nang nas ga'aphos pa rnams kyi rnam par de dag yin no// mtshan ma ni de dag
yin no// rtags 'di dag yin no// 'a dag gi nang nas rab pos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na sa pa// sems can gang
ngag gcam bu dang/ lutser smub dang/ spyi brtol can dang/ snying range ba dang/ byas pa ma gzo bdang/ sAngarje med pa dang dgang dka' ba dang/ ma byin par len pa dang/ gsog 'jogo/
[2] . ]/byed pa dang/ ca co can de dganaM/ lta zhing du bas nye bar lnga dag ga nang nas sha'i khos ra yin te/ 'a dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa na de dag yin no//
kha1 mtshan man de dag yin no// rtagasanadi dag yin no// tshesa mngon pa'i bstan bcos chen po rgyu gdags pa las tshigs bcu bdun pa 'o// sngomani phag dang spre'u
domo rnams dang/ lce sbyang sbyang ko 'i phrar ba dred// gung dang stag dang sengage dang/ klu dang de bzhin dri za dang// yi dgas dang ni mi rnams dang// lha rnams tshigs kyi sdom du byas/ phage/
dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa na gang dag yin/ mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ gas na gang dag yin zhen/ sbas pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa
dang spu ring ba dang/ smra mang ba dang/ skya gshor ba dang/ bum gsus par 'dug pa dang/ gdong ring ba dang/ sna 'khor lo ltar 'dug pa dang/ sa rdul gyi nang du 'grib dang/ ngan pa za
ni bdang mogatsang ba kun tu spyod pa dang/ so drung mtho ba de dag ni/ ta zhing du bas pag dgaganang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ bag dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam banadi dag yin no/
mtshan manadi dag yin no// rtagasanadi dag yig smra 'jug gnang nas shi 'phos ba rnams kyi rnam pan gang dag yin/ mtshan ma zhig nga dag yin/ gsan gang dag lan zhin/ smras pa
sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang/ sdung ba dang/ sprulang pa dang/ skya 'jam pa dang/ spre'u 'dra ba dang/ dmar ser du 'dug pa dang/ shing la dga' ba dang/ ri
thog la dga' ba dang 'go ba la dga' ba dang/ shing la 'dzeg pa dang 'dzegs nas kyang 'dzeg pa la yun ring ba dang/ thams cad du'ang mal gcig nam 'dug pa de dag ni/ nye zhing
du bas nye bar snga'adugaganang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ so bdag ga nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa nadi dag yin no// mtshan mni de dag yin no// rtagasanadi dag yin no// des
dag gnang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam panagang dag yin/ mtshan man gang dag yin/ rtogs na gang dag yin zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa
dang skya ring ba dang/ smra mang ba dang/ sbagasher ba dang/ ma rur can dang/ tugaring can dang/ lus 'gul ba dang ngu ba dang/ la dga' ba kha ba shing thogo la dga' ba dang/
'dzeg pa lo dga' ba dang shing la dga' ba de dag ni/ nyezhing du bas nye bar demo dag ga nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ des dag gi nang na ngashi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa na de dag yin no/
mtshan man de dag yin no/ rtagasanadi dag yin no// lu sbyang dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnyes pa naseng dag yin/ mtshan ma gangadag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhen/
sa pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang/ spu ring ba dang/ snyam ng ba dang/ phywa gsher ba dang/ g.yo byed pa dang ga yon can dang/ rgyu
can dang/ dbyen byed pa deng mtshang 'drub dang/ sdod yul spyod pa dgan/ zhi zhing du bas nye bar lu sbyang drag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa late/ lce spyang dag gnang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi
a pan de dag yin no// mtshan ma na de dag yi rtano// rtags na de dag yin no// spyang ki dag gnang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnams bzhigang dag yani/ mtshan ma gang dag yin/ rtag
zla ni gang dag la nazhen/ sbas pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang/ sbyaring ba dang/ smra mang ba dang/ smra gshor ba dang/ gcam bu dang mu cor sma ba dang/ spyi

b.lo che pa dang/ snying brtse ba med pa dang/ snying rje med pa dang/ snying ring ba dang/ byas pa mi gzo ba dang/ sha khrag za zhing 'thung ba de dag na nye zhing du bas nye bar sbyang dgaganen gnas /
'phos pa yin/ sbyang ki dag gnang nas sha'igos pa rnams kyi rnam pa nodi drag yin nod/ mtshan manadedag yin no// rtags dedag yono// sbyang gi rjelta ba bzhin du 'phar ba dang/ dred dang
gung rnams kyang dengang 'dra bar sbyar ro// stag dag ga nang nas sha'aphos pa rnams kyi rnam pa nigang dag yin/ mtshan mani gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhin/ sa khaM/ sems can gang
dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang/ gyurang ba dang/ sumang ba dang/ sra gsher ba dang/ dma' ba dang/ gtum pa dang/ rtsal che ba dang/ gcam bu dang/ mu tsher sna ba dang spyi la
che bdang/ stong la rtse ba med pa dang/ snying med pa dang/ snying dang pa dang/ byas pa la gathob dang/ sha khrag za zhing 'thung ba de dag ni'u zhing dubs nye bar stag dag gnang nas ba'angos
pa yin te/ stag dag gnang nas shi 'thos pa rnams kyi rnam pan ni dag yin no// mtshan mdi dag yin no// rtags ni de dag yin no// seng ge dag ga nang nas shi'os pa rnams kyi rnam pa
nagang dag yin/ mtshan man gang dag lan/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na sas pa/ sems can g nga dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang spu range nga dang/ su mngam dang gshol ba
dang dba' ba dang/ gdum kha dang/ stobasache ba dang/ snying brtse ba yod pa dang/ snying rdzab med pa dang/ sha khrag zazhing 'thung ba dang/ gsar pa thob de dag ni/ zhing dubs te bar seng ge
dag gnang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ seng ge dgaganang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam panadi dag yin no// mtshan an de dag yin no// rtags ni de dag ya cheno// ku dag ga nang nas shi 'phos pa
rnams kyi rnam pa na gang dag lan/ mtshan man gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhen/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag shugs myur zhing mgyogs pa dang rang bzhin gyis gde che ba dang
kha bub tu nyal ba dang/ nyal ba la rtags pa dang/ chu la dga' ba dang/ ser sna che ba dang/ yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa dang/ ma skorab 'i rang bzhin can de dag ni/ nye zhing du
bas nye bar klu dag gnang nas shi' thos pa yin te/ klu dag gnang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no/ mtshan manari dag yanen// rtags ni de dag yin no// dri za dgaganang nas
'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag lan/ mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhe na/ smras pa/ sems can gang dag gzugs bzang zhing bstan sdug la mdzes pa dang/ rol mo

spyod pa dang/ silasnyan dang/ phag rdzob pa la spyod pa dang/ rtsed mo la sred pa dang/ dog dag 'dagur spyod pa la srid pa de dag ni/ zhe zhing dubasazhe bar dra thadag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/
driwadag ga nang nas sha'e yos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no// mtshan man de dag nano// rtags na de dag yin no// ya dgas dag ga nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa nag nga dgu yin/
mtshan ma ni gang dag yin/ rtagasanagi nga dag yin zhen/ snyas pa/ sems can gang dag skem pa dang/ ngan pa la dga' ba dang/ mdog ngan pa dang/ gsus pa che ba dang/ phra ma zer ba dang/
sor snache ba dang/ 'jungs pa dang/ yo byad rnams kun tu 'dzin pa dang/ lag gis kha zas rul bar byed pa dang/ kho samang pos kyang ma 'grangs pa de dag ni/ zhe zhing du bas nye bar yi dgas dag
gnang nas shi 'phos pa yin te/ la dgas dag ga nang nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yanano// mtshan ma ni de dag yan no// rtags na de dag yin no// mdag gi nang nas sha'epo
pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni gang dag yin/ mtshan anagang dag yin/ rtags ni gang dag yin zhen/ snyas pa sems can gang dag las la srid pa dang/ bal sred nga dang/ thabs shes
ba dang/ tha ma la gus pa dang/ sri zhu che ba dang/ rtog pa'i rang bzhin can dang/ dge ba gang yin pa tshol ba de dag ni/ nye zhing du bas nye bar mi dag gi nang nas shi 'phos pa pa/ti/ mi dag
gnang nas shA 'bos ba rnams kyizhes pa nadedug lani/ mtshan la nadi dag yin no// rtags na de dag yin no/ lta dug gnang nas shi 'khos pa rnams kyi rnam pa zhigang dag yin/ mtshan
nigang dag yin/ rtagasan seng dag yin zhan/ sa pa/ sems can gang dgagazugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes mang/ banam lo med pa dang/ bden par smra ba de dag ni/
ta zhing du bas te bar lta dag gnang nasasha'aphos pa yin te/ lha dag ga nang nas shi'i bos pa rnams kyi rnam pa ni de dag yin no mtshan manodi dag par no/ rtagasanadi dag yin no// de rnams
dang lus thob pa gzhan dag kyang rtogs par byas nas/ gzhi ji lta ba bzhin du brjod par bste yi ge angs su dregs pa'i re ma sos so/ chos mngon pa 'i ra tos chen po rgyu gangags
sdomani/ shange bzhi dang ni mar bcas// ras bal rgunadang gye gu dang// de bzhin drang po phyogs gcig dang/
ba 'byang banus 'di na tshas mtha' rdzogs// ci'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i shing thams cad kyi nang nas shing 'dzam bu de dag gi mchog ces bya zhen/ snas pa/ 'jig rten 'chags
pa'itsha/ khams kyi mchog dang/ snying bo 'ai chog dang/ bzang po 'a ne chog dang/ 'ong gA mchog gang yin pa de phyog sade ra rlung gis bsdus nas de la de grub par gyur te rgya de san 'dzam bu'i

grangag shing thams cad kyi nang skashange 'dzam bu de dag ga mchog ces bya'o// ci'i phyir rgya mtshe'o'agram gyi shing thams cad kyi nang nas/ shing shal ma la ma thon bo de dag bgaachog ces bya zhen/
snas pa/ 'jig rten 'chags pa'i tshe/ khams kyi mchog dang snying po 'a mchog dang/ bzang po'a mchog dang/ zeng ge mchog gang yin pa de phyogs der rlung gis bsdus nas de la de grub

rgyu 'i gyur// rgyu des n rgya mtsho'i 'gram gyi shing thams cad kyi nang na shing shal ma la mthon po de dag gi mchog ces bya'o// ci'i phyir lca ma yan gyi res kyi shing thams cad kyi nang nangashang pa ta la sna
tshogs can de dag gi mchog ces bya zhen/ lcas pa/ 'jib rten 'chags la 'tshe lo las kyi mchog dang/ snying po'am chog dang/ bzang ba'i mchog dang/ tshong go mi chog gang lan pa de
phyogs der rlung dag gis bsdus nas de las de grub par gyur te rgyades na lha ma yin gi res kyi shing thams cad kyi nang na shang pa ta la snyatshogs can de dag gi ma chog ces bya'o/ ci'i dasum cu
rtsa gsum pa'i shing thams cad kyi nang na shing los 'dus brtel de dag ga mchog ces bya zhe na/ snyas pa/ 'jig rten 'chags pa tshe/ khams kyi mchog dang/ snying po'i mchog dang/ bzang
ba'i mchog dang/ zeng ga mchog gang yin pa de phyogs de mngags bsdus nas de grub par gyur rgya des nasum cu rtsa gsum pa'i shing thams cad kyi nang shing yos 'dus bdel de dag gi
mchog ces bya'o// ci'i phyir sos ka dang dbyarashing kha cig lam yod pa dang/ me tog yod pa dang/ 'bras bu yod par 'gyur la/ shang kha cig na le ma med pa dang/ me tog med pa
dang/ 'bras bu med par 'gyur zhen/ snyas ba/ zla ba drug tam byang phyogs na 'dug ste/ byang phyogasan 'dug pa na/ dpag tshad bzhi khri nas nyi ma 'od zer rnams byung nas de rnamA
su 'bab ste/ des n rgya mtsho chen po'i bsil bar 'gyural/ chubs lab de 'ang gling rnams kyi nang na 'greste/ shing gang dag chu bsil ba des bde bang skye bar 'gyur ba'i shing dodag ni lo ma
yod pa dang/ me tog yod pa dang/ 'bras bu yod par 'gyur la/ shing gang dag chub sal ba des bde bar skye bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni khom med pa dang/ me tog med pa dang 'bras bu
[3s ]// med par 'gyur te/ rgya des nasos ka dang dbyar dang ba cig lo ma lod pa dang/ me tog yod pa dang/ 'bras bu yod par 'gyur la/ shang ka tsagan 'khom med pa dang
kakyi/ ma tog med pa dang/ 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir dgungashang kha cig lo ma lod pa dang/ me tog yod pa dang/ 'bras bu yod par 'gyur la/ shing la cig na lo ma med pa dang/
ma rtog med pa dang 'bras bu med par 'gyur zhe na/ smras pa// zla ba drug nyi ma lta phyogs na 'dug ste lce phyogs na 'dug pa na/ dpag tshad bzhi khron ta a' 'od zer rnams byun gnas

mtsho chen por 'bab sta/ des na rgya mtsho chen po'i chu dro bar 'gyur la chu dren po de'ang rlung rnams kyi nang du 'gro ste/ shing gang dag chu dron po des bde bar skyo bar 'gyur parishang de dag ni lam
yod pa dang/ me tog yod pa dang/ 'bras bu yod par 'gyur la/ shing gangad ga chu dran po des bde bar skye bar mi 'gyur ba dedagani la ma med pa dang/ me tog med pa dang/ 'bras bu
da nga ra 'gyur te/ rgyudes na dgunangashing kha cig la lo ma lod pa dang/ me tog yod pa dang/ 'bras bu yod par 'gyur la/ shing kha hawen lam med pa dad/ ma rtos mer pa dang/ 'bras
bumed par 'gyur ro// ci'i phyi'i sapal zhes bya zhe na/ smras pa/ bskal pa dang po 'amo rnams kyi dpag bsam shing las rag byung ba gang yin pa de'i rgyu mthun pa las byung na de yin te/ rgyu
dusanas bal zhes bya// ci'i phyire rgyan zhen smras pa/ bskal pa dang po 'o e rnams kyi rigs kyi lcam bur gyur pa gang yin pa de'i rgyu bathun pa las byung ba na de yin te chu des na rgyan
zhes bya'o// ci'i phyi rer shing kha tsage gyagur 'dug la/ kha cig drang por 'dug cen snas pa/ rlung gi debeng gis 'gyur te/ shang gang dag la rlung rnams 'thun par 'gyur ba de dag ni dud
por 'gyur ro// shing gang dag la rlung rnams mo mthun par gyur pa de dag na gyi gur 'dug ste/ rgyudasan shing kha cig gyi gur 'a dug la/ kha cig drang por 'dug ka/ ci'i phyir chu gcig gi brgyan pa'i
sa phyogs gcig tu shing khagosnatshogs dang/ rtags snatshogs dang/ dbyibs sna tshogs su gyur kha dego gcig par mAgyur gas gcig par ma gyur/ dbyangs gcig pam
gyur cen/ mas pa/ sa donagyi dbang gis 'gyur te/ sa ban rdzaltar 'dug pa de bzhazhedus 'dusa'i bcud len par byed/ tshul ng nu'i bachad len par byed/ me'ang me'i bcud len par
byed/ chung yang rung ba nyid len par byed de/ rgyu des na nu gcig gis brgyan pa'i sa phyogs gcig tu shing kha dog sna tshogis dang/ rtags sna tshogs dang/ nga byibs sna tshogs su gyur te/pa
rig gcig par ma gyur/ rtags gcig par magyur/ dbyibs gcig par gyur te// ci'i phyir shing thams cad la 'byung po yod par 'gyur te// 'byung po rnams kyis dben pa ra su rgyu
can smas pa// 'jig rten 'chags pa'i tshe/ shang snang bar byed pa'i 'byung po'i bdag po bzhi tsan dan gyi shing chen po zhig la bo/nas par gyur to// 'byung po
lhag ma rnams nadi yin pa 'a shing dag la gnas bar gyur to/de dag gi thog ma gzhas su byas pas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud do// gzhan yang gyong pa gnas par gyur pa dang 'byung
po dag gis shing dag la gnam skye bgamed pa dang/ mchod rten gyi gnas lta bu dang/ gtsang pa dang/ yid du 'ong ba dang/ bstan pa'i 'osasubyas ta rma bag med par gyur pa dang/ mchod
gyi gnas lta bur gyur pa dang/ gtsang bar gyur pa dang yid du 'ong bar gyur pa dang/ rten pa'i 'os su gyur pa'i phyir/ 'byung po dag gis shing rnams gnas su byas te/ rgyu des na shing thams cad
la khyung po yod par 'gyur te/ 'byung po rnams kyis dben par ma gyur to// chos kyi rig pa'i skabs bya ba dang/ den dang/ rgyudang/ 'bras bu rmos pa zlog par byed pa/ bzang 'gre thob par
byed pa/ sdug pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ nyan thos kyis khartags pa'i chos mngon pa gdags pa'i bstan bcos gdags pa las tshigs bcu dag
rgyu ga dgas ba rdzogs te gtis ba'o/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzinaa tAdang/ pradzA warma dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba brje le9shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing
zhus te gtan la phab pa//ga rgyu// dgra bcom pa dge 'dun 'phel gyis lung bstan pa// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal la
'doskad bdag gas slob dpon gyis bshad pa ches pa na/ yul 'di'i gtsug lag khang bunyazhes bya ba'i dgra bcom pa dge 'dun 'phel zhes bya ba gsum rig pa/ mngon par shig pa theb pa/ rnam
par thar ba brgyad la bsam gtan pa zhig/ dus gzhan zhig na/ slob ma zhig dang thabs cig tu dbyar zla bgasum 'gig tshogs kyir zhes bya ba la bzhugs te/ slobam bane tshos 'dul ba la skyo ba bzhis/

lags na/ sangs rgyas mya ngan lasazhus nyis stong 'tsho ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rgya gar gyi yul ko'u sham pa zhes bya bar nub par 'gyur ro zhes rjes nas/ 'disnyam du rgya gar yul gyi chos de
tsam zhig na yul ko'u sham ba'i nub par 'gyur ba zhig na/ la lul la sogs pa gzhan gyi chos yun sprod cig tu gnas par 'gyur/ nam 'jig/ rkyen ni ga nga gi 'jig par 'gyur snyam du the tshom skyes
