sogo/ de nas dgra bcom pa de 'phrod kyi dus kyatsho nang du yang dag 'gol las bzhengs pa dang slob ma des mkhan po'i zhabs la lan lag lngas phyag btsal nas/ 'di skad ces the tsom nyes
so// slob dpon ston pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa le nyis ston 'ajig bar lung bsazhan/ la yul 'di la sogs pa lul gzhan gyi bstan pa ji srid du gnas par 'gyur/ a
@# ]'jig/ rkyen gang gis 'jig par 'gyur ba lags/ de nas mkhan pos bka' stsal pa/ bu khyod kyis la yul la sogs pa'i skye bo mang po'i denodang/ bde bar gshewa/
da/ pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir the tsom dris pa legs kyis/ legs pa nyon la yid la zung shig dang/ la lul la sogs pa'i bstan pa ji srid du gnas par 'gyur/ naa 'jig
dang skyon gang gis 'dzeg bar 'gyur bas ngasasosar lung bstan par bya'o/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa na/ bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'dasanas lo stong lnga brgya len pa dang/ lul/
yul du dad pa med pa rnams 'byung zhing/ dam pa'i chos 'jig tu rgol 'go/ de'i tshe la yul 'dir dad pa med pa'i rgyal po'ang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ yul lang rgyal pos phan tshun rtod cing 'phrog par
'gyur ro// de phyin chadan yul lang nyidag cage bzhin du nyams par 'gyur/ grong dang gtsug lag khang la sogs pa'i ng phal chos stongs par 'gyur/ ma rnams kyang nyani ga cig bshan du bu ri pang dke
mtshog gsum la dad pa khri bar 'gyur ro// rgyu des nd kon mchog gsum dang/ tshes sna bdang/ bsam ga tan pa kun kyang mtshoda gnas asum byed cing mu stobs kyi rgyal po dang/ blon po dang/
yul 'dzin pa dang/ khyim bdag rnams kyang chos dang ma mthun pa 'a phyogs 'dzani cing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro// chos dang 'thun pa ma 'a ra dang/ ma brtags pa dang
bab col gyi lo ngos spyod kyang sogs par byed par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i 'og tu dge slong dang// dge slong ma rnams 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyi phyi'i dbyen sbyobar 'gyur te/ chos 'dul ba las 'byung//
dge sbyong gi tshul spyod pa nizhi ba dang/ dul ba dang/ tsha mes pa dang/ khrel yod pa la sogs pa yal bar 'gyur zhing/ zhing dang/ lcamo ra dang/ lto tshang dang/ bskyi bar dang/ slongs
mo ba rnams kyis 'tsho bar byed do// khyim pas bsub par bya ba 'baze dang/ khyim gyisonamadang/ 'thab rtsod dang/ sgo gsol rngams po che'ang byed par 'gyur// pho nyar lang 'gro bar byed
las kyi ga'aphang dang/ 'jang yang tshol bar byed par 'gyur te/ de'atshon gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa lam gnas shang/ bde bar gshegs pa'i gdams ngag la la bar bor te/ yang
dang yang dum kha dang/ grong dang/ tshong dus dang/ srang dang/ mdosumana gnas par sems dga' bar 'gyur/ bran dang/ branamo dang/ rkang 'gros kyang tshol bar byed do// rgyu des
na khyim bdag dang/ dul 'dzin pa dang/ blon po la sogs pas kyang de dag la rim gro ma byed cing dad pa phyi'i 'tshog nas/ dgena mchog gsum dang/ dge 'dun rgya dekor la'ang 'phrog par byed
de khyim pa de dag gis kyang nor rdzas derag la bstan cing spyad pas bsod nams 'drwa 'gyur ro// rgyu des n la yul la sogs par gnod pa sna tshogs 'byung zhing le zhang dmas par 'gyur
te rtsod pa dang/ nadadang/ dus ma yin pa'i charal dang/ rlung dang/ dgra mang bo 'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dus ma yin pa'i sad dang/ srin bu dang/ bye ba dang/
ka bya ba 'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe sems can rnams nang ma mthun par 'gyur zhing/ dus tshigs kyang 'chol par 'gyur te/ de ltar na yul gang dang gang du chos lugs lag la byed pa der ni gdo/
pa de dag 'khyong bar 'gyur ro// de'atshol yul la sogs pa'i rgyal po dang/ blon po la sogs pa ya rabs las kyang/ dkon mchog la snying thag pa nas dad pa 'ga' tsam las ma 'byung na/
la la la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ rgyud lta bu san la yul la sogs pa de dkon mchog gsum gyi mchod gnas khams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur ro// de nas la lul la sogs par
dge slong gi gnas/ sngon rgyal po la sogs pa dod pa can gyis byas pa'i ng/ blon po la sogs pa dod pamed pa rnams kyis btsan phrogs su khrogs nas bdag nyid gnas par byed de/
dge slong rnams kyang 'khyamasanas/ 'tsho ba dang/ chos gos dang/ gnus kyis 'phongs par 'gyur ro// blon po la sogs pa de dag gis dge slong gi zhing dudang/ lcamar la sogs pa yo
byad rnams kyang btsan thabs su 'phrog par byed/ lha 'bangs dang/ nang gigayog rnams kyang dge slong ga ngag mi nyan cing gnya' rengs su byed par 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong rnams kyis kyang
de lta bu du gyur bar shes nas/ yi mug lta la tshul gyi dge slong rnams phan tshun du gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ yu bu cag rnams gtsug lag khang tshar ma zhes bya ba dang po dang chos 'byung pa'i
gnas der 'du'o zhes sbrananas gtsug la khang der 'dus te/ dpyid zla tha chung tshos ngaco lnga'i nub mo gso sbyong byas nas/ gcig la gcig 'di skad du/ yu bu cag rnams sngon bag med par gyur/
sa[0f10 ]mkhasapa tshos dang 'thun pa rnams la dbang thos pa'i rgyus/ da ltar khyim pa rnams kyis kyang rtsis la 'ang med khar byas te/ dana'atsho ba'ami 'byor na/ phyin chad gang du 'dong thabs
ni gang gis 'tsho bar bya zhes smos te de'i tshe thams cad kyisaM tsho ri chen 'debs par 'gyur ro// de nas de 'tsho bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i lha/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byas pa
gze ba thams cad kyang gtsug lag khang der 'dus te/ gcig la gcig blta zhing 'di skad du/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa na'i nge po ma gnas so// lul pa 'di'ang stongs par 'gyur ro
zhes mya ngan byed cing ngu bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe dge slong de dag 'dasnyam du yul 'dir ni'atsho bam 'byor na'adi ber te/ yul gzhan du 'gro bar bya'osnyam du sems 'thun par gyur nas/ gang
'dang bar bya zhes gros byas te/ lul nye ba gzhan dang gzhan n nidad pa med pa gang gis gang/ rgya gar yul du 'dong dun lam ma thar pas bod kyi lul nadakena mchog gsum la mchod gnas su byed ces gsA
ba der 'gro bar byas nas/ chu 'di la 'dong ngo zhes dus btabanas/ de'atshubamo gtsug lag khang tshar mar zhag ge/ nam langs pa dang/ bud med dad pa can zhig gis
gdan chung la spyan drangs// de nas gtidi pa drungs nas/ dge 'dun spyis gtsug lag khang bskor te mchod pa byas pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi gdan khri shog gs pa'i gseb nas/

sgromakha tha rabs can zhig snang bar 'gyur te/ de nas sgrom bu de phye ba dang/ de'i nang nas gser las byas pa'i kha zas sder cha bdun byung ste/ dge slong kun gyis de blangs te/ 'brur bsgyur nas dge
'danan dbyar zla ba gsum gtsug lag khang tshar gar tshul du 'jug pa'i tshobasbyang nas/ zang lcags las lul byung// 'gro ba'i 'o ma brgyags dang khur khal sbya'o// dbyar zla ba gsum 'das
sbyo sa 'di skad du/ su byacaga rnams byin gyis brlabasabarlabs pa'i lul 'di'i ltas la 'gro bar bya'o zhes smos te sen gnas / 'phags pa sa'i snying po'i gnas gtsug lag khang la shes ni zhes bya

rgyu ba'i drung du phyin pa dang/ de'atshikhrag la mchod rten 'og gzhi ring ba zhig yod pa jib pa 'anang nas gser bong chen po zhu gi gsigang ba shag byung ba dang de'ang blangs te 'brur bskyang nas/ phyogs der
dgun zla ba gsum gnas pa'i tshe ba sbyar te/ de nas dpyad byung ste 'gro ba'i dus la bab nas song ste/ shes chu 'og ma rgal ba dang/ lul mistod pa rnams kyis las logs sugadugs tshod sbyar nas
nyi ma re re zhing gtsug lag khang dag tu/dugs tshod gsol bar 'gyur ro// de ba tshi yul misad ba rnams kyis kyang dge slong rnams yul byung ste 'gro zhes zes nas/ dge 'dun de dag gtsug lag
khang tseng zhes bya ba'i sbyan drangasanas zhag bdun gyi bar du bshos sbyor bar 'gyug/ de'i tshe la yu lan gnas pa'i klathams cad 'disnyam du/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni rmeg med par
gyur la thug gosnyam dul na byed tsang bstan ba gnas bar bya ba'i phyiri char chen po 'khasta/ char ba des gtsug lag khangatsang zhes bya ba'i nang namachod rten gyi gzhi zhig yod panas/ gsod po
gsar phye sa gang bzhig byung ba dang/ de 'ang dge 'dun gyis tshes nas/ dpyid kyi tshor ba yo byang nams sbyor bar 'gyur ro// de nas lang yul gyi smad pa rnams kyis gtsug lag khang sa la'i tshal
zhes bya bar dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs nas/ zhag bdun gyi gdugs tshod gsol nas/ shog bdun len po 'i ton par yul stod smad kyi lo thams cad gtsug lag khang sa na bzhir 'dus nas/
dge 'dun la rdzongs dang khur kha'a'abul lo/ de'i tshatshargan rgon rnams n bslab kha 'dzazhi par byed/ gzhon nu rnams narkyang man lta zhing gdamos 'debs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur// de tshe/
mkhar dge ba can gyi nas kyang naMrganargan gcig gis gos kha dog bsgyur ba dang/ lam du 'jug pa'i yo byadaso so nas thogs nas/ so so'i dag kha'i bshes ga rten dge slong de dgag mdun du lhags
ny+tsa nas/ 'bags pa rnams brjod par ba shags nga shage cesas shing mchis te phyag 'tshal bar 'gyuro// de'i tshig tshod bde zhi penaku sha'i grong khyer gyiso nams bam ldan 'das/
mya ngan las 'da' bar shes nas/ myangs byed bzhin dumachod pa dang 'dra bar la lul dud kematshog gsum mchod pa 'cham yin no// de ra'ig tu dge slong rnams gtsug lag khang de nas bod yul
sasu chas ba dang/ lam kanumachod rten ring ba zhig gi drung du dpal lha e chen mes dge 'dun gyi ched du gser gyi dong tse phu rung gang bzhag pa redanas/ dge 'dun gyis de bgos te/ lamagyi
tshordzas sbyor bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshil lulargyamakharagatsug lag khang kas razhes bya ba na/ rgyalAgis las skyes pa'i yon bdag gcig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ yon bdag des dge 'dun rnams
zhag bdun du mchod ston gsol bar 'gyur// de 'tshimachod ston gsol ba de ni lo yul du dge 'dun tshod ston gsol pa'i tha ma yin no// de nas dge slong rnams me skar gyi lam du zhugs te song
ba dang/ de'i tshige slong bo mi gsar bu las pa la cher rang rang gi slob dpon dang mkhan po latshes shes khul te/ bzed bar gsol nas slar lul du lhag par 'gyur ro// dge slong lo me gsar
bu kha cig na la tu byung ba'i dengos po ma gtong zhing/ dzam la sogs pa'i gten skyel du 'ongs ba rnams la mya ngan gyi tshig sna zhingadus nas/ gnyen rnams phyir zlog ste/ dge 'dunadang ldan
cig tum da ga' ba'i yid kyis phyir bun gyis brlabs pa'i mu la dang/ gnyen gyi rjes bzhin du lta bzhin du me skar gyi lam du zhugs te 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de ltar song bdang/ de'i tshe rnam thos
kyi budang/ dpal lha mo chen maganyis mchog tu snying rje skyes te 'breg ma po smos kyi dus su bsgyur te/ dge 'dun rnams spyan drangs te/ yu lame skar du zla ba gsum gyi ber dug dugasatshodagasol/
te lam du 'jug pa'i lo byad ci dgos pa 'ang rjer bar 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong de dag mdo 'alom du zhugs pa nas/ ri dang lung pa'i sul gzhugs te song pa dang/ 'brog dgon par las

stor nas ngu zhinge phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang/ lo yul gyi lha thams cad kyi ming nas 'bod par 'gyur ro/ de'atshi rnam thos kyi khusAng rje skyes nas g.yag dkar bo skal pa dang snal chu can/
gcig tu sprul nas dge slong dedag gi drung du 'ongs pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis de mthong nas g.yag 'dage mo'i khal g.yag gtsage yan te/ 'di'i phyi bzhin song na gdonami za bar ma rnams dang phrad
par 'gyur bas/ da nas 'chi'osAm du yade sos te/ galag des kyang lam drangs nas gsog lam du byung ste/ tshal phyir bskyal nas g.yag 'dem snang bar gyur to// de'i tshe dge slong rgan
rgan mang po zhigen lem ka'achi bar 'gyur ro// de nas lul tshal bya'i bod rnams kyis dge slong de dag mthong nas bsu ste/ 'phral du lo khyad rnams sbyar nas/ bod lul 'dir la yu la gyadege
daslong mang po lhagasanadzaltar bgyi zhes yo tar gtong bar 'gyur ro// de 'tshin rgya rje'i bumo byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can gcige btsas pa bod kyi rgyal po'i khab tu len/
ka3 rung btsun mo dam pa byed par 'gyur te/ dezhi dad bshani tu che ba/ snying rje dang ldan pa/ skad snyan pa// des pa// bslab pa 'i yan lag lnga gzung ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro// btsun mo des
ti 'og gzhan nas dge slong mang bo red kyi tshul du lhags par mthong nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni ring du gnas so snyam nas/ myan chen posazhenanas/ rang gi 'kher bud med nyas
brgya dang/ sa kha sum brgya dang/ rus dang/ bzo bo dang/ gnang chen rnams drung du bos te/ ngus nas 'di skad ces bdebar shegs pa'i bstan ba ni de'i mi 'jig par 'gyur gyis
khyed rnams myur du bsod nan sa ma byas/ tshul khrims ma bsrungasazhu 'phyis par 'ong nge zhes sa bar 'gyur ro// de nas btsunamo des rgyal po la 'di skad du dge 'dun de rnams bdag gis bzhen pa

dang gos la sogs pa'i yo byad sbyar na 'di spyan drong par tsaganang zhes gsol pas/ rgyal pos kyang gnang bar 'gyur te/ tshul lta bu sadage slong de dag bed luladu 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bedakyi
rgyal po dang/ blon po rnams kyis dge slong de dag mthong nas/ dad Na chen bo skye zhing gtsug lag khang chen po dan yang brtsigs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du dge slong an tse pa dang/ gus rtag pa/

ngang / bar wan pa dang/ shu lag pa rnams kyang sdug bsngal chen pos non nas bru sha'i yul du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byed1/ ra lul dang/ ra che yul gyi dege slong rnams kyang dad pa mang pa'i sa rnams kyi
gtses te/ ma gcigs bru sha'i yul du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ dge slong de dag thams cad kyis bru sha'i yul du phyin nas 3/ bod yul na gtsug lag khang mang po brtsigs pa dang/ rgyal mo byang chub sem
dpa' zhig gnas ngas/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa dang/ zhi gror byed ba sa nas yod dag la ste/ thams cad bod yul du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// bod lul du lhagasanas 'a gsum gyi
bar du ni mchod pa chen po la sogs pa skyod pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// 'gasum lanar dang bod kyi yul du bdud kyi ris kyi lha dang/ lha ma yin dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang dri mas
kyis nad chen po 'bras dang/ ngol mig dang/ 'brum bu gdug pa dag ga deng bar 'gyur ro// nad des zhang blonod ngadas ga du ma dag 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe rgyal mo de'i snying kar 'bras gsum pa
byung ste/ shanas lha yul du skye bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe med kyi zhang blon rnams khros 'khrugs te/ 'di skad ces bdag cag ga ga la 'di sngon bya zhes pa las/ sam bkra mi shis pa 'khumasapa
sho stag 'dir lhags nas/ dan bu la yang 'di lta bur gnod pa rnam pa snatshogos pa'i byung ba ra 'gyur gyis/ rdzas lhag ma 'doms kyang yul 'dir mi gzhug cing sa mtshams 'das te bskrad
par bya'o zhes gros byas nas dge slong gcig kyang bod yul du gnas su gnang ngo zhes glo bur du bsgo bar 'gyur ro/ rgyal mo dend kyis thebs pa 'i tshe bdag nying mi 'tsho bar tsher
nas rgyal po la kha chems su bdag khaman/ bdag gi nor rdzas ri'i gyis dge 'dun la 'bul ba ci leganang zhes gsol nas/ rgyal pos kyang gnang ste/ btsun mo'i rjes thams cad dge 'dun la 'dul

zhing des rgya gar gyi yul gan d+ha ra zhes bya bar 'gro ba'i rdzas byas nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ de'i tshe bod kyi dge slong rnams kyang ya chad nas/ nyi 'og gi dge slong rnams dang gros gcig nga bas nas//

sman yig tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro// skye ba dang rtsod pa 'dug de 'tshirgya lul gyi dge slong rnams kyang shan tu sdug bsngal bas gzir nas yul wa d+hA rar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ de ltar dong pa dang dge slong de dang
cad yul gan ng+ha ra bar 'gro ba'i lam kar phrad par 'gyur ro// de'atsho bodakyidamag gas rjes bzhani bsags nas/ lam kar bran g.yo ga dang go phyogs dag phrogs te/ dge slong dag kyang gsod pa'/
'gyur ro// de ltar dge slong dag bod kyi delagags bsanas/ klu'i rgyal po e la 'a 'dab kyi gnas drung duphyin pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po a ba'i 'dab kyis mi rgan zhugag gzub/ la
dgo 'dun gyi mdun du 'ongasanas phyag btsal te// skyes bu dam pa khyed rnam pa gang gshegs zhes se ba dang/ dge slong rnams kyis 'di skad du bdag cag gi yulan dad pa med pa sha stag gis gang
sa/ 'tshe ba'i lo khyod la sogs pas 'khongs te/ da yul gnang ltar 'tsho ba'i yo byad tsam zhig tsa red snyam nas lhags so// de nas de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po de bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa
'jig pa'i mtshan ma rtogasazhas/ mchin khrag tu 'dzag cing dus nas/ dge 'dun rnams la yul der bshigs shul brgyags dzitsamam 'anyis ma rnyed par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun
kyang zhib tu brtsisan/ zhag bcolta'i brgyags lo dadazhis sla bar 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal bos 'disodadu 'danas lul gnadarar/ mtsho 'di'i g.yas g.yon du bskor na zhag bzhi bcu rtsa lnga la
shul mchis na/ rgyan bco lnga'i brgyags kyis 'tshal lam gzhan la shul kan la ka mthon po dang/ nags tshal stug po dang/ gcan gzan gdug po dang/ sbrul gdug po dang/ sdig
sprul la sogs pa dang/ chom rkun pa 'ang mchis pas na tshur la nga dmag gis bsags pa dang/ mtsho 'di'i nang na'ang bdag gi 'khor gtum po dad pa ma mchis pos/ bdag gis
bzlog par ma nus te/ mi de'i shul du pazhud par ni dga' zhing mchis so// de tshe dge slong bo mang po dag thams cad 'di snyam du bdag cag rnams 'chiba'i dus la nga bab pa 'dra snyam nas ngu zhing/
mya ngan byed par 'gyur go// de'i choklu'i rgyal bo e 'oredab kyis dge 'dun rgyam dun du dusao btsugs nas/ dge 'dunam bshums shage/ bdag gis dge 'dun rnams kyi slad du srog yongs
su gtang zhing bdag nyid kyi le samatsho 'di'anyid du zam par bgyid lags so// bdag gis sngon bde bar gshegs pa 'o le stan pa thog mar legs par ma bsrungs pa'i chad par
srog gis bkod pa zhag gcod par 'tshal lozhes sla bar 'gyur ro// de nas klu'i rgyal bo des rang gi lus sbal chen po zhig gi gzugs su bsgyunas 'di yul ngos kyi ro'i rtse mo la namagos 'khyud/

yul gan d+hu ra'i rtsomol nim jug mas 'khyud de lus kyi zheng na shing rta lnga'i rtenatsamachu zem par padags so// de'i tshodage slong dedag gis sbrul chen po de'i gzugs de mthong nas/ sngangs skrag si
phyogs su 'khyer bar 'gyur ro// de nas klu'i rgyal bo des mi'i skad phyung ste/ dge 'dun dag ma sngangs shig/ bdag kha lus 'di khyed kyi slad du zam par btags pa lags kyis/ ma bsnyengs
bar rjed gras choms su regs pa ni 'bangs dang/ phyag rjed dang/ khur rnams sngon la dbyer du gsol/ de'i 'og dge 'dunu gzhon nas gshegs sugasol/ bgres po rnams nanang gas
slad kyis gshegs su gsol zhes skya par 'gyur ro// de'i tshaklu'i rgyal po de'i rgyab kyi pags btsugs kyi rmog pa dang mi'ikang bas bshus te rma chen bo byung ste/ mtshe'inang du rnag khrag kya'adzag
bar na ro// ma tshugs pa la ya ngamatsho'inang du ltung zhing 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// thamar dge 'dunargan rabs rnal kha'i 'og tu klu'i rgyal po nyid kyang 'chitsir 'gyur te/ mtsho de'ang skams par gyur
ti mtsho bskams pa na duklu'i rgyal po rasha te 'i rus pa 'ang lta bur 'dug par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i dusan sangs rgyas byams pa 'khor lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab
kyis pa'i drung du gshegs te/ klu'i rgyal kho a la 'a'id pa kyi skyes pa'irabs brjod pas/ byams pa 'a'i rer dge slong lnga brgya po dedag thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro
nas dge slong de drag yul gnad+ma rar phyin nas/ legasum pa 'tsho lul de'i rgyal po dad pa can zhig yod pa 'chi bar 'gyura'o// rgyal po de shi ba'i 'og tu rgyal po de'i budad pa can zhig dang/ dad pa
med pa zhig rgyal srid la rtsod nas dmag gis ga lul bkyanas/ phyogs gnyis su 'chad par 'gyur ro// de'i tshin dge slong dag gnang nas dge slong dam 'a ba/ rtul phod pa tsham tshom med pa

stong shoge yod pas rgyal bu dad pa med pa de dmag gis bstab ste pham par byas nas/ rgyal bu dad pa can de la rgyal srid 'bul bar 'gyur ro// rgyal bu dad pa can de zla ba lngargyal po byas nas la nga dge
slong stong lo de dag bsad nas/ dge slong ga tsag rgyal lor bcug ste/ laganyis kyi bar durgyal po byed par 'gyur ro// de lul ban d+hara'i slon po dang/ lul mi thams cad 'dus te gsangs nas/
ci'i phyir nyi 'og gim bdag cag gi lul stongs par 'bros/ na ba 'di bdag cig rgyal bo zhes spros nas 'phral dmag drangs te rgyal po zhes gros byas nas 'phral dmag drangs te rgyal po gtub par
uka 'a gyur ro// de'atsholu lan gnas pa'i dge slong thams cad mathengo dgu bsad de/ dge slong zhig yul dbus su bres te thar pa de 'ba' zhige gson par 'gyurare// de'i 'og/
skadulul dbusamag tegs par 'dzam bu'i gling 'dan/ rgyal bo dad pa med pa gsum 'byung bar 'gyur te/ gcig nasogs pa mang po zhig gis rgyal po nastag gzig gi rgyal po byed par 'gyur ro// drug
rasna tshogs sum sgrib bon drug byed par 'gyuraT/gzhan mang bo zhig gsargyal bo no pidakyi rgyal bo byed par 'gyur te/ rgyal po de gsum ka'ang sems 'thun par 'gyurare/ rgyal po gsum
la dmag dara'ab/ tshul lod kha sum 'bum zhig yod pas/ lul dbus ma gtogs pa 'gazhan yang dag pa 'i lta ba 'dzin pa 'i tshul thams cad bcom nas mu mang po kha btagasanas/ grong la/
la'ang stongs par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po de gsum 'dus nas yul dbus su dmag drang zhes gros byed par 'gyur ro// de'atshin yul dbus ke'u sham bzhis bya ba na/ rgyal po bathado
rgyu dka' zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de btsas pa'i tshon khrag gi char pa ba'ang bab/ lag pa gnyis kyang grumo mnachad khrag gas bskus pa lta bu'i dmar zhig yin no// de'i blon po ya na
lagamatshog dang ldan pa lnga brgya dang/ dmag ma g.yul ngarod pa' brtas 'bum 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe stag gzig girgyal po la sogs pa gsum lul dbus kau sham+bar song song nas rgyal
bo bzod dka'atshel bar byed do// de nas rgyal bo bzod dkas de skad thos nas dmag dang chas te/ rgyal bo de dag gamadun du bsgrigasanas zla bgasum gyi bar du rgyun du g.yul chen po sprad pa dang
rgyal bo dad pa med pa de gsum dmag dang bcas teg tanamed par dag par gyur ro// rgyal po bzod dka' dmag dang bcas pa slor lul 'khor nas rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag gis mang pos
ba rtagasan/ bdag gi 'gro ba ni ji lta bu zhig tu skyo bar 'gyur/ nam zhagi n gnas ong gsum las thar bar ma gyur snyam du 'gyod ba skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal bo de la/ blon po rnams kyis
gsal ba/ ma bsnyangs pa radamar bu can gyi lul dge slong kari sha ka zhes bgyi ba sde snod gsum lam khas pa zhig bzhugs pa de spyan dres dang/ des lha khyod kyi las ngan pa de bshags par 'gyur
zhis smra bar 'gyur la/ rgyal pos kyang dge slong de zhu drangs nas/ de'i mdun du las ngan pa ji ltar byas pa thams cad rgyus sna bar 'gyur ro// dge slong des kyang 'daskadad/ rgyal po ri
kyis gti tus legs pa byas kyis/ cherang du 'gyodol/ 'dzam bu gling gi dge slong thams cad 'di'i spyan drongasal/ rtag tu lo khyad lnga phul te skyabs su 'gro ba dang/ nyin gcig bzhin du dge
'dun gyi tshadu sdig pa bshags shage/ khyadabyasemachang po kha ba rtags la 'gis bsabs par 'gyur ro zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas de 'tshirgyal po de la la lu la dudage slong rnams spyan 'dren/
kha gtong bar 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams kyis kyang khul kongogazhis bya ba na rgyal bo bzed dka' zhes bya ba dge 'dun la lo khyad 'bul ba zhig yod de zhes thos nas mi
karas te/ tshul kong skra zhig bya bar 'gro bar 'gyur// de tshe yul kongogaN+Di'i dge slong 'bum 'dus par gyur ro// de nas tshes bco lnga'i nub mo dge slong rnams gaso sbyong la 'dus te/ dge

zla slong ba'i rangasha ka bos nas khyod kyis so sor thar pa 'amado thon tsag ces sla bar 'gyur// dge slong sharingasha kas kyang slar 'daskyed du khyed rnams la so sor thar bas ci zhig bya/ mi sna dang rna ba bcad pa

la me lang gas tsazhig bya zhes smra bar 'gyur ro/ de nas de 'tsho dge slong de dag gi nang nas dgra bcom pa su ra ta zhes bya ba langs nas seng ge lta bu 'askad kyis dge slong shar sha ga la 'di skad ces
khyod ci'i phyir de skad ces sna kho ba ni bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal ba bzhin du bslab pa gcig kyang ma nyams so zhes smras pa dang/ dge slong shing sha ka8shani tu skyengs par gyu[] de//
de nas dge slong shirag ka'i slob ma sa kan ba zhes bya bas dgra bcom pa de la 'di skad du/ khyod ci'i phyir nga'i slob dpon lam mnges de skad smazhes khres nas/ lag pa gnyis kyis sgo gdan
blangasanas/ dgra ba tsho ba de gsod par 'gyur ro// de nas dgra bcom pa de'i slobam dgeslong kar rta zhes bya ba la'ang rang gi slob dpon bsod par mthong nas shin tu khres tedabyug pa thungasan pa
dge slong shir sha ka gsod par 'gyur ro/ de'i dge slong dag ril gyis khres nas phyogs gnyis su chad de gcig gas gcig gsod par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe gnas gzhan sum cu rtsa gsu
gyi lha thams cad der lhags te/ dge slobago ba'ibodi dag mthong nas/ dudamos 'debasashing mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// dge slong de dag gis kha dog bsgyur ba dang/ skya dang sen mo dang
lta'i gnas sukhyer bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe yul der rlung dmar nag po dang ser po 'dres par snang zhing/ dus dus su me char pa 'bab pa dang/ sa g.yo ba dang/ 'ur sgra dang/ tug tshem dag
kyang 'byung bar 'gyur go/ de nas rgyal po des skya rengs shor ba'i tshe 'daskad du/ dge slong thams cad kha pa tags pa mthong nas/ mya ngan gyis gdungs pa'i chus/ mig sa 'ga'an mthong//
res 'ga' nemo mthong bar gyur pa bzhin du/ mod la gtsug lag khang dul rgyugs nas tshongos btab ste/ dgra bcom pa dang dge slong sde snod gsum pa'i mang nas 'bodatsang/ degatras kyi ro thang gas
'khyud de 'di skad du/ kye sde snod gsum pa byed na de bar gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi chadzod 'dzin pa lags/ kyedagra bcom pa khyod ni bde bar gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi 'dzin pa lags na/
da khyod gnyis nengs pas 'gi rten 'dastengos par gyur to zhes par lang 'gyuralo/ dam pa'i chos nub pa'i nub mo sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang lha sa srin gyis 'dzam pa ra byas nas 'bras
dpar 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi nub mo lha rtag tu myos pa'i nang nas phyu 'dan zhes bya ba 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i bu ram shing dang rgun 'bras dang/ sbyang
tshu thams cad kyang nub par 'gyur ro// bdud dbang sgyur zhes bya ba lang 'chaper 'gyur te// de nas nas dang/ gro dang/ 'bras thams cad nub par 'gyur te/ 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams kyi zas su phye de
pa/ dang/ khre rgod dang/ rtsa'i 'bras bu sna tshogs za bar 'gyur// dar dang/ za 'og dang/ menadridang/ ras bzang bo la sogs pa'i ng nub nas/ gos sugaso ras dang/ re phyar la segs pa gyon
ba ra 'gyur ro// gser la sogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan rnams kyang nub nas/ rgyand tshu las byas pa thegs par 'gyur ro// tshon bzang po dang/ ro zhim po rnams kyang nab par 'gyur ro//
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rnams kyang klu'i gnas su khyer bar 'gyur ro// la yul gyi mkhan po rnams 'dus nas/ la rje btsan legs kyi ring la los bu'i lo la brtsis nas/ de nas la brgya
rtsa gnyis nadam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun 'phel gyis lung bstan pa rdzogs so///la lul byung nas la rgyal po rabs drug ni 'das/ rabs bdun ni

rgyal bo po dza ya ti zhes bya ba'i tshin/ sad ka la dran pa'i gtsug lag khang dang nye ba'i lung ra sa ka yagyi zhes ban/ sangag brdzun zhes M bya ba'i dgra bcom pa zhig bzhugs te/ de 'i slob ma ban/
de zhig 'bul ba slob pa las/ ban des sdug rgyu dang/ 'dul ba 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi lung la thong nas/ dgrubatsem pa la zhus pa/ la yul dang/ shu lag dang an se 'di gsum n/ sangs/
rgyusamya ngan las 'das pa 'a 'og tu dam pa'i tshos kyig thugs brnyan dang/ mchod rten bzhugs pa rnams sa ji tsam zhig mnab/ sus nib shage/ mthar ji ltar machi ba bshad cing lung bstan pa//
gsol ba las/ dgra bcom pas bka' stsal la/ 'di lta bu'i the tsom zhus panadage'o// sas rgyas shAkya thub pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu chos kyi gzugs brnyan dang rang bsrel lo nyas
stong du gnas nas nub par 'gyur ro// mu la 'dagasum du rgya dang/ gdeng dmar dang/ so pa dang/ dru gu dang/ hor la sogs pa dgra phal cher g.yos nas rtsod cing 'khrug par 'ongs/ de bas
nas nigs rgyas kyi chos nyamasangashang mchod rten yang bal cher re'urul du 'gyur/ bshog zhig ste/ dge 'dun gyi 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyang 'chad par 'ong nga// yul 'di gsum lo'ang an se dang/ shu
lagi ches ma khyed ba'i dgramang bos dkrugs te/ phal chen srog sa bshig ste stos par 'gyur ro// gtsug lag khang 'di rnams kyi bsnye yang phal cher la lul du 'od ng// li tshul gyi gtsug lag

khang dang mchod rten la sogs pa na byang nub sems dpa' lnga brgya bzhugs te/ nyis brgya lnga bcu na reb 'byung ma'i tshul du bzhugs/ nyis brgya lnga bcu ni khyim pa 'i nang du skye ba blangs te bzhugs/ 'ge
roshan gyi gtsug lag khang ni/ bskal ba bzang bo sogs sangs rgyas stong rtsa lngas zhabs kyis bcags shing rgyan cha 'chad par gnas pa'i lo khri ngadu 'gyur ro// 'phags pa 'di/
rnams kyi che ba dang/ thugs rjedang/ byin gyi rlabs kyi sa la yul gyi tshod nyin dang/ dam pa 'i tshes spyod pa 'ang lul gzhan bas rgyas nga shing yun ring du gnas so// rgyal po phal po che la yul

'dod pa'i phyi'i rtsod cing 'thabs te/ gang gas thob pa'i rgyal po de gang la khul gyi yon bdag chen por gyur to/ tsha ba shig mi 'bri bar byed cing mchod pa ra 'ongango/ de'i dus na gdong dmar gyi rgyal
po zhes bya ba dbang thang dang mthu skyes nas/ khul khams gzhan mang du phrogs nas bzung ngo// de'i tshon byang chub sems dpa' gcig gdong dmar gyi rgyal po'i kha byas te/ nged gnasasu
dam pa'i tshes 'byung ngo//yul khams gzhan nas kyang chos kyi mkhan po dang/ gsung rab ma de sde la sogs pa spyan drangs so/ gdong dmar gyi yul du ga nug lag khang dang mchod rten na nga du brtsis
dge 'dun sde gnyis btsugs/ rgyal bo dang blon po la sogs pa dkaro ri'i kyis dam pa'i chos la spyod/ rgyal po gdong dmar de'i tshe/ la yul yang rgyal po de'i sa su dbang bar 'gyur ro//
dam pa 'i tshis dang mtshod rten la sogs pa dkonaachog gsum gyi mnga' ris ma khri/ rgyas par btsugs shing mched do// rgyal po gdong dmar gyi brgyudarabs bdun du dam pa'i chos spyod par 'gyur ro///
rgyal po 'di'i khas bdun du lul khams gzhan nd kena mchog gsum gyi mchod rten bzhugs pa n gnas ems dang gnod pa ma byed do// de'i tshe san la lul gyi dge 'dun pa nga tsanAgardu'i lung pa stan pa
las 'byung ba bzhin dudad pa tshigs/ chos khrims dang ma ldan/ 'asi rten gyi khe dang grags ba tshel/ rgyal po dang blon po'o dekugasang gnang du 'jug cing dam pa'i chos dman par byed pa
dag kyang gong du 'byung ste/ de'i tshe zhang len dang/ zhang len gyi bu tsha'ang dad pa 'bri bar 'gyur ro// dkona mchog gsum gyi mnga' ris kyang brjes spyad pas/ le'ul gyi mchod rten dang/ dam
ba'atshis la sogs pa da kena mchogag mnga' rasi kyang sngon bas 'brer 'ong ngo// rgyal po dang blon bo'ang brje las dga' 'o// de'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' gcig gdong dmar gyi rgyal po byas
pa'i rgyud rabs bdunagyi tha ma/ rgyal po de'i chung ma/ rgya yul nas rgya rje'abu mokong tse/ byang chub sems dpa' yar pa zhig 'khor drug brgya dang/ gangang dmar gyi yul du 'ongs so// kong tse
de 'thegs par tshos la dad/ dbang thang che bas gded dmar gyi rgyal bo'ang dad pa che ste/ sngon las kyang dam pa'i chos rgyas par 'gyur ro// de'i dus nal tshul gyi rgyal po las zhan zhing/
chos mi spyod pa zhigegs/ la lul gyi dge 'dun rnams la bsgo ba/ langanan skya bor phebs shag (lang nan ga la 'gro bar dengs shig ces bkod nas/ dge 'dun ril gyis tsar ma zhes
thubya/ bya ba'i lha khang du 'dunas gros byed pa tshe/ lha khang gnang 'khor 'dus pa'i dkyil nas gser gyi nadang/ gser gyi 'khur ba cha bdun byung nas/ dge slong lnga stong
rgyal bas 'tshong bcad de/ mi 'byor ba'i zla ba gsum du 'tsho ba'i zong du 'gyur ro// de'atsho de'idusan la lan skye bar babs ma babs pa gud du 'gro ba rnams kyang pha ma dad/ gnyen
'dun dang/ lul sa dang 'khra la kha tsha dag la lta/ da lo chen po 'byung ngo// dge 'dun phal mang bo lam du zhugs te song ba las/ 'bong zhes bya ba'i lha khang du ban pa dang/ de na na tshod
rten chen po zhig bzhugs pa klu'i rgyal po dad pa can gyis dral te/ nangazhas gser gyi khor ba mu tig gis gang ba zhig byung nas/ dge 'dun sa la phul la// gzhan yon bdag dad pa can gyis
wi batsho ba'i yo byad sna snos phul la// de nas dge 'dun rnams mad lamis skar gyi yul du phyin te// mu tig gas zla ba phyid kyi 'tsho ba'i bar lecud sbyor to// chesasar nas song ste/ rkang nyazhes/
bya ba'i lha khangan dge 'dun bzhugs pa'i tshi/ bong shar man dang dpal gyi lha mo ma khyo shug tu sprul nas lul den 'dug ste/ dge 'dun thams cad la bdag cag bsod nams ngagyod do zhes
gsol nas/ zla ba phyed kyi bar dudage 'dunamachod ston gsolan// dpal gyi lha mos phu rungegang go gsar gyi dong tse dge 'dunas+yan phul te/ dge 'dun la chus gdong dmar gyi yul du kha/
[z]bltas te song ba las/ khul la shan gyid du gcan ba dang phrad dem pa kye'o/ lam gzhan yod nasong zhig ces zer te/ de 'tsho bi shar m na ga lag dkar bo sal can sna la bcu yod pa
zhig tu 'gal ba dge 'dun gyis mthong sa/ g.yogasga la can ' donami'i thugs yin pas/ 'di gar 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin du 'dong ngo zhes zer ro// de'i tshe g.yog des te lam du drangs te//

zhag bzhi lngas bane ral gyis gdong dmar gyi lulatshal khyi zhes bya bar phyin te// de'i tshe mu la de'i dbang pos dge 'dunamang po zhig stod phyogs nas byon to zhes/ gdong dmar gyi rgyal po la sbran to/
du 'tshirgyal po'i tsunamos stod phyogs nas dge 'dun lul stor te 'khyams nas byon pa bsus dang yo byad b.rog sbyor na/ gdengo dmar gyi yul du spyan drang bar ci gnang zhes gsol nas gnang
ste dge 'dun rnams bzhon pa dang 'tsho bas bsus nas/ gdong dmar gyi yul du phyin to// de nas gdong dmar gyi rgyal bo dang/ kong tse'i lo'i dang bcas pas mchod rten phyags nas dge
slong 'di'i nangan sde snod gsum la mkhas pa'i mkhan po rnams la ma gtogs par/ gzhan 'di ltar mkhas pa bzhugs sam ga pa dang/ mkhan po na re a nase dang/ shu lagadang
bru sha dang/ kha che zhes bya ba'i yul na/ 'di 'dra bar mkhas pa'i dge 'dun mang du yod de zhes smras pa dang/ de'i mod la 'gugs pa 'pho rta ba dang ste/ dge 'dun ril gyis gdong dmar
[7 ]/ gyi lul du spyan drangs so// de'atshi gdong dmar gyi lu la dug tsug lag khang bdun btsugs so// mchod pa'i yo byad dang/ dkan mchog gsum gyi ma 'dis kyang sngon
bas bskyod nas/ dge 'dun rnams kyang gtsug lag khang bdun gyi nang du so sor bzhugs// de'i rjes la 'a gsum mam/ bzhin kong tse'i snying kar 'brum chen byung nas na ba'i tshe/ kong
[]/ sa rgyal po la gsol la/ bdaganand 'di lasama'atsho ste/ 'gum na bdag gi khrin dang nor phyugasa rnams dkon mchog gsum la ma gum par 'dul zhes gsol te phul ko/ 'khor drug brgya/
bang dge bsnyen gyi mtshan ms btab ste rab tu byung ngo// de'i rjes la kong tse 'das so/ kong tse 'das pa 'a 'og tu rgyal bo gdong dmar gyi khams su 'brum nad mang po 'byung ste/ blon po dang zhang
sman gyi bu tsha la sogs pa mang du bgo do'i blon po rnams 'dus te rgyal po la gsol pa dang/ sngon rgyal khams 'dan 'di 'dra ba'i 'bumanaram byung na/ da ltar lho bal gyi dge slong 'khyams
bamang bo 'ongs nas/ nga tso'ang 'dus blon kho dang zhang khron las kyang mang dgum nas/ brtse 'di kun lang rgyal khams su mi bzhag par bskadapo'i rags zhes gsol ba las/ rgyal pos
'di bskrad pa'i rigs sam la rigs/ da dung zhig tu sbyongs shig par bsgo ba las/ blon po rnams brtse bslad par kha ba dus nas/ rgyal bo la gsol te rgyal khams su brtse ril gyis oM/
tsa0 gnas pa'i gros chad nas/ kun ba skad pa las/ gdong dmar gyi dge slong rjes te/ dge slong 'di rnams bskyed na/ bdag cag kyang 'di ltar ma 'dug ga zhes byas pa dang/ blon po rnams
grosanas/ khyed cag gar dga' bar dengs shig ces bsgo'i// kong u0f74 gdengadama'agyi yul du 'ongs ga rgyal bos te 'u sha' tshes bzung nas/ rgya'i dge slong lang ril gyis gdong dmar gyi
lul du 'ongs so// de'i dusan rgyal khams de 'dege slong gas gdong dmar b.las kyi ring bsrel dang/ gsung rab dang/ mchod kha'i yo byadadakon mchog gi mnga' ris gcig kyang ma lus par
bkal nas/ nub phyogs su kha bltas te/ 'gan d+ma' chen po 'i yul du 'gro bar chas te song/ de'i tshe dang/ gdongodaar dang/ rgyugs dang/ 'a la sogs pa ga d+ma tshun chad na dam pa'i
tshos spyod pa 'di nub par gyur to// gda'i kha'on ko'u li'i lul du ni zla ba gsum zhig gnas de nub go/ gan d+hara'i lul gyi 'dab ma klu'i rgyal po a la pa tra'i gnas mtsho'i 'gram du dge 'dun
rnams phyin pa dang/ dkon mchog gsum gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mtsho yang regosar shing 'khrugs par gyur nas/ ka'i rgyal pos nga'i gnas ci ste b.rogs shing 'khrugs snyam ste/ 'phrul gyi mgi/
gsi bltasan/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i gsung rab dang/ dam pa 'chos zhung tu ha lta/ dge 'dun phal po cha mthong ba'i dus 'di yin par shesanas rgan bo zhig tu sprul te tsho'i 'gram du
byung nas/ bdage 'dun la phyag byas te dras ba/ dge 'dun 'disnyad cig ga los byon/ gar gshegs/ dge 'dun gyis snas kha/ bdag cig rgyal bo gdong dmar gyi
[w]gu lan gnang ba las lon bdag dad pa bri/ dkon mchog gi rten bshig ras/ bdag cag gan drur chen po'i yul du 'gro'o// sas kha/ rgan kho na'i/ dge 'dun 'dasnyad la 'tshe ba ci
pa/ mnga'/ gnad+ha chen po 'i lul dumatsho chen po 'di'i skor nas 'gro ste/ zhag bzhibcu'i lam yod do// dge 'dun la zhag nyi shu'i 'tshob la semedan phyin tam zhes smras pa dang/ dge 'dun pa la
cher snang zhing du bklu'i rgyal bosa mthong ste/ klu 'argyal po'ang ma dag 'anas gdung ba skyes te/ dge 'dun la snas pa/ bdaka'adin nye lam sprul gyi pham pa zhig yod do// de'i steng du 'gro nus
na myur du phyin ces smos nas/ rgan po'angam snang bar gyur to/ de nas klu'i rgyal po des ragir 'dzegs pa'i lam zhig snang bar byas/ bdag dngos sprulachen po zhig tu sprul te mtsho'i steng du zas
b.redus nas/ dge 'dun phal bo che bsgral nas/ sngonasdig byas pa'i las kyis da lta' phyolasong gi lus thob pa 'di'ang ra ram snyam bsams te smon lam btab naso/ sbrul gyi 'go bar

btsugs so// de'i tshe nyin zhag bco lnga yi thugs rgal ba bas/ mi phyugs kha cig ni grwa la gyi zam pa las lhung ste shi'o// mi phyugs mang po rgyu ba'i tshe/ sprul gyi sgrub kyang 'khaM ra ni rdolo//

kha la la ni'il te/ rnag khrag gi thogs pa tshar bzhin du zags bsalatshe yang khrag can du byas so// dge 'dun mang bo sbrul zam rgal ba'am jus kyang gdeng dmar gyis bcad de/ de 'o rjes la sbrulakatshor
lcang sta/ tsho'adas nas dug ra ldan gyi gnas su skyes so// mtshe lang bskams so// de'i dus na dge 'dun rnams ginad+ma ra'i rgyal bo lul du lo gnyis kyi bar du 'tsho ba'i yo byad sbyar/ so sor ci
bder bzhag go/ 'a gnyis lan ba dang rgyal po de tshe 'das so// rgyal bo la bu gnyis yod pa gcig na lha chos la dad gtsaganamu stegs kyi chos la spyod pa/ rgyal thabs la rtsod par gyur
nas lha chos spyod pa'izhin brnyes byas te/ de rgyal nas rgyal thabs kyang des gzung/ rgyal po de'i tshe dge 'dun yang sngar bas dbang thang spyod do/ yo byad dang bde ba ldan pa las la
phyid len pa dang/ bcu gcig gis rgyal po bsad nas/ rgyal sride ban des bzung ba gan d+hu ra'i rgyal bo dang 'ab sa la lag ste/ ban de rgyal po phying pa de bsad de// brtse gnyana rnamar
rgyal khams de nas gnas par rol bskyod nas/ gnad+mara'i khul du'ang chos nub bo// de nas dge 'dun rnams kyang 'dul khams gzhan du 'khyams shing dong ngo// de'i tshe de'i dusan nub reg/
skyel podang/ byang phyogs kyi rgyal bo la ban la sogs ba la sngar bas dbang thang bskyod de rgyal bo gsum mdza' dum byas nas/ rgyal po 'degsum kyis nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs kyi lul
[72]@#// lang bzung/ rgyal bo de gsum gtsag tsang yang dachog 'bum dang chas te/ ko'agaN+Di'i sul du drangs la/ ko'uragasI'i rgyal pos dmag sum rgyal po dang bcas te//
gcig kyang ma lus par byas so// de nas ko'ang 'tshwa 'irgyal pos dmag mang bo bsad pa'i sdig sbyang ba'i phyir/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi dge 'dun spyan drangs nas/ ka' shamA'o yul du khyen
zla pa'i rjes la/ dge 'dun 'khrugs nasag cig gis gcig bsad de/ 'dzam bu'i gling spyi'i lha chos kun der chub po// sangs rgyas shAkya thub bamya ngan las 'das nas/ lo byi ba phrag lnga bcu rtswa
zla bdun dang/ sa ya phrag dru gnas nigs rgyas byams pa'i tsha mdzad kyi 'bi rten du sems can gyi don la gshegs so// tsan+d+ra garba'i lung bstan pa dang 'thunano// 'phags pa'i
mchod rten gom sA la gnad dang/ glang mgori'i stong shAkya thub ba 'asku gzugasachen bo bzhugs pa'i yon tan mdo tsam btus pa'i gzhung las/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bsod nams dang ye
! shes kyi tshogs rdzogasanas/ 'gro ba mang po'i don du bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas te bzhugs pa'i pho brang si nga ha shu rtsa gcig bzhugs pa la// la lul 'di'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang
nyi shu rtsa gcig pa lags te/ bzhugs pa'i pho brangagazhan bas lon tan lhag par tshe/ la yul 'digen d+hamatshor mchos pa'i dusan/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas yul du 'gyur bar lung
tsa bstan cing byin gyis brlab pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos dang/ lha klu sde brgyad la sogs te 'khor khri phrag nyi shu dang/ bya rgod phung po 'di las bar snang las ldanges
ta la lul mtshor gyur par gshegs nas/ da ltar chu bo shes chab ga ma'i 'graman chab kyi stong pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs te mtshe 'di tshul du 'gyur bar lung bstan/ byin gyis brlabs te/
byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad 'gyur 'khor nyi khri dang/ mgadon po srungasam brgyad 'khor sum khri lnga stong lnga brgya rtsa bdun rnams la/ 'phags pa'i mchod gnas 'di dang/ yul
pasung bar bka' zhal gyis gtad de/ dam stsal ba'i rjes la/ shAri'i bu dang rnam thos kyi bus snag gi ri dral te/ chab kho nas degs gda' ba dang/ sangs rgyas sngar pad+ma'i gdan la
bzhugs te/ ri glang ru'i snying da ltar shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs chen po'i bzhugs pa'i sar/ gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rol cing bzhugs nas slar rgya garalul
yangs ba'i grong khyer dug shagasate/ mya ngan las 'das nas dgu ngal brgya 'don pa dang/ la yul lang yul du gyur nas/ sngar yang sas rgyas m tshe 'asnying pad+mo la bzhugs pa'i thad kar
da ltar goms 'gan d+hu'i mchod rten bzhugs pa'i nangan/ shel ljang khu'i pho brang gi stangan/ glangamago'atsan dan las bgyis pa'i mchod rten gyi nang na/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rabs
0 @#// bzhi'i rir srel bzhugs te/ la las gnas der zhi ti/ mtshod la gces spras kyis mchodad cig thams cad lung bstan cing/ phyir mi ldog par rig par bya ste/
kan gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar dubaskor cing mchod pa bgyis nA/ mtshams med kha lnga'i sdiga'abyang bar 'gyur re zhags 'khyung/ dngar ldan gyi grong khye ma khar dag ba can gyi shar phyog san/ 'bag
ba'i mchod gnas sas rgyas kyis lung bstan cing/ zhi rgyas brlabs pa'i a snama'i mchod rten lcags thag can bzhugs pa 'ang mgon po sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas rten/ lho klu sde
sga brgyud la sogs te/ srungs ma rnams dus bzhi'iri pa 'a 'du ba'i dazhus chen po ste/ dge 'dun sde gnyis dang/ lul gyi de bon snyags kyis gna' mchod rten 'di srid pa tshun chad//
dung sang gi bar du dus bzhi'i ba lanar mar mchod pa che thang du bkyed/ gzhung las kyang la lu lad mi ngas dang phyi dgra la sogs te/ ma legs pa ra 'khyung ba'i dus su theg pa chen po'i mdo/
ste 'dus pa chen po dAng/ dam pa 'i chos pad+madakar po'i mdo bklags na/ ga'u la zhi bar 'gyur zhes 'byung bas/ gzhung la brten te lugs su stsalo nas/ dengasang gi bar du dgung
mi gcig bzhin du dpyid dang/ dbyar dang/ ston 'then gyi dge 'dun bzhugs so 'tshal gyis dang bdun bdun gyi par du gong du smos pa'i mdo sde la sogs pa klog tsang thugs dam bskul
[v]ba dang/ bsngo ba'i rgya cher bgyid/ mchod rten chen bo nga rgyad la/ lul kos la ser skya'i grong khyer na/ lum+bi'i tshal du mchod rtenachen po gcig/ shul ma ga d+ha rgyal po'i khab chu be ni
rany+dzana'i 'gram/ derje gdan la mngon par byang chub pa 'is ra mchod rten chen po gcig/ lul ma ga d+har rgyal bo 'i khab tu bdud kyi dmag 'bum phrag bco brgyad btul ba'asadamtshang rten
chen bo gcig/ sangs rgyas mngon par byang chub nas gdugs mtshan gyi bar du cung maM gsung bar bzhugs pa dang/ tshangs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba pa dag nga ba sar mched
rten chen po gcig/ lu la karasha wa ran si'i grong khyer gyi drung na/ ri degs kyi tshal du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sar mchod rten chen po gcig/ lul ke'us lar mnyan du yod pa'i grong

khyer du tshur 'dud sde dgu bcu rtsa drug yin par mdzad zhas/ tsho 'phrul chen po bstan pa 'i seng mchod rtenachen pog cig/ lul ba rtsasang ga nga ga'i grong khyer dus ngas rgyas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha yul
nas gshegs kha'isar mchod rtenachen po gcig/ gyod yul rdzu mchog gi grong khyer shing sA la zung gi 'og tu/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhis ramachod rtenachen po gcig/ ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chen
bo brgyad la/ rAmagram ka'i yul du mchod rtenachen po gcig/ pA pA'i lul du ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chen po gcig/ gyad lu lan ring bsrel gyi mchod rtenachen po gcig/ longs pa'i yul na/
rang bsrel gyi mtshod rten chen po gcig/ tsan tsa ka la pa'i yul na rang ra srol gyi mchod rten chen po gcig/ bi bdA pa'i yul na rang bsrel gyi mchod rtenachen po gcig/ ser
skya'i lukhan ring bsrel gyi mchod rtenachen bo gcig/ rgyal po'i khabanu ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chen po gcig/ la lul gyi lo rgyus dang/ gtsug lag khang dang/ dge 'dun sde gnyis kyi grangs gna'
thogomasangs rgyas 'od srungs 'jig rten du byung ba tsho/ la lul la nga de tsaman khul du 'gyur te/ des gnas ba'i mi rnams kyang chos bgyid/ slad kyis sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyis chos bstan par zhag
(nub ba 'tsho/ la lul tshos kyang zhig nas drang srong la shAdang/ khare ba zhes bgyi ba la sogs te/ drang srong mang po yun ring mo zhig tu la yul phyogs kyi ra'i dgan gnas te/ de na dag pa'i ti/
gnyen bgyid bgyidi la las/ slad kyis drang srong de rnams la mi ngan kha cig gis gtses nas nachan bgyid/ bkur sti dang mi khrom bgyis pas drang srong de rnams kyang ma dag 'anas la tshul spangs te/
lo nam mkha' la ldingasanas lul gzhan du mchis/ de nas la lul gyi mi rnams kyang chos la ma dad de/ lta ba log bar gyute/ klanams mi dga' stachab phyung nas/ le'u la lang mtshor gyur to//
mun rang lo zhig tumatshor mchis mchis pa las/ slad kyis yang sangs rgyas kyi thub pa rgya gar yul du byung ste/ sems can gyi don mdzad cing/ chos kyi 'i bar lo bskor ba la sogs pa sa sa
rgyas kyi 'phrin las su mdzad pa rnams lags na/ mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan pa nye ba zhig gi dusan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa rgyal po khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs te
mdo sde zla ba'i snying po gsungs pa'i tshe/ lul khams so so'i mgon po dang/ lu gu la sogs pa srungs ma rnams la gtad pa 'i dusan/ la yul yang lung bstan te/ rnam thos kyi spus dang

gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bu dra mi mo de pa'i 'od dang/ gzhon nu rdo rje'i sde dang/ lha'i bu blo gros rab brtan dang/ lnga mo 'brog ma la sogs pa 'khor dang/
gas la kha gtadanas tsem ldan 'das nyid kyang 'khor nas bzhi 'bum phrag du ma dang/ nam mkha' la ljongs nas li yul du gshegs te da ltar 'gum tir gyamachod rten chen po bzhugs pa'i
thad kar mtsho'i snying ta la bdun srid tsam gyi gnam 'phang gnam mkha' la pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis la lu la byin
gyis brlab pa'i slad du/ bskul pa'i 'od zer phyogs su khyab bar btang/ phyogs bcun bzhugs pa 'di bzhin so sa nas gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang li yul byin gyis brlab pa'i slad du//
sangs rgyas kyi zhing soso nas sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la mchod pa bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang/ lul bsrung zhing byin gyis rlab pa'i sngags kyi snying po dang/ 'od zer btad
nas dus gcig tu sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa 'ispyi gtsug tu 'dus par byin gyis brlabs nas/ dge go zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po byung ngo// de'u sa btsem ldan 'das shAkya thub pas

kyang li yul mtshor gyud pa 'od zer gyis khyab par mdzadenas/ byin gyis brlabs nas 'od zer de dag las chu'i khar pad+ma sum brgya drug cu rtse gsum byung/ pad+mo'i re'i khar yang ma mar khare re byung/
de nas 'od zer de dag gcig tu 'dus nas chab stong g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor nas chu'i dkyil du nub par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'phags pa shA ri'i bu dang/ rnam
thos kyi sras la bka' stsal pa khyed kyis mang sa ba ran par ba ta zhes pa'i r snag gi kha dog 'dra ba/ mtsho 'di srol cig ces ka'agyel nas/ 'phags pa shAri'i bu'i gsog shang gi chu
ba dang/ rnam thos sras kyi mdung rtses shangashan du mtsho dral nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyang glang mgori'isnyingan/ sku gajugs chekhon gzhugs pa 'galen legs kyi la khang gi nang na/ de
ltar machod rten chung ngu zhig bzhugs pa'i sar bsems can gyi den mdzad pa'i slad du/ dgung bdunade na bzhugs so/ de nas 'phags pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom
ldan 'das tsa'i rgyutsa'i skyen gyis 'od zer dang/ podang/ ma mar 'di dag snang bar gyur/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'od zer 'di rnams gcig tu 'dus nas g.yas logs su lan gsum 'khor te/
ba kyi dkyil du nub/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa 'apags pa shAri'i bu'i gseg shang gi rtsa ba dang/ rnam thos sras kyi mdung rtses mtsho dral bas phyis na tshe
bskams nas/ ngamya ngan las 'dus pa'i rig tu yul la yul zhes bya ba 'di 'byungaste/ 'od zer lan gsum 'khor ba'i sar ni bar kher phug tu phyis 'then gyi mkhar dngar ldan gyi grong khyer chen po rtsige

par 'gyur ro// chu'i dkyil du 'od zer nub pa'i sar no/ lul byin gyis rlob cing srungab 'arA dza gra ma'isas rgyas kyi sku gzugs pas tsan dan gyin ng du sku'i grib ma nub par byin gyis brlabs te byas pa

zhig rgya gar khul nas nam mkha' la gshogs te bzhugs par 'gyur ro// chu'i nang na pad+modang me mar byung ba'i saran phyis theg pa chen po spyod pa 'dage slong pho mo gnas pa'i ga tsug lag khang chen po sus
brgya drug cu rtsa gsum/ rgyal po la sogs pa Ta yon bdag dad pa can rnams kyis brtsigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i sku gdung la mchod pa 'byang chub sems dpa' dge slong kho mo'i tshul dug nas

pa nyis brgya lnga bcu/ khyim pa skya bo'i tshul du gnas pa nyis brgya lnga bcu ste/ lnga brgya rtag tu gnas so// gzhan yang phur ma ldogs pa'is la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po'i ches
rgyas par sbyod pa pal cher gnas te/ 'di ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khud pa pa ni no zhes byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang/ spyan ras gzigs kyadang nga phyug la sogs pa
khyang chub sems dpa' brgyad dang/ rnam thos kyi sras dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sdodapon yang dag shes dang/ 'bis kyi bu mo drame med pa 'od dang/ gnonu rdo rje'i sde lcam dral
dngalha klu la sogs pa la dus thams cad du srungs shig par de bzhin gshegs pas gtad de// de nas bcom ldan 'das la ( byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang/ byams pa dang/ sbyar ba/
gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang/ amakha'i snying bo dang/ sa'i snying bo dang/ kun tu bzang po dang/ mthuchen dang/ sman gyi rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' dang/ rnam thos kyi sras gnod sbyin 'khor
sum stong dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dbon yang dag shes 'kher khri khrag bcu dang/ lha gzhan gyis ma thub pa 'khor stong dang/ nam mkha'i spyan 'kher brgyad stong dang/ lha'i bu gsar 'phrang 'khor lnga
brgya dang/ lha'i klu'i rgyal bo gnas so bo 'khor stong dang/ lhamo lcags kyu can 'khor stong phrag bcu dang/ lhamo gnas ldan ma 'khor lnga stong dang/ rigs kyi bu mo dram me da pa'i 'od dang/ gnor
nurdo rje'i spro dang/ lha'i bu blo gros rab ba rtan dang/ lhamo'abrog ma 'khor dang bcas kha la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dam tshig bcas nas/ la lulabasrung bar zhal gyis bzhes te/
ding sang gi bar du'ang 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa 'a'adi brgyad dang/ rnam thos kyisras mgon po dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ wa mo rnams ka ra ga ya la to/ stes te/ 'khor
mang bos bskor nas bzhugs pa'i tshi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams dang/ mgon po dang lha rnams ga la bzhugs bzhugs pa'i ge nas dang/ atshig blangs pa'i sar da dung yang yul
bsrung zhing byin gyis bo/ mnortags da nga mtshan ma dag kyang 'byung/ de nas sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas/ dgung lo nyis brgya sum cu rtsa bzhi lon pa'i 'og tu/ rgya gar gyi rgyal po dor
la apasho ka zhes bgyi ba zhig gas sngon sems can mang po zhige bkum pa las/ sud kyis 'phags pa dgra bcom par sha zhes bgyi ba zhig gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyis nas/ sngar sdig pa mi
dge ba'i las car gyis pa mthol zhing bshags/ slad kyis mi bgyi bar lang yi dam bcas/ 'dzam bu'i gling na sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gatsug lag khang dang/ mchod
rten bzhugs pa rnams su mchod pa bgyidi tsang/ gos gyon can g nyan po phyin gyis brlabs pa mchis so 'tshal du gtsug lag khang dang/ mchod rten brgyad khri bzhistong btsug tu mchis pa las//
mtsho bskams nas la yul yang yul stong par mchis pa'i tsho/ daltar 'u then gyi sku mkhar mchis pa'i dogasar kus po yon du shul byung nas/ dro dgongs gcig btab pa'i nub mo rgyal po'i

btsun mo dam pa las khye'amtshan dang ldan pa bzang po gcig btsas nas/ sngon rgyal po'i btsunamo de kun dga' ra ba'i skyed mos tshal du mchis pa las/ rdzing bu'i nang du khrus bgyid cing mchis pa'i rig na/
tsha 7 nya@#// ma thos kyi sras 'khor dang bcas pa rnams m mkha' la gshegs las kyang las gzagis/ rgyal po'i btsunamos kyang rnam thos kyi sras byed bzhin pazang po mthong bas/
ba sems kyis bur chags kha/ kus po yon du btsas nas/ rgyal bo dar ma u rakas ltas mkhan rnams bkug ste/ bu 'di tsho rang ngam thung/ mtshan ma bzang ngan dang/ dbang thang ci
bod ces partagasan ltas mkhana rnams kyi mchid nas de bu'adamtshan ma'ang bzang/ dbang thang lang rab tu che ste/ mi tha mal pa ma lags pas/ rgyal po yab sku tshem 'phos par rgyal

po bgyid par 'gyur ro zhes bgyis pa dang/ rgyal bo dar ma asho ka'ang phrag dog skyes te khros nas/ kho bo de ltar dbang thang chen/ khe bdag 'tsho zhingesrid 'dzin grang/ 'di nga la ma dgas kyis kher
cig ces mchinas/ mas kyang khu dem por duni/ rgyal bo khro zhing drag shul dag che bas du bkum lta dogs nas mas bu de ber ba las/ slad kyasas lasanum byung nas/ de 'tshal ba las
ma khumasamang yang phyis sa zhur btagasaso// de'i rjesan rgya rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po bu stong dbang pa zhig byung ste/ budagu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu nam tshasan/ stong bu gcigem tshang ba
ma thos kyi sras la gsol ba btab so bslangasanas rnag dzesakyi sras kyis bltasan/ khye'u a nu bsod namasatsan bor ba mthong nas blangs to rgya rje'a'i bu skal du/ da nas rgya rjes bu

degasos nas skad kyis khye'u chen po skyes nas/ rgya rje'i bu sman dang chus kha rtse rtse ba las 'thab sa nas/ khyed rgya rdzo'abum yazhino zhes bgyis pa dang/ khye'u de glo kha ma dga' nas ma gzhan dag la'ang
lo rgyus smras na'ang/ de ltar gyur nas rgya rjel ba dag thog ma skyes pa'i lul tshel sa tshel dumachis par tsaganang zhes gsol ba las/ rgya rje'i zhal nas khyodang 'i bu lanate/ yul sa 'ang 'di yin
na mi dgaram byed cig ces lan dus bsgo ba lamnyan nas/ rgyarje rgyal bus na rgyal po thogs stsal te/ dmag stong phrag bcu dang bsgrogs te/ nub phyogs su lul tsholas tshol du btang ba las/

li yul gyimi shar du phyin te/ de nas machis pa las rgya gar yul nas kyang rgyal bo dang la gang sho ka'ablon po la bsha zhes bgyi ba la dku dar nas/ rgyal po ya sha sad narje khol 'khor lan chad/ rgyal
po la tsha dga' ba bdun stong yul nas phyung ste/ nub phyogs nasal phyogs su khulatsholas tshel dumachis chi pa las/ 'then gyi shel chab gongam 'i yul phyogs su mchis pa dang/ rgyal busanu'i 'khor
gyis tshong pa sher bgyi ba dang/ zang bgyi ba gsal kha mthunamong gcig mchis pa las/ ba bu nad lang nas me skar nas zhugs na thad kar brtol te/ dalar bres pa las mi dganyis kyis rjes
bzhin du bdas pa khas/ to khar bslebs te ba le 'u 'bras pa las lul de tshong lang be 'u 'brangs pa'i sa 'bras so le ta zhes btags/ la'i zhugs ngam gyi ming yang 'di skad du shes zang zhes bdag
[74/] bya// de nas ma gnyis kyis bltasan/ yul gzhengs stong pa bzang po zhige ba da' nas/ 'di bdag cag gargyal bus nu lul sar rung ngo zhes mchid gros su 'tshal nas/ yul sa
ka lo ltar lang ag chibadang/ 'u then gyi re shes chab gongosaramachis pa dang/ blon po ya sha'i 'khor dang mjal nas/ khyedasu'am/ ga las mchisazhes rmas pa dang/ ma de gnyis kyis kyang rgyal bu
sazhung rgyus zhib tu ba bshad pa dang/ langashas kyang rgyal bus na mes skaranamachis pa'i snying du/ go nas 'phrin pa las khyed ni rgyal rabs bdag ni blon po 'arogis na chu srid gcig du 'pham ste

khyod ni rgyal po byas la/ bdag gis blon po byas te/ 'then gyi gzhongs 'dir yul sa ra pa tsug na rung ngo zhes mchi nas/ de nas rgya lag bus mu'ang 'khor dang bcas te/ 'then gyi shel chu gang mar mchis
nas/ tshar 'baka'adi ko'i mgo yu la hang gu rdzo zhes bgyi bar majal te/ rgyal bu dang blon po 'a shag nyis yul sa la ma dum ste/ dmag bkye ste 'a thabs pa las/ nam mkha' las rnam tshes kyi
sras dang/ dbal gyi lha mo byung nas bzhugs te/ 'tshab tum stsalanas/ dag sa de nyid du rnam thos kyi sras dang/ dpal gyi lhamo bzhugs pa'i rten la re re zhig brtsigs pa 'ang dang sang gi bar
dumachis te/ tshul sungs mar gtso bo rnam thos kyisras dang/ dbal gyi lha mo mtshod ba 'ang lags/ de nas rgyal bus nu dang/ blon po ya ngasha ya dum nas sa nus ni rgyal bo bgyis//
'khasan blon po bgyis nas/ rgyal bus nu'i 'khor rgya rnams zhi'i then gyi shi la chu 'og maman chadamado la mis kar dang/ kam sheng yan chad du bkod/ blon po la sha'i rgya gar rnams shel
chugongam lan chad du rgyu dang kong shing man chad du bkod/ shel chud dusan garadang/ rgya'i blon po dang/ 'ab ngas stod mis 'dres sngar bkod nas yul btsugs/ mkhar brtsigs te/ rgyu
gar dang rgya srid pa'i khunal lags te/ skadazhagyi gar dang ma mthun/ pa gnargya gar dang bags kyis 'thun/ 'jig rten pa'i lugs ni rgya dang phal cher 'thun/ chos kyi lugs dang chos skad ni rgyu
gar dang phal cher 'thun/ la'o'i phral skadan thog ma byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal tan thos kyi dge slong gi tshul du bskyal te/ mtshan mi tsan zhes bgyi bas myos pa phyugs rdza khye'u 'aso dang
tshule 'ji zhes bgyi ba gnyis la sogs pa la/ lul tsarma brgyabaralaskad phyung ste kun la bslabs nas/ khya'adu gnyis kyang galamachis pa'i nges su la'angamamachis te/ kha skad kyang thog ma'ag
ba rnams kyis bstan cing bsubs pa lags/ thog ma la phul byung nas tatshung du lan ba/ ga'u to shan gyi mkhan po o rgyu ba der la sogs pas/ mkhan po bgres rims kyis mkhan po snga
rabs la bka' mchid thos pa dang/ 'phags pa rnams kyis lung bstan pa dang/ la rdzi'i rgyal rabs kyi yi ge dang zhib tu gtugs na gna' theg ma rgya gar yul du/ rgyal po ma skyes dgrasargyale
bgyis pa nas btsasan/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras spyir dgung lo sum cu rtsa gnyis rgyal po bgyis pa las rgyal srid bzung ste dgung lo lnga lags pa las/ sangs rgyas mya ngan 'a//

'das de tshun chad dgung lo nyi shu rtsa bdun rgyal po bgyis te/ rgyal po ma skyes dgu nas rgyal po dar ma a sho ka'i bar du/ rgyagar gyi rgyal bo khas pa cus rgyal srid bzung ste/ daram gshekas spyir
rgyal bo dgung la lnga bcu rtsa lnga bgyis pa las/ rgyal bor zhugs nas dgung lo sum tu lags pa tshig tu rgyal bos nu btsas te/ sa nudagung lo bcu gnyis 'an pa'i tsho/ rgya rjes rgyal thabs stsal nas

thog pa'i yul tsho'i sa tshol du mchis pa las/ rgyal busazhu dgu ba dang dudagu lan ba 'i tshe/ la la la lu la btsugs te/ thog mar la sdang zhugs pa yan chad zhab tu bain/ sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das/

nas dgung lo so brgyasum cu rtsa bzhi lags nas/ la yul yang ga ded byung bar gyur/ rgyal bus nus thog mar la rjer zhugs nas rgyal sridi'athung tshun chad dang/ la rje btsan bar ng btsan la brtan/ thog

dmar li rjer bskos nas/ la rdzirabs lnga bcu rtsa drug dang/ chag tshab gcig byung/ gna' dung kho mtsho bskams nas rgyal bas nudang/ blon po langasha la sogs pas thog ma zhig bzung ste mu la brtsigs nas/

rgyal bus tshu'i bu rgyal bo'i bul zhig bgyi bas/ 'gagyi dengar ldan gyi grong khyer ba tshu legs te la shul khyung nas dgung lo brgya drug cu rtsa lnga 'das pa'i 'og tu/ rgyal po yab la 'khu rgyal po bi dzi ra sam b+hab we

bsus pa rgya la por zhugs nas/ dgung lo lnga lags nas sa yul du thog mtshos byung ste/ 'jam dang la dang byams pa gnyis kyis la yul 'di dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing khud pa lags par thugs su chud
nas mas pa ni mi'i skye bas te/ rgyal bo lo dzi ya sam b+ha ba zhes smral/ 'am da pal na dge slong 'phags pa de ratsana'i go rtagasasu sprul nas/ las dang nyon mongs pa'i mthar phyin pa'i gnas/ yul
tsarma bcu khe'i tshal dugashogs te/ la lu lan mchis pa'i sems can rnamos kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad cing/ la 'oskad kyang byas pa phyugs rdzi rnams la bas share bstan/ le'i yi ge yang bslabs nus

de'i 'og tu chos byung ngo/ des rgyal bo 'u 'a'i bu rgyal po pa dzi ya sam b+ha bas yon bdag bgyis nas dge ba'i bshes gnyena' ba gas pa po ro tsa na'i slad du/ thog mar la yul du tsarma'i gtsug lag khang pa btsug/

par bgyis pa las/ li rdzabi dza ya sam b+ha ba'i blonu bo dang/ 'bangs 'khor dang bcas te kun gyi'i kyang/ tsarmar gtsug lag khang re re bzhi par gsol nasabatsagisanamad ma tsam zhig byungab las rgyal bos
bsams la// gtsug lag khang rtsig tun rtsalanan/ bdag la dgosdig tu 'gyur/ desnyad cig btsugasanani/ slad kyis zhig ral du gyur na'angam slongasasu glo bachung bas/ dge ba 'di shesag rten 'phags pa de

tsan la zhus na/ de bzhinegshegs pa'i sku ga dung sha' ris su labazhugs pa rnams kyis gtsug lag khang dang mtshod rten thugasang shig ces bsgron/ sdig tu mi 'gyur zhes byung nas/ rgyal bos kyang blon po dang
'bangs rnams la de bzhin du bsko nas/ tsarna'i khe tsug lag khang chen po rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha bas brtsigs pa'i tshe/ rgyal po 'khor dang/ bon po dang/ 'bangs rnams kyis
gtsarmar gtsug lag khang chung ngu dang mchod rten brtsigs so 'tshal gyi nang na ga am stsal ba ga cig kyang ma mchis te da gtsug lag khang brtsigs la gsan/ 'bags pa bi ro tsa nas rgyal po ba dzi la
sam b+ha ba la rgyal pos gats+tshabardungs la/ 'phags pa rnams spyan drongs shig ces bgyis pa dang/ rgyal bo 'amachid nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du 'dareg shegs te/ bdag gi lag tu

mastsal gyi bar du bdagagaN+Dimordung ngoms smon lam btab pa dang/ dem thagatu'ajam dpal gyi sprul pa dge slong de ro tsananam mkha' las de bzhin gshegs par sprul te/ nyan thos chen po bcu drug dang thams

cig tu tsarnar de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul bstan nas/ rgyal po ba dza ra sam b+ha ba la gtugats+tshistsal nas/ rgyal pos gaN+Dibardung sa pa dang/ dgung bdun gyi bar du gan+tI'i sgra ma chad par byung ste/ de bzhin
gshegs pa 'a la khaman sum du gshegs pa'i dan rtags su gsal zhabs kyis bcags pa'i rjes da dung gter du tsa na ams/ 'bags pa nyan thos chen po bcu drug la mched pa'i rin patsho sna tshe
las bgyis pa'i lo shesaM cha bcu drug rgyal pos phul ba'ang nga'i gtsug lag khang gnang du 'bags ba rnams kyis gter du stsal te/ phyis dus da musar shing dge 'dun la yon bdagam mchis te/ 'tsho ba ni

[4 ]'byor dang ri dusan na po che'i bshes cha 'da rnams de'i tshesa'i 'og nas 'byung zhe 'phags pa 'a lung bstan pa dag las kyang byang/ dge slong 'phags pa de re tsa nA mched pa 'cha rkyenang klu'i rgyal po du lar
zhes bgyi bas kha che'i yul nas de bzhin gang shegs pa bdun gyi sku gdung bzhugs pa'i mchod rtenam cig gran drangs nas/ amakha' sa gshegs ted ltar tsharman bzhugs te mchod rten 'di dri
gtsang khang gi nang na bzhugs te/ grobam dal du gsa' rar 'byung/ rgyal po ba dzi la sing dazhes bgyi ba tsarma'i gtsug lag khangangamachod pa bgyade dumachis pa las/ sgog thugs bder song bgyis
pa 'a gtsag 'chag cing gshegs par mthong nas ( mtshams med pa lnga byang ngo zhes bgyi'achi ba 'ong da ltar nga zhugs/ gtsug lag khang de'i saa bzhi l gyis bzhes pa'i ng ldan m mkha'in ngang/ nor
bu bzang ngo zhes nga rgyu nga la gas te/ ding sang/ par du mngon rtags dang mtshan ma dag kyang 'byung/ 'phags pa'i lung bstan pa dgadang sbyar na'ang/ thogam gtsug lag khang 'damasabartsigs pa'i ng
dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang/ yon bdag 'phags pa shatshugags mdzad pa/ gtsug lag khang dang mchod de na bzhugs so 'tshal gyi nang na'ang deng zhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gdung dang/ byang chub
sems dad ra dang nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung bzhugs pas/ gtan zhing byin che rang ste/ thog ma la yul du gtsug lag khang byung ba'ang 'di 'a sa snga ba mo mchis/ de nas
ba[p]// rmar 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa dge slong 'phags pa re ro tsanas chos phyung/ rgyal po pa dza ya sam b+ha bas gtsug lag khang brtsigs tshun chad rgyal po lany+dzarabs bdun gyi bar du

lags gtsug lag khang gzhan ma brtsigs/ de nas de'i 'og turgya gar yul nas 'phags pa dgra bcom pa bu 'dud pa dang/ kha 'ga' sa dang/ khag ro lang dang/ kha ga ngudo dang bzhi byung ste/ go'u to shan gyi

Artsa nar bzhugs so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'ang rje ba'i rje bi dza mya bya bar gyur te rgyal po des srog mkhar gyi lcang nas bltas na/ mkhar gyi phyi rol du gser dang dngul lta bur snang ba zhig

mthong nas bsags pa dang/ da ltar 'gam tir gyi mchod rten chen por bzhugs pa bslebanas bltas na/ sha ban gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shesasu gyur te/ rgyal po la smas pa/ kye rgyal po khyed sangs
rgyas kyis lung bstan pa bzhin de gtsug lag khang gcig btsugs dgos so zhes bgyis pa dang/ su'i phyir cig ces rgyal pos zhus pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi pho nya zhes bgyi ba 'phags pa

zla dgra bcom pa bud 'du rta la sogs pa bzhi/ khyod kyi dge kha'abashes gnyen du 'os pa 'di dag ga phyir tshugs shig ces bsgo ba dang 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag kyang rgyal po ba dza ya brtse'i drung du
byanonas tshes nga shad pas rgyal po 'ang tshe snga ma'i smon lam dran s/ de ma thag tu deg sa brtags pa'i yur bu der btab ste gtsug lag khang 'gum tIr brtso legs so// de nas rgyal po badza la brtse

'gum rtar gyi gtsug lag khang du mchod pa bgyid du mchis pa'i tshe/ bu chung ngu zhig ster nas rjes bcad de btsal na/ 'ga' dengoshan gyi lung bu'i nang na/ daltar su ma ra zhes bgyi ba gtsug lag khang
gnangan/ sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi sku gdung bzhugs pa'i machod rten gyi drung du khu red de/ des rgyal bos mchod rten 'di ga nga gisan sus brtsiges zhes rmas pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen/
'phags pa dag gi zhal nas/ mtshod nas nigs rgyas 'od srungasamyang n las 'das pa'i tshibartsigs te/ sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi sku gdung bzhugs so// la lul sngon mtshor gyur pa'idusan/
mchod rten 'di'is ga logs te chus la zhig/ phyis kyang la la 'di tsho'i 'gyur// yang mchod rten 'di'is log nas chus 'go ste/ sangs rgyas byams pa 'byung ba'i tshi'ang mtshe skam
nas/ tshul du gyur pa 'disanamachod rten 'di 'byung/ gnas 'dazhi dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhing khud pa'inang na'ang/ gi'u to shan 'di pho brang gcig yin te sa
gsum gyisangs rgyas rnams kyang kun 'arig gsar gong lung ston/ sems can gyi dono mdzad do/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing so sos byang chub sems dapa'i stong phrag nyi shu'ang dus gsum
du glang mgo ra'id lamachod pa mdzad du byon nas slar gshegs so zhes bstan/ de nas rgyal bo dzi ya 'dri dad pa'i shugs chen pos glang mgo bo'i da du 'ge'u to shan gyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs
tsha// nas buchung ngu de'ang thar par btang ste/ sa dgra bcom pa'i 'brasabu theb nas/ li yul du dgra bcom par 'gyur ba 'di las snga pa ma byung bas/ 'di na lam ston pa'o zhes mo rgu bde/

kashi phyakhar bgos te/ thegamalo rgupa de shi'ilangan de nas byung ste/ deng sang gabar du'ang thub ldan dang/ dka' thub kyang mchog las btus te/ mo rgu bde shing ra sgo ba lags/ 'ge'u toshanadang/ 'gas
sgyur gyi gtsug lag khang 'di gnyis bzhugs pa'i degs 'ang/ sa gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rims kyis 'byung ngo 'tshal gyi zhabs kyis bcags/ byin gyis rlob pa'i steng du/ 'phags pa'i lung
bstan pa dag dang sbyang na'ang thog ma gtsug lag khang 'di rnams bag pa'i ng dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang/ yon bdage 'phags pa shastag gis mdzad la/ gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten bzhugs so
'tshol gyi nangan de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung bzhugs pas gtan cing phyi'i che rab ste/ gtsug lag khang gsungs mar

zhal gyis bzhes pa'i ng rnam thos kyi srasadang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon mang dag shes dang/ klu'i rgyal bo gnas drug po lags te/ deng sang gabar du'ang mngon rtags dang/ mtshan ma dag kyang 'byung ba'i phyir

mi lul gyi gtsug lag khang bzhugs so 'tshal gyi nang na gtso bor bgyi ba lags/ rgyal bo bi dza badris 'gum tor gyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs tshun chad rgyal po rab saganyis kyi bar du gtsug lag khang gzhan/

ma brtsigs/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal bo kho dze la dza ya zhes bgyi bas rgya rje'i bu mo khu te grwar zhes bgyi bams phrang du blangs nas rgya rje'i bu mo des bal yul du srinalu'i sa bon zhig 'tshal tems nas/
khul kha zha bgyi bar srin bu gsos pa dang/ srin bumatshar ba'askabs su bdo bo rgyus la 'tshal ba kha cig gas/ rgyal bo la dza la dzaya rgyal po 'aitsun mo bgyid pa des sprul gdug pamang po ma zhun
gso zhingams te chen por gyur pa dang/ 'dul gas su gnod par glob chung nas ji ltar bgyi zhis blon po dag gis zhus pa dang/ sbrul gso ba'i khang pa ram thong la kun srog shing ces bsgo ba dang/ rgyal
mos de thos nas 'phral du rgyal po la rgyus kyis bshad pa'i rdzol thegasas/ srin bu nga shas shagi khazhus te/ gsang thabs su gsos te/ spyod kyis kha cer dar dang sri bal phyung nas/ dar dang menatu

btags te rgyal po la bstan nas/ rgyus kyis zhib tu bshad pa dang/ rgyal po 'ang 'gyod pa skyes te/ rgyags lul nas dge slong 'phags kha sang ga ga ga zhes bgyi ba la u0f7a tshul du khyenanas/ dge ba'i ngo shes
gnyen du spyan dra dAte/ srin bu phaletshol kum pa 'dengos sdigab shags sbyang sa bgyis nas/ bo sar dang/ ma zha' mchod rten dang/ gtsug lag khang chen po bgis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung

shakiramamang mo tsam zhig stsal te/ de'i slad du dpyid zla ra ba'i ngo thog thag btsom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gzugs banam zhe pos mya zhes bgyi ba'i gtsug lag khangan bzhugs so/ zhes 'phags pa dag
sha khya/ gis lung bstan pas/ dang sang gi bar du'ang la yul gyi dge 'dan speganyis dang/ rgyal po dang/ blon po man chad/ 'bangs yan chad le ro 'dapyid zla ra ba'i ngo la mched pa brgyade/
ba/ ri la gyis po star+ya'igatsug lag khang du mchis te/ gtsug lag khang 'di'ang ga nyan zhing na che rab ste/ ltar ba la dang/ ratAshur gnyis srungs skar zhal gyis bzhes pa lags te dnge sangs/

bar du'ang mngon rtags dang mtshan ma dag kyang 'byung// de nas rgyal po ba dze ya dza ya zhes bgyi ba la spyanagasum mchis te/ bu pho rab don 'dos zhes ngagyi ban rgyal sring ma 'tshal te/ bsod nams ngagyid/

thacing rgya gar yul dumachis/ de'i nu bo bar a'ang rgyal sridam 'tshal nas ban der zhugs te/ ming la dar mo nand zhes pa rtags nas/ rgya gar yul du ches slob dumachis/ nu bo tha chung rgyalasar zhugs te/

rgya mang ba dzi ya dar mar btags/ rgyal bo la tshe 'dar ma de dpa' zhing rtsal che bas gsod skye na dag la dga' nas phu bo ban de dar mnan da rgya gar yul na mchis pa chos pa'i m bslabs bsgoms pas/ 'phags

lab dgra bcom par gyur te/ 'phags pa dar mnan nas rgya gar yul nas bstan/ nu bergyal po bi dza ya da'i ma gsod rkyen bgyid cing/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos la zhen pa ra mthong nas/ go brje ste// dge ba'ang she
gten bgyi ba'i slad du rgya gar yul nas la yul du mchis de/ nyonabagyir khyi re shel chab 'og ma/ shel chab dang nye ba zhig tu spyil bu bgyis te/ de na sgom zhing bzhugs pa las/ nyin cig gcig 'phag

pa de sha ba gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba gcig sprul te 'u then gyi skumakhar gyi slad lo shar phyogs legs na/ 'gus no zhes bgyi ba'i sgang bu zhig mchis pa ban byung ba dang/ rgyal po ba dzi ya dar mas srog la bar
gyi steng nas mthong nas/ mda' gcig 'das pa dang/ shib par kho gnas sha ban bris/ rgyal bos ni slad bzhin du bsnyags pa dang/ shab de 'phags pa dar mnanada'i spyil bu'i nang du mchis pa rgyal
po sad bzhin du mchis pas bltasan/ spyil khu'i nang na shaban cang ma mchis/ dge slong gcig bar la mdas phog pa 'phyin cing mchis pa mthong nas/ phu bo lags par narim 'tshal/ phu bo dge slong da
ma nan pas byin gyis brlabasanas phu bo 'gas par gdod ngo tshar te/ rgyal pos btsun pa nongs zhes bgyis pa dang/ khyed kyis bdag la mdas 'phas te ci bya zhes bgyis pa dang/ rgyal pos kyang sha ba
ma lags par tshor nas/ bdag gis nongasan khri lan zhes bgyis pa dang/ dge slong de'i mchid nas/ gtsag na nga khyed kyi phu bo yin/ gzhis su tshu nga 'phags pa dgra bcom par gyur pas/ rgyal po

khyod kyis mtshar gyi sdig pa thob ste/ mtshams med pa dang 'dra ba'i las byas par gyur te/ bshags sbyangs dang bsod nams cheram byas zhami rung ngo zhes bgyis pa dang/ rgyal po de 'ang 'gyod pa skyes te rab
mi dag 'as/ 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de'i zhabs la 'jus te brjod par gsol/ bshags sbyangs bgyis nas bdag gi sdig pa 'dzi ltar byung zhes zhus pa dang/ 'phags pa dar ma nan nga'i zhal sa
da 'phral dugazhanabyar med kyis/ tshul 'dra tiri zhes bya ba'agazhengs pa pa na/ sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' skad bsod pa'i tshe/
rgya la po zla 'od bgyid pa'i dusan/ bram zes age bslangs te/ rgyal po nyid kyis mgo bcad nas bram ze la stsal ba'i 'phrin las dka' ba rnam pa gcig mdzad pa'i sa 'di yin/ gnyis su na bcom

ldan 'das shAkya thub pa rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po nas la lu la byin gyis rlob cing/ 'ge 'u te shan du gshegs pa 'tshe/ byang chub sems da pa'i 'khor mang pos bskor ba na byang chub sems ngang las

snying po dang/ rikrita ko sha zhes bya ba 'di byin gyis brlabs te 'di ni bzhugs bzhugs// deng sang gi bar du'ang gzugs brnyan 'di na bzhugs/ rnam pa gsum du na 'bod rgyu 'ong zhes bya ba'i tshal chung pa
bana'ang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyis bcags nas/ phyis 'phags pa 'byung ba rnams kyi sgo sar byin gyis brlabs te/ gnas 'di rnams srung bar lha 'dzin raM sha ba dang/ lha mo sangashe ga ka dang/

klu'i rgyal po dag rasha ka dang gsum gyis dmatshig bas/ deng sang gi bar du'ang gnas 'di srung zhing rgyal pos 'dir gtsug lag khang gcig brtsigs na/ snga phyi'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las su bgyis pa 'byung ngo zhes

bgyis pa dang/ rgyal po bi dza ya dar ma'ang dad pa skyes nas/ slan chad gsod rkyen mi bgyid par dam bcas/ rgyal po zla 'od kyis khram dze la mge spyonag dong du bgyis pa'i sar de ma thag tu deg sa pa drug

ba09 pa'i phur bu btab nas/ dge ba'i mi shes gnyena'aphags pa dar mnan pa'i slad du 'drotarigumachod rten dang gtsug lag khang chen po brtsigs/ sku mkhar gyi nang du'ang lta sgo sge'u chung mchis pa'i nang legro

na klu'i rgyal po chen po ba run 'i gnas kyi steng na/ pa ri wa zhes bgyi ba'amachod rtenag nyan po bzhugs pa'i drung na nang ga gtsug lag khang gcig dang/ mchod rten chen po brtags te/ mchod rten gyi nang du

bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyis gdung stsal/ sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi thog ma'i sku gdung ma zhig pa zhig spyan drangs te/ daltar gtsug lag khang 'di'i nang na bzhugs/ 'gro tor gyi gtsug lag khang 'di'i

gtan zhing byin che rab ste/ ring sang gi bar du'ang mngon rtags dang mtshan ma byung/ li lul thog ma maha shas ka'i sdo'ang dge slong 'phags pa dang mnand las byung nas/ 'u thenan 'dre tari gtogs par

gtsug lag khang brgyad dang kam shing gtsug lag khang brgyad kyi dge 'dun yang ma dkAs ka'i sder gtogs/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya sa dza ya'i ba chen po rgyal bu 'don 'dres sang tang gi gtsug
lag khang rtsig par dog sa 'jal te brtsams pa las yo byadargya rkyen gyis ma 'tshal nas/ rgyal bu bdon 'dres kyis bsams pa// gzhan nas ma 'brogs pa/ ma brkus pa/ dkon mchog gsum
gyi dkor la ma 'bags pa gtsang ma bdag nyid kyis rkang gas btsugasaM te btsal la/ gtsug lag khang brtsig go snyam nas/ thog ma rgya gar yul dumachis te/ mkhan po 'phags pa sa man ta sa de mkhan mor
[s]@#// spyan drangs te phyogs thog thagatu'ang mchis nas/ nor gtsang ma btsal/ de nas slar log nas rgya yul du mchis pa dang rgya rje'i blon po gcig khyed la chags te dgum par bgyis pa

ka2/las 'don 'dres kyis rgya rje la chen po 'di'i bskyon par bdag dgum par ci gnang zhes gsol ba las/ rgya rjes kyang gnang ste/ gshed las rgyal bu la ral gris ba ba na bcad 'gro nas 'o ma byung ste ma

gum nas rgya rje la sogs pas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ mchod pa bgyis/ yon yang mang po zhig phul/ blon po des kyang srog rin gyi yon phal cher khul blangs nas/ slar la yul gyi 'dab ba zhig tu 'khor

mang po dang lhan cig tu mchis pa dang/ rgyal bu 'a don 'dres kyinu bo rgyal mo bi dza ya dar ma rgyal srid 'dzin cing mchis pa las/ blon po kha cig gi mchid nas/ rgyal bu'i gcen rgyal bu 'don 'as rgya rjes

la yul gyi rgyal por bskos rgyu/ rgyal bo'i rgyal srid 'phrog tu 'ongs so zhes bgyis pa dang/ rgyal po ba dze ya dar ma'ang phu bo 'don 'dros la ma dga' nas/ sku mkhar gyi nang du'ang ma btang phrad du

'ang ma btung nas/ sang tir gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa'is gzhiramache zhig ces bsgo nas phu bo rgyal bu 'don 'dres kyangs nga tur du mchis te nu bos kyang chu dang rtswapa/je la'ang dang nga bskur te/ kha
bdag gi nigyis 'jal te kho khyad sbyor zhing gas pa las/ thegam rgya gar yul du mkhan po 'phags pasaman tus 'di dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi phyogs su bltasanas/ phyag 'tshal teached pa bgyis
nas smon lam btab/ spyan drangs pa dang/ mkhan po'ang rgya gar yul nas nam mkha' las ldings te/ la lul du rgyal po 'don 'dres kyi drung du gshegs nas/ gtsug lag khang ji ltar brtsigs
pa'i gshes gnyen lang bgyisi/ rgyal po spun gnyis bar du ma 'jal ba'i bsdums bgyi ba'i slad du/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnam du gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thub pas byang chub sam/
dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa 'tshe/ lus kyi lan lag dang bu smad la sogs pa sbyin gtong bgyis shing/ 'phrin las dka' ba ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin du ne tso zhes bgyi ba dang/ zlosachos la yul dum bgyir
mi rung zhes lha rnams la gsol nas/ sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lA dang/ rgyal chen las bzhi'i lha rnams la yulasang ti'i bgyi bar gshegs te/ sangs rgyas bsem ldan 'das sngon 'phrin las dka'

ba jaltar mdzad pa bzhin du/ lca rnams rjes ches bgyis pa'i tsho rgyal po bi dza la dar mas blon po dang 'bangs rnams la gcig kyang der mchir ma gnang ngo zhes bgyis pa las/ lha'i rol mo bzang po snga
nam byung ba de thos nas mi gcig gis gcig sbran te u brjod nas derams/ slad kyis rgyal po'i'i khor kun gar mchis rgyal pos smras pa dang/ blon po dag gis rgyas kyis zhib tu bshad pa dang da
rgyal po ba rdzi la darama'ang ma bzod de/ sang ti'i gyi gtsug lag khang ga 'dab tumachis pa dang/ phu bo rgyal bu 'don 'dres kyis bsus nas/ spun der mjal ba dang/ nu bo rgyal po bi dza ya dar mas su
khel phyag bgyis nas/ bus mo btsugs/ thal mo sbyage/ 'phags pa bdogags khyod kyi mthu stobs ma rig nas/ nga rgyal gyi dbang du gyur nas/ bdag gis rab tu nos te bzod pa
gsol zhing mchis na/ bdag la dngos sdig tu mi 'gyur bar bzod pa bzhes par 'genang zhes bgyis pa dang/ phu bos kyang brjod pa blangs pa dang/ de sar nu bo la bzod pa gsol nas// lagasbrel te/
gtsug lag khang du mchis nasam chod pa bgyis/ lha kusanol bgyis pa dang/ gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa las rjesasu la rang nas yon phul/ gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa'i dan grogs bgyis te/

kyin jis bkum ste phul/ thog ma sbyin majal te bzod pa gsol ba'i sar 'ja'amo ka ka rong zhes bgyi be'i gtsug lag khang gcig brtsigs nas/ thog ma la de yul du sarba sa phad kyi sde theg pa chung du pa'i ng
mkhan po 'phags pas man nga sa 'dilas byung/ gtsug lag khang gasrungs ma'ang lha ka bya la zhes bgyi bas zhal gyis bzhes te bsrung/ dengasang ga par du latsagi gcig yang/ rtag tu ston zla ra ba tshes

ban dang brgyad kyi gdugs la de bzhin gshegs pas 'phrin las dka' ba mdzad pa'i zlos chos no la brgyad de/ yul ma le rgyas tshos nyan cing der mchis te/ gtsug lag khang 'di'ang gnyan byase tshe bar bgyi//

de'i 'og tu rgyal po ba tshos dar ma'i bu rgyal po pa dzayasing pas rgyal po brgyad pa'i tsho/ ga 'jag gi rgyal pos li yul du dmag mang po drangs te/ rgyal po ba dza ya sing ra dang 'thabs pa las/ ga 'jag gi g.yag
'pham ste/ ga 'jag gi rgyal po 'ang lo rjes zhags pas zin nas dgum par bgyis pa las/ thar bar gsol nas rgyal bo ba dza ya sing nga'imaching nas/ rgyal po khyod bdag gisam de gus par thar par gtangags
nas khyod dag choms pa'i dus na/ bdang ga dege ba'i bshes gnyena mdzad cing/ slar spyon cig ces bgyis nas thar par bstsal te mang a nan dase nar brtags te/ slar shu 'ag tu btang/ de nas dge
slong lanan se na dang/ rgyud kyis dgratshamasanas thog mar rjedang dam bcas pa bzhin/ nam mkha' la ldings te la yul du gshegs nas/ rgyal po ba dze ya seng ha'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyi ba'i
slad du/ la rje yang dad pa skyes nas 'phags pa dgra bcom pa a nan da sa na'i slad du/ som nyi'i gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten brtsigs te gtsug lag ga srungasam nortem thes kyi sras dang/ lu

kabyi bzhugs te/ gtsug lag khang 'di'angamanyan zhing byin che bar bgyi/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po ba rdzaya kir tis 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa/ kam sheng du chos sbe la ba'i dgra bcom pa su zhig

bgyi bas dge ba'i gshes gnyen bgyis nas/ dad paskyes nga 'isrung du bu nyo'ogatsug lag khang brtsigs te/ thegam ka reska'i rgyal po dang/ gu zan gyi rgyal po dang/ la rdzo'i rgyal po ba dzaya kirati la sogs

pas rgya gar yul du dmag drangs nas/ the ked ces bgyi ba'i grong khyer phab pa'i tsho/ rgyal po ba dza ya kader nyis shar ram mngamo zhig red pa'i ngakhru nye'i mchod rten de'i nang du stsal ma thog ma dog sa rtog pa'i phur
gla@#// bu 'debs pa'i/ rgyal po pa dzil ka'i ta dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa su dri'i zhal nas/ phur bu 'di rgyal pos lag pasams yar lan lnga byabasan mngon rtags

'byung nge zhes bgyis pa dang/ rgyal pos kyang dogs brtags pa rishug pa'i phur bu la lag pas lan lnga byabs pa dang/ phur bu de la shug pa'i yal ga khru gang pa lnga de ma thag tu de nyin par skyes nas//
sladakyis shug pa de'i drung du ban+dedag gis dar ma bklags bdang/ shug ba de las ches bshad pa'i sgra dag byung nas/ slad kyis bsreg zhon nu dag dar ma thogs chos nyan du mchis na'ang/ de bzhin
dutshes 'chad pa'i sgradag byung ba las/ slad kyis bane gcig gis daram log par bklags s/ 'di ltar ma yin no zhes lhas bsgo ba dang mnyan nas/ de tshun chad chos ba dang pan+d+hesgra'ang ma byung/ sud
kyis gtsug lag khang 'di'i chab dka' chab kyis 'tshal te/ chab m phyin nas/ gtsug lag khang zhig tu nye ba las/ dge slong btsun pa sum pon zhes bgyi ba dgrachoms su nye ba zhig gis gtsug lag khang

dem zhag par bgyi pe'i smad du/ dgra bcom par 'grub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des klur skye bar smon lam btab nas/ de ma thag tu lus las chab phyung nas/ mi'i lus ma 'phos par shes chu chung ngu'i klur gyur
te dogasa'i 'og tu nub nas/ deng sang gi bar du gtsug lag khang de chab/ shel chab chung du las drangs/ gtsug lag khang 'di'ang dang sang gi bar du ma zhig ste/ gnyan zhing byin che bar bgyi//

susama'ang lta su dza yadang/ phyag kharnyanas de su kadang/ shel chab chung ngu'i klasum bon gyis srung/ de'adi nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po po dze ya kare ti'i bu/ rgyal po ba dzi'ang sang khra ma zhes ngagyi/

ba de ba'azhing rtsa la che ba zhig byung nas/ phyi dgramang po zhig la bsngos nas/ sems can phal cher bkum/ de'i 'og tu seng ge ma la rgol ba zhige phyung ste// dmagags btabana'ang ma khums te rgyalapo
gtsag bus seng ge la brgal te zinanas bkum/ de nas rgyal po de'i ming yang seng ge r btags/ rgyal po de'ang 'degs gsherarams pa las/ shel chab chung tshub 'gram tshal zhig tu dgongs
btab pa las/ de'i nub mo tshal de'izhingan zhugs mar 'dra gzhig rgyang nas gda' nas/ slad de nang par bltasan/ dge slong 'bags pa dgra bcom pa ga ta'an ya sha de na bzhugs pa las/ 'od byung pa
