mthong nas dad pa skyes te mchod pa bgyis nas 'phags ba 'din tsa mdzad ces zhus pa deng dgra bcom pa gnya' na ya sha' zhal nas/ sa 'di'ingasngonagyi de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs
ba la gas te/ rgyal pos 'dir gtsug lag khang gcig btsugs pa 'disiso zhes bgyis pa dang/ rgyal pos kyang 'phags pa de la dad pa skyes pa'i slad du/ bsgo ba bzhin du mnyananas sdig pa bshags
gtsug lag khang gdeg sa bsag pa'i phur pa btab nas gser gyi gzhong pa gcig spyi le la bzung ste/ dbadag gis brtsigs pa'i gtsug lag khang 'di yun du tshugasangashing brtan par 'gyuran/ phyogs
0 @#// btsun bzhugs pa'i kha gas pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlab cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung bdag ga gi zhong pa 'di'i nang du stsal bar ci gnang zhes smon lam btab pa dang/
ka nam mkha' las shari'am mang po tsam zhig gzhong pa'i nang du gshegs nas/ rgyal po sngar bas lhag par dad pa skyes te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ya sha'i sad du/ daram tir gyi gtsug lag khang mchod
rten chen po brtsigs te/ nang du shar rim mang po tsam zhig stsal pas/ gtsug lag khang 'di'ang gnyazhing bun che bas/ srungasam rnam thos kyi sras po dang/ lha ka bya las srung de nas rgyal po ba dze
ya dar mas rgyal srid bzung ba man chad/ badzaya ka'i se rgyal po bgyis pa yan chad/ rgyal po rabs bcubazhi'i bar du res 'ga'an lul du phyi dgra gzhan gyis dmag drangs tegatses/ res 'ga'
na la rje dag gis yul gzhan dudamagadangasanas 'bangs kyi tshigs su gyur/ de'i 'og tu dru gu an shed kyis la yul du dmag drangasanas 'ga' shanaman chad kyi gtsug lag khang pa la cher mes
bsregs te lul nams/ 'bangs 'grongs nas gtsug lag khang gsar pa rtsig pa'i rdzog thogs/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po pa dza ya kir ti'abu/ rgyal po badza la sang gram zhes bgyi bas ngagung 'badun
lan zhig rgyal bor zhugs nas/ slad kyis mthar son pa dang/ lul 'dasus shig/ tsa'i slad du dmas zhes dge 'dun rgan rabs dang/ blon po dag la rmas pa las/ dge 'dun dang blon po
rnams kyang/ dug am ngo shod la sogs las sngon yul ji ltar ba shage pa'i lo rgyus zhib tu bshad pa dang/ rgyal bo la dzasang gra mas blon po dag la dmag tshogs ci mchis pasdus shad ces
bsgos/ sngon gtses shang lul pa shog pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi yul du dmag drangs til naslan nas lul bshig/ sems can phal cher bkum/ de nas slar log nas/ shel chab 'og ma'i

'gram dumachis pa dang/ dge slong bdun zhig chab gyin ng du khrus bgyid cing rtsodamo sna tshogs bgyid par mthong nas/ dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa byed ces byas ba dang/ dgeslong re bdun yang de ma thag tu nam
mal las ldanges nas/ rgyal bo de la rdzu 'phrul rnam pa bcu drug bstan pa dang/ rgyal po de'i yid la bdag gis sngar lang sems can mang po zhig srog bcad re bkum/ dbang 'phags pa de rnams la ngan

sams bskyed par ng du nyes sosnyam pa'i 'gyod pa cher skyes/ 'phags pa de dag gis rdzu 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa mthong nas/ dadapa'i ng cher skyes te/ 'phags pa de dag ga la bzhugs pa'i drung du bstan
nas/ mchod pa dang bshags sbyangs bgyis/ bzod pa gsol nas/ 'phags pa dgra bcom pa po rten sta la sogs pa 'phags pa bdun gyi phyi'i 'gu zhan gyi gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ 'phags padagra
khacom pa bdun gyis kyang des dbyin gyis brlabs nas/ zhinge'os dag zhan te zhes bgyi bar gtsug lag khang gi mtshan yang btagasate/ gtsug lag khang 'di'ong gi nyan zhing drin che ba ste/ lha 'dzin/
rishi ba dang nor bu bzang po gnyis kyis srung de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya sang grama'i bu rgyal po bi dza ya sange pa zhes brgyabs/ rgyal mor zhugs nas dge ba'i bshes
ti 1gnyen 'phags pa dgra bcom pa dar ma nga la/ 'bags pa khyed rdza 'phrul tsam nga' babadag la bstan par ci gnang zhes gsol bas/ 'phags pa des rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po ba dza la song na dga'
ldan du khridede/ 'phags pa bum pa bzhugs ra ' gnas dang / zhal bstananas slar machas pa dang/ rgyal bo badzal sang has gzha'osar ma'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te dga' ldan byams
pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa ji ltar bzhugs pa'i sku gzugs bgyis/ slad kyis byams pa la mchod pa'i slad du/ mgon po dang/ lha klu ga shegs pa rnams kyi tshulatsa'i dra bamagon po'i rten khang
rgyu gcig btsugs nas/ mgon po dang lha klu'i gzugs bgyis pa da dung bzhugs te/ gtsug lag khang 'di'ang gnyan zhing cani tshe bar bgyi/ lha gangs can dang 'brog gnas zhes bgyi bas srung/ dang

sang gi bar du mngon rtagasadang mtshan ma dag kyang 'byung/ des de'i 'og tu 'ang rgyal po pa dze yapa la man chad rgyal po rabs drug gi bar dugatsug lag khang gzhan s brtsigs/ de nas de'i gotu rgyal po pho

dzaya la la zhes rtsa ba'i bu rgyal po ba dzi ma sang gam zhes bgyi ba rgyal po brgyad pa'i tshe/ cu gu pan nas tshe 'u pana'i sku gzugagasanam mkha' las ldanges te/ la lul dug shegs pa rgyal pos mthong

nas dad pa'i shugs kyis sangs rgyas de bzhugs pa'i dri gtsang khang brtsigs/ de nas sad kyis rgyal po da 'u thenagyi skamakhar gyi steng gi byang sgo' bang na mchis pa zhig gatshe na/ bltasan skumakhar gyi

slad rol na dge slong gtsage 'tsho ba skye ba la phyag 'tshalate/ bka'amachid mam de mthong nas ngo mtshar du bzung ste/ rgyal po des blon po gcig mngags nas// 3pe tu rtog tu btang pa las/ blon po des

dag slong dang skya bo se sing rmasan/ dge slong de 'a mchid nas khyim pa skya 'di ni 'phags pa 'jam dbal gyi sprul pa lags zhes mchi/ khyim pa skya bo de'i mchid nas dge slong 'di 'phags pa sa'i sang pol/

smral pa lags zhes mche ba dang/ blon po des kyang rgyab kho la de bzhin du slar gsol ba dang rgyal po bi dza ya sang gro ma'ang de ma thag bar 'phags pa de dag gi drung du bsten nas phyag 'tshal/ mchod pa bgyis
nasaM/ 'phags pa dog ga las gshegs zhes zhus pa dang 'phags pa gnyis kyi zhal nas/ bdag cag gnyis kyang shar phyogs nas de bzhinagshegs pa ma 'khrags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sa

can gyi don la 'di'i khongs so zhes byung ba dang/ de nas rgyal po ba dze yasang gram 'amachid nas 'phags pa thugs rje dang ldan pa gnyis kyis rdzu 'phrul gyisobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pam 'khrags pa'i sangs
kyi zhing bdag la bstan pa tsaganangashos gsol pa dang de bzhin du gnang nas de bzhin gshegs pam 'khrugs pa'i zhal dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang bstan pa dang/ rgyal podis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mthong/ nam mkha' las shing rta'i nang nas sangs rgyas mang po zhige gshegs nas/ de dag gis 'od zer btang ba rgyal po'i spyi bor reg par mthong ste/
kadad pa'i shugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi gzugasaji ltar mthong ab bzhin du/ gajugs su'ang brgyus te/ shing rta'i nang dubyadasang du'ang drangasanas/ mchod pa chen po bgyis te/ dengasang gi bar du'ang

dbyar zla ra ba yar gyi ngo la byang srang du sku gzugs chen po 'dren pa dang/ dge 'dun sde gnyis spyan drangs nas/ byang chub 'byung sa nas bkra shis bsal ba'i tshal du mchod rten gsol zhing/ mi skyo pa'i
mchod pa chen po bgyis pa'i ng rgyal po des bgyis nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa dgra btsem pa mo dgu bde hil ba la dang ga slad du/ bzha'o sang gre ro ma'i gtsug lag khang brtsa gas te/ rnam
thos kyi sras dang/ yang dag shes bgyibs ya nga bsrung/ de nas rgyal po ba dza ya sha staman chad/ rgyal po rabs bzhi'i bar du gtsug lag khang gsar pa gzhan m brtsigs/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal

po pa dzi yakare tu zhes bgyi ba/ 'gum ti'i dumachis pa las da lta'i phyu pa na'i gtsug lag khang nga zhugs pa'i saramachis pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po zhig der byung nas/ rgyal po ba dza ya kar rmi la snas pa/
sngon sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyitshe/ dogs 'di byin gyis brlabs nas/ gtsug lag khang brtsigs pa 'as 'di lan te/ dbang rgyal po khyod kyis gtsug lag khang gcig brtsig pa 'i regs so zhes
07 bgyis pa dang/ rgyal po smon lam btab ba da ltar 'dzam bu'i glingan 'phags pa dag gis byin gyis brlabs te 'dir gshegs par gnang na/ bdag gis gtsug lag khang gcig brtsig par 'tshal lo zhes
smon lam btab pa dang/ dam thag tu nam mkha' las 'phags pa dgra bcom pa bcu bdun gshegs nas/ rgyal bo ba dzi ya kar ti'ang dad pa'i shugs chen por skyes te rgyal po dang btsun mo lag dar te//
b+ha ba ta'isgom sa dang/ gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ gtsug lag khang 'di'ang byin che zhing gtan par bgyi/ lcagazhan gyis mi thub pa dang/ nor bu bzang pos bsrung/ gtsug lag khang 'di'ing gna' ded

kyi mnga' ris sug rtogs pa 'tshi/ mgar blon btsanaganyen gung tshonal yul gyi dbang po brgyad pa 'i tshabartsigs la gas/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po bi dza ya sang gram dang/ bu rgyal po ba dza ya gra ma sprad
rgya yul du mchis nas/ slar la u0f7a yul du mchi ba'i bar du/ dgu 'i dmagags shul khums pa las/ phan yul du gum/ bu chung ste sar mchis pa'i rdzomadzegs pa'i skabs su la blon po a ma ca le
mig ces bgyi ngas dgung lag tu gnas kyibar durgyalatshab bgyisanas/ rgyal srid bzung ba'adege ba'i bshes gnyenadage slong 'a phags pa b.ru tsa zhes bgyi ba'i slad du/ aman 'di'i mchod rten dang gtsug
lag khang brtsigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung sharimamang du stsal te/ da lta ragatsug lag khang 'di lcam mkha' sngan dang/ gnod sbyin gyi snga daron yang dag shes bgyi bas srung/ de nas
rgyal de ba dza ya sang krama'i bu rgyal po bi dza ya ba gra ma zhes bgyi bas slar la yul mchis nas// dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa dgra bcom pa bde ban khang ching ga slad du/

gtsug lag khang byi zhage rma brtsigs te/ da ltar smyu gzhan gyis ma thub pa dang/ nor bu bzang pos bsrang/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgya'i blon posaser the sha dang/ rgyal po ba dzaya dar ma gnyis kyis dge ba'i
bshes gnyen 'gum gyi bar mog 'dzin zhes nga gyi bo'i sladadu/ bong ma khar gyi byams bam tra'i gtsug lag khang btsugs te/ da ltar gtsug lag khang 'di rnam thos kyi sras kyis sung/ de nas de'i 'og tu/

zla rgya'i blon bo ka thengashi dang/ rgyal bo 'tshol sam b+ha ba zhes bgyi kha ga zhale kyis dge ba'i shes ga zhen u de na 'dra de tsi dang/ daramanan nga gnyis kyi slad du/ khe gran tse'i gtsug lag khang brtsiles te ba phyug

gtsug lag khang 'di rnam thos kyi sras kyis srung/ thog ma dge slong 'phags pa be ro tsa na tsarma'i tshul du gshegs pa thugs rje 'a sogs pam 'og ma dag gis mthong nas/ rgyal po bi dza ya sam b+ha ba la

bdag cag gis sngon ma mthong ba'i ma 'di lta bu zhig tsarma'i tshal na mchis so zhes gsol pa dang/ rgyal po ba dza ya samasdu ba'ang de ma thag du tsarma ramachis nas/ 'phags pa be ro tsa na ma thong ba dang/ dad pa skyes/

nas phyag 'tshal mchod pa bgyis nas/ 'phags pa des kyang rgyal po de dza ya sam bya ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ngagyi sa nas legs nyes gnyis kyi 'bras bu ston te/ chos bshad bshags sbyangs bgyi'i bstsal
[d ]bodang/ rgyal bo da'ang chos kyi mig bye nas/ lcag par yang dad pa skyes nas/ rgyal po mar sku mkhar du mchis nas thog ma 'phags pa bi ro tsanagshegs so zhes bka' 'chid bsAn pa shes pa'i sar

mchod rtenachen po gcig brtsigs te ming yang su song nyar btags/ slad kyis mchod rten de'ang yun rings bas zhig nas/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po ba tsho'ang brtan chen po dang/ rgyu yul nas mchis pa'i/
dge slong 'ba' la sha zhes bgyi ba mchis pas/ tsarma 'dege 'dun dge ba'i bshes gnyen du spyan drangs nas/ su sto ta'i gtsug lag khang btsugs te/ da ltar rnam thos kyi sras kyis bsrung/ dge slong

ma'i gtsug lag khang rnams kyi gtan tshigs dang/ snga phyi'i go rim sa lasmyal po gi dzalasang ha zhes bgyi ba zhig chung ngu nas rgyal por zhugs te/ chung ba'i skabs su blon po kha cig gis rngananan bgyis/
ti rgyal mo dang/ mas brang sras dang/ nang kor rnams dag dang ma rigs pa bgyis nas (slad kyis rgyal mo de chen por gyur te/ sngar blon po de dag gis rngan chan bgyisangashang bar s pa de
dran nas len par gyur te/ slad kyis rgyal bo'i bon po rnams ri dgas gshor ba ltar thabs kyis khridinas/ 'then gyi shel tshab gong ma'i yul ba lo bya zhes bgyi bar blon po bdun du rtsa lnga ba kum nas
slad kyis der gtsug lag khang gcig kyang brtsigs/ de nas skum khang du mchis naas/ rgyal bo mchis pa'i gnas ni/ rgyal mo dang/ sras dang/ nang ker ma mchis pa'i khang pa phyi sgo de kumanas
[z/p/]@#/ 'gru la bcad/ de bzhin du dgum par bgyis pa las/ rgyal po de'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas 'pho ngas te/ nyam tha gnas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i/
bshamtshan nas brjed/ mchod pa brgyad de/ lha khang bskor/ deras bkugs/ bsod nams cher bgyis pa'i mathusargya gar yul nas/ 'phags pa dgra bcom ma ya sha phrad nya dang/ snga shutadang/ songs
nata la sogs nam mkha' las ldanges te/ rgyal mo mo ga shAkengoshadang/ sa 'bu tsa la sogs pa 'khor mchis pa'i drung dug shegs nas/ rgyal mo de dag la chos bshad de rab tu byung ba las/ dad pa'i shugs
kyis de ma thag tu rgyal mo de dag gi 'khor las brgya rtsa bdu gnyis dgra choms par gyur nas/ nam mkha' las ldanges te/ bsod snyoms lenadug shegs nas rgyal po ngo dza yasang has mthong nas/ dem thag

chatug nas der mchis te bltasanas/ rgyal mo mog sha dang da sa lu tsa la sogs pa'i 'khor ral rab tu byung ste/ phal cher dgrachoms par gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan pa mthong nas/ rgyal po 'ang rab
tu ngaga'anas/ dad pa'i shugs kyis gnas de nyid du gtsug lag khang brtsigs te bran zhing dang/ nor phyugs la sogs pa ma chod pa'i yo byad mang po tsam zhig phul nas/ gtsug lag khang de'i mong yang nu

be nyazhes btags te/ gtsug lag khang 'di'ang gnyan zhing byin chab r bgyi/ da ltar lha phur pa'i lag pa zhes bgyi bas bsrung de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po don 'dres kyi btsunamo rgya rje'i sras mo sho r+ya zhes

bgyi ba'i bu mo/ dge slong ma sho'i dza ya zhes bgyi bas dgra choms nas/ nu mo shertsa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyi ba'i slad du/ rgya yul nas 'then du mchi ba'i phyir/ numo rgyal mo she'anges yo zo rje'i gtsug

lag khang brtsigs te da ltar klu'i rgyal po da tsa dang/ dar cig nyis kyis bsrung/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po la dza ya shas 'du ba ma tsa dzaro'amis grong khu su da tshod zhes bgyi ba khyim thab gus pa dang/ thub
med de la rgyal bo'am chidanas/ bdag dang mi phrad du mi rung ngo zhes bgyi ba dang/ bud med de'i mchid nas/ bdag dgung bdun zhig khyim thabakyi mdunabgyid cing/ slad po'i dum achi bar ci gnang zhes/

gsol pa dang/ rgyal pos kyang de bzhin duganang nas de ma thag tu bud med de'ang gsang de rab tu byung nas/ dgung bdun gyi bar dusems rtse gcig sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms nas/ de
bzhin gshags pa 'i zhal yang mngon sum du mthong nas/ dgra tshoms te mang langasutanAn tar btags/ rinas dgung bdun la sogs pa dang/ rgyal pos budamed de 'gugs pa zhig btang bde'i mchid

nas mo rab tu byung ste/ 'bagasam dgrachoms mar gyur nas/ daltar 'on kyang 'byung zhingaachis so zhes bgyis pa dang/ rgyal bo der mchis na 'phags ma de la 'od kyang 'byung/ rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan

pa'i ng mthong nas/ dad pa skyes nas 'phags ma khu dananada'i slad du tharo tsho'i gtsug lag khang btsugs te/ gnyan zhing tsani tsher bgyi/ daltar lha dga' nga' dbang phyug cesabyabs bsrung/denas pe/'og tu la ngo
[f ]41@#/ dzalanand zhes bgyi'i gnan gyi rgyal po sar khyo ba bzhis khang dang ma rdzol ba'i bu mo cige gcig mchis pa rab tu byung nas/ dgra bcom par gyur pas bltas na bdag mnal rdza ba yam/
'bumo lags pa'i chugs su chud nas/ 'phags ma dar ma 'bal la denang/ dge slongam 'phagasaa nyi shu shu lagazhasanam mkha' la ldings te/ la yul du gshegs nas rgyal po la ba la thog ma'i lo
rgyus kyang bshad/ rdzu 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyang bstan pas/ rgyal po'ang dad pa skyes nas bu mo 'phagasam dgra tshoms ma daram 'bal la'i smad du/ po yanango'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ de

bar rnam thos kyisas dang/ klu'i rgyal po chu 'khor bgyi bas bsrung/ de nas de'i 'og tu rgyal po ba tshe yas nga gra ma seng ge zhes bgyi ba'i ma/ rgyal mo dar ma zhes bgyi ba rab tu byung nas/ dgra bcos ma'i
'bras bu thob nas/ sgrig tshu'i nang du sgom zhing mchis pa las/ nubamo 'od byung// rgyal pos mtshan ma gzugs pa'i phyir/ ma 'gacig 'phangs banang pang mang 'tshol du btang ba'i sa de nargyal mo/

dang ma ren bzhugs pa mthong nas/ rgyal bo 'ang dad pa skyes te/ ma 'phags ma dgra bcom pa dar ma zhes bgyi ba'i slad du/ rgyal pos 'dra mi 'dza' zhes bgyi ba'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar lha sel

skyas bsrung/ de nas rgyal kho pa dza lasang gra ma'i nub brisas lag ces bgyi ba zhig gis rgyal mo drugagumo zhig rab tu byung nas mong yang pas zhukasum zhes bgyi bar btags ta ngas tshems pa'i slad du/

0 dad pa skyes nas/ tra ke 'jo zhes bgyi ba'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ de ltar gnod sbyin gyisdod bon yang dag shes kyis bsrung/ de nas gtsug lag khang 'gu zhun brtsigs pa'i rgyal po badza ya sang graa'i/

mchis drang/ rgyal po phrom kosar gyi bumo'arong kazhes bgyi ba'i bu mog nyis rab tu byung nas dag choms te/ 'phags ma de gcig gam tshan nangasha lam te zhes bgyi de gcig gi mtshan ni go'u shar zhes bgyis//

'phags ma deganyis khache'iyulanas niam mkha' la ldings te/ numo rgyal mo'urong ka'adige ba'i bshes gnyenate/ 'phagasam de gnyis kyi slad du rgyalames bon 'jo'i sa/tsug lag khang btsugs te/ da ltar klu'i

rgyal po yulor bgyi ba dang/ gser gyi sgra zhes bgyi ba gnyis kyis bsrung de nas rgyal bo badzal kir ti'i bu mo ba zha dza las/ bumo 'phags pa dgra bcomam bya da she ca'i slad du/ po lang 'tsho'i gtsug lag

khang brtsigs te/ da ltar gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes kyis bsung ]renas rgyal po ba dza ya dza ya'i bu mo gu than gyi rgyal po'aechis brang brgyad pa// bu zha pa bzhes bgyi bas phulo dge slong ma 'apagasal

dgra bcom pa bzhadza ya 'i slad du/ aramo na'ogatsug lag khang brtsigs te/ de ltar lha ser skyas bsrung/ de nas rgyal po bi dza ya bal zhes bgyi bas/ sngaraslad du sems can mang po zhig bkum nas 'gyod pa

skyes te/ bsod nams phal cher bgyis/ mchis brang yang thar bar ba dang/ 'phags ma dgra bcomo mar gyur pa Ti da dungad pa skyes nas kho bo ni 'o gtsug lag pa ya khang brtsigs te/ da ltar rnam thos kyi/
@# sras kyis bsrung/ de nas rje chen po am ca le mgaces bgyi ba lu baspyan gsum gdugs gcig tu bkumanas/ ma 'ang thar par zhugs nas/ de nyid du tsha a ca khe mag gi

ka gas sde rema'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ daltar ldan m mkha'i spyanadang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon yang dag shes kyis bsrung/ de nas rgyal po bi dza ya dza ya zhes bgyi bas o sku'i rgyal po'i bu mo mchis/
khringadu blangs te/ rgyal mo ris dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags ma dgra bcom ma gzhe ma'i smad du/ o skono'agatsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar lha che ma zhes bgyi bas bsrung/ de nas rgyal po ba dza
sa gra mas kus bya lor shonganag gi gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ nang kong ma mang zhig thar par bkye nas/ da ltar rgyal po kun srung ma lha mo gser gyi me tog dang/ lha mo dud can gnyis kyis bsrung/

denas rgyal po ba dza ya ba las nu gum yan gyi rgyal po'i bu mo bu teka zhes bgyi bamachis khrang du blangs pa'i bu mo dge slong ma dgra bcom ma a sho ka shi la'isar du/ tso'u na'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/
da ltar rtswa sa pa la dang lta 'jam pa ki'atu zhes bgyir gnyis kyis bsrung/ de nas rgyal bo kho dza ya sing ha'amachis brangag 'jag gi rgyal mo a lung 'ja' zhes bgyi ba'i bshes gnyen du shu lags M
sa/ dge slong ma 'bags dbatsoms 'dug shegs pa'i slad// rgyal bo badza lasong nas khye'asho no'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs te/ da ltar rtswa ser skyas bsrung/ rgyal po ba dza la sang
gram rgyal mo brgyad pa 'tshe batshe'i lu'anas/ dge slong ma 'phags ma dgra bcom ma shal ta dang/ 'ga' shur+ya zhes bgyi ba gnyis nam mkhalas ldings te gshegs nas/ sud kyis khyim bdagan

mo bdakhagu ba 'khyil drung du zhugs nas/ rgyal po gi dzi yasang gram la sbas pa/ rgyal bo chen bo degs 'di na sngon sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa 'tshe/ byang chub sems
dpa' sAsheng zhes bgyi bar gyur ban/ bram ze la bumang sring ga zhus yon du phul te/ 'phrin las dka' ba rnam pa gcig mdzad pa 'is 'di lags pas/ 'di'i gtsug lag khang gcig brtsigs pa'i rigs
so zhes bgyis pa dang/ khyim bdaganamo bdaces bgyi ba de'ang dad pa skyes nas khang khyim dngas de 'ang yul du phulanas/ rgyal bos kyang gtsug lag khang gcig brtsigs/ yon bdag las kyang/

ming dras nas/ gtsug lag khang gi mtshan la nga namod 'bu 'dod zhes bya bar pa gas/ daltar klu'i rgyal po hu la'o dang/ lhagase ra gyi sgra zhes bgyi bas bsung/ de nas la rdzo'i blon po 'da' nozhes bgyi
zhig gis tshong dus bar mar sku gzugs chen po bgyis pa las/ slad kyis yang la blon po am ci bya nad kyis/ sku gzugasachen po'i lta zhig ral du gyur pa'i ng gsos/ kong sheng gi dege slong ma'i
slad du 'da'an zhi'i gtsug lag khang btsugs te/ daltar rnam thos kyis bsrung/ 'thenan dge 'dun sde gnyis bzhugs pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por brtsi ba/ sku mkharatshanang slad rolo na drug cu/

na 'ang 'bring du pagyi bani/ ngagabs rgyung dang/ spang rol gyi tshang ma bang chen po ni bzhi zhig bzhugs/ tsabargyad bzhugs/ gtsug lag khang 'bring du bgyi bani/ dgu bcu rtsa lnga lags/ gtsug lag khang chung ngur bgyi ban da brgya bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bzhugs/ sgo sgo'amin
ba'i lha khang chung dudang/ yon bdagam mchis pa'i lha khang dang/ mchod rtenan skumakhar gyi nang dang slad rol gyi tshar yan chad na/ sum stong drug brgya brgyad cu rtsa brgyad bzhugs/ 'u thenan
dge 'dun sgos 'tsho yan chad/ byi ba la la brtsisan tratsem zhig bzhugs/ mdo dang/ mes kar phyogs na gtsug lag khang chen bon bzhi zhig bzhugs/ sgosgo'i lha khang dang yon
bdag mamatshas pa'i lha khang chung ngu ni brgya lhag tsam bzhugs/ dge 'dun nyi/shu tsam zhig bzhugs/ kam sheng dang be ta dang/ be rga 'dra dang/ osku yanachad/ tsa laman chad/ sku

ma khar gyi nang dang/ slad rol gyi tshor yan chad na gtsug lag khang chen po ni ta shurtsag sum bzhugs/ gtsug lag khang 'brong nyi shurtsa gcig bzhugs/ gtsug lag khang chung ngun nyi shu rtsa gsum tsam

bzhugs spo snesad pa'i lha khang chung du dang/ mchod rten chung duspyir brgyad brgyasum cu rtsa dgu bzhugs/ dge 'dun sde gnyis kas rkyen pa dang/ sgos 'tsho yan chad sngar bzhi brgya sum cu rtsa brgyud
bzhugs byas kyang man chad/ kosheng dang/ dur+ya yan chad/ skam khar gnang rang/ slad rol gyi tshe yan chad na/ gtsug lag khang chen po bco lnga tsam bzhugs sgo sge lha khang chung du dang/
yon bdagam mchis pa'i lha khang churangu dang/ mchod rten man chad bzhugs/ dge 'dun sde gnyis la rkyen pas/ sgos 'tsho yan chad spyir dgu brgya drug cu rtsa gsum bzhugs/ rgyal mosanu'i tsha bo/

rgyal po ba dza la sam b+ho pa zhes bgyi ba'i tshe/ thog ma li lul du chos byung ste brtsisanas/ khyi 'ashol bor ba'i ston zla tha chung yan chad/ dgung stong nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug tsam pa lags/
(!/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya nand tsha a banAr NamanAm/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rtogs pa brjod pa
zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang 'thams cad la phyag 'tshal la/ 'di skad bdag cig gis thos te/ bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas la brgyar brgya len par gyur pa na/ de'i

tshe de'i dusan yul sha ba ga zhes bya ban/ grong khyer byin gyis brlabs pa zhes khyab yod de/ den rgyal bo rigs pa'i sde zhes bya ba gnas so// de'atshi rgyal po rigs pa'i sde'i lul na dge slong dga' ba'i
bshes gnyen zhes bya ba rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan dang/ mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthuche ba/ dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du ma pa sems can rnams las than
grog ma dang/ kuta la yang sems can smod pa shes pa zhig gnas te/ de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus kyitsho/ dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan pa bshad de/
'di ltar dge slong rnams the tsho skyes nas sa kha/ gnas brtan yun dzasnyad cig gi bar du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'dem pa'i tshis gnas par 'gyur/ des smas ba/
ka1bzhin bzang dag dogs bamed kyis mya ngan dang skye sngags ma 'don cig/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/ gnas brtan chen po bcu drug gi lag tu ngan
pa'i chos gtad bar gyur te/ sbyin bdag dang sbyin pa kho'i sbyin pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir ro// de skad ces smos pa dang/ gnas brtan dga' ba'i bshes gnyen la/dge slong dag gis 'di ni//
cesasas so// gnas brtan bdag cag gis gnas brtan de dag gi mtshan yang 'tshal la/gnas brtan gyis smas pa/ tshodang ldan pa dag gnas brtan dang po 'amtshan na bar dra tsa bsod
snyoms len zhes bya'o// gnas brtan gnyis pa'i mtshan nagasar bu zhes bya'o// gnas brtan gsum pa mtshan zhi ba ra de tsa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bzhi pa 'i mtshan n mo byed pa zhes bya'o// gnas
bstanalnga ba'imtshan n shang shun can zhes bya'o// gnas brtan drug pa'imtshan n bzang po zhes khya'o// gnas brtan bdun pa 'a mtshan ni nag po zhes bya'o// gnas brtan brgyad pa'imtshan ni bdasa'i bu
zhes bya'o// gnas brtan dgu pa'i mtshan ni ba lang skyong zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu ba'i mtshan lam pa zhes bya'o// gnas pa rtan bcu gtsag pa 'aatshanani sgra gcan 'dzin ces bya'o// gnas brtan bcu
gnyis pa'i e tshanan klu ste zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu gsum pa 'amtshan n zur gyis shes zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bcu bzhi pa'imtshan ni nags na gnas pa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan bco lnga pa'i mtshan/
nim bam ba zhes bya 'o// gnas brtan bcu drug pa 'amtshan nag tshug ga lam zhes bya// gnas brtan de dag ni shi ba gsum dang ldan pa/ sde snod gsum pa/ khams gsum pa 'dod chags dang bral ba
rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis checin gyis brlabs te bsrungasanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'a gnas pa yin no// sbyin pa po dang/ sbyin badag rnams kyi sbyin pa longs su dag par byed do// de skad ces
smras pa dang/ dge slong rnams kyis gnas brtan dag 'a ba'i bshes gnyen la 'disad ces smras so// gnas brtan bdag cag gas gang na bzhugs pa'i ng mi 'tshal lo// gnas brtan gyis snas pa/ tshe

dang ldan pa gnas brtan dang po bar dwa tsabasod u0f7cmas 'an zhes bya bani/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong dang lhan cig tu ba glang spyod gyi glongen gnaso// gnas brtan gser bu zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom

blta stong dang lhan cig byang phyogs kyi kha che'i yul na gnas so// gnas brtan khar dwa tsa zhes bya ban/ 'khoradagra btsas ba drug stong dang lhan cige shar gyi lus 'phags kyi klong na gnas aso// gnas la rtan

mi phyed pa zhes bya bani/ 'khor dgra bcom pa bdun stong dang lhan cig 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas so// gnas brtan shing shun zhes bya ba na/ 'khor dgra bcom pa drug stong dang lhan cig byang gi sgromisnyan
[z} ]@#/ gyi glingana gnas so// gnas brtan bzang po zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa dgu stong dang lhan cig zangs gling na gnas so// gnas brtan nag po zhes buban/ 'khor

ka dgra bcom pa stong dang lhan cig sing ga'iglingana gnas so// gnas brtan bdasa'i bu zhes bya ba// 'khor dgra bcom pa khri chigastong dang lhan cig pa nasa'i glingana gnas so// gnas brtan ba lang skyong

zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa brgyad stong dang lhan cig rib smyos kyi ngad ldan n gnas so// gnas brtan lam pa zhes bya ban/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu gsum dang lhan cig lha rnams kyigan
sum cu rtsa gsum n gnas so// gnas brtan sgra gcan 'dzin ces bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong dang lhan cig tupra yaM ku'i gling na gnas so// gnas brtan klu'i sde zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom

rgyab stong phrag bcu gnyis dang lhan cig ri skya bona gnas so// gnas brtan thur gyis shesazhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu gsum dang lhan cigari bo ngos yangs na gnas so// gnas brtan n/

gnas zhes bya ba ni/ 'khoradagra bcom pa stong phrag bcu bzhi dang lhan cig lus 'phags kyi ro la gnas so// gnas brtan ma pham pa zhes bya bani/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bco lngadang lhan cig rgyal

po'i khab bya rgod kyi phung po'irol gnas so// gnas brtan gatsug gi lam zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor dgra bcom pa stong phrag bcu drug dang lhan cig ri bo gnya' shange'adzanan gnas so// gnas brtan de dag gis ma shes
/ ba'am/ ma mthong ba 'am/ mthes pa 'am/ mngon sum du ma byas pa cung zad kyang med de// dge 'dun gyi bzhes pa 'am/ spyan drangs pa 'am/ bco lngaston nas/ gtsug lag khang dbul ba khas
gaN+Di'irab gnas sam/ gang cung zad kyang rishes pa med de/ de dag tu gnas brtan bcu drug po de dag dang/ 'khor du bcas pag zhan dang gzhan gyis der byon zhing gnas te/ de ltar sprin pa longs su

dag par byed de/ ma 'ongs pa na mtshon gyi bskal pa byung ba 'dasanas/ mi rnams dge ba bcudang ldan pas tshe sar 'phel te/ de ltar la brgya thub pa ni ston pa nyan thos de dag yang phyir la 'dzam bu gling du

byenanas/ dam ba 'tshos yang dag par ston par byed cing rab tu 'byin par byed de/ desrid skyo dag rnams kyi tshe la drug brgya par gyur pa de srid du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos gnas

bar 'gyur tami rnams kyi tshe lo bdun brgya bar gyur pa na/ nyan thos de dag gis sa'i stong 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa'i tshegs ji snyed pa de gcig tu bsdus nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi
mtshod rten gcig byas te/ kun nas bskor nas spyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas/ 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das de nga zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la

'dud pas phyag 'tshal zhes brjodod phyag 'tshalanas/ phung po lhagama med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rtenade'ang nu gnas
'og ga ba ser gyi sa gzhi gang yin pa de la gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos nub par gyur to// de nas de'i rjes la'ang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bar n

la ka'ajig rten du 'phyang// de nas m nams kyi tshe lo brgyad khri par gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya ba 'jig ste nadu babyang ngo// de'i tshig

bu'i gling ni 'byor pa dang/ rgyas pa dang/ bde ba dang/ la legs pa dang/ mi dang/ skye bo mang pos yongs su gang zhing bya gag 'phur ba tsaman/ grong khyer dang grong dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/
lul 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang yod par 'gyur// lan cig sa pen pa rtab pas lan bdun gyi bar du 'bru rnams skye bar 'gyur ro// de'itan thos 'dus pa la nagasum du 'gyur te/ 'dus pa dang bo

tshe lan tan thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus pa gnyis pa la ni nyan thos bye ba phragadagu bcu rtsa bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus pa gsum pa la ni nyan thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis/

kyi kyi 'dus pa chen po'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang 'di dag ni sbyin ba po dang/ sbyin bdag yin te/ yang de dag gis gzhan du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gsung rab la sangs rgyas las dge ba'i rtsa ba

bskran cing bya ba byas par gyur pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ gser gyi rang bzhin dang/ dngul gyi rang bzhinadang/ bi cha ma'irang bzhin dang/ shel gyi rang bzhin dang/ rin po che'i rang bzhinadang/ ra gan gyi rang
bzhan dang/ 'khar ba'i des pe dang/ mu tig dang/ lcags kyi rang bzhinadang zangs kyi da sa po dang/ tsan dan gyi denges pa dang/ a ka ru'i rang bzhin dang/ dung gi rang bzhin dang/ bso'i
rang bzhin dang/ pA'i rang bzhin dang/ rtswa 'iring bzhanadang/ sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin dang/ nus pa'i rang bzhin rnams las sku gzugs sam/ mchod rten bzhengs su gsol zhing/ tha na sor
mo tsam gyi sku 'am mchod rten bzhengs su gsol zhing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'i
gsung rab lami'i lus thos par rasatu thob nas 'dus pa dang po la ni ded pa dang ldan pas khyim nas byung nas skra dang kha sa bregs te/ chos gos bgos nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste

smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du longs su mya ngan 'da' 'o// tshe dang ldan pa de dag ni'i zhigasangs rgyas la dgokha'i rtswa ba bskrun pa yin no// yang gang dag snang ba chos kyi phung po brgyad khri po bcom ldan 'das
shAkya thub pa'i chos kyi bdud la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod par gyur cing/ bskyed du bcug cing hras pa dang/ 'dir bcug pa dang/ bklags pa dang/ klog tu bcug pa dang/ gang zhig theg pa chen po'i
mdo sde zab par gyur pa/ stong pa nyid dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi se rol tu phyin pa dang dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar bo dang/ rgya cher rol pa dang/ gser 'od dam pa dang/ yon tan 'od
[]@#// mchog dang/ stong ba nyid kyi 'dam tsheg dang/ phyag na rdordzogasang ba la sogs pa dang/ sbyan lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ cho 'phrul chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ bsod nams

ka1thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'phags pa zla ba sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yi shes kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzi brjid ldan pa'i teng nge 'dzin dang/ byang chub kyi teng
nge 'dzin dang// byang chub bsdus pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad lo ngas su 'dzin pa dang/ glang po'i rtsal dang/ sprin chen dang/ sor mo'i 'phrang ba dang/ long+kar gshegs pa dang/ yongs
[]su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po dang/ zla ba'i snying po dang/ nyi ma'isAde po dang/ nam mkha'i snying po dang/ sa'i snying po dang/ byams pas zhus pa dang tshangs pas zhus pa dang//
(legs pa'i 'tshams kyis zhus pa dang/ drag shul can gyis zhus pa dang/ dra ba can gyis zhus pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa dang/ rgyas pa zhus pa dang/ brgya byin gyis
zhus pa dang/ lag na rin chen gyis zhus pa dang/ ma 'am tsa'i rgyal po ldan pas zhus pa dang/ dpa' bo nam mkhas zhus pa dang/ bumo 'di dang bas zhus pa dang// bumo rane chen
ldan gyis zhus pa dang/ bu mo gser gyi 'od mchog gis zhus pa dang/ bdasa'i skyol po 'char byed kyis zhus pa dang/ dbang phyug chen pos zhus pa dang/ gzugs can snying pos zhus pa dang
[j]dge ba bzang pos gang gse zhus pa dang/ lha'i bu legs pa'i 'tshams kyis zhus pa dang/ lcababu tsan dan gyis zhus pa dang/ lha'i bu rang gargyan gyis zhus ba dang/ lag bzangs kyis zhus pa/
dang/ sang ges zhus pa dang/ sang ge rnam par rol pas zhus pa dang/ dang 'asbyin gyis zhus pa dang/ gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa dang/ zung gi mdo dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rjesaM gar/
dang/ stag rna'i rtogs pa brjod pa dang/ ngas rnam par bshad pa dang/ blo gros ma zad pas bstan pa dang/ blo gros rgya mtshos bstan pa dang/ draa med par grags pas bstan pa dang
bden pa la 'jug pa dang/ ma sa dgram 'gyur ba dang/ sred med kyi 'gyur ba dang/ stong par 'gyur ba dang/ 'dzam bu gling 'gyur ba dang/ 'dus par 'gyurab dang/ sangs rgyas
kyi rgyan dang/ thabs la mkhas pa dang/ laganautul dang// sangs rgyas bcu ba dang/ sa bcu pa dang/ sa bcu pa dang/ 'od dpag med kyi bkod pa dang/ bde ba can gyi bkod
pa dang/ dam pa'i chos kyi yon tan bkod pa dang/ tshogs kyi bkod pa dang/ rnamadagam tog bsdus pa dang/ 'jig rten dag pas bsdus pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dpag par
bsdus pa dang/ thams cad stegs las babs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las babs pa dang/ ni bo che'i tog dang/ rin po che'i phung po dang/ rin po che'i za ma tog
dang/ mdzes pa brtsegs pa dang/ rin chen skar mda' dang/ zhi chen na dang/ rin chen ldan pa dang/ rin chen g tug dang/ rin chen 'byung gnas der/ khyod
pan dra ba can dang/ sngo po bkod pa dang/ 'di dag la sogs pa bye ba phrag brgyan theg pa chen po'i sde snod yin no// de bzhin du nyan thos kyi sde snod de/ mngon pa'i sde snod dang/ 'dul
ba'i sde snod dang/ mdo sde'i sde snod do/ mdo sde'i spyi spyod gang zhe na/ 'di la ste/ lung ring po dang/ gcig las 'phros pa'i lung dang/ yang dag par ldan pa'i lung dang/ phra mo'i/
lung dang ngo// de dag la ni mdo sde'i sde snod ces bya'o// cho sa ngon pa'i sde snod gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dri ba drug pa dang/ yang dag par sbyar ba bsdus pa la mngon pa'i sde skor ces bya'o// de
la 'dul ba sde snod gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ dge slong 'dul ba dang/ dge slong ma'i 'dul ba dang/ ma mo'i phung po dang/ 'dul ba'i ma mo 'isi/ tshe dang ldan pa de dag la 'dul ba'i sde
skyod ces bya'o// 'di dag ni skyes pa'i rabs te/ rtogs par brjod pa'i rabs dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi rabs dang/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa dang/
byang chub sems dpas bstan pa dang/ nyan thos kyis bstan pa dang/ lhas bstan pa dang/ 'byung ba bsdus pa dang/ chos nye bar bsdus ba dang/ than tshig bzhi pa'i tshogs su bcad/
pa gcig gsungs par gyur pa 'ang/ brgyags par gyur pa dang/ pazung bar gyur pa dang glegs bam bris par gyur pa dang/ chos skya ba lamachod par gyur pa dang/ de dag dang rang sangs
rgyas la mchod bar gyur ba dang/ dri dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byas pa dang/ gros dang/ mar e dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang// ba danadang/ glegs bam la kha dog sna tshogs pa'i/
gos rnams g.yogs shing dkris ba dang/ glegs shing mchog byes par gyur pa dang/ glegs bam kha dog sna tshogs pas glegs bam bcings par gyur bas dge ba'i rtse ba bskyed pas de dag thams
cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab lam thob pa rab tu thob nas dad pas khyim spangs te/ skra dang kha spu bregs nasachos gos bgos te/ khyim nas khyim med par

'dus pa gnyis pa la rab tu byung sta/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du longs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa dedag ni re zhig chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa yin no/'di ltar 'di dag
sbyin pa bo dang/ sbyin bdag yin te/ dge 'dun la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang/ bskyed du bcug pa yin te/ 'di ltar spyan 'dren pa bsgrags pa dang/ dge ba la 'dzud pa dang/ brgyad ston
byed pa dang/ gso sbyong byed pa dang/ rab tu mgron du 'bod pa dang/ dge 'dun la chos ston gsol ba dang/ spyan 'dren pa dang/ glo bur du 'dren pa dang/ zla ston byed pa dang/ rtag re
sa ba
ka gaN+Di'i rab gnas byed bdang/ sman 'bul ba dang/ lo khyad phul bas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag thams cad ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i gsung rab la ma thob
pa thobanas/ 'dus pa gsum pa la dad pas tshul sbyangs te/ sgra dang kha spu byin s tshes gos bgos te/ yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ smon lam ji lta

ts+tshA ba bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// tshedang ldan pa de dag ni ri zhig dge 'dun la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin no// de nas gnas brtan dga' ba'i bshes gnyenagyi rnam pa de dag rgya cher
bshad nas/ shing ta la bdunasrid tsamanam mkha' la mngon par 'gas nas dge slong de dgagi mdun du rnam pa snatshogs pa batshe 'phrul ya ma zung dang ldan pa'i cho 'phrul bstan te/ steng gi nam mkha'
la 'dug nas/ tshe'i 'du byed dang/ srog gi 'du byed btang ste// yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de nas dge slong de dag gis gnas brtan dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lus bsregasanas mched
nabyas te/ dr-idang/ me tog dang/ sngos dang/ mar me dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan rnams kyis mchod ma byas so// rnam pa 'di dag 'phags pa nas 'phags
bar brgyad nas bshad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa po dang/ sbyin bdag gang yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro zhes dga' ba rab tu bskyed pa'i phyir/ rtog
pa brjod pa'i 'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bshad de// 'phags pa dga' ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rtogs pa brjod pa rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dge slong
dza ta shAr bya dra dang/ dge slong shAkya 'od kyis bsgyur//// rgya gar skad du/ rAdza kA kA pA dra ba su pra kyi yu pra Ni dra sUtra/ bod skad du/ rgyal
po gser gyi lag pa'i mar me'i lo rgyus dang smon lam gyi mdo/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal 'a/sngon sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis ston pa mdzad pa'i dus na/ rgyal po gser gyi lag pa
zhes bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad la 'di skad ces gsol te// btsun pa khyedasngon gyi dus na dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig spyad na/ da ltar mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan te/ sku las 'od reramatha'/
las pa 'byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal bo chen po nyon cig/ sa so sa skye bo'i dus na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la
byang chub sems bskyed nas/ lus l ras bal gyi le'u til mar rgya nang du btses pa stong btsugs te/ phyogs bcu dus bsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la gtan pa med pa'i mchod par phul bas/
kya@#/ daltar ng nyid sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ces bya bar gyur pa yin no zhes gsung ba dang/ de la rgyal po chen po shin tu yi rang ste/ des rgyal po des rang gi lag pa g.yas pa las/
kyi 1bal mar gyis khatsos pas dkris te[]gtang nas/ lag pa la yon pa bar snang la brkyang ste/ phyogs banu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ bdag gi ston pa btsem ldan 'das mar me mdzad gto
su gsol la// 'gyod pa med pa'i sems kyis phyogs bcu'asangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis mngon sum du dmigs te/ gtan ba med pa'i mchod par bsngos nas/ smon lam 'debs te 'di skad
rgyu da// mar me'i snod ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten khams tsam du gyum cig/ snying bonari'i rgyal po ri rab tsam du gyur cig/ 'od kyis srid pa'i rtsomo man chad nas/ mnar med pa'i
rgyu sems can dmyal ba banachad nas/ gzhan yang lcags richen po 'phye rgyab na/ sems can rang gi las kyis sgrib pas bsgribs pa'i unanag chen po 'chung na/ rang ga la ga pa brkyang bskum yag
ma thor ba'i gnas tshun chad snang zhingagasal bar gyur cig/ mun na dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ji srid bzhugs la desrididu gnas par gyur cig/ grangs na phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams mtho' las pa
na bzhugs pa sangs rgyas grangs med par re lo'i spyan lam du gsal bar gyur cig/ mar me 'di gzugs med par gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ de ltar gsal ba'i mod la gzugs med pa'i
ba cu rnams mar me'i dkyis bskal ma thag tu/ mtshan dang dpe khyad du ldan nas snyoms par 'jug pa'i skye mched bzhi las grol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dis ma gtan la sogs pa 'jug pa'i/
skal ba dang ldan par gyur cig mar me 'di gzugasazhaspyod pa lha rnams kyi gnas su gsal bar gyur cig/ gzugasan spyod pa'i lha rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi deg 'a bde rtsegacig pa nyams su myong
nas/ phyir ma ldog pa'i sa theb par gyur cig/ mar me 'da'adod khams kyi lha rnams kyi gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ 'dod khams kyi lha rnams kyang/ lha'i 'dod pa 'i longs spyod
lasems ma chags shing/ rang gisoms la lta zhing bsam gtan bzhi lais kyis snyoms par 'jug pa'iskal ba dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di lham lon rnams kyi gnas su snang zhig
gsal bar gyur cig/ lham yin gyi nga rgyal dang/ khro gtum dang/ sems kyis dugs la zhunas tshod med pa bzhidang ldan nas/ zhi gnas kyi sems yid la byed pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar

ma 'di gling bzhi'ami rnams kyi gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ gling bzhi'amo rnams kyang sdug bsngal brgyad las thar nas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cige mar me 'di/
byol song rnams kyi gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ byol song de dag gcig la gcig za ba dang/ brdeg brdung dang/ bsad pa dang/ bkol ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ blun rmongs las thar nas//
shes rab rnam pa gsum dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'dag shin rje'i 'jig rten du snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ gshin rje'i rnams gsod gcod byed pa dang/ brdeg brdung/
kha las thar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis pha ro'on tu na ba bsgrags pas/ sems can thams cad gtong ba'i sems 'byung bar gyur cig/ mar me 'a di pra ta'i gnas su gsal bar gyur cig
pra ta rnams kyang bkres skom gyi sdug bsngal las thar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi thugs rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ zas dang skom gyis 'gongs pa'i longs spyod zad m/

shes pa dang ldan zhing sbyin pa'i la ril tu phyin pa 'i debang dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di na rag rnams kyi gnas su gsal bar gyur cig/ na rag na sngon gyi las ngan pa'i rnam par smin pas tsha grang gi
sdug bsngal bzod par dka' ba nyams su myong ba las/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal tshad med pa las thar nas bzod pa'i re ba la
tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'dis 'dzam bu gling gi phyi rol na mun nagaganangan 'thoms pa'i sems can rang gnang na 'thoms pa'i sems can rang gi lag pa g.yas pa bskyang ba'ang mi
mthong ba'i gnas su gsal bar gyur cig/ de dag sngon gyi las nganama'i rnam par sman pas zas dang skom 'dod pa las/ nam mkha' la rang ga lcags kyi sonamo lo da pas brtogs pas zas dang skoa ma red/

chi/ nas/ rang gi lus zin pa dang sha bcad de za ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi thugs rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis mun nag chen por 'dzoms pa las thar nas/ bde ba can gyi zhing khams su skye par
gyur cig/ gzhan la ngamar e 'daklu'i gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ de rnams gti mug dang sarasna'i mdud pa bkrol te gtong ba'i blo dang ldan zhing/ nam mkha' lta de gas 'jigs pa dang//

ma tshan bye tshan la sogs te 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las thar nas/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro zhing/ srog 'tsho ba'i zhi gnas kyi chu'i thog la snying la gnas nas klu rnams
'dod pa'i yon tan dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'di lce 'apachen po'i gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ des ste 'phyachen po'i sdug bsngal zhi nas dag 'o brgya mtsho rnam par 'phrul pa'i shugs

dang ldan par gyur cig/ mar me 'dis 'dzam bu gling gi spyir gas pa 'os bdag dang/ lca dang/ klu dang/ sa bdag gi rgyal po pa ti li dang sa'argyal chen mo dang/ rgya mtsho chen po dang dmatsho bran dang
dzing dang khren pa la gnas pa dang/ klung chen bo dang/ klung phra mo da chu migadang/ lu ma la gnas pa dang gangs ri mthon po 'irgyud la gnas ba dang/ ri nag po dang/ g.ya' dang/ shasrang dang/
spang ri dang/ nagasachen po dang/ shing gcig pa dang/ gtsug lag khang dang/ mtsho rten dang/ grong khyer dang ngasan gnas pa'i gnas su snang zhing gsal bar gyur cig/ de dgaso so ikhrul pa'i
@#/// rtog pa thams cad byang nas/ dkonaachog gsum la mi phyad pa'i dad pa dang ldan// byang chub sems dang ldan nas thar pa thob pa'i rgyur gyur cig/ de ltar deng mar me 'di'i lon
ba dag gis kyang/ gtan pa med pa'i machod pa 'di phul bas/ bdag dang mtha' yas pa'i sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa mngame mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skyes te/ mngon par rdzogs par sas
rgyas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi deb la mgon du gyur cage/ rgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i arama'i smon lam gyis de rdzogs so/// rgya gar skad
du/ Ar+ya b+ha dra tsar drani d+hanarA dza/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bzang po spyod ba'i smon lam gyi rgyal po/ 'jam dpal gzhonanur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// jisnyad sudag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenan
dus gsum gshegs pa ma yi seng ge kun/ bdag gis ma lus de dag thams cad la// lus dang ngag yang dang bas phyag bgyi 'o// bzang por spyod pa 'i smon lam stobs dag gis// rgyal ba thams cad yid
kyis mngon sum du// zhig gi ldul snyed lus rab btud pa yis// rgyal ba kun la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo// rdul gcig steng na rdul snyedasangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa dag/
de ltatshes kyidabyings rnams ma lus par/// thams cad rgyal ba dag gis gang bar mos// dedag bsngags patshazidargya mtsho rnams// dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mo'i sgra kun gyis// rgyal ba kun gyi yon rab
brjod tsang bde bar gshegs pa thams cad bdag gis bstod// me tog ngal 'phrang ba dam pa dang// sil snyan rnams dang byug pa gdugs mtsheg dang// mar me mcheg dang bdug spos dam pa yis// rgyal
bde dag la ni mchod par bgyi// na bza'adam pa rnams dang dra mchog dang/ phye ma'i phur ma ri ba mnyam pa dang// bkod pa khyad par 'phags pa'i mchog kun gyis// rgyal ba de dag kun la mched par bgyid

mchod pa gang rnams blamad rgya che ba// de dag rgyal ba thams cad la yang mos// bzang po spyod la dad pa 'i stobs dag gis// rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal mchod nga ra bgyi// 'dod chags zhe sdang pa de mug
dbang gis na// lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang// sdig pa bdag gis bgyis pa ci mchis pa// de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun ngango sangs rgyas sras// rang

rgyal rnams dang slob dang misong dang// 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gang la yang// de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag yi rang// gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sgronam dag/ byang chub rim par sangs rgyas ma chag

bar s// mgon po de dag bdag gis thams cad la// 'khor le ba named par bskor bar bskul// mya ngan 'das ston gang bzhed de dag la// 'gro ba kun la phan zhing bde ba'i phyir// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed bzhug
bar yang// bdag gis thal morab sbyar gsol bar bgyi// phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing gshags pa dang/ rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba yi// dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa/ thams cad bdag
gis byang chub phyir bsngo'o// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bcul// 'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs mchod par gyur// gang yang ma byon de dag rab
myur bar// bsam rdzogs byang chub rim par sangs rgyas na// phyogs bcu gang+gA'i zhung rnams dzastod pa// de dag rgya cher yongs su dag par gyur// byang chub shing dbang drung gshegs rgyal ba dang//

sangs rgyas sras kyis rab tu gang bar shog/ phyogs bcu'i som sa can gang rnams josnyed pa// de dag rtag tu nad med bde bar gyur// 'gro ba kun gyi chos kyi don rnams ni// 'thun par gyur cing re ba'ang 'grub

bar shog/ byang chub spyod pa dag ni bdag spyod cing// 'gro ba kun tu skye ba dran par gyur// tshe rabs kun tu 'chi 'pho skye ba na// rtag tu bdag ni rab tu 'byung bar shog/ rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su slob gyur te// bzang

po spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing// tshul khrims spyod pa drin da yongs dag bar// rtag tum nyams skyon med spyod par shog/ lha laskad dang klu dang gnod sbyin skad// grul bum dag dang ma ya skad rnams
dang 'gro ba kun gyi skad rnams ji tsam par// thams cad skad du bdag gis chos bstan to// des shang pha rol phyin la rab brtson te/ byang chub sems ni nam yang brjed ma gyur/ sdig pa gang rnams
sgrib par gyur ba dang// de dag ma lus yongs su byang bar shog/ las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi las rnams las// grol zhing 'jig rten 'gro ba rnams su yang// ji ltar pad+mochus mi chags pa bzhin// ti

zlanam mkhar thogs pa med ltar sbyang// zhing ga khyen dang phyogs rnams ji tsam par// ngan song sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bar byed// bde ba dag la 'gre pa kun bkod cing// 'gro ba thams cad la ni phan par/
spyad byang chub spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing// sems can dag gi spod dang 'thun par 'jug/ bathang po sred pa dgan rab ston cing// ma 'ongs bskal pa kun du song par gyur// bdag gi sngod
dang mtshungs pa ragang srid pa// de dgadang ni rtag tu 'grogs par shog/ lus dang ngag rnams dang ni sems kyis kyang// srid pa dag dang smon lam gcig tu spyod/ bdag la phan par 'dod pa'i
grogs po dag/ bzang po spyod pa rab tu ston pa rnams// de dag dang yang rtag tu phrad par shog/ de dag bdag gis nams kyang yod mi 'byung// sangs rgyas sras kyis bskor ba'i mgon po rnams//

mngon sum rtag tu bdag gis rgyal bar blta// ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar// de dag la ya nga mchod pa rgya cher bgyi// rgyal ba rnams kyi dam pa'i ches 'dzin cing// byang chub spyod pa kun tu snang bar
byed bzang bo spyod pa rnam par sbyong ba yang// ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyad par bgyi// srid pa thams cad du yang 'khor ban// bsod nams ye shes tshogs niu0f00 zang red/ thabs dang shes
rab ting 'dzin rnam thar dang// yon tan kun gyi mi zad mdzod du gyur/ rdul gcage stongan rdul snyed zhing rnams te// zhing der bsam gyis ma khyab sangs rgyas rnams// sangs rgyas sras kyi dbusan
bzhugs pa la/ byang chub spyad pa spyod cing blta bar bgyi// de ltar m lus thams cad phyogs su yang// sku tsam khyon la dus gsum tshad snyed kyi// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho
kazhing rnams rgya mtsho dang// bas la ba rgya mtshor spyodacing rab tu 'jug/ gsung gcig yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra skad kyis// rgyal ba kun dbyangs yan lag rnam dag pa// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa ji
bzhin dbyangs// sangs rgyas gsung la rtag tu 'jug par bgyi// dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad dag/ 'khor la'i tshul rnams rab tu bsko ba yi// de dag gi ya nga gsung dbyang sam
zad la// blo ya stobs kyis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug/ ma 'ongs bskal par thams cad 'jug par ya nga// skad cig gcig gas bdag kyang rab tu 'jug/ gang yang bskal pa dus gsum tshad de
dag/ skad cigecha shas kyin zhugs par spyad// dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng ge dag/ de dag skad cig gcig la bdag gis blta// rtag tu de dag gi ni spyod yul la// sgyu mar gyur pa'i rnam
thar stobs kyis 'jug/ gang yang dus gsum dag gi zhing gi rgyan// de dag rdul gcig steng duman par bsgrub// de ltar ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du// rgyal ba rnams kyi zhing gi rgyan la
'jug/ gang yang ma byon 'jig rten sgron ma rnams// de dgarim par 'tshang rgya 'khor la bsor/ mya ngan 'das po rab tu zhi mtha' ston// mgon po kun gyi drung du bdagamachi ko/ kun tu myur ba'i rdza
'brel stobs rnams dang// kun nas sgo la theg pa'i skyobs dag dka/ kun tu yon tan spyod pa'i skye ba rnams dang// kun tu khyab pa byams pa dag gi stobs// kun tu dge ba'i bsod nams stobs
rnams dang// chags pa med par gyur pa'i ye shes stobs// shes rab thabs dang ting 'dzin stobs dag gis// byang chub stobs rnams mang dag sgrub par byed// las kyi stobs rnams long
su dag byed cing// nyon mongs stobs rnams kun tu 'dzems par byed// bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs med rab byed cing// bzang po spyod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs par bgyi// zhing rnams rgyaatsho rnam

par dag byed cing// sems can rgya mtsho dag ni rnam par sgrol// chos rnams rgya mtsho rab tu mthong byas nas// ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu rtogs par byed// spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing// smon

lam rgya mtsho rab tu rdzogs par byed// sangs rgyas rgya mtshe rab tumachod byed cing// bskal pa rgyayatshor ma skyo spyad par bgyi// gang yang dus gsum gshegs pa 'argyal ba la/ byang chub spyod pa'i smon
lam bye brag rnams// bzang por spyod pas byang chub sangs rgyas nas// de kun bdag gis ma lus rdzogs par bgyi// rgyal ba kun gyisAsakyi thu bo pa// gang gi ming ni kun tu bzang zhes bya// ma khas

pa ded nga ma tshungs par spyad pa'i phyir// dge ba de dag thams cad rab tu bsngo// lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnam dag cing// spyod pa rnam dag zhing rnams yongs dag pa// bsngo ba bzang bo ma las la
ci 'dra bar// de 'drar ba dag kyang de dang mtshungs par shog/ kun nas dge ba bzang po spyad pa'i phyir// 'jam da ba la gyon sen lam spyad par bgyi// ma 'ongs bskal pa rnamA
ka sumi skyo khag/ de yi bya ba ma lus rdzogs par bgyi// spyod pa dag nitshad yod ma gyur cig/ yon tan rnams kyang tshad bzung med par shog/ spyod pa tshad med pa la gnas nas kyang// de dag 'phrul
sgyu bzams cad 'tshal bar bgyi/namam la'a mthar zug gyur pa ji tsam pa// sems can ma lus mtha' yang de bzhin te// dzatsam las dang donamongasa mthar gyur pa// padag gi smon lam mtha' la nga de
tsam mo// gang yang phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mtha' yas pa// rin chen brgyan te rgya'akha rnams la phul// lha dang mi la bde ba'i mchog rnams kyang// zhing gi rdul snyed bskal par yul phebs//gang
gas pasngo ba'i rgyal po 'di thos nas// byang chub mchog gi rjes su rab mos gang// lan cig tsam la nga dad pa bskyed pas na// bsod nams dam pa'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro// gang gis bzang spyod smon/

lam 'di btab pas// des nang na song thams cad sbyangs par 'gyur// des na grogs po ngan pa spangs pa yin// snang ba mtha' yas de la nga des tshur mthong// de dag red par ba red nga de bar 'tsho/ mi tshe 'dir
lang de dag legs par 'ongs// kun tu bzang po de yang ci 'dra bar// de dag ring por mi thogs de bzhin 'gyur/ mtshams med lnga ko dag gi sdig pa rnams/gang gis mi shes dbang gis byas pa dag//
de las bzang spyod smon lam 'di brjod na// myur du ma lus yongs su byang bar 'gyur// ye shes dang ni gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang// rigs dang bdag rnams dang ldan par 'gyur// bdud dang mu stegs

mang pos dem thub// 'jig rtenagasum po kun na'ang mchod par 'gyur// byang chub shing dbang drung du de myur 'gro// so nga nas sems can phan phyir de 'dug ste// byang chubs sa rgyud 'khor lo rab tu bskor//
bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa thams cad 'dul// gang yang bzang bo spyod pa'i smon lam 'di// 'chang ba dang ni ston dus klog pa yi// de yi rnam par smin pas ngas rgyas mkhyen// byang chub mchog la som
rim byed cig/ 'jam dpal dpa' bos ji ltar mkhyen pa dang// kun tu bzang po de yang de bzhin te// de dag gzhirjes su bdag slob cing// dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu ngasngo// dus gsum gasheg
pa rgyal bathams cad kyis// bsngo ba gang la mchog tu bsngags pa des// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa pa 'dzakun yang// bzang po spyod phyir rab tu bsngo bar bgyi// bdag 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur pa na sgrol
ba thams cad dag na phyi rab sal te// mngon sum snang bamathe' yas d mthong nas// bde ba can gyi zhing der rab tu 'gro// der so nas smon lam 'di dag kyang// thams cad ma lus ma ngon sum 'gyur
bar shog/ de dgam lus bdag ga les su bskang/ 'jig rten ji srid sems can phan par bgyi de/ rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang zhing dga' ba der// pad+mo dam pa shin tu mdzes pas skyes// snang ba mtha' lasaM

nub brgya bdun rnams/ sango si/ rgyal bas mngon sum du// lung bstan pa yang bdag gis der thob shog/ der zhib dag gis lung bstan rab thob nas// sngal pa mang po bye ba phrag brgya yis// blo ya stobs kyis phyog
sems can rnams la phan pa mang po bgyi// bzang po spyod pa'i son lam ton pa yi// dge ba bcu thad bdag gis ci bsags pa// des 'gro ba'i smon lam dge ba rnams// skad
tsag gcig la thams cad 'byor pa shog/ gang lang bzang spyod smon lam ston pa yi// bsod nams mtha' yas dam pa thob pa des// 'gro ba sdug bsnga la chu bor dung ba rnams// 'od dpag med pa'i
tsho gnas ba theb par shog/ 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyirgyal po rdzogs so//hU~M/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mo Tipra Ning na/ bod skad du/
'bags pa byams pa 'i smon lam/ dkona mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// kun dga' ba 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tsho/
tin lanagasuamtshan lan gsum du bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du byas te/ tshig 'di skad
ces smas so// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal la// drang srong lha mig ldan pa la// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang yang// nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// ngan 'gro thams cad zlog bgyi rung
mtho ris laman rab ston la// rga shamed par 'dren mdzad pa// byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal la// sems kyidabang du gyur pas na// bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis pa// sangs rgyas spyan sngar
mchis nas su// de dag bdag gis bshags par bgyi// bdag las rnam pa gsum gang yis// bsod nams tshegasan bsu da pa de// bdagagi kun mkhyen sa bon te// bdag gis byang chub mi
zad shog/ phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su// sangs rgyas chod pa gang byung ba// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa yi rang bas// de la bdag kyang ya rang re// sdig pa thams cad bashags par bgyi//
bsod nams kun la yi rang ngo/ sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal la// bdag ni ye shes mchog thob shog/ phyogs bcu dag ga phyogs rnams na// sa bcu dag la gnas pa la// byang chub semA
dpa' byang chub mchog/ 'tshang rgya bgyid par bskul ma 'debs// byang chub dam par sangs rgyas shing// sde dang bcas pa'i bdud btul nas// srog chag kun la sman slad du// tshes kyi 'khor lo/
skor gyur cig/ chos rnga chen po' sgra yis/sdug bsngal rems can thar bgyid shog/ bskal pa bye ba bsam yasasu// chos ston mdzad cing bzhugs gyur cig/ 'dod pa 'a 'das du bying gyur pa 'i/
sad pa'i srad bus dam bcings pa// 'ching ba kun gyis bcings dag la// rkang gnyis mchog rnams bag zigs su gsol// sems kyis drimar bgyis pa lo// sangs rgyas rnams nasodami mdzad/
las u/ sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan// srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs par// gang dag 'das dang ma byon pa// de dag rjes
su bdag slob cing// byang chub spyad pa spyod gyur cig/ pha rol phyin drug rdzogs bgyis nas// 'gro drug sems can thar bgyid shog/ mngon shes drug po mngon bgyis nas// blamed byang chub reg gyur/
cig/ ma skyes pa dang ma 'byung dang// rang bzhinam mchis gnasam mchis// rnam rigam mchis dngos ma mchis// stong pa'i ches rnams rtogs bar shog/ sangs rgyas drang srong chen po ltar
sems can ma mchis srog ma mchis// gang zag ma mchis gso ma mchis// bdag ma mchis pa 'tshos rtogs shog/ bdag 'dzin bdag gir 'dzin pa yi// dngos po kun la ma gnas par/
sems can kun la bde slad du// ser sna ma mchis spyin gtong shog/ dngos po dngos po mamachis pas// bdag ga le ngas sdod snyan grub shog/ dngos po thams cad rnam 'jig pas/ sbyin pa'i
du rel phyin rdzogs shog khrims kyis tshul khrims skyon med cing// tshul khrims rnam par dag dang ldan// rlom sems med pa'i tshul khrims kyis// tshul khrims pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sa'am
yang na me 'amachu// chung gi khams ltar mi gnas shing// bzod pa bro ba ma mchis par// bzod pa 'a la rol phyin rdzogs shog/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa 'i brtson 'grus kyi// bstan spro le 'aa
mchis shing// stobs dang ldan pa'i lus sems kyis// brtson 'grus pha re lo mun rdzogs shog/ skyam lta bu'i tange 'dzin dang// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin dang// rdo rje lta bu'i tang 'dzan gyis//
bsam gtan pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang// dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang yang// rig gsum mngon sum bgyis pa yis// shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs shog/ sangs
rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa dang// 'od dang gzi brjid 'bar ba dang// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus kyis// bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig/ de ltar spyad pa spyod byed cing// byams bgrag
dang ldan pa las// pha rol phyin drug rdzogs bgyisanas// sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa 'chen po byams pas/ gang la gnas nas thabs la mkhas
pas thog pa bde ba/ 'jug Na bde ba/ blan med pa la nga dag par rdzogs pa 'byang chub yang dag par bsgrub pa'i thabs la mkhas pa ni de yin no// 'phags pa byams pa'i smon lam rdzogs so//
!/ bod skad du/ byang chub dam pa'i rjesasu mos pa'i smon lam// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams nadus gsum gyi// ye shes yon tan thugs rje tshad
med cing// dpag med la phung rdzogs te bla med pas// bdud kyi sde bcom legs pa drug dang ldan// mkhyen pas ji bzhin gsung bzhin de bzhin gshegs// nyon mongs dgra bcom skye dgus mchod par
u@#/ 'os// yang dag rdzogs par sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen// rig pa'i blo gos la khyad par zhabs dang bcas// bgrod mchog gnas su bde gshegs legs pa b.res/
ka'ajig rten 'di dag dngos po ji bzhin gzigs// skyes bus 'dul thabs kyis kha la sbyar// srid pa 'a mthar phyin lha ma ston pa'i gtso// sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas 'di//
sgyu/ gzhal yas tshogs kyi yon tan mtsheg b.resanas// don dam dbyings mnga'a mdzad chos kyi rje// sridagasum rmos las 'khor ba'i skyon sel phyir// dbang gyur gzhan gyis reng mni thos par dka'
dka' las red pa bla med da kena mchogs/ de bas sangs rgyas mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal// dgengs pa lhadamed snying po mdo yasna/ bkra ba'i don phyir tshig bzang dbyangs kyis bsad// spro ba
bskye da ces lung bstan 'a pags pa'i gsung// don gas la bslab bder 'dra bsdobs tshigs su bcad// lul rgya de gongs pa garigs de ched du gadzags// gleng gzhis rgyus byas bslab pa'i de byanges
pa[% ]nams bstan// bshad pa ga su dpes mtshon rtogs pas brjod// yon tana mchog dang nyes pa'i skyon bstan phyir// sngon byung gtam dang thub pas mdzad pa'i thabs// rgyas par gsung daakhyen
pas cho 'phrul rmad// dzazhin gtan la phab cing bstan pa'i sde// rnam gro la khyad par bsgrubs pa lam gyitshes// ma'i po zhi ba dag pa denadamadabyangs// bstan pas tshang mar bsgrubs pa'i tshes
nyid 'di// thab mo brtag dka' thub pas ched du gsung// sgrib sel yang dag don shes chags med blos// bla med gnas su 'degs pa'i thigachen phyir// shes rlomo gzhan gyi gzhung la lo daasrid
ma srid yod pa bla med dkon mchog ste// de bas chos nyid mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal// ston pa mchog gi gsung las skyes pa skyo// ma skyes chos nyid ston pa'i yo rashes zab// mthong por spyod la
brtson pa 'a yon tan che// gnyis min khyer me d mthong zhes ma chags mo// gzhan don gtso bor bsgrubaces snying rje'i bdag/ 'phongs la yid bzhin gtong ba'i rin chen gter// sdug bsngal nad rnams
gso pa'i sman pa mchog/ rgyal sras gtso bo byang chub sems dpa 'a drang/ shes rab gsum gyi bden pa'i phyogs bsgoms te// bden mthong mis kyis nyon mongs mthar sangasanas// mya ngan
'das pa'i dbyangs la gnas pa 'khyer// rtogs pa 'a ye shes 'jig rten gsum las 'das// dbang po rab zhingul ba'i spyod lam mdzes// lus dang ngag yade skyonamada rnam dag ces// lcamin
yon tan khyadangum 'khor ba'i// slob dang mi slob 'phags ma'agang zag brgyad// bla ma'i khyad par mthongomathu gzhan dag kyang// dam pa'is la 'jug pa spro khatshe// dad mos dge bas 'tsho ba'i dka'
thub can// so sor thar pa'i sdom la tshul bzhin gnas// blo rdzab grolo gas tshul chen dge 'dun 'ad/shes gsal dag bas bsgrub pa'i spyod pa zab// dadams btul par zhugs pa'i dka' thub brtan//
yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas zhes 'dus pa mtsho// rnam dag spyod pas bdag gzhan don bsgrub phyir// sgrub byed ga na gya tshugyis [']da ma bsad// bsAdamin nges par 'phag
pa'i dkon mchog ste// de bas dge 'dun mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal// bsod nams gter chen legs pa bsam ya Ti pa// rnam dag sems kyis dad de 'ol phyogs su// bstod pa'i che
tsam brjed cing phyag 'tshal nas// 'dus ma byas pa'i mchod pa rnam dag ngas// ma byung ma skyes stong pa'i mtshan nyid de// gnyis min dbyer med rang rige snyoms pa'i yul// chos kyi re ba de dang rab
par 'brel cing// mtshan ma med pa'i stobs kyis grub pa yi// ye she mnyam pa nyid kyi longs spyod kyang// dzes pa'i rjes tsam yod kyis der mos te// yang dag nyid kyi snying po dag pa mchor// byang
chub dam pa'i spyod pa dpag yas pas// nyon mong85ma 'dres 'jig rten gsum la 'dren// na chen dbyibs bkod rnam pa ra dag pa'i zhing// 'byor pa tshad med lhun gyis grub pa'i rdzas// kun tu bzang
pa spyod pas thob pa la dbasod nams khyad par can gyi longs spyod kyang// dad pa'i ngeshugs kyis yang dag 'dir dmigs te// tshad med yod bzhin phun sum tshogs pas mchod// 'jugarten dge ba'i
mchod pa mngan sum pa// me tog byug pa phye ma sngos chusam chod// dri bsung maram rel mo sale snyan dang// rgyal mtshan ba dan 'phreng ba bya re gdugs/ rgyan dang na bza' gdong ba rin chen dkor sman
0/ dang zhal zas yo byadam thad ngas// mdzes par brgyan pa 'i gnas dang sa gzhir bcas// skye bo bzhen pa bya mchog rkang gnyis ldan// legs par spyad pa'i tshogs kyis bskyed pa yi// bde 'gro skyod
pas 'tshe ba'i le ngos spyod kyang// gus pa'i tshul gyis ma ngenasum 'dir dmagis te// dgos pa snakas mo yul 'khyer pasamatshed// mchod gnas gsum la 'os pas mchod bgyis te// snying
rje byams ldan chags mod snyoms pa'i blos// sngon par 'os dang 'khongs dang mngon sum gyi// 'brel ba'i sems can kun la sbyin pa bstabs// das po chung lang dmages pa cher bskyed de// gus
pa'i tshul gyis yang dag mchod bgyis nas// brtso ldan mgon med skyabs kyi mngon sum du// sngon gyi nyes pa ma lus bshags pa naM// thog ma med pa'i srid pa ji tsam nas// dngos med dngos por
khartags pas yid bsad de// mnor bde ba rnams kyi lam ma mthong// dkena mchog gsum gyi yon tan tshul na98shes// rgya dang 'bras bur ma rtogs donanor te// lus kyi srid pa ma dgasdog do ngagyis/
ga gi sa tshig 'chalats+tshas pas ngan du brjod// sems kyis bla tshor leg par bsams pa yis// bde 'gro mtho ri gnas dang skye gzhan gyi// las nasdig pa ma 'chab 'di'i bshags so// mang dgacig/
pa'iskal dang ldan bzhin du// dge ba'i bshes gnyen ring du bral gyur te// sdig pa'igrogs kyis rtag tu der bstan pas// la la ring tam dbang du bdag spyod cing// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la g.yengs pas//
mgus nyanasems bsgom la brtson zhan te// bla med dam pa'i lam la sgrib pa yas// nan tan nyams pa ma 'chab 'dir bshags so// mtshan ma mang pos rig pa'i blo ba yengs
ka nas dngos med dngos por rtog cing gnyis la 'jug/ don dam yang dag mtha' la zla zhan te// mi gnas dbyings la la shes rmugs pas na// 'khor ba'i skyon mthong sdug bsngal mi bzad ces/
gzhan den gtso bor bsgrub la g.yel gyur pas// bla med sangs rgyas sa la sgrib pa ya// shes rab zhan pa 'am 'chab 'dir bshags so// ji ltar sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtser 'gyur ltar/ thog
sku mar byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas// pha rol phyin bcu rnam par rdzogs mdzad cing// bsod nams ye shes dpag tu med par bsgrubs/ daMm 'dres stobs bdu ma 'jigs bzhi b.ris nas//
mngon par byang chub bdud kyi snga rnams btul// chos kyi 'khor la gsung gatshul bzhin bskor// mtha' gnyis snang phyir sa gnas mya ngan 'das// btsas pa med bzhin phun sum tshegs la sogs/
bla med sangs rgyas yon tanadabag yas kyis// rgyu dang 'bras bu legs pa jasnyed pa// de dag lo sa la rjes su yi rang bo/ bla ma mchod byed thes pas ma ngegos shing// shes rab gas la bsam
skyes ches nyidim thong// mtha' la mi gnas sdug bsngal bzod bya ste// brtser ldan sems pas 'gro ba'i sbyangs la brtson// sa dang pha rol phyin bdu rdzogs mdzad cing// bsod nams ye shes

de bag tu med pa bsgrubs// bla med dam pa'i lam la spro ba che// rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshob byang chub sems dang 'a dang// blo zhib gsal bas rten 'brel rgyud bsgoms te// phas la pa brgya snyed yon tan tshogs

bsag sa pa'i/ tshe'aphrul spyod lam tshul rgya'i sgrol byed cing// ma bstan skyon las ri'i pa 'ang rgyal dang// dad phyi'i blama'i lung bsgrubs thos 'dzinicas// gang zag chos dang dngas ngos nas brtag
pas// 'khorapa'i jug tshoskyonadogasang ragis la// mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas mchog bgrod 'os zhes// shes rab ting 'dzin blos dpyad ma bsgrubs pas// sdug bsngal ji bzhin brtags te kun
'byungan pas// 'gog pa 'i legs pa mthong ste lam rnams bsgoms// de tshul goms byas bden ma thong khyad par lam// mthong dang bsgoms pa'i legs pa dzami bzhin du// 'khor ba'i thug rdzaskyon
dag la ngagal// tshungan 'das pa'i bde kha nas rab bsgrubs pas// dgrab cos la sogs skyes bu chen po brgyad// byang chub tan thos rang rgyal 'phags pa'i rnams// yon tanasna tshegs brjod bar

dka'am tshagi rgyu nga' khrasabulegasala'adzastod pa// de dag yongs la rjes su yi rang ngo// so so'i skye bo dag sbyong ji snyed pa// dge bcu spyad pa 'i tshul bzhin nanatan gyis// mtho rasi gnas dang
'phags ba'is bskyabs pas// rab tu byung zhing tshangs par spyod la sogs// 'jig rten dge ba'i bo grangs dkyis// yon tan tshogs brjod par dka' ba yin// rgyu dang 'bras bu legs pa ji snyed pa
de dag yongs la rjes su yi rang ngo// nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra tshad bzung dka' ba la// rgyu dang 'bras bu mchog la ya rang nas// legs pa'i tshogs la rjes su rab mos te//
ka dad pas sems bskyed yi dam bcas pan// dza ltar sangs rgyas dus gsum gshegs pa yi// sngon gyi rgyal ba srasadang bcas rnams la// dad de tshul bzhin phyag 'tshal mngon par bstod//
sgyu rnam dag sems kyis dam pa'i rgya byas nas// gzhal yas tshogs kyi dbyangs la khyab pa'i sims// 'jig rten rab 'byam kun la 'jug pa'i blos// sems can yongs la snyoms par khyab pa'i
yid[]bsod nams dbam bsgrub kyi 'byunga gnas mchog/ yengashes dpag yasa mngonosum grub ma'argyus// ston pa rdul snyad shani dumanyes 'gyur ltar// de bzhin bdag gis dam pa 'asems bskyed
de/ dadadang snying rje brtson 'grus rab brtul nas// tshul khrims rnamangaganga shes rab thogs med blos// bzang po spyod pa bsgrubs te bsod nams bskang// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam ste rer shes 'jug
nam ma kha'atshod kyis gzhal te sems can bsgral/ 'khor ba'i mthas gtugs 'jig rten bskyabs la sogs// byang chub chen por bya bar rigs pa dang// ma lus bdag gis bya ba'am bca' 'o//
bla med sems bskyed da pa ga las dam bcas nas// dge ba ji snyid mchog tu bsngo ba ni// mchod 'os bsod nams zhing dag ma lus la// dad demachod cing phyag 'tshal mngon par bstod// brtser ldam
chags sems ni gsum gtong// sdig bshags pa'i sems bskyed dam bcas nas// dge ba ji snyed byang chub sange bor bsngo// dzanyid legs par spyod pa sdud pa'i rkyen// dge ba'i rtsa ba
ma lus kun bsngos nas// rtse gcig soms kyis dmagis te ston pa// 'di'i sbyad brjod pa'i 'go danams 'di nyid kyis// legs par khyad par grub pa'i chu byas te// rgyal po sa bdag chos kyis
skyong ba dang// bdag cag 'khor bcas 'thun spyod ma lus kun// da ltar gnas pa'i lus gnas 'di'i sogs// 'khor ba'i rgyunan nam ba dag gnas kyi tshe// chos dang lugs kyi don rnams ci la ya nga
skyonadang 'chad gtsol ba ga nodamed cing// lus dang sems bde 'byor pa yid bzhin te// snying rje byams pas gzhan la phan byed cing// ma skyes ma shes tshang du skye mni pa'i// ngan song gsum dang
smad pa 'amo lus rnams// mtho ris skyon dang bgegs kyis sa la sogs// sdug bsngal gsungs pa'i gnas rigs gang du yang// ma skyomamyong spyod par ma 'gyur zhing// ba/ngas rgyas sku gsung rgyun du
mthong thos te/ dad las tshul bzhin sngon las rig pa gas la// chos dang zang zing tshogs ldan m chags zlos// brtsi bya'i sprin gsum lhur byed bka' dogs shang// mgadon dang skyabs med don du/
bdag gyur te// lha mi'i du 'tsho ba gzhan las na// byang chub dam pa'i thabs dang blo rdzogs te// sku gsum lhunagyis grub ste sangs rgyas Mnas// sngonagyi dge slong chos kyi 'byungag nas kyi/sems
[t ]@#// bskyedargya chen smon lam btab pa 'i mthus// 'jig rtenab de pa can gyi gnas mchog 'dir// 'byor pa dpag las tshad med 'khongs spyod cing// 'od 'bar sku mchog mi g.yo bzhugs zhing
ka mtshan tsam thos pas bde gnasazeb la sogs// 'jig rten khyad par phan ngag skyabs mdzad pa'i// ye shes 'od dpag med par gyur pa bzhin// khams gsum rnam par grags pa'i dzin grub ste//
'gro ba yongs kyi dpal du grub par smon// de bzhin rgyud drug lam la gnas pa la// nyon mongs dbang gyur sems can ji snyed kun// 'khor ba'i in sosa'i skyin bzhin du// gtsemed lus sems
rtag tu bde bzhin gnas// dge ba'i bshes gnyen mchog tu bsnyen gyur te// chos nyid dbyangs la rig pa 'a blo rdzogs shing// byang chub dam pa'isams bskyed mtsho grub ste// bde gshegs yang dag
sa la gnas par smon// lugs bzhin dngos bdun bdag gas 'di snas pas// skyon med rtse gcig dam bsal ba bstan pa'i// bla ma gsung gacha tsam 'ol phyogs su/ ni ce ji'izhin tshig bzlas
tsha brjod mod kyis// rgyal ba'i yon tan la sogs dpag yas la// bdag 'dra'i blos dbags tshig 'di 'khrul srid kyis// gang nongs bla ma yongs la brjod par gsol// byang chub dam pa'i rjes
mos pa 'i smon lam rdzogs so///rgya gar skad du/ agra tsAr+ya pran de nAn/ bod skad du/ mchog gi spyod pa 'osmon lam/ sangs rgyas dang byang/
ka rlubasems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// skye dgu kun la sman dang bde skad du// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas rnams la 'dud// de dag la rjod cing mchod par bgyi// 'gro kun byang chub
mchog la reg gyurag/ khyams pa dang ni'am dbalamanga' bdag rtog/ chos kyi blo gros dpa' bo bdud rtsi gsung// dpa' bo de dag phyag 'tshal mkhyen pa ltar// de bzhin bdag kyang mi dbang rnams la
'dud// thugs rjer ldazhing 'jig rtenadona mdzad pa'i// rgyal khami mkhyen gzigs m mnga' ba// mdebang thugs brtse byams la gnas pa yi// rgyal ba de kun bdag la dgongs su gsol// sngon gyi slob
pa dag tu bdag nyid kyis// sdig pa'i las rnams gang bgyis bdag gis bshags// de bzhin lus ngag yid kyis bgyis pa rnams// de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags// b+hA'akya thub dang mi
'khrugs 'od da pag med// de dag gisana'aphrin las yongs spangs dang// 'chags dang bshagasalA mkhyen cing grwa shags gyur ltar// de bzhin bdag gis sdig pa bshags par bgyi// thams cad dga'

mdzad skyes bu dam pa gang// byang chub zhugs pa kun la gsol ba 'tshag/ n gnas o nga bzhi bo myur du zhigyur cig/ ma khom 'dzoms par bgyid cing rgya bar shog/ sangs rgyas bzang spyodai da mnga' bdag dang//

de bzhin lhun po 'i debal dang ni ma sgron// dedag bsod nams la rang mkhyen pa ltar// de bzhin bdag kyang bsod nams rjes yi rang// phyogs bcu dgan sbyin pa spyod pa gang// de bzhin tshul khrims ting 'dzin/
spyod rnams dang/ shes rab sgom dang bsod nams stobs kun la// byang chub lon na don du yaM rang ngo// rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan mtha' las dang// chos bstan byang chub 'ajog bgyid

thams cad la// byang chub yon tanadend pa rang ngo// 'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig/ 'jig rten rgyal ba gang bzhugs kun la bskul// phyogs bcu dag na byang chub red pa gang// de dag tshangs brgyas/
jaltar gso la ba ltar// rgyal rnams bzhugs shing chos mchog ston gyur cig/ rgyal kun baskal pa mang por bzhugs par shig/ 'grekun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig/ mi rnams thams cad mchog dang
bla med pa// 'jig rten sgronam bdegashegasanur gyur cig/ sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal mchod gang dang// las dge rnams la yi rang gang lags dang// sdig pa'i las rnams bshags pa gang lags

dang rgyal ba rkang gnyis dbang mas mthong gang dang// bdag gis dge ba cung dzad ci bgyis pa// lus dang ngagadang sams las byung ba'ang rung// bdag gis bgyis dang bgyid par 'gyur pa gang// thams cad skyed

sman slad stsal bar bgyi// ji ltar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnam mkhyenanas// stsal ba legs par stsal cang legs rgyas pa// de bzhin bdag gis skye dgu sman slad stsal// 'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur
cig[0f10 ]bdag gis 'gro la stsal ba gang lags pa'i// bsod as 'bras bu thamedaci mchis pa// theg pa chen por yongs su bsngo par bagyi// bdag la byang chub 'bras bu 'grub par shog/ mtshungs pa mams
kun nas sgomo rnamag/ 'gro ba'idin du bdag la mngon sum shog/ 'jam dpal gyi na rjes su slob bgyid cing// byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam gdab par bgyi// mgacig tsam gyi ched du'angamanar med pa'i//
tshor ba thams cad bdag gsamyang 'gyur bar// bskal pa dumar bdag ni spro bar bgyi// 'gro ba thams cad mya ngan med par shog/ sems dmyal gshin rje 'jig rten sdug bsngal dang// dud 'gro'i gnas

rnams dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal dang// mi yi gnas rnams mi yi sdug bsngal dang// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal phung po mtha' yas dag/ bdag la bab gyur 'gro ba bde bar shog[]rgyal po rnams kyi zhing na cha ma dag
dang// sems can rnam dag de shes rnam dag dang// rgyal ba rnams kyi smon lam mtha' yas gling// smon lam de kun bdag la grub par shog/ bdag gi smon la ma nyams par ma gyur cig/ bdag ni nams
kyang skyo bar 'gyur shog/ byang chub mchogani ba dag gis thob par du// bskal pa du mar pa dag ni spro bar sheg/ mchog gi spyod pa'i smon lam rdzogasaso//rgya gar gyi mkhan po phradA
wan dang// zha chen gyi lo tsapa ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/2/ 'phags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzog

pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo kha/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhabasaM dang/ chos dang/ dge slong dege 'dun la ma ge bos phyag 'tshal 'o/ phyogs bzhu brjod kyis mi lang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhug
pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ sa chen po ra tshud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol// gang bdag gi skye ba 'di 'am/ skye ba gzhan du khyim
pa 'am/ rab tu byung bas phyitsam du 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ma 'tshal nas/ sdog pam dge ba'i las bgyis shing bsags pa lus dang/ ngagadang/ bde kyis bgyis pa dang/ bgyid du stsal ba dang/
bgyis pa la rjes su yi rang bar shes pa 'am mi shes pa'i m/ bsams pas/ ma bsams pa 'am/ dran pa 'am/ mi dran pa 'dod chags kyi dbang ngas/ zhe sdang gi dbang ngam/ gti
mug gi dbangangs dge ba'i bshes gnyenam lags pa dang 'brel ba'i da bang ngam/ ma shes pa'i dbang ngas yul gyi dbang ngas dus su skyes pa'id bang ngas/ yang dag par tshul khrims 'chal
ba 'am/ sbyor bas tshul khrims 'chal pa 'am dngos pos tshul khrims 'chal pa 'am/ lus kyi rnam gsum dang/ ngag gi rnam bzhi dang/ yade kyi rnam gsum gyis sangs rgyas dang/
ra ches dang/ dge 'dun rang pha ma dang/ mkhan po dang/ slob dpon nam/ bla ma gzhan dag la nyes pa bgyis pa 'am/ sems can gyi khams lta ba 'tshog pa la btsud pa 'am/ sems can
lang dag sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams kyi bar chad bgyis pa'i m/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams lag par bsngo bas yongs su bsngos pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dag pa ma yin pa smas pa 'am/
chos sa yon pa chos su bstan pa'i a/ chos chos ma yin par bstan pa 'am/ 'dul ba ma yin pa 'dul bar bstan pa'i m/ 'dul ba 'dul ba ma yin par bstan pa 'am/ las ma yin pa lam
du bstan pa 'am/ lam la mam yin par bstan pa 'am/ sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs nas bdag ma dag pa'i tshes mngon du 'gyur zhing/ dge ba'i phyogs la sems yang dag pa rami gnas pa
'am/ sgrib pa gnyanagyis bsangs nas/ blo galang bar 'gyuranga'anings pa gang lags pa de dag thamasacad nongs pa bshags par bgyi'o// ji ltar rus pa/ ji ltar thun pa/ ji ltar cha gsal ba/
ltar mi mkhas pa/ rje lta'achal pa'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin can/ de ltar nongs panangs par bshags par bgyi'o// nangos pa nos par bshags nas/ phyis sdom pa blangs shing la nga de ltar maM
bgyi ste/ de ltar lanaganyisade ltar lan gsum du'o// langasas rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag la dgongs su gsol gangasas rgyas thams cad sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa rnams
kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ brjod pa dang brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang shes rab kyis bla named pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor 'khorab tur skor// chos kyi dung kun nas bus/ chos kyi rnga rab tu brdungs/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad/
chos dang 'thun par chos bsgrub pa dag/ sems can gyi khams rab tu btsud/ dam pa 'i tshes kyi tshul rab tubastanatsang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis rang sangs rgyas rnams
ka1 rang sangs rgyas nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba dang dge ba'i rtsa ba ga nga gis nyanadzes rnams nyan thos nyid rtogs par 'gyur zhing/ rig pa gsum dang mngon par shes pa drug rtogs par 'gyur ba dang
so so yang dag par rig ba mngon du 'gyur zhing/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ tang 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang
gis sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skyo gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten ngan song ngan gre 'go par ltang las yang dag par 'da' ba dang/ 'dod chags dang/
zhe sdang dang/ gtamug nyon mongs pa dang/ nye ba'i nyin mo ngas pa song ba dang/ tshe ring ba dang gnod pa chung bar ng/ mdog bzang ba dang/ gzugs bzang ba dang/ gatha brjid che ba
dang/ dbang che ba dang/ rigs mtho ba dang/ langs song che ba dang/ shes rab che ba dang/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sangs pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang/
tha ma phyag gcig 'tshal ba dang/ thal mo gcig sbyor ba dang/ ma rtogogatsag 'bul ba dang/ soms dang ba gcig tsam bskyed pa'i sems can gang la gas pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi
bang sku/ rjes su ma rang ba'i mtsheg gis rjes su yi rang// gtso bo dang/ dam pa dang/ rab dang/ khul dang/ bla na ma mchis pa dang/ gongan ma mchis pa dang/ gong ma'i yang gong
mdang ma nyam pa ma mchis pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang/ nam mkha' ltar dag cing yongs su dag pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ngo//
gang dag khags chos thams cad yang dag par thugs su chudanas/ chos la dgos pa dang/ chos la nges pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyod pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa dang/
