yon thams cad yongs su sbyong zhing yongs susngo ba dang/ chos kyi phung po stong phrag kun dang/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang dpenge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams
cad dang/ dam bcas pa dang/ sog ma dang/ zag pa zad pa shes pa dang/ ston pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang bzhin shes pa yang dag par thugs su chud nas
kyang sems can gyi khams bka' blom pa de bar mkhyen nas/ thugs khral chung dur thugs 'jog par mdzad cing/ chos ston par ma mdzad pa de dag la bdag bskul ma 'debs te/ skye bo mang po la
sman pa dang/ skye bo mang bo la bdeb dang/ 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang/ skye bo'i tshogs mang bo'i don dang/ lha dang mi rnams la sman pa dang/ bde ba'i slad du dam pa'i tshes bshad du gso la/
tshes kyi 'ber la 'og tu bskor du gsol/ tshes kyi dung kun s 'bud du gsol// chos kyi rnga brdung du gsol/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad du gsol chos dang 'thun/
ka1bar chos sgrub pa dag la sems can gyi khams rab tu dgad du gsol// gang dag tshe la dbang po// sprul pa la dbang ba/ byin gyi rlobs la dbang ba/ rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba/ sems can 'dul ba'i/
tshogs sman par mdzad pa dbang du gyur pa dang/ dbang du ma gyur pa rnams la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar thugs gzhol zhing/ sku tshe 'dor bar mdzad pa de dag la bdag gsol ba 'debs te skye bo

mang po la sman pa dang/ skye bo mang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang/ skye bo'i tshigs mang po 'dzin dang lha dang mo rnams la sman pa dang/ bde ba'i slad du sku tshe'i 'du byed rnams/
byin gyis brlab tu gsol// gang ba dag gis 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ma 'tshal ba nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis shing bsags pa/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyis bgyis pa dang/ bgyid du/
stsal ba dang/ bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang/ tshul khrims las byung ba dang/ bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang/
than sems can gcig gi sams gcig gis sems dang ba gcig tsam bskyod par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngopar bgyi'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'disasan+ta
can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad los su rdzogs par gyur cig/ tshe ring ba dang/ gnod pa chung ba dang/ mdog bzang ba dang/ gzugs bzang ba dang/ gzi brjid che ba dang/ dbang/
tshab dang/ rigasamatheb dang/ 'khos spyod che ba dang/ shes rab che bdang/ rdzas dang/ sngags dang/ smanared ba dang/ geba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang/ dam pa'i chos nyan pa
dang/ tshulakhazhin yod la byed pa dang/ chos dang 'thunuba'i chos grub pa dang/ 'dod chags dang/ zhesdang dang/ gti mug nyon mongs pa dang/ rna ba'i nyon mongs pa slong ba dang/ sems
can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'askyo gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rtenan gnas ong ngan 'gro log par ltung ba las lang dag par 'da' ba dang/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge
'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad thob pa dang/ lus las byung ba dang/ sams las byung ba'i yid mi bde ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang/ bde ba dang/ yid bde ba
thams cad 'thob pa dang/ nyan thos kyi lonatanabya mchog nyid dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi mchog nyid dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/
so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi tshesama'adres pa bco brgyad dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ dga' ba chen po dang/ btang snyoms chen po dang/
chu@#// bag chags 'joms pa dang/ bsal mamanga' ba'achos nyid dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang/ ye shes ma zad pa nyid dang/
ka 1 shes rab mi zad pa nyid dang sobs pa ma zad pa nyid dang/ bsod nams ma zad pa nyid dang/ nam ma kha'amadzod nyid dang/ lagan rin po che nyid dang/ ban med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
ye shes 'thob pa dang/ gzhan yang 'jig rten dang/ 'a rten las 'das pa 'dage ba'i rtsa ba gang la gas pa de dag/ sems can thams cad la yang dag par grub par gyur cig/ gang
sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba bgyis pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos pa de las bsod nams kyi'adras bu yod pa gang lags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'asi/ bdag blan med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can m rgyal ba rnams ni bsgral bar bgyi'o// ma grol ba rnams ni dgrel bar bgyi'o// dbugs ma phyin pa rnams
nadabugs dbyung bar bgyi'o// mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams mya ngan las bzla bar bgyi'o// sman pa dang bde ba'i mtha'i gnas kyi gzhi la rab tu dgod par bgyi ste/ de ltar lan gnyis de ltar
lan gsum du'o// 'phags pa bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo ba rdzogs so//
[2/]'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i longs su bsngo ba// sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/
byang chub sems dang bsems dang 'chen po thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags so// bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo// sangs rgyas
thams cad la gsol ba 'debs so// bsod nams thams cad sems can thams cad kyis bran med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bgyi khe'i slad du yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// bden pa dang

bden pa'i tshig gis bden pa gsung ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgel ba rtsa ba yang dag kha ji ltar yongs su bsngo bar mdzad pa de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des gang
sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa tshadage ba nyes pa byas pa dang/ lag par smras pa dang/ ngan du bsams pa dang 'onamongs pa'i sgrib pa dang las kyi sgrib pa dang/ rnam par smin pa 'i sgob
pa dang/ shes bya'i sgrib pa dang/ sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs shing g.yos/sa te/ kun nas dkris pa bdag nyid dang/ gzhan dgags bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang/ khams dang/ rang
bzhin la nga dag par ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal ba dang/ dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi rim pa dang/ dge ba dang/ mi dge ba'i chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhinam 'tshal ba dang/ khan ma tho ba dang
bcas pa dang/ kho nam tho ba med pa dang/ bsten par bya bdang/ bstan bar bya ba ma yAn pa'i chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhinam 'tshal ba dang skyes bu dam pa dang 'phrad/
ba dang/ a pa'i chos nyan pa dang/ tshul bzhin yod la bgyid pa dang/ chos dang 'thun pa'i chos sgrub ba tsha sgrub par 'gyur ba dang/ sgrib pa ga nga gis bsgribs shing g.yogs te/ kun nas/
dkris ba rnams sems can 'dul ba dang/ bdag 'dul ba dang/ gzhan 'dul ba dang/ gnyis ka 'dul ba dang/ 'jam pos 'dul ba dang khri bas 'dul ba dang/ ba dang snyoms
sgyu kyis 'dul ba dang/ bsdigs pas 'dul ba dang/ bskrad pas 'dul ba dang/ smod pas 'dul ba dang/ bstan pa dang/ bsnyen pa dang/ bsnyen bkur byas pas 'dul ba dang/ chos
bshad pas 'dul ba dang/ 'dzum bstan pas 'dul ba dang/ nang du yang dag 'dzeg gis 'dul ba dang/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo khyad bsnyangs pas 'dul ba dang/ sbyin pa dang/ tshang/
khrims dang/ bzed pa dang [ ]brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pas 'dul ba dang/ dang pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ thes pa dang/
gtong ba dang/ shes rab dang/ sgom pas 'dul ba dang/ 'dul ba gang dang gang gis/ sems can gyi khams 'dul bar 'gyur ba de lang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal ba dang/ tshul
mas kyi rgyu ma'i byung ba dang/ ri de 'dzin gyi rgyu dang/ dmigs pa 'i rgyu dang/ bsam gtan gyi rgyu dang/ zhi gnas kyi rgya dang/ lhag ma thang gi rgyu rang/ mngon par shes pa'i rgyu dang/
zag pa zad pa'i rgyudang/ so so yang dag par ga la 'i rgyu rnams rnam par dag par mi 'gyur ba dang/ bsam gtanadang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa mngon/
dusaM'agyur pa dang/ snang ba skyes shing skyes pa de dag nub par 'gyur ba dang/ rnyed pa 'dod pa dang/ bsnyen bkur 'dod pa dang/ grogs pa 'dod pa dang/ 'khor 'dod pa'i sems 'byung ba
dang 'dod pa ba rnam par rtog pa dang/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang/ 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang/ mi 'chi ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang/ rgya lo rnam par rtog pa dang/ gnyen la rnam
par rtog pa dang/ gas dang/ thas dang/ mal stan dang/ na ba'i gsos smanagyi rkyen gyi lo khyad la rnam par rtog pas mas la kun nas gnas pa dang/ tshe thung pa dang/ gnod ba mang ba dang//
mdog ngan pa dang/ gzugs ngan pa dang/ dbang chung ba dang/ rigs dma' ba dang/ longs spyod chung ba dang/ shes rab 'chal pa dang/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skyi
gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ ngan song ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang/ lus las byung ba'i sdug bsngal rnam pa du ma dang/ sems las byung ba'i lo rim bde ba nyams su myong ba dang
smon lam log pa la dga' ba dang/ yang dag pa'i smon lam ma rtogs pa dang/ gzhan yang sgrib pa gang dang gang gis bsgribs sha/ kun nas dkris pa'i sems can
kha1 rnams kyis rnam par sman bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bdag la sminanas/ sems can thams cad rnam par grol zhing/ rnam par dag par gyuracig/ sangs rgyas kyi khams ji tsam pa dang/
chos kyi khams tsam pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi 'o mas ji tsam pa dang/ la ngadog pa 'amatho' ji tsam pa dang/ gnyis su med pa dzatsem pa dang/ de bzhin nyid ji tsam pa dang mnyam pa nyid ji tsam pa dang
'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gi khams ji tsam pa dang/ 'khor bar dogs pa dang/ 'degs par 'gyur ba'i ji tsam ba de tsam du sems can thams cad kyi chen mongs pa dang//
ltaba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i khams gang yin pa de bdag 'a sAn nas sems can thams cad rnam par grol zhing/ rnam par dag par gyur cig bdag gis ji tsam
ra du sngon gyi mtha' ma 'tshal ba dge ba'i rtsa ba bgyis shing/ bsags pa bang lags pa de sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// bdag ni 'dod chags 'ag chags/ zhe sdang gis gdungs//
gti mug gas rmongs te/ nyon mongs pa dang/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang ldan nas/ ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba los su bgro bar bgyi ba ba nga dag ba ji lta ba bzhin ma 'tshal

ma mthong/ ma rig ste// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mkhyen cing gzigs la thugs su chud pas rdza ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba mdzad pa de ltar bdag gis longs su bsngo bar bgyi'i/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i thugs dang 'thun par yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// ji ltar sems can 'dul ba dang/ ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa basmanupa dang/ joltaredage ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'bal ba dang/ ji ltar sdug bsngal
shis pa dang/ kun 'byung ba slong ba dang/ 'gog pa mngon du bya ba dang/ lam sgom pa dang/ blan med pa khams cad mkhyen pa'i yi shes 'thob pa dang/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cades ng ba dang/
dge ba'i rtsa ba rngams cad ldan pa dang/ bag chags 'joms pa dang/ bsel bam 'ba'i chos nyid dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dzaltar 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/

daltar byung ba 'a sangs rgyas sngon byang chub sems dbar gyur pa thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba los su bsngos pa de bzhin/ bdag gis longs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// mnyam pa nyid kyis lo ngas su bsngo ba dang/
gzhis suid las yongs su bsngoladang/ 'grol thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i longasasubastobs yongs su bsngo bar bgyi ste/ de ltar lan gnyis re ltar lan gsum du'o// sems can gang zhig gang
dang gang gis 'dul khar 'gyur ba de dang de'isimasa rnam par rtog pa med pas/ bdag mthong par 'gyur zhing/ rdzoltaji ltar sems can dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdag gis lus kyi las dang/ ngag gi
rnalas dang/ yid kyi las rtag tu 'jug par gyur cig/ dus ji lta ba dang/ lul ji lta ba dang// sems can rnams kyi 'dul ba ji lta ba de lta de ltar chos kyidabyings 'khrugs
[n ]pa med par ston par gyur cig/ 'phags pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i yongs su bsngo pa rdzogs so//ka rgyagar gyi mkhan po bdu ka ra pra b+ha dang/
lotsa ba ban de yeThashes snying pos bsgyur/ zhu chen gyi le tsa ba banad+dedang la btsugs kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa// na bod skad du/ rdo rje rgyal

mtshan gyi yongs su bsngo ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems da pa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal 'gro/ rgyu dang ma rgyu'i 'jig rtenasman slad du// byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur dang da ltar gyi// rang byung thub dbang
jugs rje ldan rnams la// bdag gis bdag kun btud nas phyag 'tshal la// tshogs dang zhe sdang gti mug dbang gis ni// bdag gis lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// srid pa nyam ngar sdig pa ci sag
pa sdig kha de kun so sor bshags par bgyi// de bzhin gshegs kyi bsod nams mdzod ge nga dang/ byang chub sems dpa' las byang bsod nams dang// gang yang nyan thos rkyen gyi theg can dang// 'jig

rten bsod nams de la yi rang ngo// byang chub snying por thog mar ga ngasangs rgyas// pad+ma rgyas pa'i spyan 'dra spyan mnga' ba// sangs rgyas zlamed mtha' yas de dag la// chos kyi 'khor la dam pa bskor
bar bskul// phung po ma lus sku ngan 'das dbyings su// gshegs par gang bzheng ma dang lha yi lha// mgon po de dag ji srid sman slad du// bzhugs dang sangs rgyas sku don mdzad pa ragasol/
phyag 'tsho'i kha dang bshags pa'i bsod nams dang// bskul pa dang ni gsol ba btab pa dang// de bzhin la rang bsod nams ci bsags pa// byang chub dam pa mchogatu bsngo bar bgyi// bdag gis
bsod nams dam pa 'dis rtag tu// byang chub sems na brjod par ma gyuracig/ rtag tu sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// dge ba'i bshes rnams mnyes par byed gyur cig/ ma lem

gnod pa brgyad po slong bar shog/ brjod dang ldan zhingamtshan gyis lus brgyan dang// rtag tu skye dran sems ni ma rmongs dang// rang des pha rol phyin pa brtson gyur cig dbang phyag ma brje chos kyi ngabang
tsug dang gson tan 'byung gde'agyur med shog// g.yog 'khor mang po 'thun par ldan pa dang// bsam pa 'thun zhing rgya cher dag gyur cig/ bsod nams ma thad rnam dag blo dang ldano// cho ga yon tan dag
la dga' bar shogo/ bsam gtana mngon shes soso yang dag rig/ dbang bcudag la bdag dbang byed gyur cig/ byang chub soms dpa' gang dag lam rdzogs la// de dag sangs rgyas go 'phang myur
thob shog/ de la gang dag lam kun mardzogs pa//de dag tshogs kyis redapa red gyur cig/sems na thams cad ban med pa yaM//byang chub tu nasmon lam myur 'debs shog de la dam bcas pas na be rtan gyur
cing/ byang chub thob mnaden gzhan byed ma gyur// lus kun dbang po dag pas rab rgyas shing// nad med rims nad med cing mngon bral// tshor zhi dang sgra ni yid 'ong ldan//
sdig las zlog cingedag la 'jug gyur cig/ ser sna bral zhing zang zing medachos kyis// rtag tu phan tshun phan 'dogs byed par shog/ gzhan du snying rje che dang ldan gyur nas// 'dod pa mi mnga' ba de
bar gshegs gyuracig/ 'gro bsdug bsngal bying la lan bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub slanameda mchog tu// rdo rjergyal mtshan yongs bsngo rgyal po la// nges norang gi bsod nams yongs su bsngo
bde gshegs kun tu bzang dang akhyen pa dag/ kun bzang bo bsdodage dza lta bar// de bzhin bdag kyang kun tu bzang spyodadang// rgyal ba dam pa kumAtubazang por shog/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su
[p?]// rgya gar skad du/ Asu yan gA tha/ bodoskad du/ bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag
'tshel ko/ wa zhig lta bar 'ongosanas su/ 'jig rtenamagon la zhus byas to// gangags kun tu bde legs 'gyur// bdag zhus btsamo ldan bka 'astsal gsol// de yatshog degasan gyur nas//
'jig rten 'dren pas bka'astsal pa// gangags kun bade legs 'gyur// de nawa khyod legs pa nyon// gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang// g.yo ba med cing rab brtan dang// gang gis tshul khrims
[zo/]dge gyur pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig pa dang ma dang bu// chung ma de bzhin mngag ga zhug la// rtag tu rim gro legs byas pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig rtag tu
dgra bcom la// yon rnams shin tu brtan byas dang// lha rnams la yang bya bsgo ba// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig lus dang ngag dang ni// yid kyis nyes pa byas med cing// gang
zhig gnas gsum bsdams gyur pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig 'byung po thams cad la// byams pa sems nir pa bsgoms shing// dpag tu med la mi 'khrugs pa// de la
kun tu bde legs 'gyur// sdug bsngal thams cad spang pa'i phyir// bde ba 'thob byed 'gas pa'i lam// yan lag brgyad pa sus bsgoms pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// 'du byed
thams cad stong nyid du// gang gis rtag tu rab mthong zhing// der yang sems can gnas gyur pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// gang dag drim med chos rnams// lus kyise mngon sum byas nas spyang
dgrwa bcos rnam par grol sems rnams// de dag rtag tu bde legs 'gyur// gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang dang// ma rig pa yang rnam spangs dang// shes pa ma 'jigs skyes gyur pa// de la
kun tu bde legs 'gyur// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten mgon// yang sride zad pa'i s ngas rgyas kyis// gang la khong du chud mdzad pa// de la kun tu bde legs 'gyur// bde legs su
'gyurapa'i tshigs su bcad pa rdzogasaso// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzazhin tudang/ su len dra bo dIring/ zhu chen gyi le tsa ba brje le shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus tegatan
[DI?]la khag ba///// rgyagar skad du/ sAn+ti grwa tha/ bod skadadu/ bde legs kyi tshog su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// rtswa zhig te
bar 'osanas su// lcasamachod pa la zhus byas te// sangs rgyas chen po thub pa chon// cazhigisan bde legs 'gyur// lha yi tshig de gsan gyur nas// 'jig rten rtsa lag bka' stsal pa//
gang gis rtag tu rjod byed la// nga la bde legs 'gyur de nyon// 'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dang mthe ses na// nachen rgya chen mchog na gang yod pa// de ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen lag/
cis kyang grangs dang bgrang dang char a lod// mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rtena mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden ma chog na// bden
tshopa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog/ zhi 'gog bdud rtsi shan tu gya nom gang// shAkya thub pasamanyam gzhag thugs chud la// chos de dang na enus pa yodaan te// de mngon byas
yin phyin chad mya nganamed// ngamatshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dam pa'i chos kyis rin chen 'jig rtena mchog/ thaltar nga 'a'adi de bzhin bden mchogan bden pa 'dis rishin tu bde legs/
shog/ rgyal bas gang dag gang zagabargyad gsungs pa// de dag rnams ni skyes bu zung bzhi ste// sbyin gnas de dag sa steng shin tu dkon// de dag rnams la byin na da ga med 'gyur// ngomatshar
shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dge 'dun zhe chen ga ngazhig 'gi rtena mchog/ ji ltar ng 'di de bzhin bden mchogan// bden pa 'dis shin tu bde legs shog/ dam pa gtso bo mchog sbyin gya nom
ga 'od a tshog ba' bdas pa mchog gas 'os// shes rab dam pa chos kyis dam kha mchog/ mchogaman mchog mkhyen 'dun bcom ldan cig/ ngomatshar shan tu rmad byung dpag med de//
rdzogs pa sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rtena mchog/ jaltar nga'i 'du de bzhin bdena mchog na// bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog tange 'dzin dam pa bar chad med pa gang// mtha'
yas blo ldan de bzhin gshegs gsungs pa// nga 'dzin de brtan rdo rje dper byas pa/ ting 'dzan de dang mtshungs pa'i ting 'dzin med// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// ting nge
'dzin gyi achen 'jig rtena mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di di bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dasani shin tu bde legs shog/ ji ltar sgo gtan po rnyan zhing rab dam ste// stobs chen
rlung bzhi dag gsam bskyod pa// de ltar mkhas pa gzhi mthong bden gnas pa'i ng// 'jig rten sa ba rnams kyis 'dir mi g.yos// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dge 'dun
chen gang zhig 'jig rtena mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'didi bzhin bden mtshegan// bden pa 'das nishAn tu bde legs shog/ thams cad thal gnon kun mkhyen thams cad
gzigs// thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs rnams kun dang ldan/ kun gyi deb ma 'gas la kun dang bral// bsam pa kun a khyen 'di nangecom ldan cig/ ngomatshar shin tu rmad byung
zla dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nichen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar ng 'a 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden pa 'dis shane bde legs shog/ srid pa 'gog cing mi g.yo
'gyur pa med// skyon med 'jigs pa kun lasa rnam par grol// shin tu dkon zhing gya nom nges par 'byung// shin tu drisodazhi ba blos mi 'phrogs// ngomatshar shin tu rmad byung dpagamedade//
dam pa 'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rtena mchog/ ji ltar ng 'a'i de bzhin bden mchogan// bden pa 'dusan hanitu bde legs shog/ shin tu sdug bsngal ston cing bde spyan pa 'di// 'dren rnams mthong/
su gang dgabag yod cing// bden pa rin chen rnams la dogs bral ba// de dag skye ba brgyad pa phyis mi len// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// dge 'dun rini chen gang zhige 'jage rten mchog/
ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bdenaachogan// bden pa 'das na shin tubade legs shig/ dam pa rnams kyi dem pa don dmamkhyen// mchog dang mchog min mkhyen cing don dam brtse gas/ gzhan gyis
ma 'phrogs dam pa thugs chud rtogs// shin tu sdug bsngal rnams kyis dpung gnyen mchog/ ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'joge rten rin chen mchog/ ji ltar nga'i
'di de bzhin bdena mchog na// bden pa 'disan shin tu bde legasangashog/ 'dun pa skyes nas rnal 'byor ldan gyur cing/ gi don bstan la rtag brtson rab grol zhing// gzhan gyis mi dkrol dgazhi der

rig/ 'di la der reg grangs su phyin mi 'gyur/ dngamatshar shin tu rmad byung dpagamed de// dge 'dun gang zhing 'jig rten rin chen mchog/ ji ltar ng 'di de bzhin bdena mchog na/pa den pa 'dis/shin tu de legs

shog/bden pa mthengab brjod pa sa brgya lam na/gal te sdig pa 'ba' zhig byas gyur cing/ de ni de chab ba ya'is man te//chos nyade 'dan ma g.yo gnas phyi'i ro//ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/dge 'dun rin

chen gang zhig 'jig rtenaachog/ ji ltar nga'i 'dodi bzhin bdena mchog na//bden pa 'disani shin tu bde legs shog/lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad na//sangs rgyas dang na lag pa 'am mtshungs pa med//lha dang

sa ya ston pa bla na med/ ston pa ded dpon sman pa rnams kyi mchog/ ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag medade// rdzog pas nags rgyas rin chen 'jig rtena mchog/ji ltar nga'i 'di di bzhin bdena mchog na//bden 'dase

narigaMn tu bde legs shog/ sos ka'i zla ba dang por thub pa yis// nags khrod chos kyi dam pa gang gsungs pa// chos de dang ni mtshungs pa'i m lhag pa med// 'di la der regagrangs su phyin m 'brang// ngo/
mtshan shin tu rmad khyung dpag med de// dam pa'i chos kyi don chen 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga 'a 'di de bzhin bden mchog na// bden ma 'das rishin tu bde legs shog
[7 ]sgrig pa rang zad gsaradu byas zhed na// rimasand yod cing 'jig med mya ngan bral// srid pa 'gags pas rtsa ba ma skyod pa// brten pa mar me bzhin du 'bar bar 'gyur// ngo mtshar shin tu rmad
byung dpa gamed de// dge 'dun rin chen ga nga zhig 'jig rten mchog/ ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bdena mchog na// bden pa 'dis na shin tu bde legs shig/ bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pardzog
tsA// rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsa ta thAg ta mang gal gA tho/ bod skad du/ de bzhinagshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis kyi tshogs su bcad pa// dkon mchog gsum
la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par snang mdzad ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan// zla ba nya 'dra'asku mnga'asrid pa'i mthar phyin pa// dgengs pa mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des
nAskye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid dang gti mug rnam sbyongs// mgon po yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa'i bkra shis pa// dge mnyam bsam sems ldan pa'i bkra shis gang

yin pa//bkra shas des n skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ yon tan sangs rgyas lon tan kun gyi rgyan gyis brgyana mdzad pa/ dam nga dag bden pa'i 'byor pa sbyin mdzad mi bslu ba// rin chen 'byung gnas zhes

bya'il krar shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des na skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/bsam gtan ting 'dzin dam pa pha rol phyin pa'i gnas// ye shes pad+ma'i steng bzhugs nang gam da tshe ldan zhing/ tshe grangs med
par byin gyis brlabs pa'i bkra shis gang/ bkra shis des na skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ sems can don gyi las la thugs na spyir mdzad cing/ 'gro ba kun gyi 'ching bas bcings las grol mdzad pa/
thub mchog don yod grub kyi bkra shis gang yin pa//bkra shis des n skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkrashis tshig su bcad pa rdzogasaso////

dam pa tog dkar dga' ldan pho brang dam pa ru/ma pham mgon la rgyal tshab dam par dbang bskur zhang/ 'dzam gling nyid du glang chen thal kar ltar gshegs gang//bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dare ba de leg/

shog/ rgyal po 'i khab kyi grong khyer dam pa zas gtsang sras// bud med skyon bral g.yo sgyu sas pa lcamadzes yum/lcamasu zla bcur blo gros ldan pa shAkya'i rig/ bkra shas dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde
legs shog/ lcam pa'i tshal ni dben zhing nyams dga' blag sha'i// yal gnas lozung bltams gyur tshangs dang brgya byin 'dud// mkha' la gshegs te phyogs bcur pad+ma 'byung 'gyur gang// bkra
shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ gzhal med khang mdzes drang srong dam pa'i mdun bzhag nas// mtshan ltas shis pa brjod de ston pa byung gyur pa shAku rig bud med 'khor ldan kun 'dus/
rgyan btags gang// bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/gzhon nu'i stobs ni sgyu rtsal yig sa 'khong lasan/ kun las mthar byung lta ma la sogs tun pas achog/

skashakya'i gis 'khrungs log rtog bsal ba'i btsun mo'i 'khor// bkra shase dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ kho brang nas byung na nad 'chi ba las byung gzagrem rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags dur
sgrig gosanams khul/ srid gsum dag las rgal phyir mthonamathing dbu skra bregs// bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ lca rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags dur smrig gos rnams lul//

nir lam chubor dka'athubam lus rdzogs// thub pa bsam gtan nas bzhengs bkra shis 'o thug gsol// bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/pad+mo las byang khya mchog byang chub shing drung du/

skyel me krung bcasam galo mchog gas bdud btulanas// tho rangs bdud rtsi mi 'gyur khun tshogs sangs rgyas pa// bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dire bde legangashog/ wAr Na sir chos kyi 'khor lo mgon pos
bsor// ku shes la sogs bden bzhi lo lnga bzang la bstan// lha klu lcamin la sogasam tshan pa dud 'gyur gang// bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ nga rgyal bsnyams par ldan pa'i

ston pa drug btul zhing// glang chen rab myos mi bzad las byin gyis ched btul// drang srong mchog la spre'u rgyal cang shes sbrang rtsi mchod// bkra shis dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ pad+mo
gzhon nu lta bu mtshan ldan shAkya'i rigs// zas gtsang sras su rgyal rigs 'khor la sgyur rgyal bltams/bltams pa nas bzung sA la'i tshal du ma lus rdzog/bkra shas dam pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs/
shog/ byams pa'i stobs kyis 'gro ba ma lus sgrol mdzad cing// sems can mtha' yas zhi bde lam la rab bkod nas// grong khyer rtswa mchog dam par dgos nga yongs rdzogs dang/ bkra shis

ram pa des kyang deng 'dir bde legs shog/ bcom ldan rnam par gzigs na rgyal rigs gzi brjid can// tshe lo brgyad khri'i dusan khreng khyer nyeldan du//pa to la yang shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa//

deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phunasumatshogs gyur cig/ bde gshegs gtsug tor anga' ba rgyal rigs rdzu 'phrul can/tshe lo bdun khri'i dus na kana'i grong khyer// shang mchog sen 'di' shonge dung mngon

parasangs rgyas pa/ deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cage/ rgyal ba thams cad skyob ba'i rgyal rigs blo gros can//tshe lo drug khri'i dusan grong khyer ama medadu/ shing mchog sA la rishade/

drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'di'i bde gshegs bkangashas phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ thub pa 'khor ba 'jig na stobs ldan bram ze'i rigs/ tshe lo bzhi khri'i dus na grong khyer bde ldan du/ sha ri sha ya

shang dung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'direbadagshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyuratsago/ 'dren pa gser thub bslab pa mchog ldan bram ze'i rigu/tshe lo sum khri'i dusan grong khyer mdzes ldan du
u dum wa ra'i shing drung mngon pa sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ skyob pa 'od srungs rgyal rigs bla med yon tan can// tshe 'a nyi

khra'i dus nagrong khyer wA ra Na ga ru// n+ya gro d+ha ya shing drunga mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'di'i bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ 'gro mgon shAkya thub pa rgyal rigs brtson 'grus can//

phab+hU tshe lo brgya pa'i dus na ser skya'i grong khyer du// a pashAt+ma yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa// deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig/ phun sum tshogs pa/mnga' dbang gsa' phyir ba

'dra 'jig rtan gasum gyi mgon po dril gsum spangs nga// sangs rgyas pa rmi rgyus pa'i 'dab 'dra'i spyan mang ra ra// dkra shis des ni skye dgu shrI byed dang po'o// de yas nye bar bstan pa'i mchog 'bam/

g.yo da// 'jig rtenagasum na grags shing lha dang mes mchod pa// chos mchog dam ba skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa// 'di ni 'jig rten dag pa'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o// dge 'dun dam pa'i chos ldan thos pa'i
bkra shis phug/ ma deng lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa ' gnas // tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal kyi zhing// 'di ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa'o// che ba'i che mchog ston
mchog bla na med// chos rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i byin rlabs kyis// bgegs dang bdud rtsis gnod pa 'i dgra zhi ste/ rtag tu dpa la gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ chos nyid bden pa'i chos mchog bla na/
mad[]dam chos bdud rtsi'i bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis// nyon mongs sdug bsngal gdung ba'i dgra zhi ste/ rtag tu dpatsha gnas niyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ dge 'dun yon tan ni chen dpal
'ba' ba// rgyal sras dan mdzad bden pa 'i byin rlabs kyis// nyos pa'i skyon ni dge tshogs rnam par 'al// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ tshangs dang lha dar de srungs/
ma'i byin rlabs kyis/ na mdzad lha ya bkra shis gnas gyur te// bde legs bsam pa yid bzhin grub pa dang// tshe ring nad med bde skyid ldan par shog/
oMswa ste/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas gtso la len tan mchog mnga' zhing// che dgus mchod cing smon lam sprin tshogs 'dus/ dge 'phang ston pa chos kyi char babs pa/

bkra shis des kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ skyob pa'i chos la legs pa'i tshogs mnga' zhing// shin tu phan dang bde dang nges gsung pa// 'khor ba rtag bde mya ngan med 'thob pa'i// bkra shis des
kyang skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ dge 'dun cha la mthu rtsal rmad mnga' zhing/ bsang gzhalegs bcas brtson pa'i rnal 'byor can// bdag gzhan don chen sgrub pa'i lam zhugs ra// bkra shis des kyang
rgya dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ dge ba 'di yis skye bo kun// bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags te// bsod nams ye shes las byung ba// dam pa gnyis ni thob par shog/ sems can thams cad m lus
ra sa rab dga' ba thob bar du// rtag tu tshe rabs dran pa dang// rab tu 'byung ba thob par shog/ bkra shis par gyur cig/
rgya gar skad du/ rat+na tra ya sAste bag sku/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bde legs kyi tshigs su bcar pa// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas gtso
la yon tan mchog mnga' ba// che dgus mchod cing smon 'a ma sbyin tshogs 'dus// ge'aphang mchog brnyes bstod pa 'i char 'bab pa'i/ bkra shis dam pa des 'di'i thad legs shog/ skyob
pa'i chos la legs pa'i tshogs mnga' ba// shin tu phan dang da de dang nges gzung ba// 'khor ba rtag bde mya ngan 'das thob pa'i// bkra shis dam pa des 'di'i bde legs shog/ dge
'dun che la mthu dpal rmad mnga' ba// bslabakan legs bcas brtson pa'i rnal 'byor can// bdag gzhan don chen bsgrub pa'i lam zhugs pa'i// bkra shas dam pa sa 'du'i
bad legs shog/ le brgya 'tsho zhang ston brgya mthong ba dang// rang ba dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang// theg pa mchog gis nges par 'byung 'gyur ba/ lnga po dus
kyang bdag la srung gyur cig/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so//
'dir smras pa/ ma smad snying stobs rdo rje'i go cha yi sa// rtsod ldan 'gro ba sgrol bar zhal 'chesashing// rnam 'dren stong gi dbus na
pad dkar ltar// yongs bsngags ston mchog zas gtsang sras po yis// mi ri ga 'jigs dam bca' bzhi ldan seng+ga'i sgra// chos tshul rgya mtsho'i gdangs su nyer 'khrol
ba// gangs can yi ge'i gzugs su legs 'phos pa'i// glegs bam brgya rgya phrag gcig dang dgu yi grangs// ris med 'gro la phan bde'i gsos sman du//
ci dgar 'gyed slad dag gsal dpar gyi 'phrul// bskrun pa'i rnam dkar 'dis mtshon dus gsum du// bsags pa'i dge tshogs zla gzhon 'bum 'dra des// ras med thub bstan
dpag bsam yongs 'du'i shing// bshad dang sgrub pa'i yal ga phyogs kyi mthar// yongs khyab gtan bde'i grib bsil rtag 'bebs pas// 'gro kun ngal gso'i dbugs dbyungs
thob par shog/ mkhas dang grub pa'i bstan 'dzin skyes mchog kun// zhabs zung g.yung drung ngo bor lhun chags shing// gzhan phan 'phrin las nyin byed stong gi gze// rnam par grol
ba'i dge mtshan rab gsal shog/ bslab gsum sbrang rtsi'i bcud kyis rab gtams pa'i// shAkya'i sras po rig grol 'dab brgya'i tshal// klog spong ge saradagod pa'i so phreng gi/
'dzum dkar 'dzam gling rgyan du rtag mdzes shog/ yangs pa'i 'jig rten khyon du bde legasakyi// rdzogs ldan dpyid kyi dpal yon sngag gum// phun tshogs sde bzhi'i lang tsho rab dar ba'i//
ngo mtshar kun dge'i dus ston yongs khyab shog/ tshul 'dir 'bad pa'i dge tshogs nyal 'gro'i rgyun// rgyal srasasmon pa'i chu klung 'bum phrag dang// lhan cig byang chen rgya mtshor rab
gzhol te// khams gsum srid pa'i gdung ba kun selashog///ces pa 'di yang sngon la dwags rgyal po nyi ma rnam rgyal gyi dus su rgyal po'i bka' bzhin bka' blon bsod nams lhun
grub kyis dbus phyogs lha bo 'brug bstan chos slong nas rgyal ba'i bka' 'gyur rin po che gangan drangs shing/ de la ma dper byas te bka' 'gyur pod grangs brgya dang dgu byas pa zhig gsar
bzhengs mdzad pa de bzhin bka' 'gyur dpar gsar khag gzhan dang chos tshan bsgrigs stangs dang/ brda gsar rnying sogs tshig sna mi 'dra ba dang/ pod kyi grangs tha dad lta bur 'dug pa
der phyi mi mkhas pa 'ga' zhig gis do snang ci che byed bzhin par brten bstan rgyan la'ang phan rlabs che bar mthong ste/ mdape'i bdag po la dwags rgyal po kun bzang rnam rgyal mchog dang/
rgyalam bde skyid dbang mo rnam gnyis la snyan bskul zhus don ltar ma dpa bris ma bris tshugs spus legs 'di nyid g.yar poskyabs 'jug don smin son pa bzhin/ la dwags ta ru gser
mgar pa tshe brtan rnam rgyal pas phyi lo 1975 lor 'go 'dzugs zhus te da lam phyi lo 1980 tham pa'i lor mjug rdzogs par dpar pa
bskrun bgyis pa'i dge tshogs byang chen gyi rgyur smin phyir smon tshig 'di 'dra zhig brtsams dgos zhes bskul ba ltar/ yongs 'dzin dga' ldan khri byang sprul ming blo bzang ye shes bstan pa
'dzin rgya mtshor 'bod pas sbyar ba de de bzhin du 'grub par gyur cig//
